text_following: The situation will be much clearer in a few weeks, when the results of the campaign for volunteers are known.

text_original: The situation will be much clearer in a few weeks, when the results of the campaign for volunteers are known.
text_preceding: The War Department has advised me that it is unable to make an accurate forecast at the present time as to whether it will be possible to maintain the strength of the Army by relying exclusively on volunteers.
text_following: The War Department will make its recommendations as to the need for the extension of Selective Service in sufficient time to enable the Congress to take action prior to the expiration of the present law on March 31st.

text_original: The War Department will make its recommendations as to the need for the extension of Selective Service in sufficient time to enable the Congress to take action prior to the expiration of the present law on March 31st.
text_preceding: The situation will be much clearer in a few weeks, when the results of the campaign for volunteers are known.
text_following: The responsibility for maintaining our armed forces at the strength necessary for our national safety rests with the Congress.

text_original: The responsibility for maintaining our armed forces at the strength necessary for our national safety rests with the Congress.
text_preceding: The War Department will make its recommendations as to the need for the extension of Selective Service in sufficient time to enable the Congress to take action prior to the expiration of the present law on March 31st.
text_following: The development of a trained citizen reserve is also vital to our national security.

text_original: The development of a trained citizen reserve is also vital to our national security.
text_preceding: The responsibility for maintaining our armed forces at the strength necessary for our national safety rests with the Congress.
text_following: This can best be accomplished through universal training.

text_original: This can best be accomplished through universal training.
text_preceding: The development of a trained citizen reserve is also vital to our national security.
text_following: I have appointed an Advisory Commission on Universal Training to study the various plans for a training program, and I expect that the recommendations of the Commission will be of benefit to the Congress and to me in reaching decisions on this problem.

text_original: I have appointed an Advisory Commission on Universal Training to study the various plans for a training program, and I expect that the recommendations of the Commission will be of benefit to the Congress and to me in reaching decisions on this problem.
text_preceding: This can best be accomplished through universal training.
text_following: The cost of the military establishment is substantial.

text_original: The cost of the military establishment is substantial.
text_preceding: I have appointed an Advisory Commission on Universal Training to study the various plans for a training program, and I expect that the recommendations of the Commission will be of benefit to the Congress and to me in reaching decisions on this problem.
text_following: There is one certain way by which we can cut costs and at the same time enhance our national security.

text_original: There is one certain way by which we can cut costs and at the same time enhance our national security.
text_preceding: The cost of the military establishment is substantial.
text_following: That is by the establishment of a single Department of National Defense.

text_original: That is by the establishment of a single Department of National Defense.
text_preceding: There is one certain way by which we can cut costs and at the same time enhance our national security.
text_following: I shall communicate with the Congress in the near future with reference to the establishment of a single Department of National Defense.

text_original: I shall communicate with the Congress in the near future with reference to the establishment of a single Department of National Defense.
text_preceding: That is by the establishment of a single Department of National Defense.
text_following: National security does not consist only of an army, a navy, and an air force.

text_original: National security does not consist only of an army, a navy, and an air force.
text_preceding: I shall communicate with the Congress in the near future with reference to the establishment of a single Department of National Defense.
text_following: It rests on a much broader basis.

text_original: It rests on a much broader basis.
text_preceding: National security does not consist only of an army, a navy, and an air force.
text_following: It depends on a sound economy of prices and wages, on prosperous agriculture, on satisfied and productive workers, on a competitive private enterprise free from monopolistic repression, on continued industrial harmony and production, on civil liberties and human freedoms in all the forces which create in our men and women a strong moral fiber and spiritual stamina.

text_original: It depends on a sound economy of prices and wages, on prosperous agriculture, on satisfied and productive workers, on a competitive private enterprise free from monopolistic repression, on continued industrial harmony and production, on civil liberties and human freedoms in all the forces which create in our men and women a strong moral fiber and spiritual stamina.
text_preceding: It rests on a much broader basis.
text_following: But we have a higher duty and a greater responsibility than the attainment of our own national security.

text_original: But we have a higher duty and a greater responsibility than the attainment of our own national security.
text_preceding: It depends on a sound economy of prices and wages, on prosperous agriculture, on satisfied and productive workers, on a competitive private enterprise free from monopolistic repression, on continued industrial harmony and production, on civil liberties and human freedoms in all the forces which create in our men and women a strong moral fiber and spiritual stamina.
text_following: Our goal is collective security for all mankind.

text_original: Our goal is collective security for all mankind.
text_preceding: But we have a higher duty and a greater responsibility than the attainment of our own national security.
text_following: If we can work in a spirit of understanding and mutual respect, we can fulfill this solemn obligation which rests upon us.

text_original: If we can work in a spirit of understanding and mutual respect, we can fulfill this solemn obligation which rests upon us.
text_preceding: Our goal is collective security for all mankind.
text_following: The spirit of the American people can set the course of world history.

text_original: The spirit of the American people can set the course of world history.
text_preceding: If we can work in a spirit of understanding and mutual respect, we can fulfill this solemn obligation which rests upon us.
text_following: If we maintain and strengthen our cherished ideals, and if we share our great bounty with war-stricken people over the world, then the faith of our citizens in freedom and democracy will be spread over the whole earth and free men everywhere will share our devotion to those ideals.

text_original: If we maintain and strengthen our cherished ideals, and if we share our great bounty with war-stricken people over the world, then the faith of our citizens in freedom and democracy will be spread over the whole earth and free men everywhere will share our devotion to those ideals.
text_preceding: The spirit of the American people can set the course of world history.
text_following: Let us have the will and the patience to do this job together.

text_original: Let us have the will and the patience to do this job together.
text_preceding: If we maintain and strengthen our cherished ideals, and if we share our great bounty with war-stricken people over the world, then the faith of our citizens in freedom and democracy will be spread over the whole earth and free men everywhere will share our devotion to those ideals.
text_following: May the Lord strengthen us in our faith.

text_original: May the Lord strengthen us in our faith.
text_preceding: Let us have the will and the patience to do this job together.
text_following: May He give us wisdom to lead the peoples of the world in His ways of peace.

text_original: May He give us wisdom to lead the peoples of the world in His ways of peace.
text_preceding: May the Lord strengthen us in our faith.

text_original: Mr. President, Mr. Speaker, and Members of the 80th Congress: We are here today to consider the state of the Union.
text_following: On this occasion, above all others, the Congress and the President should concentrate their attention, not upon party but upon the country;

text_original: On this occasion, above all others, the Congress and the President should concentrate their attention, not upon party but upon the country;
text_preceding: Mr. President, Mr. Speaker, and Members of the 80th Congress: We are here today to consider the state of the Union.
text_following: not upon things which divide us but upon those which bind us together the enduring principles of our American system, and our common aspirations for the future welfare and security of the people of the United States.

text_original: not upon things which divide us but upon those which bind us together the enduring principles of our American system, and our common aspirations for the future welfare and security of the people of the United States.
text_preceding: On this occasion, above all others, the Congress and the President should concentrate their attention, not upon party but upon the country;
text_following: The United States has become great because we, as a people, have been able to work together for great objectives even while differing about details.

text_original: The United States has become great because we, as a people, have been able to work together for great objectives even while differing about details.
text_preceding: not upon things which divide us but upon those which bind us together the enduring principles of our American system, and our common aspirations for the future welfare and security of the people of the United States.
text_following: The elements of our strength are many.

text_original: The elements of our strength are many.
text_preceding: The United States has become great because we, as a people, have been able to work together for great objectives even while differing about details.
text_following: They include our democratic government, our economic system, our great natural resources.

text_original: They include our democratic government, our economic system, our great natural resources.
text_preceding: The elements of our strength are many.
text_following: But these are only partial explanations.

text_original: But these are only partial explanations.
text_preceding: They include our democratic government, our economic system, our great natural resources.
text_following: The basic source of our strength is spiritual.

text_original: The basic source of our strength is spiritual.
text_preceding: But these are only partial explanations.
text_following: For we are a people with a faith.

text_original: For we are a people with a faith.
text_preceding: The basic source of our strength is spiritual.
text_following: We believe in the dignity of man.

text_original: We believe in the dignity of man.
text_preceding: For we are a people with a faith.
text_following: We believe that he was created in the image of the Father of us all.

text_original: We believe that he was created in the image of the Father of us all.
text_preceding: We believe in the dignity of man.
text_following: We do not believe that men exist merely to strengthen the state or to be cogs in the economic machine.

text_original: We do not believe that men exist merely to strengthen the state or to be cogs in the economic machine.
text_preceding: We believe that he was created in the image of the Father of us all.
text_following: We do believe that governments are created to serve the people and that economic systems exist to minister to their wants.

text_original: We do believe that governments are created to serve the people and that economic systems exist to minister to their wants.
text_preceding: We do not believe that men exist merely to strengthen the state or to be cogs in the economic machine.
text_following: We have a profound devotion to the welfare and rights of the individual as a human being.

text_original: We have a profound devotion to the welfare and rights of the individual as a human being.
text_preceding: We do believe that governments are created to serve the people and that economic systems exist to minister to their wants.
text_following: The faith of our people has particular meaning at this time in history because of the unsettled and changing state of the world.

text_original: The faith of our people has particular meaning at this time in history because of the unsettled and changing state of the world.
text_preceding: We have a profound devotion to the welfare and rights of the individual as a human being.
text_following: The victims of war in many lands are striving to rebuild their lives, and are seeking assurance that the tragedy of war will not occur again.

text_original: The victims of war in many lands are striving to rebuild their lives, and are seeking assurance that the tragedy of war will not occur again.
text_preceding: The faith of our people has particular meaning at this time in history because of the unsettled and changing state of the world.
text_following: Throughout the world new ideas are challenging the old.

text_original: Throughout the world new ideas are challenging the old.
text_preceding: The victims of war in many lands are striving to rebuild their lives, and are seeking assurance that the tragedy of war will not occur again.
text_following: Men of all nations are re-examining the beliefs by which they live.

text_original: Men of all nations are re-examining the beliefs by which they live.
text_preceding: Throughout the world new ideas are challenging the old.
text_following: Great scientific and industrial changes have released new forces which will affect the future course of civilization.

text_original: Great scientific and industrial changes have released new forces which will affect the future course of civilization.
text_preceding: Men of all nations are re-examining the beliefs by which they live.
text_following: The state of our Union reflects the changing nature of the modern world.

text_original: The state of our Union reflects the changing nature of the modern world.
text_preceding: Great scientific and industrial changes have released new forces which will affect the future course of civilization.
text_following: On all sides there is heartening evidence of great energy-of capacity for economic development-and even more important, capacity for spiritual growth.

text_original: On all sides there is heartening evidence of great energy-of capacity for economic development-and even more important, capacity for spiritual growth.
text_preceding: The state of our Union reflects the changing nature of the modern world.
text_following: But accompanying this great activity there are equally great questions, great anxieties, and great aspirations.

text_original: But accompanying this great activity there are equally great questions, great anxieties, and great aspirations.
text_preceding: On all sides there is heartening evidence of great energy-of capacity for economic development-and even more important, capacity for spiritual growth.
text_following: They represent the concern of an enlightened people that conditions should be so arranged as to make life more worthwhile.

text_original: They represent the concern of an enlightened people that conditions should be so arranged as to make life more worthwhile.
text_preceding: But accompanying this great activity there are equally great questions, great anxieties, and great aspirations.
text_following: We must devote ourselves to finding answers to these anxieties and aspirations.

text_original: We must devote ourselves to finding answers to these anxieties and aspirations.
text_preceding: They represent the concern of an enlightened people that conditions should be so arranged as to make life more worthwhile.
text_following: We seek answers which will embody the moral and spiritual elements of tolerance, unselfishness, and brotherhood upon which true freedom and opportunity must rest.

text_original: We seek answers which will embody the moral and spiritual elements of tolerance, unselfishness, and brotherhood upon which true freedom and opportunity must rest.
text_preceding: We must devote ourselves to finding answers to these anxieties and aspirations.
text_following: As we examine the state of our Union today, we can benefit from viewing it on a basis of the accomplishments of the last decade and of our goals for the next.

text_original: As we examine the state of our Union today, we can benefit from viewing it on a basis of the accomplishments of the last decade and of our goals for the next.
text_preceding: We seek answers which will embody the moral and spiritual elements of tolerance, unselfishness, and brotherhood upon which true freedom and opportunity must rest.
text_following: How far have we come during the last 10 years and how far can we go in the next 10?

text_original: How far have we come during the last 10 years and how far can we go in the next 10?
text_preceding: As we examine the state of our Union today, we can benefit from viewing it on a basis of the accomplishments of the last decade and of our goals for the next.
text_following: The years that followed brought untold death and destruction.

text_original: The years that followed brought untold death and destruction.
text_preceding: How far have we come during the last 10 years and how far can we go in the next 10?
text_following: We shared in the human suffering of the war, but we were fortunate enough to escape most of war's destruction.

text_original: We shared in the human suffering of the war, but we were fortunate enough to escape most of war's destruction.
text_preceding: The years that followed brought untold death and destruction.
text_following: We were able through these 10 years to expand the productive strength of our farms and factories.

text_original: We were able through these 10 years to expand the productive strength of our farms and factories.
text_preceding: We shared in the human suffering of the war, but we were fortunate enough to escape most of war's destruction.
text_following: More important, however, is the fact that these years brought us new courage, new confidence in the ideals of our free democracy.

text_original: More important, however, is the fact that these years brought us new courage, new confidence in the ideals of our free democracy.
text_preceding: We were able through these 10 years to expand the productive strength of our farms and factories.
text_following: Our deep belief in freedom and justice was reinforced in the crucible of war.

text_original: Our deep belief in freedom and justice was reinforced in the crucible of war.
text_preceding: More important, however, is the fact that these years brought us new courage, new confidence in the ideals of our free democracy.
text_following: On the foundations of our greatly strengthened economy and our renewed confidence in democratic values, we can continue to move forward.

text_original: On the foundations of our greatly strengthened economy and our renewed confidence in democratic values, we can continue to move forward.
text_preceding: Our deep belief in freedom and justice was reinforced in the crucible of war.
text_following: There are some who look with fear and distrust upon planning for the future.

text_original: There are some who look with fear and distrust upon planning for the future.
text_preceding: On the foundations of our greatly strengthened economy and our renewed confidence in democratic values, we can continue to move forward.
text_following: Yet our great national achievements have been attained by those with vision.

text_original: Yet our great national achievements have been attained by those with vision.
text_preceding: There are some who look with fear and distrust upon planning for the future.
text_following: Our Union was formed, our frontiers were pushed back, and our great industries were built by men who looked ahead.

text_original: Our Union was formed, our frontiers were pushed back, and our great industries were built by men who looked ahead.
text_preceding: Yet our great national achievements have been attained by those with vision.
text_following: I propose that we look ahead today toward those goals for the future which have the greatest bearing upon the foundations of our democracy and the happiness of our people.

text_original: I propose that we look ahead today toward those goals for the future which have the greatest bearing upon the foundations of our democracy and the happiness of our people.
text_preceding: Our Union was formed, our frontiers were pushed back, and our great industries were built by men who looked ahead.
text_following: I do so, confident in the thought that with clear objectives and with firm determination, we can, in the next 10 years, build upon the accomplishments of the past decades to achieve a glorious future.

text_original: I do so, confident in the thought that with clear objectives and with firm determination, we can, in the next 10 years, build upon the accomplishments of the past decades to achieve a glorious future.
text_preceding: I propose that we look ahead today toward those goals for the future which have the greatest bearing upon the foundations of our democracy and the happiness of our people.
text_following: Year by year, beginning now, we must make a substantial part of this progress.

text_original: Year by year, beginning now, we must make a substantial part of this progress.
text_preceding: I do so, confident in the thought that with clear objectives and with firm determination, we can, in the next 10 years, build upon the accomplishments of the past decades to achieve a glorious future.
text_following: Our first goal is to secure fully the essential human rights of our citizens.

text_original: Our first goal is to secure fully the essential human rights of our citizens.
text_preceding: Year by year, beginning now, we must make a substantial part of this progress.
text_following: The United States has always had a deep concern for human rights.

text_original: The United States has always had a deep concern for human rights.
text_preceding: Our first goal is to secure fully the essential human rights of our citizens.
text_following: Religious freedom, free speech, and freedom of thought are cherished realities in our land.

text_original: Religious freedom, free speech, and freedom of thought are cherished realities in our land.
text_preceding: The United States has always had a deep concern for human rights.
text_following: Any denial of human rights is a denial of the basic beliefs of democracy and of our regard for the worth of each individual.

text_original: Any denial of human rights is a denial of the basic beliefs of democracy and of our regard for the worth of each individual.
text_preceding: Religious freedom, free speech, and freedom of thought are cherished realities in our land.
text_following: Today, however, some of our citizens are still denied equal opportunity for education, for jobs and economic advancement, and for the expression of their views at the polls.

text_original: Today, however, some of our citizens are still denied equal opportunity for education, for jobs and economic advancement, and for the expression of their views at the polls.
text_preceding: Any denial of human rights is a denial of the basic beliefs of democracy and of our regard for the worth of each individual.
text_following: Most serious of all, some are denied equal protection under laws.

text_original: Most serious of all, some are denied equal protection under laws.
text_preceding: Today, however, some of our citizens are still denied equal opportunity for education, for jobs and economic advancement, and for the expression of their views at the polls.
text_following: Whether discrimination is based on race, or creed, or color, or land of origin, it is utterly contrary to American ideals of democracy.

text_original: Whether discrimination is based on race, or creed, or color, or land of origin, it is utterly contrary to American ideals of democracy.
text_preceding: Most serious of all, some are denied equal protection under laws.
text_following: The recent report of the President's Committee on Civil Rights points the way to corrective action by the Federal Government and by State and local governments.

text_original: The recent report of the President's Committee on Civil Rights points the way to corrective action by the Federal Government and by State and local governments.
text_preceding: Whether discrimination is based on race, or creed, or color, or land of origin, it is utterly contrary to American ideals of democracy.
text_following: Because of the need for effective Federal action, I shall send a special message to the Congress on this important subject.

text_original: Because of the need for effective Federal action, I shall send a special message to the Congress on this important subject.
text_preceding: The recent report of the President's Committee on Civil Rights points the way to corrective action by the Federal Government and by State and local governments.
text_following: We should also consider our obligation to assure the fullest possible measure of civil rights to the people of our territories and possessions.

text_original: We should also consider our obligation to assure the fullest possible measure of civil rights to the people of our territories and possessions.
text_preceding: Because of the need for effective Federal action, I shall send a special message to the Congress on this important subject.
text_following: I believe that the time has come for Alaska and Hawaii to be admitted to the Union as States.

text_original: I believe that the time has come for Alaska and Hawaii to be admitted to the Union as States.
text_preceding: We should also consider our obligation to assure the fullest possible measure of civil rights to the people of our territories and possessions.
text_following: Our second goal is to protect and develop our human resources.

text_original: Our second goal is to protect and develop our human resources.
text_preceding: I believe that the time has come for Alaska and Hawaii to be admitted to the Union as States.
text_following: The safeguarding of the rights of our citizens must be accompanied by an equal regard for their opportunities for development and their protection from economic insecurity.

text_original: The safeguarding of the rights of our citizens must be accompanied by an equal regard for their opportunities for development and their protection from economic insecurity.
text_preceding: Our second goal is to protect and develop our human resources.
text_following: In this Nation the ideals of freedom and equality can be given specific meaning in terms of health, education, social security, and housing.

text_original: In this Nation the ideals of freedom and equality can be given specific meaning in terms of health, education, social security, and housing.
text_preceding: The safeguarding of the rights of our citizens must be accompanied by an equal regard for their opportunities for development and their protection from economic insecurity.
text_following: Over the past 12 years we have erected a sound framework of social security legislation.

text_original: Over the past 12 years we have erected a sound framework of social security legislation.
text_preceding: In this Nation the ideals of freedom and equality can be given specific meaning in terms of health, education, social security, and housing.
text_following: Many millions of our citizens are now protected against the loss of income which can come with unemployment, old age, or the death of wage earners.

text_original: Many millions of our citizens are now protected against the loss of income which can come with unemployment, old age, or the death of wage earners.
text_preceding: Over the past 12 years we have erected a sound framework of social security legislation.
text_following: Yet our system has gaps and inconsistencies;

text_original: Yet our system has gaps and inconsistencies;
text_preceding: Many millions of our citizens are now protected against the loss of income which can come with unemployment, old age, or the death of wage earners.
text_following: We should now extend unemployment compensation, old age benefits, and survivors' benefits to millions who are not now protected.

text_original: We should now extend unemployment compensation, old age benefits, and survivors' benefits to millions who are not now protected.
text_preceding: Yet our system has gaps and inconsistencies;
text_following: We should also raise the level of benefits.

text_original: We should also raise the level of benefits.
text_preceding: We should now extend unemployment compensation, old age benefits, and survivors' benefits to millions who are not now protected.
text_following: The greatest gap in our social security structure is the lack of adequate provision for the Nation's health.

text_original: The greatest gap in our social security structure is the lack of adequate provision for the Nation's health.
text_preceding: We should also raise the level of benefits.
text_following: We are rightly proud of the high standards of medical care we know how to provide in the United States.

text_original: We are rightly proud of the high standards of medical care we know how to provide in the United States.
text_preceding: The greatest gap in our social security structure is the lack of adequate provision for the Nation's health.
text_following: The fact is, however, that most of our people cannot afford to pay for the care they need.

text_original: The fact is, however, that most of our people cannot afford to pay for the care they need.
text_preceding: We are rightly proud of the high standards of medical care we know how to provide in the United States.
text_following: I have often and strongly urged that this condition demands a national health program.

text_original: I have often and strongly urged that this condition demands a national health program.
text_preceding: The fact is, however, that most of our people cannot afford to pay for the care they need.
text_following: The heart of the program must be a national system of payment for medical care based on well-tried insurance principles.

text_original: The heart of the program must be a national system of payment for medical care based on well-tried insurance principles.
text_preceding: I have often and strongly urged that this condition demands a national health program.
text_following: This great Nation cannot afford to allow its citizens to suffer needlessly from the lack of proper medical care.

text_original: This great Nation cannot afford to allow its citizens to suffer needlessly from the lack of proper medical care.
text_preceding: The heart of the program must be a national system of payment for medical care based on well-tried insurance principles.
text_following: Our ultimate aim must be a comprehensive insurance system to protect all our people equally against insecurity and ill health.

text_original: Our ultimate aim must be a comprehensive insurance system to protect all our people equally against insecurity and ill health.
text_preceding: This great Nation cannot afford to allow its citizens to suffer needlessly from the lack of proper medical care.
text_following: Another fundamental aim of our democracy is to provide an adequate education for every person.

text_original: Another fundamental aim of our democracy is to provide an adequate education for every person.
text_preceding: Our ultimate aim must be a comprehensive insurance system to protect all our people equally against insecurity and ill health.
text_following: Our educational systems face a financial crisis.

text_original: Our educational systems face a financial crisis.
text_preceding: Another fundamental aim of our democracy is to provide an adequate education for every person.
text_following: It is deplorable that in a Nation as rich as ours there are millions of children who do not have adequate schoolhouses or enough teachers for a good elementary or secondary education.

text_original: It is deplorable that in a Nation as rich as ours there are millions of children who do not have adequate schoolhouses or enough teachers for a good elementary or secondary education.
text_preceding: Our educational systems face a financial crisis.
text_following: If there are educational inadequacies in any State, the whole Nation suffers.

text_original: If there are educational inadequacies in any State, the whole Nation suffers.
text_preceding: It is deplorable that in a Nation as rich as ours there are millions of children who do not have adequate schoolhouses or enough teachers for a good elementary or secondary education.
text_following: The Federal Government has a responsibility for providing financial aid to meet this crisis.

text_original: The Federal Government has a responsibility for providing financial aid to meet this crisis.
text_preceding: If there are educational inadequacies in any State, the whole Nation suffers.
text_following: In addition, we must make possible greater equality of opportunity to all our citizens for education.

text_original: In addition, we must make possible greater equality of opportunity to all our citizens for education.
text_preceding: The Federal Government has a responsibility for providing financial aid to meet this crisis.
text_following: Only by so doing can we insure that our citizens will be capable of understanding and sharing the responsibilities of democracy.

text_original: Only by so doing can we insure that our citizens will be capable of understanding and sharing the responsibilities of democracy.
text_preceding: In addition, we must make possible greater equality of opportunity to all our citizens for education.
text_following: The Government's programs for health, education, and security are of such great importance to our democracy that we should now establish an executive department for their administration.

text_original: The Government's programs for health, education, and security are of such great importance to our democracy that we should now establish an executive department for their administration.
text_preceding: Only by so doing can we insure that our citizens will be capable of understanding and sharing the responsibilities of democracy.
text_following: Health and education have their beginning in the home.

text_original: Health and education have their beginning in the home.
text_preceding: The Government's programs for health, education, and security are of such great importance to our democracy that we should now establish an executive department for their administration.
text_following: No matter what our hospitals or schools are like, the youth of our Nation are handicapped when millions of them live in city slums and country shacks.

text_original: No matter what our hospitals or schools are like, the youth of our Nation are handicapped when millions of them live in city slums and country shacks.
text_preceding: Health and education have their beginning in the home.
text_following: Within the next decade, we must see that every American family has a decent home.

text_original: Within the next decade, we must see that every American family has a decent home.
text_preceding: No matter what our hospitals or schools are like, the youth of our Nation are handicapped when millions of them live in city slums and country shacks.
text_following: As an immediate step we need the long range housing program which I have recommended on many occasions to this Congress.

text_original: As an immediate step we need the long range housing program which I have recommended on many occasions to this Congress.
text_preceding: Within the next decade, we must see that every American family has a decent home.
text_following: This should include financial aids designed to yield more housing at lower prices.

text_original: This should include financial aids designed to yield more housing at lower prices.
text_preceding: As an immediate step we need the long range housing program which I have recommended on many occasions to this Congress.
text_following: It should provide public housing for low-income families, and vigorous development of new techniques to lower the cost of building.

text_original: It should provide public housing for low-income families, and vigorous development of new techniques to lower the cost of building.
text_preceding: This should include financial aids designed to yield more housing at lower prices.
text_following: Until we can overcome the present drastic housing shortage, we must extend and strengthen rent control.

text_original: Until we can overcome the present drastic housing shortage, we must extend and strengthen rent control.
text_preceding: It should provide public housing for low-income families, and vigorous development of new techniques to lower the cost of building.
text_following: We have had, and shall continue to have, a special interest in the welfare of our veterans.

text_original: We have had, and shall continue to have, a special interest in the welfare of our veterans.
text_preceding: Until we can overcome the present drastic housing shortage, we must extend and strengthen rent control.
text_following: Over 14 million men and women who served in the armed forces in World War II have now returned to civilian life.

text_original: Over 14 million men and women who served in the armed forces in World War II have now returned to civilian life.
text_preceding: We have had, and shall continue to have, a special interest in the welfare of our veterans.
text_following: Over 2 million veterans are being helped through school.

text_original: Over 2 million veterans are being helped through school.
text_preceding: Over 14 million men and women who served in the armed forces in World War II have now returned to civilian life.
text_following: Millions have been aided while finding jobs, and have been helped in buying homes, in obtaining medical care, and in adjusting themselves to physical handicaps.

text_original: Millions have been aided while finding jobs, and have been helped in buying homes, in obtaining medical care, and in adjusting themselves to physical handicaps.
text_preceding: Over 2 million veterans are being helped through school.
text_following: All but a very few veterans have successfully made the transition from military life to their home communities.

text_original: All but a very few veterans have successfully made the transition from military life to their home communities.
text_preceding: Millions have been aided while finding jobs, and have been helped in buying homes, in obtaining medical care, and in adjusting themselves to physical handicaps.
text_following: The success of our veterans' program is proved by this fact.

text_original: The success of our veterans' program is proved by this fact.
text_preceding: All but a very few veterans have successfully made the transition from military life to their home communities.
text_following: This Nation is proud of the eagerness shown by our veterans to become self-reliant and self-supporting citizens.

text_original: This Nation is proud of the eagerness shown by our veterans to become self-reliant and self-supporting citizens.
text_preceding: The success of our veterans' program is proved by this fact.
text_following: Our third goal is to conserve and use our natural resources so that they can contribute most effectively to the welfare of our people.

text_original: Our third goal is to conserve and use our natural resources so that they can contribute most effectively to the welfare of our people.
text_preceding: This Nation is proud of the eagerness shown by our veterans to become self-reliant and self-supporting citizens.
text_following: The resources given by nature to this country are rich and extensive.

text_original: The resources given by nature to this country are rich and extensive.
text_preceding: Our third goal is to conserve and use our natural resources so that they can contribute most effectively to the welfare of our people.
text_following: The material foundations of our growth and economic development are the bounty of our fields, the wealth of our mines and forests, and the energy of our waters.

text_original: The material foundations of our growth and economic development are the bounty of our fields, the wealth of our mines and forests, and the energy of our waters.
text_preceding: The resources given by nature to this country are rich and extensive.
text_following: As a Nation, we are coming to appreciate more each day the close relationship between the conservation of these resources and the preservation of our national strength.

text_original: As a Nation, we are coming to appreciate more each day the close relationship between the conservation of these resources and the preservation of our national strength.
text_preceding: The material foundations of our growth and economic development are the bounty of our fields, the wealth of our mines and forests, and the energy of our waters.
text_following: We are doing far less than we know how to do to make use of our resources without destroying them.

text_original: We are doing far less than we know how to do to make use of our resources without destroying them.
text_preceding: As a Nation, we are coming to appreciate more each day the close relationship between the conservation of these resources and the preservation of our national strength.
text_following: Both the public and private use of these resources must have the primary objective of maintaining and increasing these basic supports for an expanding future.

text_original: Both the public and private use of these resources must have the primary objective of maintaining and increasing these basic supports for an expanding future.
text_preceding: We are doing far less than we know how to do to make use of our resources without destroying them.
text_following: We must continue to take specific steps toward this goal.

text_original: We must continue to take specific steps toward this goal.
text_preceding: Both the public and private use of these resources must have the primary objective of maintaining and increasing these basic supports for an expanding future.
text_following: We must vigorously defend our natural wealth against those who would misuse it for selfish gain.

text_original: We must vigorously defend our natural wealth against those who would misuse it for selfish gain.
text_preceding: We must continue to take specific steps toward this goal.
text_following: We need accurate and comprehensive knowledge of our mineral resources and must intensify our efforts to develop new supplies and to acquire stockpiles of scarce materials.

text_original: We need accurate and comprehensive knowledge of our mineral resources and must intensify our efforts to develop new supplies and to acquire stockpiles of scarce materials.
text_preceding: We must vigorously defend our natural wealth against those who would misuse it for selfish gain.
text_following: We need to protect and restore our land public and private-through combating erosion and rebuilding the fertility of the soil.

text_original: We need to protect and restore our land public and private-through combating erosion and rebuilding the fertility of the soil.
text_preceding: We need accurate and comprehensive knowledge of our mineral resources and must intensify our efforts to develop new supplies and to acquire stockpiles of scarce materials.
text_following: We must expand our reclamation program to bring millions of acres of arid land into production, and to improve water supplies for additional millions of acres.

text_original: We must expand our reclamation program to bring millions of acres of arid land into production, and to improve water supplies for additional millions of acres.
text_preceding: We need to protect and restore our land public and private-through combating erosion and rebuilding the fertility of the soil.
text_following: This will provide new opportunities for veterans and others, particularly in the West, and aid in providing a rising living standard for a growing population.

text_original: This will provide new opportunities for veterans and others, particularly in the West, and aid in providing a rising living standard for a growing population.
text_preceding: We must expand our reclamation program to bring millions of acres of arid land into production, and to improve water supplies for additional millions of acres.
text_following: We must protect and restore our forests by sustained-yield forestry and by planting new trees in areas now slashed and barren.

text_original: We must protect and restore our forests by sustained-yield forestry and by planting new trees in areas now slashed and barren.
text_preceding: This will provide new opportunities for veterans and others, particularly in the West, and aid in providing a rising living standard for a growing population.
text_following: We must continue to erect multiple-purpose dams on our great rivers-not only to reclaim land, but also to prevent floods, to extend our inland waterways and to provide hydroelectric power.

text_original: We must continue to erect multiple-purpose dams on our great rivers-not only to reclaim land, but also to prevent floods, to extend our inland waterways and to provide hydroelectric power.
text_preceding: We must protect and restore our forests by sustained-yield forestry and by planting new trees in areas now slashed and barren.
text_following: This public power must not be monopolized for private gain.

text_original: This public power must not be monopolized for private gain.
text_preceding: We must continue to erect multiple-purpose dams on our great rivers-not only to reclaim land, but also to prevent floods, to extend our inland waterways and to provide hydroelectric power.
text_following: Only through well established policies of transmitting power directly to its market and thus encouraging widespread use at low rates can the Federal Government assure the people of their full share of its benefits.

text_original: Only through well established policies of transmitting power directly to its market and thus encouraging widespread use at low rates can the Federal Government assure the people of their full share of its benefits.
text_preceding: This public power must not be monopolized for private gain.
text_following: Additional power - public and private - is needed to raise the ceilings now imposed by power shortages on industrial and agricultural development.

text_original: Additional power - public and private - is needed to raise the ceilings now imposed by power shortages on industrial and agricultural development.
text_preceding: Only through well established policies of transmitting power directly to its market and thus encouraging widespread use at low rates can the Federal Government assure the people of their full share of its benefits.
text_following: We should achieve the wise use of resources through the integrated development of our great river basins.

text_original: We should achieve the wise use of resources through the integrated development of our great river basins.
text_preceding: Additional power - public and private - is needed to raise the ceilings now imposed by power shortages on industrial and agricultural development.
text_following: We can learn much from our Tennessee Valley experience.

text_original: We can learn much from our Tennessee Valley experience.
text_preceding: We should achieve the wise use of resources through the integrated development of our great river basins.
text_following: We should no longer delay in applying the lessons of that vast undertaking to our other great river basins.

text_original: We should no longer delay in applying the lessons of that vast undertaking to our other great river basins.
text_preceding: We can learn much from our Tennessee Valley experience.
text_following: Our fourth goal is to lift the standard of living for all our people by strengthening our economic system and sharing more broadly among our people the goods we produce.

text_original: Our fourth goal is to lift the standard of living for all our people by strengthening our economic system and sharing more broadly among our people the goods we produce.
text_preceding: We should no longer delay in applying the lessons of that vast undertaking to our other great river basins.
text_following: The amazing economic progress of the past 10 years points the way for the next 10.

text_original: The amazing economic progress of the past 10 years points the way for the next 10.
text_preceding: Our fourth goal is to lift the standard of living for all our people by strengthening our economic system and sharing more broadly among our people the goods we produce.
text_following: Today 14 million more people have jobs than in 1938.

text_original: Today 14 million more people have jobs than in 1938.
text_preceding: The amazing economic progress of the past 10 years points the way for the next 10.
text_following: Our yearly output of goods and services has increased by two-thirds.

text_original: Our yearly output of goods and services has increased by two-thirds.
text_preceding: Today 14 million more people have jobs than in 1938.
text_following: The average income of our people, measured in dollars of equal purchasing power, has increased-after taxes-by more than 50 percent.

text_original: The average income of our people, measured in dollars of equal purchasing power, has increased-after taxes-by more than 50 percent.
text_preceding: Our yearly output of goods and services has increased by two-thirds.
text_following: In no other 10 years have farmers, businessmen, and wage earners made such great gains.

text_original: In no other 10 years have farmers, businessmen, and wage earners made such great gains.
text_preceding: The average income of our people, measured in dollars of equal purchasing power, has increased-after taxes-by more than 50 percent.
text_following: We may not be able to expand as rapidly in the next decade as in the last, because we are now starting from full employment and very high production.

text_original: We may not be able to expand as rapidly in the next decade as in the last, because we are now starting from full employment and very high production.
text_preceding: In no other 10 years have farmers, businessmen, and wage earners made such great gains.
text_following: But we can increase our annual output by at least one-third above the present level.

text_original: But we can increase our annual output by at least one-third above the present level.
text_preceding: We may not be able to expand as rapidly in the next decade as in the last, because we are now starting from full employment and very high production.
text_following: We can lift our standard of living to nearly double what it was 10 years ago.

text_original: We can lift our standard of living to nearly double what it was 10 years ago.
text_preceding: But we can increase our annual output by at least one-third above the present level.
text_following: If we distribute these gains properly, we can go far toward stamping out poverty in our generation.

text_original: If we distribute these gains properly, we can go far toward stamping out poverty in our generation.
text_preceding: We can lift our standard of living to nearly double what it was 10 years ago.
text_following: To do this, agriculture, business, and labor must move forward together.

text_original: To do this, agriculture, business, and labor must move forward together.
text_preceding: If we distribute these gains properly, we can go far toward stamping out poverty in our generation.
text_following: Permanent farm prosperity and agricultural abundance will be achieved only as our whole economy grows and prospers.

text_original: Permanent farm prosperity and agricultural abundance will be achieved only as our whole economy grows and prospers.
text_preceding: To do this, agriculture, business, and labor must move forward together.
text_following: The farmer can sell more food at good prices when the incomes of wage earners are high and when there is full employment.

text_original: The farmer can sell more food at good prices when the incomes of wage earners are high and when there is full employment.
text_preceding: Permanent farm prosperity and agricultural abundance will be achieved only as our whole economy grows and prospers.
text_following: Adequate diets for every American family, and the needs of our industries at full production, will absorb a farm output well above our present levels.

text_original: Adequate diets for every American family, and the needs of our industries at full production, will absorb a farm output well above our present levels.
text_preceding: The farmer can sell more food at good prices when the incomes of wage earners are high and when there is full employment.
text_following: Although the average farmer is now better off than ever before, farm families as a whole have only begun to catch up with the standards of living enjoyed in the cities.

text_original: Although the average farmer is now better off than ever before, farm families as a whole have only begun to catch up with the standards of living enjoyed in the cities.
text_preceding: Adequate diets for every American family, and the needs of our industries at full production, will absorb a farm output well above our present levels.
text_following: In 1946, the average income of farm people was $779, contrasted with an average income of $1,288 for non-farm people.

text_original: In 1946, the average income of farm people was $779, contrasted with an average income of $1,288 for non-farm people.
text_preceding: Although the average farmer is now better off than ever before, farm families as a whole have only begun to catch up with the standards of living enjoyed in the cities.
text_following: Within the next decade, we should eliminate elements of inequality in these living standards.

text_original: Within the next decade, we should eliminate elements of inequality in these living standards.
text_preceding: In 1946, the average income of farm people was $779, contrasted with an average income of $1,288 for non-farm people.
text_following: To this end our farm program should enable the farmer to market his varied crops at fair price levels and to improve his standard of living.

text_original: To this end our farm program should enable the farmer to market his varied crops at fair price levels and to improve his standard of living.
text_preceding: Within the next decade, we should eliminate elements of inequality in these living standards.
text_following: We need to continue price supports for major farm commodities on a basis which will afford reasonable protection against fluctuations in the levels of production and demand.

text_original: We need to continue price supports for major farm commodities on a basis which will afford reasonable protection against fluctuations in the levels of production and demand.
text_preceding: To this end our farm program should enable the farmer to market his varied crops at fair price levels and to improve his standard of living.
text_following: The present price support program must be reexamined and modernized.

text_original: The present price support program must be reexamined and modernized.
text_preceding: We need to continue price supports for major farm commodities on a basis which will afford reasonable protection against fluctuations in the levels of production and demand.
text_following: Crop insurance should be strengthened and its benefits extended in order to protect the farmer against the special hazards to which he is subject.

text_original: Crop insurance should be strengthened and its benefits extended in order to protect the farmer against the special hazards to which he is subject.
text_preceding: The present price support program must be reexamined and modernized.
text_following: We also need to improve the means for getting farm products into markets and into the hands of consumers.

text_original: We also need to improve the means for getting farm products into markets and into the hands of consumers.
text_preceding: Crop insurance should be strengthened and its benefits extended in order to protect the farmer against the special hazards to which he is subject.
text_following: Cooperatives which directly or indirectly serve this purpose must be encouraged - not discouraged.

text_original: Cooperatives which directly or indirectly serve this purpose must be encouraged - not discouraged.
text_preceding: We also need to improve the means for getting farm products into markets and into the hands of consumers.
text_following: The school lunch program should be continued and adequately financed.

text_original: The school lunch program should be continued and adequately financed.
text_preceding: Cooperatives which directly or indirectly serve this purpose must be encouraged - not discouraged.
text_following: We need to go forward with the rural electrification program to bring the benefits of electricity to all our farm population.

text_original: We need to go forward with the rural electrification program to bring the benefits of electricity to all our farm population.
text_preceding: The school lunch program should be continued and adequately financed.
text_following: We can, and must, aid and encourage farmers to conserve their soil resources and restore the fertility of the land that has suffered from neglect or unwise use.

text_original: We can, and must, aid and encourage farmers to conserve their soil resources and restore the fertility of the land that has suffered from neglect or unwise use.
text_preceding: We need to go forward with the rural electrification program to bring the benefits of electricity to all our farm population.
text_following: All these are practical measures upon which we should act immediately to enable agriculture to make its full contribution to our prosperity.

text_original: All these are practical measures upon which we should act immediately to enable agriculture to make its full contribution to our prosperity.
text_preceding: We can, and must, aid and encourage farmers to conserve their soil resources and restore the fertility of the land that has suffered from neglect or unwise use.
text_following: We must also strengthen our economic system within the next decade by enlarging our industrial capacity within the framework of our free enterprise system.

text_original: We must also strengthen our economic system within the next decade by enlarging our industrial capacity within the framework of our free enterprise system.
text_preceding: All these are practical measures upon which we should act immediately to enable agriculture to make its full contribution to our prosperity.
text_following: We are today far short of the industrial capacity we need for a growing future.

text_original: We are today far short of the industrial capacity we need for a growing future.
text_preceding: We must also strengthen our economic system within the next decade by enlarging our industrial capacity within the framework of our free enterprise system.
text_following: At least $50 billion should be invested by industry to improve and expand our productive facilities over the next few years.

text_original: At least $50 billion should be invested by industry to improve and expand our productive facilities over the next few years.
text_preceding: We are today far short of the industrial capacity we need for a growing future.
text_following: But this is only the beginning.

text_original: But this is only the beginning.
text_preceding: At least $50 billion should be invested by industry to improve and expand our productive facilities over the next few years.
text_following: The industrial application of atomic energy and other scientific advances will constantly open up further opportunities for expansion.

text_original: The industrial application of atomic energy and other scientific advances will constantly open up further opportunities for expansion.
text_preceding: But this is only the beginning.
text_following: Farm prosperity and high employment will call for an immensely increased output of goods and services.

text_original: Farm prosperity and high employment will call for an immensely increased output of goods and services.
text_preceding: The industrial application of atomic energy and other scientific advances will constantly open up further opportunities for expansion.
text_following: Growth and vitality in our economy depend on vigorous private enterprise.

text_original: Growth and vitality in our economy depend on vigorous private enterprise.
text_preceding: Farm prosperity and high employment will call for an immensely increased output of goods and services.
text_following: Free competition is the key to industrial development, full production and employment, fair prices, and an ever improving standard of living.

text_original: Free competition is the key to industrial development, full production and employment, fair prices, and an ever improving standard of living.
text_preceding: Growth and vitality in our economy depend on vigorous private enterprise.
text_following: Competition is seriously limited today in many industries by the concentration of economic power and other elements of monopoly.

text_original: Competition is seriously limited today in many industries by the concentration of economic power and other elements of monopoly.
text_preceding: Free competition is the key to industrial development, full production and employment, fair prices, and an ever improving standard of living.
text_following: The appropriation of sufficient funds to permit proper enforcement of the present antitrust laws is essential.

text_original: The appropriation of sufficient funds to permit proper enforcement of the present antitrust laws is essential.
text_preceding: Competition is seriously limited today in many industries by the concentration of economic power and other elements of monopoly.
text_following: Beyond that we should go on to strengthen our legislation to protect competition.

text_original: Beyond that we should go on to strengthen our legislation to protect competition.
text_preceding: The appropriation of sufficient funds to permit proper enforcement of the present antitrust laws is essential.
text_following: Another basic element of a strong economic system is the well-being of the wage earners.

text_original: Another basic element of a strong economic system is the well-being of the wage earners.
text_preceding: Beyond that we should go on to strengthen our legislation to protect competition.
text_following: We have learned that the well-being of workers depends on high production and consequent high employment.

text_original: We have learned that the well-being of workers depends on high production and consequent high employment.
text_preceding: Another basic element of a strong economic system is the well-being of the wage earners.
text_following: We have learned equally well that the welfare of industry and agriculture depends on high incomes for our workers.

text_original: We have learned equally well that the welfare of industry and agriculture depends on high incomes for our workers.
text_preceding: We have learned that the well-being of workers depends on high production and consequent high employment.
text_following: The Government has wisely chosen to set a floor under wages.

text_original: The Government has wisely chosen to set a floor under wages.
text_preceding: We have learned equally well that the welfare of industry and agriculture depends on high incomes for our workers.
text_following: But our 40-cent minimum wage is inadequate and obsolete.

text_original: But our 40-cent minimum wage is inadequate and obsolete.
text_preceding: The Government has wisely chosen to set a floor under wages.
text_following: I recommend the lifting of the minimum wage to 75 cents an hour.

text_original: I recommend the lifting of the minimum wage to 75 cents an hour.
text_preceding: But our 40-cent minimum wage is inadequate and obsolete.
text_following: In general, however, we must continue to rely on our sound system of collective bargaining to set wage scales.

text_original: In general, however, we must continue to rely on our sound system of collective bargaining to set wage scales.
text_preceding: I recommend the lifting of the minimum wage to 75 cents an hour.
text_following: Workers' incomes should increase at a rate consistent with the maintenance of sound price, profit, and wage relationships and with increase of productivity.

text_original: Workers' incomes should increase at a rate consistent with the maintenance of sound price, profit, and wage relationships and with increase of productivity.
text_preceding: In general, however, we must continue to rely on our sound system of collective bargaining to set wage scales.
text_following: The Government's part in labor-management relations is now largely controlled by the terms of the Labor-Management Relations Act of 1947.

text_original: The Government's part in labor-management relations is now largely controlled by the terms of the Labor-Management Relations Act of 1947.
text_preceding: Workers' incomes should increase at a rate consistent with the maintenance of sound price, profit, and wage relationships and with increase of productivity.
text_following: I made my attitude clear on this act in my veto message to the Congress last June.

text_original: I made my attitude clear on this act in my veto message to the Congress last June.
text_preceding: The Government's part in labor-management relations is now largely controlled by the terms of the Labor-Management Relations Act of 1947.
text_following: Nothing has occurred since to change my opinion of this law.

text_original: Nothing has occurred since to change my opinion of this law.
text_preceding: I made my attitude clear on this act in my veto message to the Congress last June.
text_following: As long as it remains the law of the land, however, I shall carry out my constitutional duty and administer it.

text_original: As long as it remains the law of the land, however, I shall carry out my constitutional duty and administer it.
text_preceding: Nothing has occurred since to change my opinion of this law.
text_following: As we look ahead we can understand the crucial importance of restraint and wisdom in arriving at new labor-management contracts.

text_original: As we look ahead we can understand the crucial importance of restraint and wisdom in arriving at new labor-management contracts.
text_preceding: As long as it remains the law of the land, however, I shall carry out my constitutional duty and administer it.
text_following: Work stoppages would result in a loss of production-a loss which could bring higher prices for our citizens and could also deny the necessities of life to the hard pressed peoples of other lands.

text_original: Work stoppages would result in a loss of production-a loss which could bring higher prices for our citizens and could also deny the necessities of life to the hard pressed peoples of other lands.
text_preceding: As we look ahead we can understand the crucial importance of restraint and wisdom in arriving at new labor-management contracts.
text_following: It is my sincere hope that the representatives of labor and of industry will bear in mind that the Nation as a whole has a vital stake in the success of their bargaining efforts.

text_original: It is my sincere hope that the representatives of labor and of industry will bear in mind that the Nation as a whole has a vital stake in the success of their bargaining efforts.
text_preceding: Work stoppages would result in a loss of production-a loss which could bring higher prices for our citizens and could also deny the necessities of life to the hard pressed peoples of other lands.
text_following: If we surmount our current economic difficulties, we can move ahead to a great increase in our national income which will enable all our people to enjoy richer and fuller lives.

text_original: If we surmount our current economic difficulties, we can move ahead to a great increase in our national income which will enable all our people to enjoy richer and fuller lives.
text_preceding: It is my sincere hope that the representatives of labor and of industry will bear in mind that the Nation as a whole has a vital stake in the success of their bargaining efforts.
text_following: All of us must advance together.

text_original: All of us must advance together.
text_preceding: If we surmount our current economic difficulties, we can move ahead to a great increase in our national income which will enable all our people to enjoy richer and fuller lives.
text_following: One fifth of our families now have average annual incomes of less than $850.

text_original: One fifth of our families now have average annual incomes of less than $850.
text_preceding: All of us must advance together.
text_following: We must see that our gains in national income are made more largely available to those with low incomes, whose need is greatest.

text_original: We must see that our gains in national income are made more largely available to those with low incomes, whose need is greatest.
text_preceding: One fifth of our families now have average annual incomes of less than $850.
text_following: This will benefit us all through providing a stable foundation of buying power to maintain prosperity.

text_original: This will benefit us all through providing a stable foundation of buying power to maintain prosperity.
text_preceding: We must see that our gains in national income are made more largely available to those with low incomes, whose need is greatest.
text_following: Business, labor, agriculture, and Government, working together, must develop the policies which will make possible the realization of the full benefits of our economic system.

text_original: Business, labor, agriculture, and Government, working together, must develop the policies which will make possible the realization of the full benefits of our economic system.
text_preceding: This will benefit us all through providing a stable foundation of buying power to maintain prosperity.
text_following: Our fifth goal is to achieve world peace based on principles of freedom and justice and the equality of all nations.

text_original: Our fifth goal is to achieve world peace based on principles of freedom and justice and the equality of all nations.
text_preceding: Business, labor, agriculture, and Government, working together, must develop the policies which will make possible the realization of the full benefits of our economic system.
text_following: Twice within our generation, world wars have taught us that we cannot isolate ourselves from the rest of the world.

text_original: Twice within our generation, world wars have taught us that we cannot isolate ourselves from the rest of the world.
text_preceding: Our fifth goal is to achieve world peace based on principles of freedom and justice and the equality of all nations.
text_following: We have learned that the loss of freedom in any area of the world means a loss of freedom to ourselves - that the loss of independence by any nation adds directly to the insecurity of the United States and all free nations.

text_original: We have learned that the loss of freedom in any area of the world means a loss of freedom to ourselves - that the loss of independence by any nation adds directly to the insecurity of the United States and all free nations.
text_preceding: Twice within our generation, world wars have taught us that we cannot isolate ourselves from the rest of the world.
text_following: We have learned that a healthy world economy is essential to world peace-that economic distress is a disease whose evil effects spread far beyond the boundaries of the afflicted nation.

text_original: We have learned that a healthy world economy is essential to world peace-that economic distress is a disease whose evil effects spread far beyond the boundaries of the afflicted nation.
text_preceding: We have learned that the loss of freedom in any area of the world means a loss of freedom to ourselves - that the loss of independence by any nation adds directly to the insecurity of the United States and all free nations.
text_following: For these reasons the United States is vigorously following policies designed to achieve a peaceful and prosperous world.

text_original: For these reasons the United States is vigorously following policies designed to achieve a peaceful and prosperous world.
text_preceding: We have learned that a healthy world economy is essential to world peace-that economic distress is a disease whose evil effects spread far beyond the boundaries of the afflicted nation.
text_following: We are giving, and will continue to give, our full support to the United Nations.

text_original: We are giving, and will continue to give, our full support to the United Nations.
text_preceding: For these reasons the United States is vigorously following policies designed to achieve a peaceful and prosperous world.
text_following: While that organization has encountered unforeseen and unwelcome difficulties, I am confident of its ultimate success.

text_original: While that organization has encountered unforeseen and unwelcome difficulties, I am confident of its ultimate success.
text_preceding: We are giving, and will continue to give, our full support to the United Nations.
text_following: We are also devoting our efforts toward world economic recovery and the revival of world trade.

text_original: We are also devoting our efforts toward world economic recovery and the revival of world trade.
text_preceding: While that organization has encountered unforeseen and unwelcome difficulties, I am confident of its ultimate success.
text_following: These actions are closely related and mutually supporting.

text_original: These actions are closely related and mutually supporting.
text_preceding: We are also devoting our efforts toward world economic recovery and the revival of world trade.
text_following: We believe that the United States can be an effective force for world peace only if it is strong.

text_original: We believe that the United States can be an effective force for world peace only if it is strong.
text_preceding: These actions are closely related and mutually supporting.
text_following: We look forward to the day when nations will decrease their armaments.

text_original: We are seeking to restore the world trading system which was shattered by the war and to remedy the economic paralysis which grips many countries.

text_original: To restore world trade we have recently taken the lead in bringing about the greatest reduction of world tariffs that the world has ever seen.

text_original: In my recent message to the Congress, I outlined the reasons why it is wise and necessary for the United States to extend this support.

text_original: I want to reaffirm my belief in the soundness and the promise of this proposal.
text_preceding: In my recent message to the Congress, I outlined the reasons why it is wise and necessary for the United States to extend this support.

text_following: We are following a sound, constructive, and practical course in carrying out our determination to achieve peace.

text_original: We are following a sound, constructive, and practical course in carrying out our determination to achieve peace.
