text_following: We are fighting poverty, hunger, and suffering.

text_original: We are fighting poverty, hunger, and suffering.
text_preceding: We are following a sound, constructive, and practical course in carrying out our determination to achieve peace.
text_following: We are building toward a world where all nations, large and small alike, may live free from the fear of aggression.

text_original: We are building toward a world where all nations, large and small alike, may live free from the fear of aggression.
text_preceding: We are fighting poverty, hunger, and suffering.
text_following: Above all else, we are striving to achieve a concord among the peoples of the world based upon the dignity of the individual and the brotherhood of man.

text_original: Above all else, we are striving to achieve a concord among the peoples of the world based upon the dignity of the individual and the brotherhood of man.
text_preceding: We are building toward a world where all nations, large and small alike, may live free from the fear of aggression.
text_following: We can go forward with confidence that we are following sound policies, both at home and with other nations, which will lead us toward our great goals for economic, social and moral achievement.

text_original: We can go forward with confidence that we are following sound policies, both at home and with other nations, which will lead us toward our great goals for economic, social and moral achievement.
text_preceding: Above all else, we are striving to achieve a concord among the peoples of the world based upon the dignity of the individual and the brotherhood of man.
text_following: As we enter the new year, we must surmount one major problem which affects all our goals.

text_original: As we enter the new year, we must surmount one major problem which affects all our goals.
text_preceding: We can go forward with confidence that we are following sound policies, both at home and with other nations, which will lead us toward our great goals for economic, social and moral achievement.
text_following: That is the problem of inflation.

text_original: That is the problem of inflation.
text_preceding: As we enter the new year, we must surmount one major problem which affects all our goals.
text_following: Already inflation in this country is undermining the living standards of millions of families.

text_original: Already inflation in this country is undermining the living standards of millions of families.
text_preceding: That is the problem of inflation.
text_following: Housing has reached fantastic price levels.

text_original: Housing has reached fantastic price levels.
text_preceding: Already inflation in this country is undermining the living standards of millions of families.
text_following: Schools and hospitals are in financial distress.

text_original: Schools and hospitals are in financial distress.
text_preceding: Housing has reached fantastic price levels.
text_following: Inflation threatens to bring on disagreement and strife between labor and management.

text_original: Inflation threatens to bring on disagreement and strife between labor and management.
text_preceding: Schools and hospitals are in financial distress.
text_following: Worst of all, inflation holds the threat of another depression, just as we had a depression after the unstable boom following the First World War.

text_original: Worst of all, inflation holds the threat of another depression, just as we had a depression after the unstable boom following the First World War.
text_preceding: Inflation threatens to bring on disagreement and strife between labor and management.
text_following: When I announced last October that the Congress was being called into session, I described the price increases which had taken place since June 1946.

text_original: When I announced last October that the Congress was being called into session, I described the price increases which had taken place since June 1946.
text_preceding: Worst of all, inflation holds the threat of another depression, just as we had a depression after the unstable boom following the First World War.
text_following: Wholesale prices had increased 40 percent; retail prices had increased 23 percent.

text_original: Wholesale prices had increased 40 percent; retail prices had increased 23 percent.
text_preceding: When I announced last October that the Congress was being called into session, I described the price increases which had taken place since June 1946.
text_following: Since October prices have continued to rise.

text_original: Since October prices have continued to rise.
text_preceding: Wholesale prices had increased 40 percent; retail prices had increased 23 percent.
text_following: Wholesale prices have gone up at an annual rate of 18 percent.

text_original: Wholesale prices have gone up at an annual rate of 18 percent.
text_preceding: Since October prices have continued to rise.
text_following: Retail prices have gone up at an annual rate of 10 percent.

text_original: Retail prices have gone up at an annual rate of 10 percent.
text_preceding: Wholesale prices have gone up at an annual rate of 18 percent.
text_following: The events which have occurred since I presented my 10-point anti-inflation program to the Congress in November have made it even clearer that all in points are essential.

text_original: The events which have occurred since I presented my 10-point anti-inflation program to the Congress in November have made it even clearer that all in points are essential.
text_preceding: Retail prices have gone up at an annual rate of 10 percent.
text_following: High prices must not be our means of rationing.

text_original: High prices must not be our means of rationing.
text_preceding: The events which have occurred since I presented my 10-point anti-inflation program to the Congress in November have made it even clearer that all in points are essential.
text_following: We must deal effectively and at once with the high cost of living.

text_original: We must deal effectively and at once with the high cost of living.
text_preceding: High prices must not be our means of rationing.
text_following: We must stop the spiral of inflation.

text_original: We must stop the spiral of inflation.
text_preceding: We must deal effectively and at once with the high cost of living.
text_following: I trust that within the shortest possible time the Congress will make available to the Government the weapons that are so desperately needed in the fight against inflation.

text_original: I trust that within the shortest possible time the Congress will make available to the Government the weapons that are so desperately needed in the fight against inflation.
text_preceding: We must stop the spiral of inflation.
text_following: One of the most powerful anti-inflationary factors in our economy today is the excess of Government revenues over expenditures.

text_original: One of the most powerful anti-inflationary factors in our economy today is the excess of Government revenues over expenditures.
text_preceding: I trust that within the shortest possible time the Congress will make available to the Government the weapons that are so desperately needed in the fight against inflation.
text_following: Government expenditures have been and must continue to be held at the lowest safe levels.

text_original: Government expenditures have been and must continue to be held at the lowest safe levels.
text_preceding: One of the most powerful anti-inflationary factors in our economy today is the excess of Government revenues over expenditures.
text_following: Since V-J day Federal expenditures have been sharply reduced.

text_original: Since V-J day Federal expenditures have been sharply reduced.
text_preceding: Government expenditures have been and must continue to be held at the lowest safe levels.
text_following: They have been cut from more than $63 billion in the fiscal year 1946 to less than $38 billion in the present fiscal year.

text_original: They have been cut from more than $63 billion in the fiscal year 1946 to less than $38 billion in the present fiscal year.
text_preceding: Since V-J day Federal expenditures have been sharply reduced.
text_following: The number of civilian employees has been cut nearly in half-from 3/4 million down to 2 million.

text_original: The number of civilian employees has been cut nearly in half-from 3/4 million down to 2 million.
text_preceding: They have been cut from more than $63 billion in the fiscal year 1946 to less than $38 billion in the present fiscal year.
text_following: On the other hand, Government revenues must not be reduced.

text_original: On the other hand, Government revenues must not be reduced.
text_preceding: The number of civilian employees has been cut nearly in half-from 3/4 million down to 2 million.
text_following: Until inflation has been stopped there should be no cut in taxes that is not offset by additions at another point in our tax structure.

text_original: Until inflation has been stopped there should be no cut in taxes that is not offset by additions at another point in our tax structure.
text_preceding: On the other hand, Government revenues must not be reduced.
text_following: Certain adjustments should be made within our existing tax structure that will not affect total receipts, yet will adjust the tax burden so that those least able to pay will have their burden lessened by the transfer of a portion of it to those best able to pay.

text_original: Certain adjustments should be made within our existing tax structure that will not affect total receipts, yet will adjust the tax burden so that those least able to pay will have their burden lessened by the transfer of a portion of it to those best able to pay.
text_preceding: Until inflation has been stopped there should be no cut in taxes that is not offset by additions at another point in our tax structure.
text_following: Many of our families today are suffering hardship because of the high cost of living.

text_original: Many of our families today are suffering hardship because of the high cost of living.
text_preceding: Certain adjustments should be made within our existing tax structure that will not affect total receipts, yet will adjust the tax burden so that those least able to pay will have their burden lessened by the transfer of a portion of it to those best able to pay.
text_following: At the same time profits of corporations have reached an all-time record in 1947.

text_original: At the same time profits of corporations have reached an all-time record in 1947.
text_preceding: Many of our families today are suffering hardship because of the high cost of living.
text_following: Corporate profits total $17 billion after taxes.

text_original: Corporate profits total $17 billion after taxes.
text_preceding: At the same time profits of corporations have reached an all-time record in 1947.
text_following: This compared with $12.5 billion in 1946, the previous high year.

text_original: This compared with $12.5 billion in 1946, the previous high year.
text_preceding: Corporate profits total $17 billion after taxes.
text_following: Because of this extraordinarily high level of profits, corporations can well afford to carry a larger share of the tax load at this time.

text_original: Because of this extraordinarily high level of profits, corporations can well afford to carry a larger share of the tax load at this time.
text_preceding: This compared with $12.5 billion in 1946, the previous high year.
text_following: During this period in which the high cost of living is bearing down on so many of our families, tax adjustments should be made to ease their burden.

text_original: During this period in which the high cost of living is bearing down on so many of our families, tax adjustments should be made to ease their burden.
text_preceding: Because of this extraordinarily high level of profits, corporations can well afford to carry a larger share of the tax load at this time.
text_following: The low-income group particularly is being pressed very hard.

text_original: The low-income group particularly is being pressed very hard.
text_preceding: During this period in which the high cost of living is bearing down on so many of our families, tax adjustments should be made to ease their burden.
text_following: To this group a tax adjustment would result in a saving that could be used to buy the necessities of life.

text_original: To this group a tax adjustment would result in a saving that could be used to buy the necessities of life.
text_preceding: The low-income group particularly is being pressed very hard.
text_following: I recommend therefore that, effective January I, 1948, a cost of living tax credit be extended to our people consisting of a credit of $40 to each individual taxpayer and an additional credit of $40 for each dependent.

text_original: I recommend therefore that, effective January I, 1948, a cost of living tax credit be extended to our people consisting of a credit of $40 to each individual taxpayer and an additional credit of $40 for each dependent.
text_preceding: To this group a tax adjustment would result in a saving that could be used to buy the necessities of life.
text_following: Thus the income tax of a man with a wife and two children would be reduced $160.

text_original: Thus the income tax of a man with a wife and two children would be reduced $160.
text_preceding: I recommend therefore that, effective January I, 1948, a cost of living tax credit be extended to our people consisting of a credit of $40 to each individual taxpayer and an additional credit of $40 for each dependent.
text_following: The credit would be extended to all taxpayers, but it would be particular helpful to those in the low-income group.

text_original: The credit would be extended to all taxpayers, but it would be particular helpful to those in the low-income group.
text_preceding: Thus the income tax of a man with a wife and two children would be reduced $160.
text_following: It is estimated that such a tax credit would reduce Federal revenue by $3.2 billion.

text_original: It is estimated that such a tax credit would reduce Federal revenue by $3.2 billion.
text_preceding: The credit would be extended to all taxpayers, but it would be particular helpful to those in the low-income group.
text_following: This reduction should be made up by increasing the tax on corporate profits in an amount that will produce this sum-with appropriate adjustments for small corporations.

text_original: This reduction should be made up by increasing the tax on corporate profits in an amount that will produce this sum-with appropriate adjustments for small corporations.
text_preceding: It is estimated that such a tax credit would reduce Federal revenue by $3.2 billion.
text_following: This is the proper method of tax relief at this time.

text_original: This is the proper method of tax relief at this time.
text_preceding: This reduction should be made up by increasing the tax on corporate profits in an amount that will produce this sum-with appropriate adjustments for small corporations.
text_following: It gives relief to those who need it most without cutting the total tax revenue of the Government.

text_original: It gives relief to those who need it most without cutting the total tax revenue of the Government.
text_preceding: This is the proper method of tax relief at this time.
text_following: When the present danger of inflation has passed we should consider tax reduction based upon a revision of our entire tax structure.

text_original: When the present danger of inflation has passed we should consider tax reduction based upon a revision of our entire tax structure.
text_preceding: It gives relief to those who need it most without cutting the total tax revenue of the Government.
text_following: When we have conquered inflation, we shall be in a position to move forward toward our chosen goals.

text_original: When we have conquered inflation, we shall be in a position to move forward toward our chosen goals.
text_preceding: When the present danger of inflation has passed we should consider tax reduction based upon a revision of our entire tax structure.
text_following: As we do so, let us keep ever before us our high purposes.

text_original: As we do so, let us keep ever before us our high purposes.
text_preceding: When we have conquered inflation, we shall be in a position to move forward toward our chosen goals.
text_following: We are determined that every citizen of this Nation shall have an equal right and an equal opportunity to grow in wisdom and in stature and to take his place in the control of his Nation's destiny.

text_original: We are determined that every citizen of this Nation shall have an equal right and an equal opportunity to grow in wisdom and in stature and to take his place in the control of his Nation's destiny.
text_preceding: As we do so, let us keep ever before us our high purposes.

text_original: We are determined that the productive resources of this Nation shall be used wisely and fully for the benefit of all.
text_preceding: We are determined that every citizen of this Nation shall have an equal right and an equal opportunity to grow in wisdom and in stature and to take his place in the control of his Nation's destiny.
text_following: We are determined that the democratic faith of our people and the strength of our resources shall contribute their full share to the attainment of enduring peace in the world.

text_original: We are determined that the democratic faith of our people and the strength of our resources shall contribute their full share to the attainment of enduring peace in the world.
text_preceding: We are determined that the productive resources of this Nation shall be used wisely and fully for the benefit of all.
text_following: It is our faith in human dignity that underlies these purposes.

text_original: It is our faith in human dignity that underlies these purposes.
text_preceding: We are determined that the democratic faith of our people and the strength of our resources shall contribute their full share to the attainment of enduring peace in the world.
text_following: It is this faith that keeps us a strong and vital people.

text_original: It is this faith that keeps us a strong and vital people.
text_preceding: It is our faith in human dignity that underlies these purposes.
text_following: This is a time to remind ourselves of these fundamentals.

text_original: This is a time to remind ourselves of these fundamentals.
text_preceding: It is this faith that keeps us a strong and vital people.
text_following: For today the whole world looks to us for leadership.

text_original: For today the whole world looks to us for leadership.
text_preceding: This is a time to remind ourselves of these fundamentals.
text_following: This is the hour to rededicate ourselves to the faith in mankind that makes us strong.

text_original: This is the hour to rededicate ourselves to the faith in mankind that makes us strong.
text_preceding: For today the whole world looks to us for leadership.
text_following: This is the hour to rededicate ourselves to the faith in God that gives us confidence as we face the challenge of the years ahead.

text_original: This is the hour to rededicate ourselves to the faith in God that gives us confidence as we face the challenge of the years ahead.
text_preceding: This is the hour to rededicate ourselves to the faith in mankind that makes us strong.

text_original: The opening of this new year must arouse in us all grateful thanks to a kind Providence whose protection has been ever present and whose bounty has been manifold and abundant.
text_following: The State of the Union today demonstrates what can be accomplished under God by a free people; by their vision, their understanding of national problems, their initiative, their self-reliance, their capacity for work--and by their willingness to sacrifice whenever sacrifice is needed.

text_original: The State of the Union today demonstrates what can be accomplished under God by a free people; by their vision, their understanding of national problems, their initiative, their self-reliance, their capacity for work--and by their willingness to sacrifice whenever sacrifice is needed.
text_preceding: The opening of this new year must arouse in us all grateful thanks to a kind Providence whose protection has been ever present and whose bounty has been manifold and abundant.
text_following: In the past three years, responding to what our people want their Government to do, the Congress and the Executive have done much in building a stronger, better America.

text_original: In the past three years, responding to what our people want their Government to do, the Congress and the Executive have done much in building a stronger, better America.
text_preceding: The State of the Union today demonstrates what can be accomplished under God by a free people; by their vision, their understanding of national problems, their initiative, their self-reliance, their capacity for work--and by their willingness to sacrifice whenever sacrifice is needed.
text_following: There has been broad progress in fostering the energies of our people, in providing greater opportunity for the satisfaction of their needs, and in fulfilling their demands for the strength and security of the Republic.

text_original: There has been broad progress in fostering the energies of our people, in providing greater opportunity for the satisfaction of their needs, and in fulfilling their demands for the strength and security of the Republic.
text_preceding: In the past three years, responding to what our people want their Government to do, the Congress and the Executive have done much in building a stronger, better America.
text_following: Our security posture commands respect.

text_original: Our security posture commands respect.
text_preceding: There has been broad progress in fostering the energies of our people, in providing greater opportunity for the satisfaction of their needs, and in fulfilling their demands for the strength and security of the Republic.
text_following: A spiritual vigor marks our national life.

text_original: A spiritual vigor marks our national life.
text_preceding: Our security posture commands respect.
text_following: Our economy, approaching the 400 billion dollar mark, is at an unparalleled level of prosperity.

text_original: Our economy, approaching the 400 billion dollar mark, is at an unparalleled level of prosperity.
text_preceding: A spiritual vigor marks our national life.
text_following: The national income is more widely and fairly distributed than ever before.

text_original: The national income is more widely and fairly distributed than ever before.
text_preceding: Our economy, approaching the 400 billion dollar mark, is at an unparalleled level of prosperity.
text_following: The number of Americans at work has reached an all-time high.

text_original: The number of Americans at work has reached an all-time high.
text_preceding: The national income is more widely and fairly distributed than ever before.
text_following: As a people, we are achieving consuming more, building more and investing more than ever before.

text_original: As a people, we are achieving consuming more, building more and investing more than ever before.
text_preceding: The number of Americans at work has reached an all-time high.
text_following: Virtually all sectors of our society are sharing in these good times.

text_original: Virtually all sectors of our society are sharing in these good times.
text_preceding: As a people, we are achieving consuming more, building more and investing more than ever before.
text_following: Our farm families, if we act wisely, imaginatively and promptly to strengthen our present farm programs, can also look forward to sharing equitably in the prosperity they have helped to create.

text_original: Our farm families, if we act wisely, imaginatively and promptly to strengthen our present farm programs, can also look forward to sharing equitably in the prosperity they have helped to create.
text_preceding: Virtually all sectors of our society are sharing in these good times.
text_following: War in Korea ended two and a half years ago.

text_original: War in Korea ended two and a half years ago.
text_preceding: Our farm families, if we act wisely, imaginatively and promptly to strengthen our present farm programs, can also look forward to sharing equitably in the prosperity they have helped to create.
text_following: The collective security system has been powerfully strengthened.

text_original: The collective security system has been powerfully strengthened.
text_preceding: War in Korea ended two and a half years ago.
text_following: Our defenses have been reinforced at sharply reduced costs.

text_original: Our defenses have been reinforced at sharply reduced costs.
text_preceding: The collective security system has been powerfully strengthened.
text_following: Programs to expand world trade and to harness the atom for the betterment of mankind have been carried forward.

text_original: Programs to expand world trade and to harness the atom for the betterment of mankind have been carried forward.
text_preceding: Our defenses have been reinforced at sharply reduced costs.
text_following: Our economy has been freed from governmental wage and price controls.

text_original: Our economy has been freed from governmental wage and price controls.
text_preceding: Programs to expand world trade and to harness the atom for the betterment of mankind have been carried forward.
text_following: Inflation has been halted; the cost of living stabilized.

text_original: Inflation has been halted; the cost of living stabilized.
text_preceding: Our economy has been freed from governmental wage and price controls.
text_following: Government spending has been cut by more than ten billion dollars.

text_original: Government spending has been cut by more than ten billion dollars.
text_preceding: Inflation has been halted; the cost of living stabilized.
text_following: Nearly three hundred thousand positions have been eliminated from the Federal payroll.

text_original: Nearly three hundred thousand positions have been eliminated from the Federal payroll.
text_preceding: Government spending has been cut by more than ten billion dollars.
text_following: Taxes have been substantially reduced.

text_original: Taxes have been substantially reduced.
text_preceding: Nearly three hundred thousand positions have been eliminated from the Federal payroll.
text_following: A balanced budget is in prospect.

text_original: A balanced budget is in prospect.
text_preceding: Taxes have been substantially reduced.
text_following: Social security has been extended to ten million more Americans and unemployment insurance to four million more.

text_original: Social security has been extended to ten million more Americans and unemployment insurance to four million more.
text_preceding: A balanced budget is in prospect.
text_following: Unprecedented advances in civil rights have been made.

text_original: Unprecedented advances in civil rights have been made.
text_preceding: Social security has been extended to ten million more Americans and unemployment insurance to four million more.
text_following: The long-standing and deep-seated problems of agriculture have been forthrightly attacked.

text_original: The long-standing and deep-seated problems of agriculture have been forthrightly attacked.
text_preceding: Unprecedented advances in civil rights have been made.
text_following: This record of progress has been accomplished with a self-imposed caution against unnecessary and unwise interference in the private affairs of our people, of their communities and of the several States.

text_original: This record of progress has been accomplished with a self-imposed caution against unnecessary and unwise interference in the private affairs of our people, of their communities and of the several States.
text_preceding: The long-standing and deep-seated problems of agriculture have been forthrightly attacked.
text_following: If we of the Executive and Legislative Branches, keeping this caution ever in mind, address ourselves to the business of the year before us-- and to the unfinished business of last year--with resolution, the outlook is bright with promise.

text_original: If we of the Executive and Legislative Branches, keeping this caution ever in mind, address ourselves to the business of the year before us-- and to the unfinished business of last year--with resolution, the outlook is bright with promise.
text_preceding: This record of progress has been accomplished with a self-imposed caution against unnecessary and unwise interference in the private affairs of our people, of their communities and of the several States.
text_following: Many measures of great national importance recommended last year to the Congress still demand immediate attention--legislation for school and highway construction;

text_original: Many measures of great national importance recommended last year to the Congress still demand immediate attention--legislation for school and highway construction;
text_preceding: If we of the Executive and Legislative Branches, keeping this caution ever in mind, address ourselves to the business of the year before us-- and to the unfinished business of last year--with resolution, the outlook is bright with promise.
text_following: Many new items of business likewise require our attention-- measures that will further promote the release of the energies of our people;

text_original: Many new items of business likewise require our attention-- measures that will further promote the release of the energies of our people;
text_preceding: Many measures of great national importance recommended last year to the Congress still demand immediate attention--legislation for school and highway construction;
text_following: Every political and economic guide supports a valid confidence that wise effort will be rewarded by an even more plentiful harvest of human benefit than we now enjoy.

text_original: Every political and economic guide supports a valid confidence that wise effort will be rewarded by an even more plentiful harvest of human benefit than we now enjoy.
text_preceding: Many new items of business likewise require our attention-- measures that will further promote the release of the energies of our people;
text_following: Our resources are too many, our principles too dynamic, our purposes too worthy and the issues at stake too immense for us to entertain doubt or fear.

text_original: Our resources are too many, our principles too dynamic, our purposes too worthy and the issues at stake too immense for us to entertain doubt or fear.
text_preceding: Every political and economic guide supports a valid confidence that wise effort will be rewarded by an even more plentiful harvest of human benefit than we now enjoy.
text_following: But our responsibilities require that we approach this year's business with a sober humility.

text_original: But our responsibilities require that we approach this year's business with a sober humility.
text_preceding: Our resources are too many, our principles too dynamic, our purposes too worthy and the issues at stake too immense for us to entertain doubt or fear.
text_following: A heedless pride in our present strength and position would blind us to the facts of the past, to the pitfalls of the future.

text_original: A heedless pride in our present strength and position would blind us to the facts of the past, to the pitfalls of the future.
text_preceding: But our responsibilities require that we approach this year's business with a sober humility.
text_following: We must walk ever in the knowledge that we are enriched by a heritage earned in the labor and sacrifice of our forebears;

text_original: We must walk ever in the knowledge that we are enriched by a heritage earned in the labor and sacrifice of our forebears;
text_preceding: A heedless pride in our present strength and position would blind us to the facts of the past, to the pitfalls of the future.
text_following: In this light the Administration has continued work on its program for the Republic, begun three years ago.

text_original: In this light the Administration has continued work on its program for the Republic, begun three years ago.
text_preceding: We must walk ever in the knowledge that we are enriched by a heritage earned in the labor and sacrifice of our forebears;
text_following: Because the vast spread of national and human interests is involved within it, I shall not in this Message attempt its detailed delineation.

text_original: Because the vast spread of national and human interests is involved within it, I shall not in this Message attempt its detailed delineation.
text_preceding: In this light the Administration has continued work on its program for the Republic, begun three years ago.
text_following: Instead, from time to time during this Session, there will be submitted to the Congress specific recommendations within specific fields.

text_original: Instead, from time to time during this Session, there will be submitted to the Congress specific recommendations within specific fields.
text_preceding: Because the vast spread of national and human interests is involved within it, I shall not in this Message attempt its detailed delineation.
text_following: In the comprehensive survey required for their preparation, the Administration is guided by enduring objectives.

text_original: In the comprehensive survey required for their preparation, the Administration is guided by enduring objectives.
text_preceding: Instead, from time to time during this Session, there will be submitted to the Congress specific recommendations within specific fields.
text_following: The first is: THE DISCHARGE OF OUR WORLD RESPONSIBILITY.

text_original: The first is: THE DISCHARGE OF OUR WORLD RESPONSIBILITY.
text_preceding: In the comprehensive survey required for their preparation, the Administration is guided by enduring objectives.
text_following: Our world policy and our actions are dedicated to the achievement of peace with justice for all nations.

text_original: Our world policy and our actions are dedicated to the achievement of peace with justice for all nations.
text_preceding: The first is: THE DISCHARGE OF OUR WORLD RESPONSIBILITY.
text_following: With this purpose, we move in a wide variety of ways and through many agencies to remove the pall of fear;  .

text_original: With this purpose, we move in a wide variety of ways and through many agencies to remove the pall of fear;  .
text_preceding: Our world policy and our actions are dedicated to the achievement of peace with justice for all nations.
text_following: These national objectives are fully supported by both our political parties.

text_original: These national objectives are fully supported by both our political parties.
text_preceding: With this purpose, we move in a wide variety of ways and through many agencies to remove the pall of fear;  .
text_following: In the past year, our search for a more stable and just peace has taken varied forms.

text_original: In the past year, our search for a more stable and just peace has taken varied forms.
text_preceding: These national objectives are fully supported by both our political parties.
text_following: Among the most important were the two Conferences at Geneva, in July and in the fall of last year.

text_original: Among the most important were the two Conferences at Geneva, in July and in the fall of last year.
text_preceding: In the past year, our search for a more stable and just peace has taken varied forms.
text_following: We explored the possibilities of agreement on critical issues that jeopardize the peace.

text_original: We explored the possibilities of agreement on critical issues that jeopardize the peace.
text_preceding: Among the most important were the two Conferences at Geneva, in July and in the fall of last year.
text_following: The July meeting of Heads of Government held out promise to the world of moderation in the bitterness, of word and action, which tends to generate conflict and war.

text_original: The July meeting of Heads of Government held out promise to the world of moderation in the bitterness, of word and action, which tends to generate conflict and war.
text_preceding: We explored the possibilities of agreement on critical issues that jeopardize the peace.
text_following: All were in agreement that a nuclear war would be an intolerable disaster which must not be permitted to occur.

text_original: All were in agreement that a nuclear war would be an intolerable disaster which must not be permitted to occur.
text_preceding: The July meeting of Heads of Government held out promise to the world of moderation in the bitterness, of word and action, which tends to generate conflict and war.
text_following: But in October, when the Foreign Ministers met again, the results demonstrated conclusively that the Soviet leaders are not yet willing to create the indispensable conditions for a secure and lasting peace.

text_original: But in October, when the Foreign Ministers met again, the results demonstrated conclusively that the Soviet leaders are not yet willing to create the indispensable conditions for a secure and lasting peace.
text_preceding: All were in agreement that a nuclear war would be an intolerable disaster which must not be permitted to occur.
text_following: Nevertheless, it is clear that the conflict between international communism and freedom has taken on a new complexion.

text_original: Nevertheless, it is clear that the conflict between international communism and freedom has taken on a new complexion.
text_preceding: But in October, when the Foreign Ministers met again, the results demonstrated conclusively that the Soviet leaders are not yet willing to create the indispensable conditions for a secure and lasting peace.
text_following: We know the Communist leaders have often practiced the tactics of retreat and zigzag.

text_original: We know the Communist leaders have often practiced the tactics of retreat and zigzag.
text_preceding: Nevertheless, it is clear that the conflict between international communism and freedom has taken on a new complexion.
text_following: We know that Soviet and Chinese communism still poses a serious threat to the free world.

text_original: We know that Soviet and Chinese communism still poses a serious threat to the free world.
text_preceding: We know the Communist leaders have often practiced the tactics of retreat and zigzag.
text_following: And in the Middle East recent Soviet moves are hardly compatible with the reduction of international tension.

text_original: And in the Middle East recent Soviet moves are hardly compatible with the reduction of international tension.
text_preceding: We know that Soviet and Chinese communism still poses a serious threat to the free world.
text_following: Yet Communist tactics against the free nations have shifted in emphasis from reliance on violence and the threat of violence to reliance on division, enticement and duplicity.

text_original: Yet Communist tactics against the free nations have shifted in emphasis from reliance on violence and the threat of violence to reliance on division, enticement and duplicity.
text_preceding: And in the Middle East recent Soviet moves are hardly compatible with the reduction of international tension.
text_following: We must be well prepared to meet the current tactics which pose a dangerous though less obvious threat.

text_original: We must be well prepared to meet the current tactics which pose a dangerous though less obvious threat.
text_preceding: Yet Communist tactics against the free nations have shifted in emphasis from reliance on violence and the threat of violence to reliance on division, enticement and duplicity.
text_following: At the same time, our policy must be dynamic as well as flexible, designed primarily to forward the achievement of our own objectives rather than to meet each shift and change on the Communist front.

text_original: At the same time, our policy must be dynamic as well as flexible, designed primarily to forward the achievement of our own objectives rather than to meet each shift and change on the Communist front.
text_preceding: We must be well prepared to meet the current tactics which pose a dangerous though less obvious threat.
text_following: We must act in the firm assurance that the fruits of freedom are more attractive and desirable to mankind in the pursuit of happiness than the record of Communism.

text_original: We must act in the firm assurance that the fruits of freedom are more attractive and desirable to mankind in the pursuit of happiness than the record of Communism.
text_preceding: At the same time, our policy must be dynamic as well as flexible, designed primarily to forward the achievement of our own objectives rather than to meet each shift and change on the Communist front.
text_following: In the face of Communist military power, we must, of course, continue to maintain an effective system of collective security.

text_original: In the face of Communist military power, we must, of course, continue to maintain an effective system of collective security.
text_preceding: We must act in the firm assurance that the fruits of freedom are more attractive and desirable to mankind in the pursuit of happiness than the record of Communism.
text_following: This involves two things--a system which gives clear warning that armed aggression will be met by joint action of the free nations, and deterrent military power to make that warning effective.

text_original: This involves two things--a system which gives clear warning that armed aggression will be met by joint action of the free nations, and deterrent military power to make that warning effective.
text_preceding: In the face of Communist military power, we must, of course, continue to maintain an effective system of collective security.
text_following: Moreover, the awesome power of the atom must be made to serve as a guardian of the free community and of the peace.

text_original: Moreover, the awesome power of the atom must be made to serve as a guardian of the free community and of the peace.
text_preceding: This involves two things--a system which gives clear warning that armed aggression will be met by joint action of the free nations, and deterrent military power to make that warning effective.
text_following: In the last year, the free world has seen major gains for the system of collective security: the accession to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Western European Union of the sovereign Federal German Republic;

text_original: In the last year, the free world has seen major gains for the system of collective security: the accession to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Western European Union of the sovereign Federal German Republic;
text_preceding: Moreover, the awesome power of the atom must be made to serve as a guardian of the free community and of the peace.
text_following: In our own hemisphere, the inter-American system has continued to show its vitality in maintaining peace and a common approach to world problems.

text_original: In our own hemisphere, the inter-American system has continued to show its vitality in maintaining peace and a common approach to world problems.
text_preceding: In the last year, the free world has seen major gains for the system of collective security: the accession to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Western European Union of the sovereign Federal German Republic;
text_following: We now have security pacts with more than 40 other nations.

text_original: We now have security pacts with more than 40 other nations.
text_preceding: In our own hemisphere, the inter-American system has continued to show its vitality in maintaining peace and a common approach to world problems.
text_following: In the pursuit of our national purposes, we have been steadfast in our support of the United Nations, now entering its second decade with a wider membership and ever-increasing influence and usefulness.

text_original: In the pursuit of our national purposes, we have been steadfast in our support of the United Nations, now entering its second decade with a wider membership and ever-increasing influence and usefulness.
text_preceding: We now have security pacts with more than 40 other nations.
text_following: In the release of our fifteen fliers from Communist China, an essential prelude was the world opinion mobilized by the General Assembly, which condemned their imprisonment and demanded their liberation.

text_original: In the release of our fifteen fliers from Communist China, an essential prelude was the world opinion mobilized by the General Assembly, which condemned their imprisonment and demanded their liberation.
text_preceding: In the pursuit of our national purposes, we have been steadfast in our support of the United Nations, now entering its second decade with a wider membership and ever-increasing influence and usefulness.
text_following: The successful Atomic Energy Conference held in Geneva under United Nations auspices and our Atoms for Peace program have been practical steps toward the world-wide use of this new energy source.

text_original: The successful Atomic Energy Conference held in Geneva under United Nations auspices and our Atoms for Peace program have been practical steps toward the world-wide use of this new energy source.
text_preceding: In the release of our fifteen fliers from Communist China, an essential prelude was the world opinion mobilized by the General Assembly, which condemned their imprisonment and demanded their liberation.
text_following: Our sponsorship of such use has benefited our relations with other countries.

text_original: Our sponsorship of such use has benefited our relations with other countries.
text_preceding: The successful Atomic Energy Conference held in Geneva under United Nations auspices and our Atoms for Peace program have been practical steps toward the world-wide use of this new energy source.
text_following: Active negotiations are now in progress to create an International Agency to foster peaceful uses of atomic energy.

text_original: Active negotiations are now in progress to create an International Agency to foster peaceful uses of atomic energy.
text_preceding: Our sponsorship of such use has benefited our relations with other countries.
text_following: During the past year the crucial problem of disarmament has moved to the forefront of practical political endeavor.

text_original: During the past year the crucial problem of disarmament has moved to the forefront of practical political endeavor.
text_preceding: Active negotiations are now in progress to create an International Agency to foster peaceful uses of atomic energy.
text_following: At Geneva, I declared the readiness of the United States to exchange blueprints of the military establishments of our nation and the U.S.S.R., to be confirmed by reciprocal aerial reconnaissance.

text_original: At Geneva, I declared the readiness of the United States to exchange blueprints of the military establishments of our nation and the U.S.S.R., to be confirmed by reciprocal aerial reconnaissance.
text_preceding: During the past year the crucial problem of disarmament has moved to the forefront of practical political endeavor.
text_following: By this means, I felt mutual suspicions could be allayed and an atmosphere developed in which negotiations looking toward limitation of arms would have improved chances of success.

text_original: By this means, I felt mutual suspicions could be allayed and an atmosphere developed in which negotiations looking toward limitation of arms would have improved chances of success.
text_preceding: At Geneva, I declared the readiness of the United States to exchange blueprints of the military establishments of our nation and the U.S.S.R., to be confirmed by reciprocal aerial reconnaissance.
text_following: In the United Nations Subcommittee on Disarmament last fall, this proposal was explored and the United States also declared itself willing to include reciprocal ground inspection of key points.

text_original: In the United Nations Subcommittee on Disarmament last fall, this proposal was explored and the United States also declared itself willing to include reciprocal ground inspection of key points.
text_preceding: By this means, I felt mutual suspicions could be allayed and an atmosphere developed in which negotiations looking toward limitation of arms would have improved chances of success.
text_following: By the overwhelming vote of 56 to 7, the United Nations on December 16 endorsed these proposals and gave them a top priority.

text_original: By the overwhelming vote of 56 to 7, the United Nations on December 16 endorsed these proposals and gave them a top priority.
text_preceding: In the United Nations Subcommittee on Disarmament last fall, this proposal was explored and the United States also declared itself willing to include reciprocal ground inspection of key points.
text_following: Thereby, the issue is placed squarely before the bar of world opinion.

text_original: Thereby, the issue is placed squarely before the bar of world opinion.
text_preceding: By the overwhelming vote of 56 to 7, the United Nations on December 16 endorsed these proposals and gave them a top priority.
text_following: We shall persevere in seeking a general reduction of armaments under effective inspection and control which are essential safeguards to ensure reciprocity and protect the security of all.

text_original: We shall persevere in seeking a general reduction of armaments under effective inspection and control which are essential safeguards to ensure reciprocity and protect the security of all.
text_preceding: Thereby, the issue is placed squarely before the bar of world opinion.
text_following: In the coming year much remains to be done.

text_original: In the coming year much remains to be done.
text_preceding: We shall persevere in seeking a general reduction of armaments under effective inspection and control which are essential safeguards to ensure reciprocity and protect the security of all.
text_following: While maintaining our military deterrent, we must intensify our efforts to achieve a just peace.

text_original: While maintaining our military deterrent, we must intensify our efforts to achieve a just peace.
text_preceding: In the coming year much remains to be done.
text_following: In Asia we shall continue to give help to nations struggling to maintain their freedom against the threat of Communist coercion or subversion.

text_original: In Asia we shall continue to give help to nations struggling to maintain their freedom against the threat of Communist coercion or subversion.
text_preceding: While maintaining our military deterrent, we must intensify our efforts to achieve a just peace.
text_following: In Europe we shall endeavor to increase not only the military strength of the North Atlantic Alliance but also its political cohesion and unity of purpose.

text_original: In Europe we shall endeavor to increase not only the military strength of the North Atlantic Alliance but also its political cohesion and unity of purpose.
text_preceding: In Asia we shall continue to give help to nations struggling to maintain their freedom against the threat of Communist coercion or subversion.
text_following: We shall give such assistance as is feasible to the recently renewed effort of Western European nations to achieve a greater measure of integration, such as in the field of peaceful uses of atomic energy.

text_original: We shall give such assistance as is feasible to the recently renewed effort of Western European nations to achieve a greater measure of integration, such as in the field of peaceful uses of atomic energy.
text_preceding: In Europe we shall endeavor to increase not only the military strength of the North Atlantic Alliance but also its political cohesion and unity of purpose.
text_following: In the Near East we shall spare no effort in seeking to promote a fair solution of the tragic dispute between the Arab States and Israel, all of whom we want as our friends.

text_original: In the Near East we shall spare no effort in seeking to promote a fair solution of the tragic dispute between the Arab States and Israel, all of whom we want as our friends.
text_preceding: We shall give such assistance as is feasible to the recently renewed effort of Western European nations to achieve a greater measure of integration, such as in the field of peaceful uses of atomic energy.
text_following: The United States is ready to do its part to assure enduring peace in that area.

text_original: The United States is ready to do its part to assure enduring peace in that area.
text_preceding: In the Near East we shall spare no effort in seeking to promote a fair solution of the tragic dispute between the Arab States and Israel, all of whom we want as our friends.
text_following: We hope that both sides will make the contributions necessary to achieve that purpose.

text_original: We hope that both sides will make the contributions necessary to achieve that purpose.
text_preceding: The United States is ready to do its part to assure enduring peace in that area.
text_following: In Latin America, we shall continue to cooperate vigorously in trade and other measures designed to assist economic progress in the area.

text_original: In Latin America, we shall continue to cooperate vigorously in trade and other measures designed to assist economic progress in the area.
text_preceding: We hope that both sides will make the contributions necessary to achieve that purpose.
text_following: Strong economic ties are an essential element in our free world partnership.

text_original: Strong economic ties are an essential element in our free world partnership.
text_preceding: In Latin America, we shall continue to cooperate vigorously in trade and other measures designed to assist economic progress in the area.
text_following: Increasing trade and investment help all of us prosper together.

text_original: Increasing trade and investment help all of us prosper together.
text_preceding: Strong economic ties are an essential element in our free world partnership.
text_following: Gratifying progress has been made in this direction, most recently by the three-year extension of our trade agreements legislation.

text_original: Gratifying progress has been made in this direction, most recently by the three-year extension of our trade agreements legislation.
text_preceding: Increasing trade and investment help all of us prosper together.
text_following: I most earnestly request that the Congress approve our membership in the Organization for Trade Cooperation, which would assist the carrying out of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade to which we have been a party since 1948.

text_original: I most earnestly request that the Congress approve our membership in the Organization for Trade Cooperation, which would assist the carrying out of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade to which we have been a party since 1948.
text_preceding: Gratifying progress has been made in this direction, most recently by the three-year extension of our trade agreements legislation.
text_following: Our membership in the OTC will provide the most effective and expeditious means for removing discriminations and restrictions against American exports and in making our trade agreements truly reciprocal.

text_original: Our membership in the OTC will provide the most effective and expeditious means for removing discriminations and restrictions against American exports and in making our trade agreements truly reciprocal.
text_preceding: I most earnestly request that the Congress approve our membership in the Organization for Trade Cooperation, which would assist the carrying out of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade to which we have been a party since 1948.
text_following: United States membership in the Organization will evidence our continuing desire to cooperate in promoting an expanded trade among the free nations.

text_original: United States membership in the Organization will evidence our continuing desire to cooperate in promoting an expanded trade among the free nations.
text_preceding: Our membership in the OTC will provide the most effective and expeditious means for removing discriminations and restrictions against American exports and in making our trade agreements truly reciprocal.
text_following: Thus the Organization, as proposed, is admirably suited to our own interests and to those of like-minded nations in working for steady expansion of trade and closer economic cooperation.

text_original: Thus the Organization, as proposed, is admirably suited to our own interests and to those of like-minded nations in working for steady expansion of trade and closer economic cooperation.
text_preceding: United States membership in the Organization will evidence our continuing desire to cooperate in promoting an expanded trade among the free nations.
text_following: Being strictly an administrative entity, the Organization for Trade Cooperation cannot, of course, alter the control by Congress of the tariff, import, and customs policies of the United States.

text_original: Being strictly an administrative entity, the Organization for Trade Cooperation cannot, of course, alter the control by Congress of the tariff, import, and customs policies of the United States.
text_preceding: Thus the Organization, as proposed, is admirably suited to our own interests and to those of like-minded nations in working for steady expansion of trade and closer economic cooperation.
text_following: We need to encourage investment overseas by avoiding unfair tax duplications, and to foster foreign trade by further simplification and improvement of our customs legislation.

text_original: We need to encourage investment overseas by avoiding unfair tax duplications, and to foster foreign trade by further simplification and improvement of our customs legislation.
text_preceding: Being strictly an administrative entity, the Organization for Trade Cooperation cannot, of course, alter the control by Congress of the tariff, import, and customs policies of the United States.
text_following: We must sustain and fortify our Mutual Security Program.

text_original: We must sustain and fortify our Mutual Security Program.
text_preceding: We need to encourage investment overseas by avoiding unfair tax duplications, and to foster foreign trade by further simplification and improvement of our customs legislation.
text_following: Because the conditions of poverty and unrest in less developed areas make their people a special target of international communism, there is a need to help them achieve the economic growth and stability necessary to preserve their independence against communist threats and enticements.

text_original: Because the conditions of poverty and unrest in less developed areas make their people a special target of international communism, there is a need to help them achieve the economic growth and stability necessary to preserve their independence against communist threats and enticements.
text_preceding: We must sustain and fortify our Mutual Security Program.
text_following: In order that our friends may better achieve the greater strength that is our common goal, they need assurance of continuity in economic assistance for development projects and programs which we approve and which require a period of years for planning and completion.

text_original: In order that our friends may better achieve the greater strength that is our common goal, they need assurance of continuity in economic assistance for development projects and programs which we approve and which require a period of years for planning and completion.
text_preceding: Because the conditions of poverty and unrest in less developed areas make their people a special target of international communism, there is a need to help them achieve the economic growth and stability necessary to preserve their independence against communist threats and enticements.
text_following: Accordingly, I ask Congress to grant limited authority to make longer-term commitments for assistance to such projects, to be fulfilled from appropriations to be made in future fiscal years.

text_original: Accordingly, I ask Congress to grant limited authority to make longer-term commitments for assistance to such projects, to be fulfilled from appropriations to be made in future fiscal years.
text_preceding: In order that our friends may better achieve the greater strength that is our common goal, they need assurance of continuity in economic assistance for development projects and programs which we approve and which require a period of years for planning and completion.
text_following: These various steps will powerfully strengthen the economic foundation of our foreign policy.

text_original: These various steps will powerfully strengthen the economic foundation of our foreign policy.
text_preceding: Accordingly, I ask Congress to grant limited authority to make longer-term commitments for assistance to such projects, to be fulfilled from appropriations to be made in future fiscal years.
text_following: Together with constructive action abroad, they will maintain the present momentum toward general economic progress and vitality of the free world.

text_original: Together with constructive action abroad, they will maintain the present momentum toward general economic progress and vitality of the free world.
text_preceding: These various steps will powerfully strengthen the economic foundation of our foreign policy.
text_following: In all things, change is the inexorable law of life.

text_original: In all things, change is the inexorable law of life.
text_preceding: Together with constructive action abroad, they will maintain the present momentum toward general economic progress and vitality of the free world.
text_following: In much of the world the ferment of change is working strongly; but grave injustices are still uncorrected.

text_original: In much of the world the ferment of change is working strongly; but grave injustices are still uncorrected.
text_preceding: In all things, change is the inexorable law of life.
text_following: We must not, by any sanction of ours, help to perpetuate these wrongs.

text_original: We must not, by any sanction of ours, help to perpetuate these wrongs.
text_preceding: In much of the world the ferment of change is working strongly; but grave injustices are still uncorrected.
text_following: I have particularly in mind the oppressive division of the German people, the bondage of millions elsewhere, and the exclusion of Japan from United Nations membership.

text_original: I have particularly in mind the oppressive division of the German people, the bondage of millions elsewhere, and the exclusion of Japan from United Nations membership.
text_preceding: We must not, by any sanction of ours, help to perpetuate these wrongs.
text_following: We shall keep these injustices in the forefront of human consciousness and seek to maintain the pressure of world opinion to right these vast wrongs in the interest both of justice and secure peace.

text_original: We shall keep these injustices in the forefront of human consciousness and seek to maintain the pressure of world opinion to right these vast wrongs in the interest both of justice and secure peace.
text_preceding: I have particularly in mind the oppressive division of the German people, the bondage of millions elsewhere, and the exclusion of Japan from United Nations membership.
text_following: Injustice thrives on ignorance.

text_original: Injustice thrives on ignorance.
text_preceding: We shall keep these injustices in the forefront of human consciousness and seek to maintain the pressure of world opinion to right these vast wrongs in the interest both of justice and secure peace.
text_following: Because an understanding of the truth about America is one of our most powerful forces, I am recommending a substantial increase in budgetary support of the United States Information Agency.

text_original: Because an understanding of the truth about America is one of our most powerful forces, I am recommending a substantial increase in budgetary support of the United States Information Agency.
text_preceding: Injustice thrives on ignorance.
text_following: The sum of our international effort should be this: the waging of peace, with as much resourcefulness, with as great a sense of dedication and urgency, as we have ever mustered in defense of our country in time of war.

text_original: The sum of our international effort should be this: the waging of peace, with as much resourcefulness, with as great a sense of dedication and urgency, as we have ever mustered in defense of our country in time of war.
text_preceding: Because an understanding of the truth about America is one of our most powerful forces, I am recommending a substantial increase in budgetary support of the United States Information Agency.
text_following: In this effort, our weapon is not force.

text_original: In this effort, our weapon is not force.
text_preceding: The sum of our international effort should be this: the waging of peace, with as much resourcefulness, with as great a sense of dedication and urgency, as we have ever mustered in defense of our country in time of war.
text_following: Our weapons are the principles and ideas embodied in our historic traditions, applied with the same vigor that in the past made America a living promise of freedom for all mankind.

text_original: Our weapons are the principles and ideas embodied in our historic traditions, applied with the same vigor that in the past made America a living promise of freedom for all mankind.
text_preceding: In this effort, our weapon is not force.
text_following: To accomplish these vital tasks, all of us should be concerned with the strength, effectiveness and morale of our State Department and our Foreign Service.

text_original: To accomplish these vital tasks, all of us should be concerned with the strength, effectiveness and morale of our State Department and our Foreign Service.
text_preceding: Our weapons are the principles and ideas embodied in our historic traditions, applied with the same vigor that in the past made America a living promise of freedom for all mankind.
text_following: Another guide in the preparation of the Administration's program is: THE CONSTANT IMPROVEMENT OF OUR NATIONAL SECURITY.

text_original: Another guide in the preparation of the Administration's program is: THE CONSTANT IMPROVEMENT OF OUR NATIONAL SECURITY.
text_preceding: To accomplish these vital tasks, all of us should be concerned with the strength, effectiveness and morale of our State Department and our Foreign Service.
text_following: Because peace is the keystone of our national policy, our defense program emphasizes an effective flexible type of power calculated to deter or repulse any aggression and to preserve the peace.

text_original: Because peace is the keystone of our national policy, our defense program emphasizes an effective flexible type of power calculated to deter or repulse any aggression and to preserve the peace.
text_preceding: Another guide in the preparation of the Administration's program is: THE CONSTANT IMPROVEMENT OF OUR NATIONAL SECURITY.
text_following: Short of war, we have never had military strength better adapted to our needs with improved readiness for emergency use.

text_original: Short of war, we have never had military strength better adapted to our needs with improved readiness for emergency use.
text_preceding: Because peace is the keystone of our national policy, our defense program emphasizes an effective flexible type of power calculated to deter or repulse any aggression and to preserve the peace.
text_following: The maintenance of this strong military capability for the indefinite future will continue to call for a large share of our national budget.

text_original: The maintenance of this strong military capability for the indefinite future will continue to call for a large share of our national budget.
text_preceding: Short of war, we have never had military strength better adapted to our needs with improved readiness for emergency use.
text_following: Our military programs must meet the needs of today.

text_original: Our military programs must meet the needs of today.
text_preceding: The maintenance of this strong military capability for the indefinite future will continue to call for a large share of our national budget.
text_following: To build less would expose the nation to aggression.

text_original: To build less would expose the nation to aggression.
text_preceding: Our military programs must meet the needs of today.
text_following: To build excessively, under the influence of fear, could defeat our purposes and impair or destroy the very freedom and economic system our military defenses are designed to protect.

text_original: To build excessively, under the influence of fear, could defeat our purposes and impair or destroy the very freedom and economic system our military defenses are designed to protect.
text_preceding: To build less would expose the nation to aggression.
text_following: We have improved the effectiveness and combat readiness of our forces by developing and making operational new weapons and by integrating the latest scientific developments, including new atomic weapons, into our military plans.

text_original: We have improved the effectiveness and combat readiness of our forces by developing and making operational new weapons and by integrating the latest scientific developments, including new atomic weapons, into our military plans.
text_preceding: To build excessively, under the influence of fear, could defeat our purposes and impair or destroy the very freedom and economic system our military defenses are designed to protect.
text_following: We continue to push the production of the most modern military aircraft.

text_original: We continue to push the production of the most modern military aircraft.
text_preceding: We have improved the effectiveness and combat readiness of our forces by developing and making operational new weapons and by integrating the latest scientific developments, including new atomic weapons, into our military plans.
text_following: The development of long-range missiles has been on an accelerated basis for some time.

text_original: The development of long-range missiles has been on an accelerated basis for some time.
text_preceding: We continue to push the production of the most modern military aircraft.
text_following: We are moving as rapidly as practicable toward nuclear-powered aircraft and ships.

text_preceding: The development of long-range missiles has been on an accelerated basis for some time.
text_following: Combat capability, especially in terms of firepower, has been substantially increased.

text_original: Combat capability, especially in terms of firepower, has been substantially increased.
text_preceding: We are moving as rapidly as practicable toward nuclear-powered aircraft and ships.
text_following: We have made the adjustments in personnel permitted by the cessation of the Korean War, the buildup of our allies and the introduction of new weapons.

text_original: We have made the adjustments in personnel permitted by the cessation of the Korean War, the buildup of our allies and the introduction of new weapons.
text_preceding: Combat capability, especially in terms of firepower, has been substantially increased.
text_following: The services are all planning realistically on a long-term basis.

text_original: The services are all planning realistically on a long-term basis.
text_preceding: We have made the adjustments in personnel permitted by the cessation of the Korean War, the buildup of our allies and the introduction of new weapons.
text_following: To strengthen our continental defenses the United States and Canada, in the closest cooperation, have substantially augmented early warning networks.

text_original: To strengthen our continental defenses the United States and Canada, in the closest cooperation, have substantially augmented early warning networks.
text_preceding: The services are all planning realistically on a long-term basis.
text_following: Great progress is being made in extending surveillance of the Arctic, the Atlantic and the Pacific approaches to North America.

text_preceding: To strengthen our continental defenses the United States and Canada, in the closest cooperation, have substantially augmented early warning networks.

text_preceding: Great progress is being made in extending surveillance of the Arctic, the Atlantic and the Pacific approaches to North America.

text_preceding: In the last analysis our real strength lies in the caliber of the men and women in our Armed Forces, active and Reserve.
text_following: This year, I renew my request of last year for legislation to provide proper medical care for military dependents and a more equitable survivors' benefit program.

text_original: This year, I renew my request of last year for legislation to provide proper medical care for military dependents and a more equitable survivors' benefit program.
text_preceding: Much has been done to attract and hold capable military personnel, but more needs to be done.

text_preceding: Our Federal civil defense authorities have made progress in their program, and now comprehensive studies are being conducted jointly by the Federal Civil Defense Administration, the States, and critical target case of an atomic attack.

text_following: We have the facilities, materials, skills and knowledge rapidly to expand the production of things we need for our defense whenever they are required.

text_original: I am requesting, therefore, that the Congress once again extend the Defense Production Act.
text_preceding: We must maintain flexibility to meet new requirements.
text_following: Of great importance to our nation's security is a continuing alertness to internal subversive activity within or without our government.

text_preceding: I am requesting, therefore, that the Congress once again extend the Defense Production Act.
text_following: This Administration will not relax its efforts to deal forthrightly and vigorously in protection of this government and its citizens against subversion, at the same time fully protecting the constitutional rights of all citizens.

text_original: This Administration will not relax its efforts to deal forthrightly and vigorously in protection of this government and its citizens against subversion, at the same time fully protecting the constitutional rights of all citizens.
text_preceding: Of great importance to our nation's security is a continuing alertness to internal subversive activity within or without our government.
text_following: A third objective of the Administration is: FISCAL INTEGRITY.

text_original: A third objective of the Administration is: FISCAL INTEGRITY.
text_preceding: This Administration will not relax its efforts to deal forthrightly and vigorously in protection of this government and its citizens against subversion, at the same time fully protecting the constitutional rights of all citizens.
text_following: A public office is, indeed, a public trust.

text_original: A public office is, indeed, a public trust.
text_preceding: A third objective of the Administration is: FISCAL INTEGRITY.
text_following: None of its aspects is more demanding than the proper management of the public finances.

text_original: None of its aspects is more demanding than the proper management of the public finances.
text_preceding: A public office is, indeed, a public trust.
text_following: I refer now not only to the indispensable virtues of plain honesty and trustworthiness but also to the prudent, effective and conscientious use of tax money.

text_original: I refer now not only to the indispensable virtues of plain honesty and trustworthiness but also to the prudent, effective and conscientious use of tax money.
text_preceding: None of its aspects is more demanding than the proper management of the public finances.
text_following: I refer also to the attitude of mind that makes efficient and economical service to the people a watchword in our government.

text_original: I refer also to the attitude of mind that makes efficient and economical service to the people a watchword in our government.
text_preceding: I refer now not only to the indispensable virtues of plain honesty and trustworthiness but also to the prudent, effective and conscientious use of tax money.
text_following: Over the long term, a balanced budget is a sure index to thrifty management--in a home, in a business or in the Federal Government.

text_original: Over the long term, a balanced budget is a sure index to thrifty management--in a home, in a business or in the Federal Government.
text_preceding: I refer also to the attitude of mind that makes efficient and economical service to the people a watchword in our government.
text_following: When achievement of a balanced budget is for long put off in a business or home, bankruptcy is the result.

text_original: When achievement of a balanced budget is for long put off in a business or home, bankruptcy is the result.
text_preceding: Over the long term, a balanced budget is a sure index to thrifty management--in a home, in a business or in the Federal Government.
text_following: But in similar circumstances a government resorts to inflation of the money supply.

text_original: But in similar circumstances a government resorts to inflation of the money supply.
text_preceding: When achievement of a balanced budget is for long put off in a business or home, bankruptcy is the result.
text_following: This inevitably results in depreciation of the value of the money, and an increase in the cost of living.

text_original: This inevitably results in depreciation of the value of the money, and an increase in the cost of living.
text_preceding: But in similar circumstances a government resorts to inflation of the money supply.
text_following: Every investment in personal security is threatened by this process of inflation, and the real values of the people's savings, whether in the form of insurance, bonds, pension and retirement funds or savings accounts are thereby shriveled.

text_original: Every investment in personal security is threatened by this process of inflation, and the real values of the people's savings, whether in the form of insurance, bonds, pension and retirement funds or savings accounts are thereby shriveled.
text_preceding: This inevitably results in depreciation of the value of the money, and an increase in the cost of living.
