text_preceding: Every investment in personal security is threatened by this process of inflation, and the real values of the people's savings, whether in the form of insurance, bonds, pension and retirement funds or savings accounts are thereby shriveled.
text_following: The deficit for fiscal year 1953 was almost 9 1/2 billion dollars.

text_original: The deficit for fiscal year 1953 was almost 9 1/2 billion dollars.
text_preceding: We have made long strides these past three years in bringing our Federal finances under control.
text_following: Larger deficits seemed certain--deficits which would have depreciated the value of the dollar and pushed the cost of living still higher.

text_original: Larger deficits seemed certain--deficits which would have depreciated the value of the dollar and pushed the cost of living still higher.
text_preceding: The deficit for fiscal year 1953 was almost 9 1/2 billion dollars.
text_following: But government waste and extravagance were searched out.

text_original: But government waste and extravagance were searched out.
text_preceding: Larger deficits seemed certain--deficits which would have depreciated the value of the dollar and pushed the cost of living still higher.
text_following: Nonessential activities were dropped.

text_original: Nonessential activities were dropped.
text_preceding: But government waste and extravagance were searched out.
text_following: Government expenses were carefully scrutinized.

text_original: Government expenses were carefully scrutinized.
text_preceding: Nonessential activities were dropped.
text_following: Total spending was cut by 14 billion dollars below the amount planned by the previous Administration for the fiscal year 1954.

text_original: Total spending was cut by 14 billion dollars below the amount planned by the previous Administration for the fiscal year 1954.
text_preceding: Government expenses were carefully scrutinized.
text_following: This made possible--and it was appropriate in the existing circumstances of transition to a peacetime economy--the largest tax cut in any year in our history.

text_original: This made possible--and it was appropriate in the existing circumstances of transition to a peacetime economy--the largest tax cut in any year in our history.
text_preceding: Total spending was cut by 14 billion dollars below the amount planned by the previous Administration for the fiscal year 1954.
text_following: Almost 7 1/2 billion dollars were released and every taxpayer in the country benefited.

text_original: Almost 7 1/2 billion dollars were released and every taxpayer in the country benefited.
text_preceding: This made possible--and it was appropriate in the existing circumstances of transition to a peacetime economy--the largest tax cut in any year in our history.
text_following: Almost two-thirds of the savings went directly to individuals.

text_original: Almost two-thirds of the savings went directly to individuals.
text_preceding: Almost 7 1/2 billion dollars were released and every taxpayer in the country benefited.
text_following: This tax cut also helped to build up the economy, to make jobs in industry and to increase the production of the many things desired to improve the scale of living for the great majority of Americans.

text_original: This tax cut also helped to build up the economy, to make jobs in industry and to increase the production of the many things desired to improve the scale of living for the great majority of Americans.
text_preceding: Almost two-thirds of the savings went directly to individuals.
text_following: The strong expansion of the economy, coupled with a constant care for efficiency in government operations and an alert guard against waste and duplication, has brought us to a prospective balance between income and expenditure.

text_original: The strong expansion of the economy, coupled with a constant care for efficiency in government operations and an alert guard against waste and duplication, has brought us to a prospective balance between income and expenditure.
text_preceding: This tax cut also helped to build up the economy, to make jobs in industry and to increase the production of the many things desired to improve the scale of living for the great majority of Americans.
text_following: This is being done while we continue to strengthen our military security.

text_original: This is being done while we continue to strengthen our military security.
text_preceding: The strong expansion of the economy, coupled with a constant care for efficiency in government operations and an alert guard against waste and duplication, has brought us to a prospective balance between income and expenditure.
text_following: I expect the budget to be in balance during the fiscal year ending June 30, 1956.

text_original: I expect the budget to be in balance during the fiscal year ending June 30, 1956.
text_preceding: This is being done while we continue to strengthen our military security.
text_following: I shall propose a balanced budget for the next fiscal year ending June 30, 1957.

text_original: I shall propose a balanced budget for the next fiscal year ending June 30, 1957.
text_preceding: I expect the budget to be in balance during the fiscal year ending June 30, 1956.
text_following: But the balance we are seeking cannot be accomplished without the continuing every-day effort of the Executive and Legislative Branches to keep expenditures under control.

text_original: But the balance we are seeking cannot be accomplished without the continuing every-day effort of the Executive and Legislative Branches to keep expenditures under control.
text_preceding: I shall propose a balanced budget for the next fiscal year ending June 30, 1957.
text_following: It will also be necessary to continue all of the present excise taxes without any reduction and the corporation income taxes at their present rates for another year beyond next April 1st.

text_original: It will also be necessary to continue all of the present excise taxes without any reduction and the corporation income taxes at their present rates for another year beyond next April 1st.
text_preceding: But the balance we are seeking cannot be accomplished without the continuing every-day effort of the Executive and Legislative Branches to keep expenditures under control.
text_following: It is unquestionably true that our present tax level is very burdensome and, in the interest of long term and continuous economic growth, should be reduced when we prudently can.

text_original: It is unquestionably true that our present tax level is very burdensome and, in the interest of long term and continuous economic growth, should be reduced when we prudently can.
text_preceding: It will also be necessary to continue all of the present excise taxes without any reduction and the corporation income taxes at their present rates for another year beyond next April 1st.
text_following: It is essential, in the sound management of the Government's finances, that we be mindful of our enormous national debt and of the obligation we have toward future Americans to reduce that debt whenever we can appropriately do so.

text_original: It is essential, in the sound management of the Government's finances, that we be mindful of our enormous national debt and of the obligation we have toward future Americans to reduce that debt whenever we can appropriately do so.
text_preceding: It is unquestionably true that our present tax level is very burdensome and, in the interest of long term and continuous economic growth, should be reduced when we prudently can.
text_following: Under conditions of high peacetime prosperity, such as now exist, we can never justify going further into debt to give ourselves a tax cut at the expense of our children.

text_original: Under conditions of high peacetime prosperity, such as now exist, we can never justify going further into debt to give ourselves a tax cut at the expense of our children.
text_preceding: It is essential, in the sound management of the Government's finances, that we be mindful of our enormous national debt and of the obligation we have toward future Americans to reduce that debt whenever we can appropriately do so.
text_following: So, in the present state of our financial affairs, I earnestly believe that a tax cut can be deemed justifiable only when it will not unbalance the budget, a budget which makes provision for some reduction, even though modest, in our national debt.

text_original: So, in the present state of our financial affairs, I earnestly believe that a tax cut can be deemed justifiable only when it will not unbalance the budget, a budget which makes provision for some reduction, even though modest, in our national debt.
text_preceding: Under conditions of high peacetime prosperity, such as now exist, we can never justify going further into debt to give ourselves a tax cut at the expense of our children.
text_following: In this way we can best maintain fiscal integrity.

text_preceding: So, in the present state of our financial affairs, I earnestly believe that a tax cut can be deemed justifiable only when it will not unbalance the budget, a budget which makes provision for some reduction, even though modest, in our national debt.
text_following: A fourth aim of our program is: TO FOSTER A STRONG ECONOMY.

text_original: A fourth aim of our program is: TO FOSTER A STRONG ECONOMY.
text_preceding: In this way we can best maintain fiscal integrity.
text_following: Our competitive enterprise system depends on the energy of free human beings, limited by prudent restraints in law, using free markets to plan, organize and distribute production, and spurred by the prospect of reward for successful effort.

text_original: Our competitive enterprise system depends on the energy of free human beings, limited by prudent restraints in law, using free markets to plan, organize and distribute production, and spurred by the prospect of reward for successful effort.
text_preceding: A fourth aim of our program is: TO FOSTER A STRONG ECONOMY.
text_following: This system has developed our resources.

text_original: This system has developed our resources.
text_preceding: Our competitive enterprise system depends on the energy of free human beings, limited by prudent restraints in law, using free markets to plan, organize and distribute production, and spurred by the prospect of reward for successful effort.
text_following: It has marvelously expanded our productive capacity.

text_original: It has marvelously expanded our productive capacity.
text_preceding: This system has developed our resources.
text_following: Against the record of all other economic systems devised through the ages, this competitive system has proved the most creative user of human skills in the development of physical resources, and the richest rewarder of human effort.

text_original: Against the record of all other economic systems devised through the ages, this competitive system has proved the most creative user of human skills in the development of physical resources, and the richest rewarder of human effort.
text_preceding: It has marvelously expanded our productive capacity.
text_following: This is still true in this era when improved living standards and rising national requirements are accompanied by swift advances in technology and rapid obsolescence in machines and methods.

text_original: This is still true in this era when improved living standards and rising national requirements are accompanied by swift advances in technology and rapid obsolescence in machines and methods.
text_preceding: Against the record of all other economic systems devised through the ages, this competitive system has proved the most creative user of human skills in the development of physical resources, and the richest rewarder of human effort.
text_following: Typical of these are the strides made in construction of plants to produce electrical energy from atomic power and of laboratories and installations for the application of this new force in industry, agriculture and the healing arts.

text_preceding: This is still true in this era when improved living standards and rising national requirements are accompanied by swift advances in technology and rapid obsolescence in machines and methods.

text_preceding: These developments make it imperative--to assure effective functioning of our enterprise system--that the Federal Government concern itself with certain broad areas of our economic life.
text_following: Our farm people are not sharing as they should in the general prosperity.

text_original: Our farm people are not sharing as they should in the general prosperity.
text_preceding: Most important of these is: Agriculture.
text_following: They alone of all major groups have seen their incomes decline rather than rise.

text_original: They alone of all major groups have seen their incomes decline rather than rise.
text_preceding: Our farm people are not sharing as they should in the general prosperity.
text_following: They are caught between two millstones-- rising production costs and declining prices.

text_original: They are caught between two millstones-- rising production costs and declining prices.

text_following: Such harm to a part of the national economy so vitally important to everyone is of great concern to us all.

text_following: Our objective must be to help bring production into balance with existing and new markets, at prices that yield farmers a return for their work in line with what other Americans get.

text_preceding: To reach this goal, deep-seated problems must be subjected to a stepped-up attack.

text_following: A fundamental belief shines forth in this Republic.

text_original: A fundamental belief shines forth in this Republic.
text_preceding: A final consideration in our program planning is: THE RESPONSE TO HUMAN CONCERNS.
text_following: We believe in the worth and dignity of the individual.

text_original: We believe in the worth and dignity of the individual.
text_preceding: A fundamental belief shines forth in this Republic.
text_following: We know that if we are to govern ourselves wisely--in the tradition of America--we must have the opportunity to develop our individual capacities to the utmost.

text_original: We know that if we are to govern ourselves wisely--in the tradition of America--we must have the opportunity to develop our individual capacities to the utmost.
text_preceding: We believe in the worth and dignity of the individual.
text_following: To fulfill the individual's aspirations in the American way of life, good education is fundamental.

text_original: To fulfill the individual's aspirations in the American way of life, good education is fundamental.
text_preceding: We know that if we are to govern ourselves wisely--in the tradition of America--we must have the opportunity to develop our individual capacities to the utmost.
text_following: Good education is the outgrowth of good homes, good communities, good churches, and good schools.

text_original: Good education is the outgrowth of good homes, good communities, good churches, and good schools.
text_preceding: To fulfill the individual's aspirations in the American way of life, good education is fundamental.
text_following: Today our schools face pressing problems--problems which will not yield to swift and easy solutions, or to any single action.

text_original: Today our schools face pressing problems--problems which will not yield to swift and easy solutions, or to any single action.
text_preceding: Good education is the outgrowth of good homes, good communities, good churches, and good schools.
text_following: They will yield only to a continuing, active, informed effort by the people toward achieving better schools.

text_original: They will yield only to a continuing, active, informed effort by the people toward achieving better schools.
text_preceding: Today our schools face pressing problems--problems which will not yield to swift and easy solutions, or to any single action.
text_following: This kind of effort has been spurred by the thousands of conferences held in recent months by half a million citizens and educators in all parts of the country, culminating in the White House Conference on Education.

text_original: This kind of effort has been spurred by the thousands of conferences held in recent months by half a million citizens and educators in all parts of the country, culminating in the White House Conference on Education.
text_preceding: They will yield only to a continuing, active, informed effort by the people toward achieving better schools.
text_following: In that Conference, some two thousand delegates, broadly representative of the nation, studied together the problems of the nation's schools.

text_original: In that Conference, some two thousand delegates, broadly representative of the nation, studied together the problems of the nation's schools.
text_preceding: This kind of effort has been spurred by the thousands of conferences held in recent months by half a million citizens and educators in all parts of the country, culminating in the White House Conference on Education.
text_following: They concluded that the people of the United States must make a greater effort through their local, State, and Federal Governments to improve the education of our youth.

text_original: They concluded that the people of the United States must make a greater effort through their local, State, and Federal Governments to improve the education of our youth.
text_preceding: In that Conference, some two thousand delegates, broadly representative of the nation, studied together the problems of the nation's schools.
text_following: This expression from the people must now be translated into action at all levels of government.

text_original: This expression from the people must now be translated into action at all levels of government.
text_preceding: They concluded that the people of the United States must make a greater effort through their local, State, and Federal Governments to improve the education of our youth.
text_following: So far as the Federal share of responsibility is concerned, I urge that the Congress move promptly to enact an effective program of Federal assistance to help erase the existing deficit of school classrooms.

text_original: So far as the Federal share of responsibility is concerned, I urge that the Congress move promptly to enact an effective program of Federal assistance to help erase the existing deficit of school classrooms.
text_preceding: This expression from the people must now be translated into action at all levels of government.
text_following: Such a program, which should be limited to a five-year period, must operate to increase rather than decrease local and State support of schools and to give the greatest help to the States and localities with the least financial resources.

text_original: Such a program, which should be limited to a five-year period, must operate to increase rather than decrease local and State support of schools and to give the greatest help to the States and localities with the least financial resources.
text_preceding: So far as the Federal share of responsibility is concerned, I urge that the Congress move promptly to enact an effective program of Federal assistance to help erase the existing deficit of school classrooms.
text_following: Federal aid should in no way jeopardize the freedom of local school systems.

text_original: Federal aid should in no way jeopardize the freedom of local school systems.
text_preceding: Such a program, which should be limited to a five-year period, must operate to increase rather than decrease local and State support of schools and to give the greatest help to the States and localities with the least financial resources.
text_following: There will be presented to the Congress a recommended program of Federal assistance for school construction.

text_original: There will be presented to the Congress a recommended program of Federal assistance for school construction.
text_preceding: Federal aid should in no way jeopardize the freedom of local school systems.
text_following: Such a program should be accompanied by action to increase services to the nation's schools by the Office of Education and by legislation to provide continuation of payments to school districts where Federal activities have impaired the ability of those districts to provide adequate schools.

text_following: Under the 1954 Amendments to the old-age and survivors' insurance program, protection was extended to some 10 million additional workers and benefits were increased.

text_following: The nation has made dramatic progress in conquering disease-- progress of profound human significance which can be greatly accelerated by an intensified effort in medical research.

text_original: The nation has made dramatic progress in conquering disease-- progress of profound human significance which can be greatly accelerated by an intensified effort in medical research.
text_preceding: Similarly the problems of our aged people need our attention.
text_following: A well-supported, well-balanced program of research, including basic research, can open new frontiers of knowledge, prevent and relieve suffering, and prolong life.

text_original: A well-supported, well-balanced program of research, including basic research, can open new frontiers of knowledge, prevent and relieve suffering, and prolong life.
text_preceding: The nation has made dramatic progress in conquering disease-- progress of profound human significance which can be greatly accelerated by an intensified effort in medical research.

text_original: Accordingly I shall recommend a substantial increase in Federal funds for the support of such a program.
text_preceding: A well-supported, well-balanced program of research, including basic research, can open new frontiers of knowledge, prevent and relieve suffering, and prolong life.

text_following: The response of government to human concerns embraces, of course, other measures of broad public interest, and of special interest to our working men and women.

text_original: The recommendations I submitted to the Congress last year take into account not only the interests of labor and management but also the public welfare.

text_preceding: In keeping with our responsibility of world leadership and in our own self interest, I again point out to the Congress the urgent need for revision of the immigration and nationality laws.
text_following: The wisdom of such a policy is clearly shown by the fact that America has been built by immigrants and the descendants of immigrants.

text_original: The wisdom of such a policy is clearly shown by the fact that America has been built by immigrants and the descendants of immigrants.
text_preceding: Our nation has always welcomed immigrants to our shores.
text_following: That policy must be continued realistically with present day conditions in mind.

text_original: That policy must be continued realistically with present day conditions in mind.
text_preceding: The wisdom of such a policy is clearly shown by the fact that America has been built by immigrants and the descendants of immigrants.
text_following: I recommend that the number of persons admitted to this country annually be based not on the 1920 census but on the latest, the 1950 census.

text_original: I recommend that the number of persons admitted to this country annually be based not on the 1920 census but on the latest, the 1950 census.
text_preceding: That policy must be continued realistically with present day conditions in mind.
text_following: Provision should be made to allow for greater flexibility in the use of quotas so if one country does not use its share, the vacancies may be made available for the use of qualified individuals from other countries.

text_following: The march of science, the expanding economy, the advance in collective security toward a just peace--in this threefold movement our people are creating new standards by which the future of the Republic may be judged.

text_original: The march of science, the expanding economy, the advance in collective security toward a just peace--in this threefold movement our people are creating new standards by which the future of the Republic may be judged.
text_preceding: To conclude: the vista before us is bright.
text_following: Progress, however, will be realized only as it is more than matched by a continuing growth in the spiritual strength of the nation.

text_original: Progress, however, will be realized only as it is more than matched by a continuing growth in the spiritual strength of the nation.
text_preceding: The march of science, the expanding economy, the advance in collective security toward a just peace--in this threefold movement our people are creating new standards by which the future of the Republic may be judged.
text_following: Our dedication to moral values must be complete in our dealings abroad and in our relationships among ourselves.

text_original: Our dedication to moral values must be complete in our dealings abroad and in our relationships among ourselves.
text_preceding: Progress, however, will be realized only as it is more than matched by a continuing growth in the spiritual strength of the nation.
text_following: We have single-minded devotion to the common good of America.

text_original: We have single-minded devotion to the common good of America.
text_preceding: Our dedication to moral values must be complete in our dealings abroad and in our relationships among ourselves.
text_following: Never must we forget that this means the well-being, the prosperity, the security of all Americans in every walk of life.

text_original: Never must we forget that this means the well-being, the prosperity, the security of all Americans in every walk of life.
text_preceding: We have single-minded devotion to the common good of America.
text_following: To the attainment of these objectives, I pledge full energies of the Administration, as in the Session ahead, it works on a program for submission to you, the Congress of the United States.

text_original: To the attainment of these objectives, I pledge full energies of the Administration, as in the Session ahead, it works on a program for submission to you, the Congress of the United States.
text_preceding: Never must we forget that this means the well-being, the prosperity, the security of all Americans in every walk of life.

text_original: This is the moment when Congress and the Executive annually begin their cooperative work to build a better America.
text_following: One basic purpose unites us: To promote strength and security, side by side with liberty and opportunity.

text_original: One basic purpose unites us: To promote strength and security, side by side with liberty and opportunity.
text_preceding: This is the moment when Congress and the Executive annually begin their cooperative work to build a better America.
text_following: As we meet today, in the 170th year of the Republic, our Nation must continue to provide--as all other free governments have had to do throughout time--a satisfactory answer to a question as old as history.

text_original: As we meet today, in the 170th year of the Republic, our Nation must continue to provide--as all other free governments have had to do throughout time--a satisfactory answer to a question as old as history.
text_preceding: One basic purpose unites us: To promote strength and security, side by side with liberty and opportunity.
text_following: It is: Can Government based upon liberty and the God-given rights of man, permanently endure when ceaselessly challenged by a dictatorship, hostile to our mode of life, and controlling an economic and military power of great and growing strength?

text_original: It is: Can Government based upon liberty and the God-given rights of man, permanently endure when ceaselessly challenged by a dictatorship, hostile to our mode of life, and controlling an economic and military power of great and growing strength?
text_preceding: As we meet today, in the 170th year of the Republic, our Nation must continue to provide--as all other free governments have had to do throughout time--a satisfactory answer to a question as old as history.
text_following: For us the answer has always been found, and is still found in the devotion, the vision, the courage and the fortitude of our people.

text_original: For us the answer has always been found, and is still found in the devotion, the vision, the courage and the fortitude of our people.
text_preceding: It is: Can Government based upon liberty and the God-given rights of man, permanently endure when ceaselessly challenged by a dictatorship, hostile to our mode of life, and controlling an economic and military power of great and growing strength?
text_following: Moreover, this challenge we face, not as a single powerful nation, but as one that has in recent decades reached a position of recognized leadership in the Free World.

text_original: Moreover, this challenge we face, not as a single powerful nation, but as one that has in recent decades reached a position of recognized leadership in the Free World.
text_preceding: For us the answer has always been found, and is still found in the devotion, the vision, the courage and the fortitude of our people.
text_following: We have arrived at this position of leadership in an era of remarkable productivity and growth.

text_original: We have arrived at this position of leadership in an era of remarkable productivity and growth.
text_preceding: Moreover, this challenge we face, not as a single powerful nation, but as one that has in recent decades reached a position of recognized leadership in the Free World.
text_following: It is also a time when man's power of mass destruction has reached fearful proportions.

text_original: It is also a time when man's power of mass destruction has reached fearful proportions.
text_preceding: We have arrived at this position of leadership in an era of remarkable productivity and growth.
text_following: Possession of such capabilities helps create world suspicion and tension.

text_original: Possession of such capabilities helps create world suspicion and tension.
text_preceding: It is also a time when man's power of mass destruction has reached fearful proportions.
text_following: We, on our part, know that we seek only a just peace for all, with aggressive designs against no one.

text_original: We, on our part, know that we seek only a just peace for all, with aggressive designs against no one.
text_preceding: Possession of such capabilities helps create world suspicion and tension.
text_following: Yet we realize that there is uneasiness in the world because of a belief on the part of peoples that through arrogance, miscalculation or fear of attack, catastrophic war could be launched.

text_original: Yet we realize that there is uneasiness in the world because of a belief on the part of peoples that through arrogance, miscalculation or fear of attack, catastrophic war could be launched.
text_preceding: We, on our part, know that we seek only a just peace for all, with aggressive designs against no one.
text_following: Keeping the peace in today's world more than ever calls for the utmost in the nation's resolution, wisdom, steadiness and unremitting effort.

text_original: Keeping the peace in today's world more than ever calls for the utmost in the nation's resolution, wisdom, steadiness and unremitting effort.
text_preceding: Yet we realize that there is uneasiness in the world because of a belief on the part of peoples that through arrogance, miscalculation or fear of attack, catastrophic war could be launched.
text_following: We cannot build peace through desire alone.

text_original: We cannot build peace through desire alone.
text_preceding: Keeping the peace in today's world more than ever calls for the utmost in the nation's resolution, wisdom, steadiness and unremitting effort.
text_following: Moreover, we have learned the bitter lesson that international agreements, historically considered by us as sacred, are regarded in Communist doctrine and in practice to be mere scraps of paper.

text_original: Moreover, we have learned the bitter lesson that international agreements, historically considered by us as sacred, are regarded in Communist doctrine and in practice to be mere scraps of paper.
text_preceding: We cannot build peace through desire alone.
text_following: The most recent proof of their disdain of international obligations, solemnly undertaken, is their announced intention to abandon their responsibilities respecting Berlin.

text_original: The most recent proof of their disdain of international obligations, solemnly undertaken, is their announced intention to abandon their responsibilities respecting Berlin.
text_preceding: Moreover, we have learned the bitter lesson that international agreements, historically considered by us as sacred, are regarded in Communist doctrine and in practice to be mere scraps of paper.
text_following: As a consequence, we can have no confidence in any treaty to which Communists are a party except where such a treaty provides within itself for self-enforcing mechanisms.

text_original: As a consequence, we can have no confidence in any treaty to which Communists are a party except where such a treaty provides within itself for self-enforcing mechanisms.
text_preceding: The most recent proof of their disdain of international obligations, solemnly undertaken, is their announced intention to abandon their responsibilities respecting Berlin.
text_following: Indeed, the demonstrated disregard of the Communists of their own pledges is one of the greatest obstacles to success in substituting the Rule of Law for rule by force.

text_original: Indeed, the demonstrated disregard of the Communists of their own pledges is one of the greatest obstacles to success in substituting the Rule of Law for rule by force.
text_preceding: As a consequence, we can have no confidence in any treaty to which Communists are a party except where such a treaty provides within itself for self-enforcing mechanisms.
text_following: Yet step by step we must strengthen the institutions of peace--a peace that rests upon justice--a peace that depends upon a deep knowledge and clear understanding by all peoples of the cause and consequences of possible failure in this great purpose.

text_original: Yet step by step we must strengthen the institutions of peace--a peace that rests upon justice--a peace that depends upon a deep knowledge and clear understanding by all peoples of the cause and consequences of possible failure in this great purpose.
text_preceding: Indeed, the demonstrated disregard of the Communists of their own pledges is one of the greatest obstacles to success in substituting the Rule of Law for rule by force.

text_preceding: Any survey of the free world's defense structure cannot fail to impart a feeling of regret that so much of our effort and resources must be devoted to armaments.
text_following: America will never give up the hope that eventually all nations can, with mutual confidence, drastically reduce these non-productive expenditures.

text_original: America will never give up the hope that eventually all nations can, with mutual confidence, drastically reduce these non-productive expenditures.
text_preceding: At Geneva and elsewhere we continue to seek technical and other agreements that may help to open up, with some promise, the issues of international disarmament.
text_following: II. The material foundation of our national safety is a strong and expanding economy.

text_original: II. The material foundation of our national safety is a strong and expanding economy.
text_preceding: America will never give up the hope that eventually all nations can, with mutual confidence, drastically reduce these non-productive expenditures.
text_following: This we have--and this we must maintain.

text_original: This we have--and this we must maintain.
text_preceding: II. The material foundation of our national safety is a strong and expanding economy.
text_following: Only with such an economy can we be secure and simultaneously provide for the well-being of our people.

text_original: Only with such an economy can we be secure and simultaneously provide for the well-being of our people.
text_preceding: This we have--and this we must maintain.
text_following: A year ago the nation was experiencing a decline in employment and output.

text_original: A year ago the nation was experiencing a decline in employment and output.
text_preceding: Only with such an economy can we be secure and simultaneously provide for the well-being of our people.
text_following: Today that recession is fading into history, and this without gigantic, hastily-improvised public works projects or untimely tax reductions.

text_original: Today that recession is fading into history, and this without gigantic, hastily-improvised public works projects or untimely tax reductions.
text_preceding: A year ago the nation was experiencing a decline in employment and output.
text_following: A healthy and vigorous recovery has been under way since last May.

text_original: A healthy and vigorous recovery has been under way since last May.
text_preceding: Today that recession is fading into history, and this without gigantic, hastily-improvised public works projects or untimely tax reductions.
text_following: New homes are being built at the highest rate in several years.

text_original: New homes are being built at the highest rate in several years.
text_preceding: A healthy and vigorous recovery has been under way since last May.
text_following: Retail sales are at peak levels.

text_original: Retail sales are at peak levels.
text_preceding: New homes are being built at the highest rate in several years.
text_following: Personal income is at an all-time high.

text_original: Personal income is at an all-time high.
text_preceding: Retail sales are at peak levels.
text_following: The marked forward thrust of our economy reaffirms our confidence in competitive enterprise.

text_original: The marked forward thrust of our economy reaffirms our confidence in competitive enterprise.
text_preceding: Personal income is at an all-time high.
text_following: But--clearly--wisdom and prudence in both the public and private sectors of the economy are always necessary.

text_original: But--clearly--wisdom and prudence in both the public and private sectors of the economy are always necessary.
text_preceding: The marked forward thrust of our economy reaffirms our confidence in competitive enterprise.
text_following: Our outlook is this: 1960 commitments for our armed forces, the Atomic Energy Commission and Military Assistance exceed 47 billion dollars.

text_original: Our outlook is this: 1960 commitments for our armed forces, the Atomic Energy Commission and Military Assistance exceed 47 billion dollars.
text_preceding: But--clearly--wisdom and prudence in both the public and private sectors of the economy are always necessary.
text_following: In the foreseeable future they are not likely to be significantly lower.

text_original: In the foreseeable future they are not likely to be significantly lower.
text_preceding: Our outlook is this: 1960 commitments for our armed forces, the Atomic Energy Commission and Military Assistance exceed 47 billion dollars.
text_following: With an annual population increase of three million, other governmental costs are bound to mount.

text_original: With an annual population increase of three million, other governmental costs are bound to mount.
text_preceding: In the foreseeable future they are not likely to be significantly lower.
text_following: After we have provided wisely for our military strength, we must judge how to allocate our remaining government resources most effectively to promote our well-being and economic growth.

text_original: After we have provided wisely for our military strength, we must judge how to allocate our remaining government resources most effectively to promote our well-being and economic growth.
text_preceding: With an annual population increase of three million, other governmental costs are bound to mount.
text_following: Federal programs that will benefit all citizens are moving forward.

text_original: Federal programs that will benefit all citizens are moving forward.
text_preceding: After we have provided wisely for our military strength, we must judge how to allocate our remaining government resources most effectively to promote our well-being and economic growth.
text_following: Next year we will be spending increased amounts on health programs; on Federal assistance to science and education; on the development of the nation's water resources; on the renewal of urban areas; and on our vast system of Federal-aid highways.

text_original: Next year we will be spending increased amounts on health programs; on Federal assistance to science and education; on the development of the nation's water resources; on the renewal of urban areas; and on our vast system of Federal-aid highways.
text_preceding: Federal programs that will benefit all citizens are moving forward.
text_following: Each of these additional outlays is being made necessary by the surging growth of America.

text_original: Each of these additional outlays is being made necessary by the surging growth of America.
text_preceding: Next year we will be spending increased amounts on health programs; on Federal assistance to science and education; on the development of the nation's water resources; on the renewal of urban areas; and on our vast system of Federal-aid highways.
text_following: Responsive to this growth, Federal grants and long term loans to assist 14 major types of capital improvements in our cities will total over 2 billion dollars in 1960--double the expenditure of two years ago.

text_original: Responsive to this growth, Federal grants and long term loans to assist 14 major types of capital improvements in our cities will total over 2 billion dollars in 1960--double the expenditure of two years ago.
text_preceding: Each of these additional outlays is being made necessary by the surging growth of America.
text_following: The major responsibility for development in these fields rests in the localities, even though the Federal Government will continue to do its proper part in meeting the genuine needs of a burgeoning population.

text_original: The major responsibility for development in these fields rests in the localities, even though the Federal Government will continue to do its proper part in meeting the genuine needs of a burgeoning population.
text_preceding: Responsive to this growth, Federal grants and long term loans to assist 14 major types of capital improvements in our cities will total over 2 billion dollars in 1960--double the expenditure of two years ago.
text_following: But the progress of our economy can more than match the growth of our needs.

text_original: But the progress of our economy can more than match the growth of our needs.
text_preceding: The major responsibility for development in these fields rests in the localities, even though the Federal Government will continue to do its proper part in meeting the genuine needs of a burgeoning population.
text_following: We need only to act wisely and confidently.

text_original: We need only to act wisely and confidently.
text_preceding: But the progress of our economy can more than match the growth of our needs.
text_following: Here, I hope you will permit me to digress long enough to express something that is much on my mind.

text_original: Here, I hope you will permit me to digress long enough to express something that is much on my mind.
text_preceding: We need only to act wisely and confidently.
text_following: The basic question facing us today is more than mere survival--the military defense of national life and territory.

text_original: The basic question facing us today is more than mere survival--the military defense of national life and territory.
text_preceding: Here, I hope you will permit me to digress long enough to express something that is much on my mind.
text_following: It is the preservation of a way of life.

text_original: It is the preservation of a way of life.
text_preceding: The basic question facing us today is more than mere survival--the military defense of national life and territory.
text_following: We must meet the world challenge and at the same time permit no stagnation in America.

text_original: We must meet the world challenge and at the same time permit no stagnation in America.
text_preceding: It is the preservation of a way of life.
text_following: Unless we progress, we regress.

text_original: Unless we progress, we regress.
text_preceding: We must meet the world challenge and at the same time permit no stagnation in America.
text_following: We can successfully sustain security and remain true to our heritage of freedom if we clearly visualize the tasks ahead and set out to perform them with resolution and fervor.

text_original: We can successfully sustain security and remain true to our heritage of freedom if we clearly visualize the tasks ahead and set out to perform them with resolution and fervor.
text_preceding: Unless we progress, we regress.
text_following: We must first define these tasks and then understand what we must do to perform them.

text_original: We must first define these tasks and then understand what we must do to perform them.
text_preceding: We can successfully sustain security and remain true to our heritage of freedom if we clearly visualize the tasks ahead and set out to perform them with resolution and fervor.
text_following: If progress is to be steady we must have long term guides extending far ahead, certainly five, possibly even ten years.

text_original: If progress is to be steady we must have long term guides extending far ahead, certainly five, possibly even ten years.
text_preceding: We must first define these tasks and then understand what we must do to perform them.
text_following: They must reflect the knowledge that before the end of five years we will have a population of over 190 million.

text_original: They must reflect the knowledge that before the end of five years we will have a population of over 190 million.
text_preceding: If progress is to be steady we must have long term guides extending far ahead, certainly five, possibly even ten years.
text_following: They must be goals that stand high, and so inspire every citizen to climb always toward mounting levels of moral, intellectual and material strength.

text_original: They must be goals that stand high, and so inspire every citizen to climb always toward mounting levels of moral, intellectual and material strength.
text_preceding: They must reflect the knowledge that before the end of five years we will have a population of over 190 million.
text_following: Every advance toward them must stir pride in individual and national achievements.

text_original: Every advance toward them must stir pride in individual and national achievements.
text_preceding: They must be goals that stand high, and so inspire every citizen to climb always toward mounting levels of moral, intellectual and material strength.
text_following: To define these goals, I intend to mobilize help from every available source.

text_original: To define these goals, I intend to mobilize help from every available source.
text_preceding: Every advance toward them must stir pride in individual and national achievements.
text_following: We need more than politically ordained national objectives to challenge the best efforts of free men and women.

text_original: We need more than politically ordained national objectives to challenge the best efforts of free men and women.
text_preceding: To define these goals, I intend to mobilize help from every available source.
text_following: A group of selfless and devoted individuals, outside of government, could effectively participate in making the necessary appraisal of the potentials of our future.

text_original: A group of selfless and devoted individuals, outside of government, could effectively participate in making the necessary appraisal of the potentials of our future.
text_preceding: We need more than politically ordained national objectives to challenge the best efforts of free men and women.
text_following: The result would be establishment of national goals that would not only spur us on to our finest efforts, but would meet the stern test of practicality.

text_original: The result would be establishment of national goals that would not only spur us on to our finest efforts, but would meet the stern test of practicality.
text_preceding: A group of selfless and devoted individuals, outside of government, could effectively participate in making the necessary appraisal of the potentials of our future.
text_following: The Committee I plan will comprise educators and representatives of labor, management, finance, the professions and every other kind of useful activity.

text_original: The Committee I plan will comprise educators and representatives of labor, management, finance, the professions and every other kind of useful activity.
text_preceding: The result would be establishment of national goals that would not only spur us on to our finest efforts, but would meet the stern test of practicality.
text_following: Such a study would update and supplement, in the light of continuous changes in our society and its economy, the monumental work of the Committee on Recent Social Trends which was appointed in 1931 by President Hoover.

text_original: Such a study would update and supplement, in the light of continuous changes in our society and its economy, the monumental work of the Committee on Recent Social Trends which was appointed in 1931 by President Hoover.
text_preceding: The Committee I plan will comprise educators and representatives of labor, management, finance, the professions and every other kind of useful activity.
text_following: Its report has stood the test of time and has had a beneficial influence on national development.

text_original: Its report has stood the test of time and has had a beneficial influence on national development.
text_preceding: Such a study would update and supplement, in the light of continuous changes in our society and its economy, the monumental work of the Committee on Recent Social Trends which was appointed in 1931 by President Hoover.
text_following: The new Committee would be concerned, among other things, with the acceleration of our economy's growth and the living standards of our people, their health and education, their better assurance of life and liberty and their greater opportunities.

text_original: The new Committee would be concerned, among other things, with the acceleration of our economy's growth and the living standards of our people, their health and education, their better assurance of life and liberty and their greater opportunities.
text_preceding: Its report has stood the test of time and has had a beneficial influence on national development.
text_following: It would also be concerned with methods to meet such goals and what levels of government--Local, State, or Federal--might or should be particularly concerned.

text_original: It would also be concerned with methods to meet such goals and what levels of government--Local, State, or Federal--might or should be particularly concerned.
text_preceding: The new Committee would be concerned, among other things, with the acceleration of our economy's growth and the living standards of our people, their health and education, their better assurance of life and liberty and their greater opportunities.
text_following: As one example, consider our schools, operated under the authority of local communities and states.

text_original: As one example, consider our schools, operated under the authority of local communities and states.
text_preceding: It would also be concerned with methods to meet such goals and what levels of government--Local, State, or Federal--might or should be particularly concerned.
text_following: In their capacity and in their quality they conform to no recognizable standards.

text_original: In their capacity and in their quality they conform to no recognizable standards.
text_preceding: As one example, consider our schools, operated under the authority of local communities and states.
text_following: In some places facilities are ample, in others meager.

text_original: In some places facilities are ample, in others meager.
text_preceding: In their capacity and in their quality they conform to no recognizable standards.
text_following: Pay of teachers ranges between wide limits, from the adequate to the shameful.

text_original: Pay of teachers ranges between wide limits, from the adequate to the shameful.
text_preceding: In some places facilities are ample, in others meager.
text_following: As would be expected, quality of teaching varies just as widely.

text_original: As would be expected, quality of teaching varies just as widely.
text_preceding: Pay of teachers ranges between wide limits, from the adequate to the shameful.
text_following: But to our teachers we commit the most valuable possession of the nation and of the family-- our children.

text_original: But to our teachers we commit the most valuable possession of the nation and of the family-- our children.
text_preceding: As would be expected, quality of teaching varies just as widely.
text_following: We must have teachers of competence.

text_original: We must have teachers of competence.
text_preceding: But to our teachers we commit the most valuable possession of the nation and of the family-- our children.
text_following: To obtain and hold them we need standards.

text_original: To obtain and hold them we need standards.
text_preceding: We must have teachers of competence.
text_following: Once established I am certain that public opinion would compel steady progress toward its accomplishment.

text_original: Once established I am certain that public opinion would compel steady progress toward its accomplishment.
text_preceding: To obtain and hold them we need standards.
text_following: Such studies would be helpful, I believe, to government at all levels and to all individuals.

text_original: Such studies would be helpful, I believe, to government at all levels and to all individuals.
text_preceding: Once established I am certain that public opinion would compel steady progress toward its accomplishment.
text_following: The goals so established could help us see our current needs in perspective.

text_original: The goals so established could help us see our current needs in perspective.
text_preceding: Such studies would be helpful, I believe, to government at all levels and to all individuals.
text_following: We do not forget, of course, that our nation's progress and fiscal integrity are interdependent and inseparable.

text_original: We do not forget, of course, that our nation's progress and fiscal integrity are interdependent and inseparable.
text_preceding: The goals so established could help us see our current needs in perspective.
text_following: We can afford everything we clearly need, but we cannot afford one cent of waste.

text_original: We can afford everything we clearly need, but we cannot afford one cent of waste.
text_preceding: We do not forget, of course, that our nation's progress and fiscal integrity are interdependent and inseparable.
text_following: We must examine every item of governmental expense critically.

text_original: We must examine every item of governmental expense critically.
text_preceding: We can afford everything we clearly need, but we cannot afford one cent of waste.
text_following: To do otherwise would betray our nation's future.

text_original: To do otherwise would betray our nation's future.
text_preceding: We must examine every item of governmental expense critically.
text_following: Thrift is one of the characteristics that has made this nation great.

text_original: Thrift is one of the characteristics that has made this nation great.
text_preceding: To do otherwise would betray our nation's future.
text_following: We must avoid any contribution to inflationary processes, which could disrupt sound growth in our economy.

text_original: We must avoid any contribution to inflationary processes, which could disrupt sound growth in our economy.
text_preceding: Thrift is one of the characteristics that has made this nation great.
text_following: Prices have displayed a welcome stability in recent months and, if we are wise and resolute, we will not tolerate inflation in the years to come.

text_original: Prices have displayed a welcome stability in recent months and, if we are wise and resolute, we will not tolerate inflation in the years to come.
text_preceding: We must avoid any contribution to inflationary processes, which could disrupt sound growth in our economy.
text_following: But history makes clear the risks inherent in any failure to deal firmly with the basic causes of inflation.

text_original: But history makes clear the risks inherent in any failure to deal firmly with the basic causes of inflation.
text_preceding: Prices have displayed a welcome stability in recent months and, if we are wise and resolute, we will not tolerate inflation in the years to come.
text_following: Two of the most important of these causes are the wage-price spiral and continued deficit financing.

text_original: Two of the most important of these causes are the wage-price spiral and continued deficit financing.
text_preceding: But history makes clear the risks inherent in any failure to deal firmly with the basic causes of inflation.
text_following: Inflation would reduce job opportunities, price us out of world markets, shrink the value of savings and penalize the thrift so essential to finance a growing economy.

text_original: Inflation would reduce job opportunities, price us out of world markets, shrink the value of savings and penalize the thrift so essential to finance a growing economy.
text_preceding: Two of the most important of these causes are the wage-price spiral and continued deficit financing.
text_following: Inflation is not a Robin Hood, taking from the rich to give to the poor.

text_original: Inflation is not a Robin Hood, taking from the rich to give to the poor.
text_preceding: Inflation would reduce job opportunities, price us out of world markets, shrink the value of savings and penalize the thrift so essential to finance a growing economy.
text_following: Rather, it deals most cruelly with those who can least protect themselves.

text_original: Rather, it deals most cruelly with those who can least protect themselves.
text_preceding: Inflation is not a Robin Hood, taking from the rich to give to the poor.
text_following: It strikes hardest those millions of our citizens whose incomes do not quickly rise with the cost of living.

text_original: It strikes hardest those millions of our citizens whose incomes do not quickly rise with the cost of living.
text_preceding: Rather, it deals most cruelly with those who can least protect themselves.
text_following: When prices soar, the pensioner and the widow see their security undermined, the man of thrift sees his savings melt away; the white collar worker, the minister, and the teacher see their standards of living dragged down.

text_original: When prices soar, the pensioner and the widow see their security undermined, the man of thrift sees his savings melt away; the white collar worker, the minister, and the teacher see their standards of living dragged down.
text_preceding: It strikes hardest those millions of our citizens whose incomes do not quickly rise with the cost of living.
text_following: But this demands statesmanship on the part of business and labor leaders and of government at all levels.

text_original: But this demands statesmanship on the part of business and labor leaders and of government at all levels.
text_preceding: When prices soar, the pensioner and the widow see their security undermined, the man of thrift sees his savings melt away; the white collar worker, the minister, and the teacher see their standards of living dragged down.
text_following: We must encourage the self-discipline, the restraint necessary to curb the wage-price spiral and we must meet current costs from current revenue.

text_original: We must encourage the self-discipline, the restraint necessary to curb the wage-price spiral and we must meet current costs from current revenue.
text_preceding: But this demands statesmanship on the part of business and labor leaders and of government at all levels.
text_following: To minimize the danger of future soaring prices and to keep our economy sound and expanding, I shall present to the Congress certain proposals.

text_original: To minimize the danger of future soaring prices and to keep our economy sound and expanding, I shall present to the Congress certain proposals.
text_preceding: We must encourage the self-discipline, the restraint necessary to curb the wage-price spiral and we must meet current costs from current revenue.
text_following: First, I shall submit a balanced budget for the next year, a year expected to be the most prosperous in our history.

text_original: First, I shall submit a balanced budget for the next year, a year expected to be the most prosperous in our history.
text_preceding: To minimize the danger of future soaring prices and to keep our economy sound and expanding, I shall present to the Congress certain proposals.
text_following: It is a realistic budget with wholly attainable objectives.

text_original: It is a realistic budget with wholly attainable objectives.
text_preceding: First, I shall submit a balanced budget for the next year, a year expected to be the most prosperous in our history.
text_following: If we cannot live within our means during such a time of rising prosperity, the hope for fiscal integrity will fade.

text_original: If we cannot live within our means during such a time of rising prosperity, the hope for fiscal integrity will fade.
text_preceding: It is a realistic budget with wholly attainable objectives.
text_following: If we persist in living beyond our means, we make it difficult for every family in our land to balance its own household budget.

text_original: If we persist in living beyond our means, we make it difficult for every family in our land to balance its own household budget.
text_preceding: If we cannot live within our means during such a time of rising prosperity, the hope for fiscal integrity will fade.
text_following: But to live within our means would be a tangible demonstration of the self-discipline needed to assure a stable dollar.

text_original: But to live within our means would be a tangible demonstration of the self-discipline needed to assure a stable dollar.
text_preceding: If we persist in living beyond our means, we make it difficult for every family in our land to balance its own household budget.
text_following: The Constitution entrusts the Executive with many functions, but the Congress--and the Congress alone--has the power of the purse.

text_original: The Constitution entrusts the Executive with many functions, but the Congress--and the Congress alone--has the power of the purse.
text_preceding: But to live within our means would be a tangible demonstration of the self-discipline needed to assure a stable dollar.
text_following: Ultimately upon Congress rests responsibility for determining the scope and amount of Federal spending.

text_original: Ultimately upon Congress rests responsibility for determining the scope and amount of Federal spending.
text_preceding: The Constitution entrusts the Executive with many functions, but the Congress--and the Congress alone--has the power of the purse.
text_following: By working together, the Congress and the Executive can keep a balance between income and outgo.

text_original: By working together, the Congress and the Executive can keep a balance between income and outgo.
text_preceding: Ultimately upon Congress rests responsibility for determining the scope and amount of Federal spending.
text_following: If this is done there is real hope that we can look forward to a time in the foreseeable future when needed tax reforms can be accomplished.

text_original: If this is done there is real hope that we can look forward to a time in the foreseeable future when needed tax reforms can be accomplished.
text_preceding: By working together, the Congress and the Executive can keep a balance between income and outgo.
text_following: In this hope, I am requesting the Secretary of the Treasury to prepare appropriate proposals for revising, at the proper time, our tax structure, to remove inequities and to enhance incentives for all Americans to work, to save, and to invest.

text_original: In this hope, I am requesting the Secretary of the Treasury to prepare appropriate proposals for revising, at the proper time, our tax structure, to remove inequities and to enhance incentives for all Americans to work, to save, and to invest.
text_preceding: If this is done there is real hope that we can look forward to a time in the foreseeable future when needed tax reforms can be accomplished.
text_following: Such recommendations will be made as soon as our fiscal condition permits.

text_original: Such recommendations will be made as soon as our fiscal condition permits.
text_preceding: In this hope, I am requesting the Secretary of the Treasury to prepare appropriate proposals for revising, at the proper time, our tax structure, to remove inequities and to enhance incentives for all Americans to work, to save, and to invest.
text_following: These prospects will be brightened if 1960 expenditures do not exceed the levels recommended.

text_original: These prospects will be brightened if 1960 expenditures do not exceed the levels recommended.
text_preceding: Such recommendations will be made as soon as our fiscal condition permits.
text_following: Second, I shall recommend to the Congress that the Chief Executive be given the responsibility either to approve or to veto specific items in appropriations and authorization bills.

text_original: Second, I shall recommend to the Congress that the Chief Executive be given the responsibility either to approve or to veto specific items in appropriations and authorization bills.
text_preceding: These prospects will be brightened if 1960 expenditures do not exceed the levels recommended.
text_following: [I assure you gentlemen that I know this recommendation has been made time and again by every President that has appeared in this hall for many years, but I say this, it still is one of the most important corrections that could be made in our annual expenditure program, because this would save tax dollars.]

text_original: [I assure you gentlemen that I know this recommendation has been made time and again by every President that has appeared in this hall for many years, but I say this, it still is one of the most important corrections that could be made in our annual expenditure program, because this would save tax dollars.]
text_preceding: Second, I shall recommend to the Congress that the Chief Executive be given the responsibility either to approve or to veto specific items in appropriations and authorization bills.
text_following: Third, to reduce Federal operations in an area where private enterprise can do the job, I shall recommend legislation for greater flexibility in extending Federal credit, and in improving the procedures under which private credits are insured or guaranteed.

text_original: Third, to reduce Federal operations in an area where private enterprise can do the job, I shall recommend legislation for greater flexibility in extending Federal credit, and in improving the procedures under which private credits are insured or guaranteed.
text_preceding: [I assure you gentlemen that I know this recommendation has been made time and again by every President that has appeared in this hall for many years, but I say this, it still is one of the most important corrections that could be made in our annual expenditure program, because this would save tax dollars.]
text_following: Present practices have needlessly added large sums to Federal expenditures.

text_preceding: Third, to reduce Federal operations in an area where private enterprise can do the job, I shall recommend legislation for greater flexibility in extending Federal credit, and in improving the procedures under which private credits are insured or guaranteed.

text_preceding: Present practices have needlessly added large sums to Federal expenditures.

text_preceding: Fourth, action is required to make more effective use of the large Federal expenditures for agriculture and to achieve greater fiscal control in this area.

text_original: By the end of this fiscal year it is estimated that there will be in Government hands surplus farm products worth about nine billion dollars.
text_preceding: That is a sum equal to approximately two-fifths of the net income of all farm operators in the entire United States.

text_original: And by July 1, 1959, Government expenditures for storage, interest, and handling of its agricultural inventory will reach a rate of one billion dollars a year.

text_preceding: And by July 1, 1959, Government expenditures for storage, interest, and handling of its agricultural inventory will reach a rate of one billion dollars a year.

text_preceding: This level of expenditure for farm products could be made willingly for a temporary period if it were leading to a sound solution of the problem.

text_original: In the past I have sent messages to the Congress requesting greater freedom for our farmers to manage their own farms and greater freedom for markets to reflect the wishes of producers and consumers.

text_following: Legislative changes that followed were appropriate in direction but did not go far enough.

text_original: Legislative changes that followed were appropriate in direction but did not go far enough.
text_preceding: In the past I have sent messages to the Congress requesting greater freedom for our farmers to manage their own farms and greater freedom for markets to reflect the wishes of producers and consumers.
text_following: The situation calls for prompt and forthright action.

text_original: The situation calls for prompt and forthright action.
text_preceding: Legislative changes that followed were appropriate in direction but did not go far enough.
text_following: Recommendation for action will be contained in a message to be transmitted to the Congress shortly.

text_original: Recommendation for action will be contained in a message to be transmitted to the Congress shortly.
text_preceding: The situation calls for prompt and forthright action.
text_following: These fiscal and related actions will help create an environment of price stability for economic growth.

text_original: These fiscal and related actions will help create an environment of price stability for economic growth.
text_preceding: Recommendation for action will be contained in a message to be transmitted to the Congress shortly.
text_following: However, certain additional measures are needed.

text_original: However, certain additional measures are needed.
text_preceding: These fiscal and related actions will help create an environment of price stability for economic growth.
text_following: I shall ask Congress to amend the Employment Act of 1946 to make it clear that Government intends to use all appropriate means to protect the buying power of the dollar.

text_original: I shall ask Congress to amend the Employment Act of 1946 to make it clear that Government intends to use all appropriate means to protect the buying power of the dollar.
text_preceding: However, certain additional measures are needed.
text_following: I am establishing a continuing Cabinet group on Price Stability for Economic Growth to study governmental and private policies affecting costs, prices, and economic growth.

text_original: I am establishing a continuing Cabinet group on Price Stability for Economic Growth to study governmental and private policies affecting costs, prices, and economic growth.
text_preceding: I shall ask Congress to amend the Employment Act of 1946 to make it clear that Government intends to use all appropriate means to protect the buying power of the dollar.
text_following: It will strive also to build a better public understanding of the conditions necessary for maintaining growth and price stability.

text_original: It will strive also to build a better public understanding of the conditions necessary for maintaining growth and price stability.
text_preceding: I am establishing a continuing Cabinet group on Price Stability for Economic Growth to study governmental and private policies affecting costs, prices, and economic growth.
text_following: Studies are being undertaken to improve our information on prices, wages, and productivity.

text_original: Studies are being undertaken to improve our information on prices, wages, and productivity.
text_preceding: It will strive also to build a better public understanding of the conditions necessary for maintaining growth and price stability.
text_following: I believe all citizens in all walks of life will support this program of action to accelerate economic growth and promote price stability.

text_original: I believe all citizens in all walks of life will support this program of action to accelerate economic growth and promote price stability.
text_preceding: Studies are being undertaken to improve our information on prices, wages, and productivity.
text_following: III. I take up next certain aspects of our international situation and our programs to strengthen it.

text_original: III. I take up next certain aspects of our international situation and our programs to strengthen it.
text_preceding: I believe all citizens in all walks of life will support this program of action to accelerate economic growth and promote price stability.
text_following: America's security can be assured only within a world community of strong, stable, independent nations, in which the concepts of freedom, justice and human dignity can flourish.

text_original: America's security can be assured only within a world community of strong, stable, independent nations, in which the concepts of freedom, justice and human dignity can flourish.
text_preceding: III. I take up next certain aspects of our international situation and our programs to strengthen it.
text_following: There can be no such thing as Fortress America.

text_original: There can be no such thing as Fortress America.
text_preceding: America's security can be assured only within a world community of strong, stable, independent nations, in which the concepts of freedom, justice and human dignity can flourish.
text_following: If ever we were reduced to the isolation implied by that term, we would occupy a prison, not a fortress.

text_original: If ever we were reduced to the isolation implied by that term, we would occupy a prison, not a fortress.
text_preceding: There can be no such thing as Fortress America.
text_following: The question whether we can afford to help other nations that want to defend their freedom but cannot fully do so from their own means, has only one answer: we can and we must, we we have been doing so since 1947.

text_original: The question whether we can afford to help other nations that want to defend their freedom but cannot fully do so from their own means, has only one answer: we can and we must, we we have been doing so since 1947.
text_preceding: If ever we were reduced to the isolation implied by that term, we would occupy a prison, not a fortress.
text_following: Our foreign policy has long been dedicated to building a permanent and just peace.

text_original: Our foreign policy has long been dedicated to building a permanent and just peace.
text_preceding: The question whether we can afford to help other nations that want to defend their freedom but cannot fully do so from their own means, has only one answer: we can and we must, we we have been doing so since 1947.
text_following: During the past six years our free world security arrangements have been bolstered and the bonds of freedom have been more closely knit.

text_original: During the past six years our free world security arrangements have been bolstered and the bonds of freedom have been more closely knit.
text_preceding: Our foreign policy has long been dedicated to building a permanent and just peace.
text_following: Our friends in Western Europe are experiencing new internal vitality, and are increasingly more able to resist external threats.

text_original: Our friends in Western Europe are experiencing new internal vitality, and are increasingly more able to resist external threats.
text_preceding: During the past six years our free world security arrangements have been bolstered and the bonds of freedom have been more closely knit.
text_following: Over the years the world has come to understand clearly that it is our firm policy not to countenance aggression.

text_original: Over the years the world has come to understand clearly that it is our firm policy not to countenance aggression.
text_preceding: Our friends in Western Europe are experiencing new internal vitality, and are increasingly more able to resist external threats.
text_following: In Lebanon, Taiwan, and Berlin--our stand has been clear, right, and expressive of the determined will of a united people.

text_original: In Lebanon, Taiwan, and Berlin--our stand has been clear, right, and expressive of the determined will of a united people.
text_preceding: Over the years the world has come to understand clearly that it is our firm policy not to countenance aggression.
text_following: Acting with other free nations we have undertaken the solemn obligation to defend the people of free Berlin against any effort to destroy their freedom.

text_original: Acting with other free nations we have undertaken the solemn obligation to defend the people of free Berlin against any effort to destroy their freedom.
text_preceding: In Lebanon, Taiwan, and Berlin--our stand has been clear, right, and expressive of the determined will of a united people.
text_following: In the meantime we shall constantly seek meaningful agreements to settle this and other problems, knowing full well that not only the integrity of a single city, but the hope of all free peoples is at stake.

text_original: In the meantime we shall constantly seek meaningful agreements to settle this and other problems, knowing full well that not only the integrity of a single city, but the hope of all free peoples is at stake.
text_preceding: Acting with other free nations we have undertaken the solemn obligation to defend the people of free Berlin against any effort to destroy their freedom.
text_following: We need, likewise, to continue helping to build the economic base so essential to the Free World's stability and strength.

text_original: We need, likewise, to continue helping to build the economic base so essential to the Free World's stability and strength.
