text_following: But far too many are still trapped in poverty and idleness and fear.

text_original: But far too many are still trapped in poverty and idleness and fear.
text_preceding: Most Americans enjoy a good life.
text_following: Let a just nation throw open to them the city of promise: --to the elderly, by providing hospital care under social security and by raising benefit payments to those struggling to maintain the dignity of their later years;

text_original: Let a just nation throw open to them the city of promise: --to the elderly, by providing hospital care under social security and by raising benefit payments to those struggling to maintain the dignity of their later years;
text_preceding: But far too many are still trapped in poverty and idleness and fear.
text_following: to the poor and the unfortunate, through doubling the war against poverty this year;

text_original: to the poor and the unfortunate, through doubling the war against poverty this year;
text_preceding: Let a just nation throw open to them the city of promise: --to the elderly, by providing hospital care under social security and by raising benefit payments to those struggling to maintain the dignity of their later years;
text_following: to Negro Americans, through enforcement of the civil rights law and elimination of barriers to the right to vote;

text_original: to Negro Americans, through enforcement of the civil rights law and elimination of barriers to the right to vote;
text_preceding: to the poor and the unfortunate, through doubling the war against poverty this year;
text_following: to those in other lands that are seeking the promise of America, through an immigration law based on the work a man can do and not where he was born or how he spells his name.

text_original: to those in other lands that are seeking the promise of America, through an immigration law based on the work a man can do and not where he was born or how he spells his name.
text_preceding: to Negro Americans, through enforcement of the civil rights law and elimination of barriers to the right to vote;
text_following: To Enrich the Life of All: Our third goal is to improve the quality of American life.

text_original: To Enrich the Life of All: Our third goal is to improve the quality of American life.
text_preceding: to those in other lands that are seeking the promise of America, through an immigration law based on the work a man can do and not where he was born or how he spells his name.
text_following: Through Education: We begin with learning.

text_original: Through Education: We begin with learning.
text_preceding: To Enrich the Life of All: Our third goal is to improve the quality of American life.
text_following: Every child must have the best education that this Nation can provide.

text_original: Every child must have the best education that this Nation can provide.
text_preceding: Through Education: We begin with learning.
text_following: Thomas Jefferson said that no nation can be both ignorant and free.

text_original: Thomas Jefferson said that no nation can be both ignorant and free.
text_preceding: Every child must have the best education that this Nation can provide.
text_following: Today no nation can be both ignorant and great.

text_original: Today no nation can be both ignorant and great.
text_preceding: Thomas Jefferson said that no nation can be both ignorant and free.
text_following: In addition to our existing programs, I will recommend a new program for schools and students with a first year authorization of $1,500 million.

text_original: In addition to our existing programs, I will recommend a new program for schools and students with a first year authorization of $1,500 million.
text_preceding: Today no nation can be both ignorant and great.
text_following: It will help at every stage along the road to learning.

text_original: It will help at every stage along the road to learning.
text_preceding: In addition to our existing programs, I will recommend a new program for schools and students with a first year authorization of $1,500 million.
text_following: For the preschool years we will help needy children become aware of the excitement of learning.

text_original: For the preschool years we will help needy children become aware of the excitement of learning.
text_preceding: It will help at every stage along the road to learning.
text_following: For the primary and secondary school years we will aid public schools serving low-income families and assist students in both public and private schools.

text_original: For the primary and secondary school years we will aid public schools serving low-income families and assist students in both public and private schools.
text_preceding: For the preschool years we will help needy children become aware of the excitement of learning.
text_following: For the college years we will provide scholarships to high school students of the greatest promise and the greatest need and we will guarantee low-interest loans to students continuing their college studies.

text_original: For the college years we will provide scholarships to high school students of the greatest promise and the greatest need and we will guarantee low-interest loans to students continuing their college studies.
text_preceding: For the primary and secondary school years we will aid public schools serving low-income families and assist students in both public and private schools.
text_following: New laboratories and centers will help our schools--help them lift their standards of excellence and explore new methods of teaching.

text_original: New laboratories and centers will help our schools--help them lift their standards of excellence and explore new methods of teaching.
text_preceding: For the college years we will provide scholarships to high school students of the greatest promise and the greatest need and we will guarantee low-interest loans to students continuing their college studies.
text_following: These centers will provide special training for those who need and those who deserve special treatment.

text_original: These centers will provide special training for those who need and those who deserve special treatment.
text_preceding: New laboratories and centers will help our schools--help them lift their standards of excellence and explore new methods of teaching.
text_following: Through Better Health: Greatness requires not only an educated people but a healthy people.

text_original: Through Better Health: Greatness requires not only an educated people but a healthy people.
text_preceding: These centers will provide special training for those who need and those who deserve special treatment.
text_following: Our goal is to match the achievements of our medicine to the afflictions of our people.

text_original: Our goal is to match the achievements of our medicine to the afflictions of our people.
text_preceding: Through Better Health: Greatness requires not only an educated people but a healthy people.
text_following: We already carry on a large program in this country for research and health.

text_original: We already carry on a large program in this country for research and health.
text_preceding: Our goal is to match the achievements of our medicine to the afflictions of our people.
text_following: In addition, regional medical centers can provide the most advanced diagnosis and treatment for heart disease and cancer and stroke and other major diseases.

text_original: In addition, regional medical centers can provide the most advanced diagnosis and treatment for heart disease and cancer and stroke and other major diseases.
text_preceding: We already carry on a large program in this country for research and health.
text_following: New support for medical and dental education will provide the trained people to apply our knowledge.

text_original: New support for medical and dental education will provide the trained people to apply our knowledge.
text_preceding: In addition, regional medical centers can provide the most advanced diagnosis and treatment for heart disease and cancer and stroke and other major diseases.
text_following: Community centers can help the mentally ill and improve health care for school-age children from poor families, including services for the mentally retarded.

text_original: Community centers can help the mentally ill and improve health care for school-age children from poor families, including services for the mentally retarded.
text_preceding: New support for medical and dental education will provide the trained people to apply our knowledge.
text_following: Through Improving the World We Live in: The City An educated and healthy people require surroundings in harmony with their hopes.

text_original: Through Improving the World We Live in: The City An educated and healthy people require surroundings in harmony with their hopes.
text_preceding: Community centers can help the mentally ill and improve health care for school-age children from poor families, including services for the mentally retarded.
text_following: In our urban areas the central problem today is to protect and restore man's satisfaction in belonging to a community where he can find security and significance.

text_original: In our urban areas the central problem today is to protect and restore man's satisfaction in belonging to a community where he can find security and significance.
text_preceding: Through Improving the World We Live in: The City An educated and healthy people require surroundings in harmony with their hopes.
text_following: The first step is to break old patterns--to begin to think and work and plan for the development of the entire metropolitan areas.

text_original: The first step is to break old patterns--to begin to think and work and plan for the development of the entire metropolitan areas.
text_preceding: In our urban areas the central problem today is to protect and restore man's satisfaction in belonging to a community where he can find security and significance.
text_following: We will take this step with new programs of help for the basic community facilities and for neighborhood centers of health and recreation.

text_original: We will take this step with new programs of help for the basic community facilities and for neighborhood centers of health and recreation.
text_preceding: The first step is to break old patterns--to begin to think and work and plan for the development of the entire metropolitan areas.
text_following: New and existing programs will be open to those cities which work together to develop unified long-range policies for metropolitan areas.

text_original: New and existing programs will be open to those cities which work together to develop unified long-range policies for metropolitan areas.
text_preceding: We will take this step with new programs of help for the basic community facilities and for neighborhood centers of health and recreation.
text_following: We must also make some very important changes in our housing programs if we are to pursue these same basic goals.

text_original: We must also make some very important changes in our housing programs if we are to pursue these same basic goals.
text_preceding: New and existing programs will be open to those cities which work together to develop unified long-range policies for metropolitan areas.
text_following: So a Department of Housing and Urban Development will be needed to spearhead this effort in our cities.

text_original: So a Department of Housing and Urban Development will be needed to spearhead this effort in our cities.
text_preceding: We must also make some very important changes in our housing programs if we are to pursue these same basic goals.
text_following: Every citizen has the right to feel secure in his home and on the streets of his community.

text_original: Every citizen has the right to feel secure in his home and on the streets of his community.
text_preceding: So a Department of Housing and Urban Development will be needed to spearhead this effort in our cities.
text_following: To help control crime, we will recommend programs: to train local law enforcement officers;

text_original: To help control crime, we will recommend programs: to train local law enforcement officers;
text_preceding: Every citizen has the right to feel secure in his home and on the streets of his community.
text_following: to put the best techniques of modern science at their disposal;

text_original: to put the best techniques of modern science at their disposal;
text_preceding: To help control crime, we will recommend programs: to train local law enforcement officers;
text_following: to discover the causes of crime and better ways to prevent it.

text_original: to discover the causes of crime and better ways to prevent it.
text_preceding: to put the best techniques of modern science at their disposal;
text_following: I will soon assemble a panel of outstanding experts of this Nation to search out answers to the national problem of crime and delinquency, and I welcome the recommendations and the constructive efforts of the Congress.

text_original: I will soon assemble a panel of outstanding experts of this Nation to search out answers to the national problem of crime and delinquency, and I welcome the recommendations and the constructive efforts of the Congress.
text_preceding: to discover the causes of crime and better ways to prevent it.
text_following: The Beauty of America For over three centuries the beauty of America has sustained our spirit and has enlarged our vision.

text_original: The Beauty of America For over three centuries the beauty of America has sustained our spirit and has enlarged our vision.
text_preceding: I will soon assemble a panel of outstanding experts of this Nation to search out answers to the national problem of crime and delinquency, and I welcome the recommendations and the constructive efforts of the Congress.
text_following: We must act now to protect this heritage.

text_original: We must act now to protect this heritage.
text_preceding: The Beauty of America For over three centuries the beauty of America has sustained our spirit and has enlarged our vision.
text_following: In a fruitful new partnership with the States and the cities the next decade should be a conservation milestone.

text_original: In a fruitful new partnership with the States and the cities the next decade should be a conservation milestone.
text_preceding: We must act now to protect this heritage.
text_following: We must make a massive effort to save the countryside and to establish--as a green legacy for tomorrow--more large and small parks, more seashores and open spaces than have been created during any other period in our national history.

text_original: We must make a massive effort to save the countryside and to establish--as a green legacy for tomorrow--more large and small parks, more seashores and open spaces than have been created during any other period in our national history.
text_preceding: In a fruitful new partnership with the States and the cities the next decade should be a conservation milestone.
text_following: A new and substantial effort must be made to landscape highways to provide places of relaxation and recreation wherever our roads run.

text_original: A new and substantial effort must be made to landscape highways to provide places of relaxation and recreation wherever our roads run.
text_preceding: We must make a massive effort to save the countryside and to establish--as a green legacy for tomorrow--more large and small parks, more seashores and open spaces than have been created during any other period in our national history.
text_following: Within our cities imaginative programs are needed to landscape streets and to transform open areas into places of beauty and recreation.

text_original: Within our cities imaginative programs are needed to landscape streets and to transform open areas into places of beauty and recreation.
text_preceding: A new and substantial effort must be made to landscape highways to provide places of relaxation and recreation wherever our roads run.
text_following: We will seek legal power to prevent pollution of our air and water before it happens.

text_original: We will seek legal power to prevent pollution of our air and water before it happens.
text_preceding: Within our cities imaginative programs are needed to landscape streets and to transform open areas into places of beauty and recreation.
text_following: We will step up our effort to control harmful wastes, giving first priority to the cleanup of our most contaminated rivers.

text_original: We will step up our effort to control harmful wastes, giving first priority to the cleanup of our most contaminated rivers.
text_preceding: We will seek legal power to prevent pollution of our air and water before it happens.
text_following: We will increase research to learn much more about the control of pollution.

text_original: We will increase research to learn much more about the control of pollution.
text_preceding: We will step up our effort to control harmful wastes, giving first priority to the cleanup of our most contaminated rivers.
text_following: We hope to make the Potomac a model of beauty here in the Capital, and preserve unspoiled stretches of some of our waterways with a Wild Rivers bill.

text_original: We hope to make the Potomac a model of beauty here in the Capital, and preserve unspoiled stretches of some of our waterways with a Wild Rivers bill.
text_preceding: We will increase research to learn much more about the control of pollution.
text_following: More ideas for a beautiful America will emerge from a White House Conference on Natural Beauty which I will soon call.

text_original: More ideas for a beautiful America will emerge from a White House Conference on Natural Beauty which I will soon call.
text_preceding: We hope to make the Potomac a model of beauty here in the Capital, and preserve unspoiled stretches of some of our waterways with a Wild Rivers bill.
text_following: Art and Science We must also recognize and encourage those who can be pathfinders for the Nation's imagination and understanding.

text_original: Art and Science We must also recognize and encourage those who can be pathfinders for the Nation's imagination and understanding.
text_preceding: More ideas for a beautiful America will emerge from a White House Conference on Natural Beauty which I will soon call.
text_following: To help promote and honor creative achievements, I will propose a National Foundation on the Arts.

text_original: To help promote and honor creative achievements, I will propose a National Foundation on the Arts.
text_preceding: Art and Science We must also recognize and encourage those who can be pathfinders for the Nation's imagination and understanding.
text_following: To develop knowledge which will enrich our lives and ensure our progress, I will recommend programs to encourage basic science, particularly in the universities--and to bring closer the day when the oceans will supply our growing need for fresh water.

text_original: To develop knowledge which will enrich our lives and ensure our progress, I will recommend programs to encourage basic science, particularly in the universities--and to bring closer the day when the oceans will supply our growing need for fresh water.
text_preceding: To help promote and honor creative achievements, I will propose a National Foundation on the Arts.
text_following: The Government: For government to serve these goals it must be modern in structure, efficient in action, and ready for any emergency.

text_original: The Government: For government to serve these goals it must be modern in structure, efficient in action, and ready for any emergency.
text_preceding: To develop knowledge which will enrich our lives and ensure our progress, I will recommend programs to encourage basic science, particularly in the universities--and to bring closer the day when the oceans will supply our growing need for fresh water.
text_following: I am busy, currently, reviewing the structure of the entire executive branch of this Government.

text_original: I am busy, currently, reviewing the structure of the entire executive branch of this Government.
text_preceding: The Government: For government to serve these goals it must be modern in structure, efficient in action, and ready for any emergency.
text_following: I hope to reshape it and to reorganize it to meet more effectively the tasks of the 20th century.

text_original: I hope to reshape it and to reorganize it to meet more effectively the tasks of the 20th century.
text_preceding: I am busy, currently, reviewing the structure of the entire executive branch of this Government.
text_following: Wherever waste is found, I will eliminate it.

text_original: Wherever waste is found, I will eliminate it.
text_preceding: I hope to reshape it and to reorganize it to meet more effectively the tasks of the 20th century.
text_following: Last year we saved almost $3,500 million by eliminating waste in the National Government.

text_original: Last year we saved almost $3,500 million by eliminating waste in the National Government.
text_preceding: Wherever waste is found, I will eliminate it.
text_following: And I intend to do better this year.

text_original: And I intend to do better this year.
text_preceding: Last year we saved almost $3,500 million by eliminating waste in the National Government.
text_following: And very soon I will report to you on our progress and on new economies that your Government plans to make.

text_original: And very soon I will report to you on our progress and on new economies that your Government plans to make.
text_preceding: And I intend to do better this year.
text_following: Even the best of government is subject to the worst of hazards.

text_original: Even the best of government is subject to the worst of hazards.
text_preceding: And very soon I will report to you on our progress and on new economies that your Government plans to make.
text_following: I will propose laws to insure the necessary continuity of leadership should the President become disabled or die.

text_original: I will propose laws to insure the necessary continuity of leadership should the President become disabled or die.
text_preceding: Even the best of government is subject to the worst of hazards.
text_following: In addition, I will propose reforms in the electoral college-- leaving undisturbed the vote by States--but making sure that no elector can substitute his will for that of the people.

text_original: In addition, I will propose reforms in the electoral college-- leaving undisturbed the vote by States--but making sure that no elector can substitute his will for that of the people.
text_preceding: I will propose laws to insure the necessary continuity of leadership should the President become disabled or die.
text_following: Last year, in a sad moment, I came here and I spoke to you after 33 years of public service, practically all of them here on this Hill.

text_original: Last year, in a sad moment, I came here and I spoke to you after 33 years of public service, practically all of them here on this Hill.
text_preceding: In addition, I will propose reforms in the electoral college-- leaving undisturbed the vote by States--but making sure that no elector can substitute his will for that of the people.
text_following: This year I speak after 1 year as President of the United States.

text_original: This year I speak after 1 year as President of the United States.
text_preceding: Last year, in a sad moment, I came here and I spoke to you after 33 years of public service, practically all of them here on this Hill.
text_following: Many of you in this Chamber are among my oldest friends.

text_original: Many of you in this Chamber are among my oldest friends.
text_preceding: This year I speak after 1 year as President of the United States.
text_following: We have shared many happy moments and many hours of work, and we have watched many Presidents together.

text_original: We have shared many happy moments and many hours of work, and we have watched many Presidents together.
text_preceding: Many of you in this Chamber are among my oldest friends.
text_following: Yet, only in the White House can you finally know the full weight of this Office.

text_original: Yet, only in the White House can you finally know the full weight of this Office.
text_preceding: We have shared many happy moments and many hours of work, and we have watched many Presidents together.
text_following: The greatest burden is not running the huge operations of government-- or meeting daily troubles, large and small--or even working with the Congress.

text_original: The greatest burden is not running the huge operations of government-- or meeting daily troubles, large and small--or even working with the Congress.
text_preceding: Yet, only in the White House can you finally know the full weight of this Office.
text_following: A President's hardest task is not to do what is right, but to know what is right.

text_original: A President's hardest task is not to do what is right, but to know what is right.
text_preceding: The greatest burden is not running the huge operations of government-- or meeting daily troubles, large and small--or even working with the Congress.
text_following: Yet the Presidency brings no special gift of prophecy or foresight.

text_original: Yet the Presidency brings no special gift of prophecy or foresight.
text_preceding: A President's hardest task is not to do what is right, but to know what is right.
text_following: You take an oath, you step into an office, and you must then help guide a great democracy.

text_original: You take an oath, you step into an office, and you must then help guide a great democracy.
text_preceding: Yet the Presidency brings no special gift of prophecy or foresight.
text_following: The answer was waiting for me in the land where I was born.

text_original: The answer was waiting for me in the land where I was born.
text_preceding: You take an oath, you step into an office, and you must then help guide a great democracy.
text_following: The angular hills were covered with scrub cedar and a few large live oaks.

text_original: The angular hills were covered with scrub cedar and a few large live oaks.
text_preceding: The answer was waiting for me in the land where I was born.
text_following: Little would grow in that harsh caliche soil of my country.

text_original: Little would grow in that harsh caliche soil of my country.
text_preceding: The angular hills were covered with scrub cedar and a few large live oaks.
text_following: And each spring the Pedernales River would flood our valley.

text_original: And each spring the Pedernales River would flood our valley.
text_preceding: Little would grow in that harsh caliche soil of my country.
text_following: But men came and they worked and they endured and they built.

text_original: But men came and they worked and they endured and they built.
text_preceding: And each spring the Pedernales River would flood our valley.
text_following: And tonight that country is abundant; abundant with fruit and cattle and goats and sheep, and there are pleasant homes and lakes and the floods are gone.

text_original: And tonight that country is abundant; abundant with fruit and cattle and goats and sheep, and there are pleasant homes and lakes and the floods are gone.
text_preceding: But men came and they worked and they endured and they built.
text_following: Why did men come to that once forbidding land? Well, they were restless, of course, and they had to be moving on.

text_original: Why did men come to that once forbidding land? Well, they were restless, of course, and they had to be moving on.
text_preceding: And tonight that country is abundant; abundant with fruit and cattle and goats and sheep, and there are pleasant homes and lakes and the floods are gone.
text_following: There was a dream--a dream of a place where a free man could build for himself, and raise his children to a better life--a dream of a continent to be conquered, a world to be won, a nation to be made.

text_original: There was a dream--a dream of a place where a free man could build for himself, and raise his children to a better life--a dream of a continent to be conquered, a world to be won, a nation to be made.
text_preceding: Why did men come to that once forbidding land? Well, they were restless, of course, and they had to be moving on.
text_following: Remembering this, I knew the answer.

text_original: Remembering this, I knew the answer.
text_preceding: There was a dream--a dream of a place where a free man could build for himself, and raise his children to a better life--a dream of a continent to be conquered, a world to be won, a nation to be made.
text_following: A President does not shape a new and personal vision of America.

text_original: A President does not shape a new and personal vision of America.
text_preceding: Remembering this, I knew the answer.
text_following: He collects it from the scattered hopes of the American past.

text_original: He collects it from the scattered hopes of the American past.
text_preceding: A President does not shape a new and personal vision of America.
text_following: It existed when the first settlers saw the coast of a new world, and when the first pioneers moved westward.

text_original: It existed when the first settlers saw the coast of a new world, and when the first pioneers moved westward.
text_preceding: He collects it from the scattered hopes of the American past.
text_following: It has guided us every step of the way.

text_original: It has guided us every step of the way.
text_preceding: It existed when the first settlers saw the coast of a new world, and when the first pioneers moved westward.
text_following: But it is also your inheritance and it belongs equally to all the people that we all serve.

text_original: But it is also your inheritance and it belongs equally to all the people that we all serve.
text_preceding: It has guided us every step of the way.
text_following: It must be interpreted anew by each generation for its own needs; as I have tried, in part, to do tonight.

text_original: It must be interpreted anew by each generation for its own needs; as I have tried, in part, to do tonight.
text_preceding: But it is also your inheritance and it belongs equally to all the people that we all serve.
text_following: This, then, is the state of the Union: Free and restless, growing and full of hope.

text_original: This, then, is the state of the Union: Free and restless, growing and full of hope.
text_preceding: It must be interpreted anew by each generation for its own needs; as I have tried, in part, to do tonight.
text_following: So it shall always be, while God is willing, and we are strong enough to keep the faith.

text_original: So it shall always be, while God is willing, and we are strong enough to keep the faith.
text_preceding: This, then, is the state of the Union: Free and restless, growing and full of hope.

text_original: I share with all of you the grief that you feel at the death today of one of the most beloved, respected, and effective Members of this body, the distinguished Representative from Rhode Island, Mr. Fogarty.
text_following: I have come here tonight to report to you that this is a time of testing for our Nation.

text_original: I have come here tonight to report to you that this is a time of testing for our Nation.
text_preceding: I share with all of you the grief that you feel at the death today of one of the most beloved, respected, and effective Members of this body, the distinguished Representative from Rhode Island, Mr. Fogarty.
text_following: At home, the question is whether we will continue working for better opportunities for all Americans, when most Americans are already living better than any people in history.

text_original: At home, the question is whether we will continue working for better opportunities for all Americans, when most Americans are already living better than any people in history.
text_preceding: I have come here tonight to report to you that this is a time of testing for our Nation.
text_following: Abroad, the question is whether we have the staying power to fight a very costly war, when the objective is limited and the danger to us is seemingly remote.

text_original: Abroad, the question is whether we have the staying power to fight a very costly war, when the objective is limited and the danger to us is seemingly remote.
text_preceding: At home, the question is whether we will continue working for better opportunities for all Americans, when most Americans are already living better than any people in history.
text_following: So our test is not whether we shrink from our country's cause when the dangers to us are obvious and close at hand, but, rather, whether we carry on when they seem obscure and distant-and some think that it is safe to lay down our burdens.

text_original: So our test is not whether we shrink from our country's cause when the dangers to us are obvious and close at hand, but, rather, whether we carry on when they seem obscure and distant-and some think that it is safe to lay down our burdens.
text_preceding: Abroad, the question is whether we have the staying power to fight a very costly war, when the objective is limited and the danger to us is seemingly remote.
text_following: I have come tonight to ask this Congress and this Nation to resolve that issue: to meet our commitments at home and abroad- to continue to build a better America-and to reaffirm this Nation's allegiance to freedom.

text_original: I have come tonight to ask this Congress and this Nation to resolve that issue: to meet our commitments at home and abroad- to continue to build a better America-and to reaffirm this Nation's allegiance to freedom.
text_preceding: So our test is not whether we shrink from our country's cause when the dangers to us are obvious and close at hand, but, rather, whether we carry on when they seem obscure and distant-and some think that it is safe to lay down our burdens.
text_following: We must ask where we are, and whither we are tending.

text_original: We must ask where we are, and whither we are tending.
text_preceding: I have come tonight to ask this Congress and this Nation to resolve that issue: to meet our commitments at home and abroad- to continue to build a better America-and to reaffirm this Nation's allegiance to freedom.
text_following: The last 3 years bear witness to our determination to make this a better country.

text_original: The last 3 years bear witness to our determination to make this a better country.
text_preceding: We must ask where we are, and whither we are tending.
text_following: We have struck down legal barriers to equality.

text_original: We have struck down legal barriers to equality.
text_preceding: The last 3 years bear witness to our determination to make this a better country.
text_following: We have improved the education of 7 million deprived children and this year alone we have enabled almost 1 million students to go to college.

text_original: We have improved the education of 7 million deprived children and this year alone we have enabled almost 1 million students to go to college.
text_preceding: We have struck down legal barriers to equality.
text_following: We have brought medical care to older people who were unable to afford it.

text_original: We have brought medical care to older people who were unable to afford it.
text_preceding: We have improved the education of 7 million deprived children and this year alone we have enabled almost 1 million students to go to college.
text_following: Three and one-half million Americans have already received treatment under Medicare since July.

text_original: Three and one-half million Americans have already received treatment under Medicare since July.
text_preceding: We have brought medical care to older people who were unable to afford it.
text_following: We have built a strong economy that has put almost 3 million more Americans on the payrolls in the last year alone.

text_original: We have built a strong economy that has put almost 3 million more Americans on the payrolls in the last year alone.
text_preceding: Three and one-half million Americans have already received treatment under Medicare since July.
text_following: We have included more than 9 million new workers under a higher minimum wage.

text_original: We have included more than 9 million new workers under a higher minimum wage.
text_preceding: We have built a strong economy that has put almost 3 million more Americans on the payrolls in the last year alone.
text_following: We have launched new training programs to provide job skills for almost 1 million Americans.

text_original: We have launched new training programs to provide job skills for almost 1 million Americans.
text_preceding: We have included more than 9 million new workers under a higher minimum wage.
text_following: We have helped more than a thousand local communities to attack poverty in the neighborhoods of the poor.

text_original: We have helped more than a thousand local communities to attack poverty in the neighborhoods of the poor.
text_preceding: We have launched new training programs to provide job skills for almost 1 million Americans.
text_following: We have set out to rebuild our cities on a scale that has never been attempted before.

text_original: We have set out to rebuild our cities on a scale that has never been attempted before.
text_preceding: We have helped more than a thousand local communities to attack poverty in the neighborhoods of the poor.
text_following: We have begun to rescue our waters from the menace of pollution and to restore the beauty of our land and our countryside, our cities and our towns.

text_original: We have begun to rescue our waters from the menace of pollution and to restore the beauty of our land and our countryside, our cities and our towns.
text_preceding: We have set out to rebuild our cities on a scale that has never been attempted before.
text_following: We have given 1 million young Americans a chance to earn through the Neighborhood Youth Corps-or through Head Start, a chance to learn.

text_original: We have given 1 million young Americans a chance to earn through the Neighborhood Youth Corps-or through Head Start, a chance to learn.
text_preceding: We have begun to rescue our waters from the menace of pollution and to restore the beauty of our land and our countryside, our cities and our towns.
text_following: So together we have tried to meet the needs of our people.

text_original: So together we have tried to meet the needs of our people.
text_preceding: We have given 1 million young Americans a chance to earn through the Neighborhood Youth Corps-or through Head Start, a chance to learn.
text_following: And, we have succeeded in creating a better life for the many as well as the few.

text_original: And, we have succeeded in creating a better life for the many as well as the few.
text_preceding: So together we have tried to meet the needs of our people.
text_following: Now we must answer whether our gains shall be the foundations of further progress, or whether they shall be only monuments to what might have been- abandoned now by a people who lacked the will to see their great work through.

text_original: Now we must answer whether our gains shall be the foundations of further progress, or whether they shall be only monuments to what might have been- abandoned now by a people who lacked the will to see their great work through.
text_preceding: And, we have succeeded in creating a better life for the many as well as the few.
text_following: I believe that our people do not want to quit-though the task is great, the work hard, often frustrating, and success is a matter not of days or months, but of years- and sometimes it may be even decades.

text_original: I believe that our people do not want to quit-though the task is great, the work hard, often frustrating, and success is a matter not of days or months, but of years- and sometimes it may be even decades.
text_preceding: Now we must answer whether our gains shall be the foundations of further progress, or whether they shall be only monuments to what might have been- abandoned now by a people who lacked the will to see their great work through.
text_following: I have come here tonight to discuss with you five ways of carrying forward the progress of these last 3 years.

text_original: I have come here tonight to discuss with you five ways of carrying forward the progress of these last 3 years.
text_preceding: I believe that our people do not want to quit-though the task is great, the work hard, often frustrating, and success is a matter not of days or months, but of years- and sometimes it may be even decades.
text_following: These five ways concern programs, partnerships, priorities, prosperity, and peace.

text_original: These five ways concern programs, partnerships, priorities, prosperity, and peace.
text_preceding: I have come here tonight to discuss with you five ways of carrying forward the progress of these last 3 years.
text_following: We must see to it, I think, that these new programs that we have passed work effectively and are administered in the best possible way.

text_original: We must see to it, I think, that these new programs that we have passed work effectively and are administered in the best possible way.
text_preceding: These five ways concern programs, partnerships, priorities, prosperity, and peace.
text_following: Three years ago we set out to create these new instruments of social progress.

text_original: Three years ago we set out to create these new instruments of social progress.
text_preceding: We must see to it, I think, that these new programs that we have passed work effectively and are administered in the best possible way.
text_following: This required trial and error-and it has produced both.

text_original: This required trial and error-and it has produced both.
text_preceding: Three years ago we set out to create these new instruments of social progress.
text_following: But as we learn, through success and failure, we are changing our strategy and we are trying to improve our tactics.

text_original: But as we learn, through success and failure, we are changing our strategy and we are trying to improve our tactics.
text_preceding: This required trial and error-and it has produced both.
text_following: In the long run, these starts-some rewarding, others inadequate and disappointing-are crucial to success.

text_original: In the long run, these starts-some rewarding, others inadequate and disappointing-are crucial to success.
text_preceding: But as we learn, through success and failure, we are changing our strategy and we are trying to improve our tactics.
text_following: One example is the struggle to make life better for the less fortunate among us.

text_original: One example is the struggle to make life better for the less fortunate among us.
text_preceding: In the long run, these starts-some rewarding, others inadequate and disappointing-are crucial to success.
text_following: The American people have decided that poverty is just as wasteful and just as unnecessary as preventable disease.

text_original: The American people have decided that poverty is just as wasteful and just as unnecessary as preventable disease.
text_preceding: One example is the struggle to make life better for the less fortunate among us.
text_following: Many listened to President Truman that day here in this Chamber, but few understood what was required and did anything about it.

text_original: Many listened to President Truman that day here in this Chamber, but few understood what was required and did anything about it.
text_preceding: The American people have decided that poverty is just as wasteful and just as unnecessary as preventable disease.
text_following: The executive branch and the Congress waited 15 long years before ever taking any action on that challenge, as it did on many other challenges that great President presented.

text_original: The executive branch and the Congress waited 15 long years before ever taking any action on that challenge, as it did on many other challenges that great President presented.
text_preceding: Many listened to President Truman that day here in this Chamber, but few understood what was required and did anything about it.
text_following: It will not be a short or easy struggle- no single weapon will suffice-but we shall not rest until that war is won.

text_original: It will not be a short or easy struggle- no single weapon will suffice-but we shall not rest until that war is won.
text_preceding: The executive branch and the Congress waited 15 long years before ever taking any action on that challenge, as it did on many other challenges that great President presented.
text_following: And I have come here to renew that pledge tonight.

text_original: And I have come here to renew that pledge tonight.
text_preceding: It will not be a short or easy struggle- no single weapon will suffice-but we shall not rest until that war is won.
text_following: I recommend that we intensify our efforts to give the poor a chance to enjoy and to join in this Nation's progress.

text_original: I recommend that we intensify our efforts to give the poor a chance to enjoy and to join in this Nation's progress.
text_preceding: And I have come here to renew that pledge tonight.
text_following: I shall propose certain administrative changes suggested by the Congress-as well as some that we have learned from our own trial and error.

text_original: I shall propose certain administrative changes suggested by the Congress-as well as some that we have learned from our own trial and error.
text_preceding: I recommend that we intensify our efforts to give the poor a chance to enjoy and to join in this Nation's progress.
text_following: I shall urge special methods and special funds to reach the hundreds of thousands of Americans that are now trapped in the ghettos of our big cities and, through Head Start, to try to reach out to our very young, little children.

text_original: I shall urge special methods and special funds to reach the hundreds of thousands of Americans that are now trapped in the ghettos of our big cities and, through Head Start, to try to reach out to our very young, little children.
text_preceding: I shall propose certain administrative changes suggested by the Congress-as well as some that we have learned from our own trial and error.
text_following: The chance to learn is their brightest hope and must command our full determination.

text_original: The chance to learn is their brightest hope and must command our full determination.
text_preceding: I shall urge special methods and special funds to reach the hundreds of thousands of Americans that are now trapped in the ghettos of our big cities and, through Head Start, to try to reach out to our very young, little children.
text_following: For learning brings skills; and skills bring jobs; and jobs bring responsibility and dignity, as well as taxes.

text_original: For learning brings skills; and skills bring jobs; and jobs bring responsibility and dignity, as well as taxes.
text_preceding: The chance to learn is their brightest hope and must command our full determination.
text_following: This war-like the war in Vietnam-is not a simple one.

text_original: This war-like the war in Vietnam-is not a simple one.
text_preceding: For learning brings skills; and skills bring jobs; and jobs bring responsibility and dignity, as well as taxes.
text_following: There is no single battle line which you can plot each day on a chart.

text_original: There is no single battle line which you can plot each day on a chart.
text_preceding: This war-like the war in Vietnam-is not a simple one.
text_following: The enemy is not easy to perceive, or to isolate, or to destroy.

text_original: The enemy is not easy to perceive, or to isolate, or to destroy.
text_preceding: There is no single battle line which you can plot each day on a chart.
text_following: There are mistakes and there are setbacks.

text_original: There are mistakes and there are setbacks.
text_preceding: The enemy is not easy to perceive, or to isolate, or to destroy.
text_following: But we are moving, and our direction is forward.

text_original: But we are moving, and our direction is forward.
text_preceding: There are mistakes and there are setbacks.
text_following: This is true with other programs that are making and breaking new ground.

text_original: This is true with other programs that are making and breaking new ground.
text_preceding: But we are moving, and our direction is forward.
text_following: Some do not yet have the capacity to absorb well or wisely all the money that could be put into them.

text_original: Some do not yet have the capacity to absorb well or wisely all the money that could be put into them.
text_preceding: This is true with other programs that are making and breaking new ground.
text_following: Administrative skills and trained manpower are just as vital to their success as dollars.

text_original: Administrative skills and trained manpower are just as vital to their success as dollars.
text_preceding: Some do not yet have the capacity to absorb well or wisely all the money that could be put into them.
text_following: And I believe those skills will come.

text_original: And I believe those skills will come.
text_preceding: Administrative skills and trained manpower are just as vital to their success as dollars.
text_following: But it will take time and patience and hard work.

text_original: But it will take time and patience and hard work.
text_preceding: And I believe those skills will come.
text_following: Success cannot be forced at a single stroke.

text_original: Success cannot be forced at a single stroke.
text_preceding: But it will take time and patience and hard work.
text_following: So we must continue to strengthen the administration of every program if that success is to come-as we know it must.

text_original: So we must continue to strengthen the administration of every program if that success is to come-as we know it must.
text_preceding: Success cannot be forced at a single stroke.
text_following: We have done much in the space of 2 short years, working together.

text_original: We have done much in the space of 2 short years, working together.
text_preceding: So we must continue to strengthen the administration of every program if that success is to come-as we know it must.
text_following: I have recommended, and you, the Congress, have approved, 10 different reorganization plans, combining and consolidating many bureaus of this Government, and creating two entirely new Cabinet departments.

text_original: I have recommended, and you, the Congress, have approved, 10 different reorganization plans, combining and consolidating many bureaus of this Government, and creating two entirely new Cabinet departments.
text_preceding: We have done much in the space of 2 short years, working together.
text_following: I have come tonight to propose that we establish a new department-a Department of Business and Labor.

text_original: I have come tonight to propose that we establish a new department-a Department of Business and Labor.
text_preceding: I have recommended, and you, the Congress, have approved, 10 different reorganization plans, combining and consolidating many bureaus of this Government, and creating two entirely new Cabinet departments.
text_following: By combining the Department of Commerce with the Department of Labor and other related agencies, I think we can create a more economical, efficient, and streamlined instrument that will better serve a growing nation.

text_original: By combining the Department of Commerce with the Department of Labor and other related agencies, I think we can create a more economical, efficient, and streamlined instrument that will better serve a growing nation.
text_preceding: I have come tonight to propose that we establish a new department-a Department of Business and Labor.
text_following: This is our goal throughout the entire Federal Government.

text_original: This is our goal throughout the entire Federal Government.
text_preceding: By combining the Department of Commerce with the Department of Labor and other related agencies, I think we can create a more economical, efficient, and streamlined instrument that will better serve a growing nation.
text_following: Every program will be thoroughly evaluated.

text_original: Every program will be thoroughly evaluated.
text_preceding: This is our goal throughout the entire Federal Government.
text_following: Grant-in-aid programs will be improved and simplified as desired by many of our local administrators and our Governors.

text_original: Grant-in-aid programs will be improved and simplified as desired by many of our local administrators and our Governors.
text_preceding: Every program will be thoroughly evaluated.
text_following: Where there have been mistakes, we will try very hard to correct them.

text_original: Where there have been mistakes, we will try very hard to correct them.
text_preceding: Grant-in-aid programs will be improved and simplified as desired by many of our local administrators and our Governors.
text_following: Where there has been progress, we will try to build upon it.

text_original: Where there has been progress, we will try to build upon it.
text_preceding: Where there have been mistakes, we will try very hard to correct them.
text_following: Our second objective is partnership-to create an effective partnership at all levels of government.

text_original: Our second objective is partnership-to create an effective partnership at all levels of government.
text_preceding: Where there has been progress, we will try to build upon it.
text_following: And I should treasure nothing more than to have that partnership begin between the executive and the Congress.

text_original: And I should treasure nothing more than to have that partnership begin between the executive and the Congress.
text_preceding: Our second objective is partnership-to create an effective partnership at all levels of government.
text_following: The 88th and the 89th between the executive social and economic legislation than any two single Congresses in American history.

text_original: The 88th and the 89th between the executive social and economic legislation than any two single Congresses in American history.
text_preceding: And I should treasure nothing more than to have that partnership begin between the executive and the Congress.
text_following: Most of you who were Members of those Congresses voted to pass most of those measures.

text_original: Most of you who were Members of those Congresses voted to pass most of those measures.
text_preceding: The 88th and the 89th between the executive social and economic legislation than any two single Congresses in American history.
text_following: But your efforts will come to nothing unless it reaches the people.

text_original: But your efforts will come to nothing unless it reaches the people.
text_preceding: Most of you who were Members of those Congresses voted to pass most of those measures.
text_following: Only a total working partnership among Federal, State, and local governments can succeed.

text_original: Only a total working partnership among Federal, State, and local governments can succeed.
text_preceding: But your efforts will come to nothing unless it reaches the people.
text_following: The test of that partnership will be the concern of each public organization, each private institution, and each responsible citizen.

text_original: The test of that partnership will be the concern of each public organization, each private institution, and each responsible citizen.
text_preceding: Only a total working partnership among Federal, State, and local governments can succeed.
text_following: Each State, county, and city needs to examine its capacity for government in today's world, as we are examining ours in the executive department, and as I see you are examining yours.

text_original: Each State, county, and city needs to examine its capacity for government in today's world, as we are examining ours in the executive department, and as I see you are examining yours.
text_preceding: The test of that partnership will be the concern of each public organization, each private institution, and each responsible citizen.
text_following: Some will need to reorganize and reshape their methods of administration- as we are doing.

text_original: Some will need to reorganize and reshape their methods of administration- as we are doing.
text_preceding: Each State, county, and city needs to examine its capacity for government in today's world, as we are examining ours in the executive department, and as I see you are examining yours.
text_following: Others will need to revise their constitutions and their laws to bring them up to date-as we are doing.

text_original: Others will need to revise their constitutions and their laws to bring them up to date-as we are doing.
text_preceding: Some will need to reorganize and reshape their methods of administration- as we are doing.
text_following: Above all, I think we must work together and find ways in which the multitudes of small jurisdictions can be brought together more efficiently.

text_original: Above all, I think we must work together and find ways in which the multitudes of small jurisdictions can be brought together more efficiently.
text_preceding: Others will need to revise their constitutions and their laws to bring them up to date-as we are doing.
text_following: During the past 3 years we have returned to State and local governments about $40 billion in grants-in-aid.

text_original: During the past 3 years we have returned to State and local governments about $40 billion in grants-in-aid.
text_preceding: Above all, I think we must work together and find ways in which the multitudes of small jurisdictions can be brought together more efficiently.
text_following: This year alone, 70 percent of our Federal expenditures for domestic programs will be distributed through the State and local governments.

text_original: This year alone, 70 percent of our Federal expenditures for domestic programs will be distributed through the State and local governments.
text_preceding: During the past 3 years we have returned to State and local governments about $40 billion in grants-in-aid.
text_following: With Federal assistance, State and local governments by 1970 will be spending close to $110 billion annually.

text_original: With Federal assistance, State and local governments by 1970 will be spending close to $110 billion annually.
text_preceding: This year alone, 70 percent of our Federal expenditures for domestic programs will be distributed through the State and local governments.
text_following: These enormous sums must be used wisely, honestly, and effectively.

text_original: These enormous sums must be used wisely, honestly, and effectively.
text_preceding: With Federal assistance, State and local governments by 1970 will be spending close to $110 billion annually.
text_following: We intend to work closely with the States and the localities to do exactly that.

text_original: We intend to work closely with the States and the localities to do exactly that.
text_preceding: These enormous sums must be used wisely, honestly, and effectively.
text_following: Our third objective is priorities, to move ahead on the priorities that we have established within the resources that are available.

text_original: Our third objective is priorities, to move ahead on the priorities that we have established within the resources that are available.
text_preceding: We intend to work closely with the States and the localities to do exactly that.
text_following: I wish, of course, that we could do all that should be done-and that we could do it now.

text_original: I wish, of course, that we could do all that should be done-and that we could do it now.
text_preceding: Our third objective is priorities, to move ahead on the priorities that we have established within the resources that are available.
text_following: But the Nation has many commitments and responsibilities which make heavy demands upon our total resources.

text_original: But the Nation has many commitments and responsibilities which make heavy demands upon our total resources.
text_preceding: I wish, of course, that we could do all that should be done-and that we could do it now.
text_following: No administration would more eagerly utilize for these programs all the resources they require than the administration that started them.

text_original: No administration would more eagerly utilize for these programs all the resources they require than the administration that started them.
text_preceding: But the Nation has many commitments and responsibilities which make heavy demands upon our total resources.
text_following: So let us resolve, now, to do all that we can, with what we have-knowing that it is far, far more than we have ever done before, and far, far less than our problems will ultimately require.

text_original: So let us resolve, now, to do all that we can, with what we have-knowing that it is far, far more than we have ever done before, and far, far less than our problems will ultimately require.
text_preceding: No administration would more eagerly utilize for these programs all the resources they require than the administration that started them.
text_following: Let us create new opportunities for our children and our young Americans who need special help.

text_original: Let us create new opportunities for our children and our young Americans who need special help.
text_preceding: So let us resolve, now, to do all that we can, with what we have-knowing that it is far, far more than we have ever done before, and far, far less than our problems will ultimately require.
text_following: We should strengthen the Head Start program, begin it for children 3 years old, and maintain its educational momentum by following through in the early years.

text_original: We should strengthen the Head Start program, begin it for children 3 years old, and maintain its educational momentum by following through in the early years.
text_preceding: Let us create new opportunities for our children and our young Americans who need special help.
text_following: We should try new methods of child development and care from the earliest years, before it is too late to correct.

text_original: We should try new methods of child development and care from the earliest years, before it is too late to correct.
text_preceding: We should strengthen the Head Start program, begin it for children 3 years old, and maintain its educational momentum by following through in the early years.
text_following: And I will propose these measures to the 90th Congress.

text_original: And I will propose these measures to the 90th Congress.
text_preceding: We should try new methods of child development and care from the earliest years, before it is too late to correct.
text_following: Let us insure that older Americans, and neglected Americans, share in their Nation's progress.

text_original: Let us insure that older Americans, and neglected Americans, share in their Nation's progress.
text_preceding: And I will propose these measures to the 90th Congress.
text_following: We should raise social security payments by an overall average of 20 percent.

text_original: We should raise social security payments by an overall average of 20 percent.
text_preceding: Let us insure that older Americans, and neglected Americans, share in their Nation's progress.
text_following: That will add $4 billion 100 million to social security payments in the first year.

text_original: That will add $4 billion 100 million to social security payments in the first year.
text_preceding: We should raise social security payments by an overall average of 20 percent.
text_following: I will recommend that each of the 23 million Americans now receiving payments get an increase of at least 15 percent.

text_original: I will recommend that each of the 23 million Americans now receiving payments get an increase of at least 15 percent.
text_preceding: That will add $4 billion 100 million to social security payments in the first year.
text_following: I will ask that you raise the minimum payments by 59 percent-from $44 to $70 a month, and to guarantee a minimum benefit of $100 a month for those with a total of 25 years of coverage.

text_original: I will ask that you raise the minimum payments by 59 percent-from $44 to $70 a month, and to guarantee a minimum benefit of $100 a month for those with a total of 25 years of coverage.
text_preceding: I will recommend that each of the 23 million Americans now receiving payments get an increase of at least 15 percent.
text_following: We must raise the limits that retired workers can earn without losing social security income.

text_original: We must raise the limits that retired workers can earn without losing social security income.
text_preceding: I will ask that you raise the minimum payments by 59 percent-from $44 to $70 a month, and to guarantee a minimum benefit of $100 a month for those with a total of 25 years of coverage.
text_following: We must eliminate by law unjust discrimination in employment because of age.

text_original: We must eliminate by law unjust discrimination in employment because of age.
text_preceding: We must raise the limits that retired workers can earn without losing social security income.
text_following: We should embark upon a major effort to provide self-help assistance to the forgotten in our midst-the American Indians and the migratory farm workers.

text_original: We should embark upon a major effort to provide self-help assistance to the forgotten in our midst-the American Indians and the migratory farm workers.
text_preceding: We must eliminate by law unjust discrimination in employment because of age.
text_following: And we should reach with the hand of understanding to help those who live in rural poverty.

text_original: And we should reach with the hand of understanding to help those who live in rural poverty.
text_preceding: We should embark upon a major effort to provide self-help assistance to the forgotten in our midst-the American Indians and the migratory farm workers.
text_following: And I will propose these measures to the 90th Congress.

text_original: And I will propose these measures to the 90th Congress.
text_preceding: And we should reach with the hand of understanding to help those who live in rural poverty.
text_following: So let us keep on improving the quality of life and enlarging the meaning of justice for all of our fellow Americans.

text_original: So let us keep on improving the quality of life and enlarging the meaning of justice for all of our fellow Americans.
text_preceding: And I will propose these measures to the 90th Congress.
text_following: We should transform our decaying slums into places of decency through the landmark Model Cities program.

text_original: We should transform our decaying slums into places of decency through the landmark Model Cities program.
text_preceding: So let us keep on improving the quality of life and enlarging the meaning of justice for all of our fellow Americans.
text_following: I intend to seek for this effort, this year, the full amount that you in Congress authorized last year.

text_original: I intend to seek for this effort, this year, the full amount that you in Congress authorized last year.
text_preceding: We should transform our decaying slums into places of decency through the landmark Model Cities program.
text_following: We should call upon the genius of private industry and the most advanced technology to help rebuild our great cities.

text_original: We should call upon the genius of private industry and the most advanced technology to help rebuild our great cities.
text_preceding: I intend to seek for this effort, this year, the full amount that you in Congress authorized last year.
text_following: We should continue to carry to every corner of the Nation our campaign for a beautiful America-to clean up our towns, to make them more beautiful, our cities, our countryside, by creating more parks, and more seashores, and more open spaces for our children to play in, and for the generations that come after us to enjoy.

text_original: We should continue to carry to every corner of the Nation our campaign for a beautiful America-to clean up our towns, to make them more beautiful, our cities, our countryside, by creating more parks, and more seashores, and more open spaces for our children to play in, and for the generations that come after us to enjoy.
text_preceding: We should call upon the genius of private industry and the most advanced technology to help rebuild our great cities.
text_following: We should continue to seek equality and justice for each citizen-before a jury, in seeking a job, in exercising his civil rights.

text_original: We should continue to seek equality and justice for each citizen-before a jury, in seeking a job, in exercising his civil rights.
text_preceding: We should continue to carry to every corner of the Nation our campaign for a beautiful America-to clean up our towns, to make them more beautiful, our cities, our countryside, by creating more parks, and more seashores, and more open spaces for our children to play in, and for the generations that come after us to enjoy.
text_following: We should find a solution to fair housing, so that every American, regardless of color, has a decent home of his choice.

text_original: We should find a solution to fair housing, so that every American, regardless of color, has a decent home of his choice.
text_preceding: We should continue to seek equality and justice for each citizen-before a jury, in seeking a job, in exercising his civil rights.
text_following: We should modernize our Selective Service System.

text_original: We should modernize our Selective Service System.
text_preceding: We should find a solution to fair housing, so that every American, regardless of color, has a decent home of his choice.
text_following: The National Commission on Selective Service will shortly submit its report.

text_original: The National Commission on Selective Service will shortly submit its report.
text_preceding: We should modernize our Selective Service System.
text_following: I will send you new recommendations to meet our military manpower needs.

text_original: I will send you new recommendations to meet our military manpower needs.
text_preceding: The National Commission on Selective Service will shortly submit its report.
text_following: But let us resolve that this is to be the Congress that made our draft laws as fair and as effective as possible.

text_original: But let us resolve that this is to be the Congress that made our draft laws as fair and as effective as possible.
text_preceding: I will send you new recommendations to meet our military manpower needs.
text_following: We should outlaw all wiretapping-public and private- wherever and whenever it occurs, except when the security of this Nation itself is at stake-and only then with the strictest governmental safeguards.

text_original: We should outlaw all wiretapping-public and private- wherever and whenever it occurs, except when the security of this Nation itself is at stake-and only then with the strictest governmental safeguards.
text_preceding: But let us resolve that this is to be the Congress that made our draft laws as fair and as effective as possible.
text_following: I hope this Congress will try to help me do more for the consumer.

text_original: I hope this Congress will try to help me do more for the consumer.

text_following: But until world conditions permit, and until peace is assured, America's might-and America's bravest sons who wear our Nation's uniform-must continue to stand guard for all of us-as they gallantly do tonight in Vietnam and other places in the world.
