text_original: We can make this truly a new day for the American consumer, and by giving him this protection we can live in history as the consumer-conscious Congress.
text_preceding: This Congress-Democrats and Republicans-can earn the thanks of history.
text_following: So let us get on with the work.

text_original: So let us get on with the work.
text_preceding: We can make this truly a new day for the American consumer, and by giving him this protection we can live in history as the consumer-conscious Congress.
text_following: We, at every level of the government, State, local, Federal, know that the American people have had enough of rising crime and lawlessness in this country.

text_original: We, at every level of the government, State, local, Federal, know that the American people have had enough of rising crime and lawlessness in this country.
text_preceding: So let us get on with the work.
text_following: They recognize that law enforcement is first the duty of local police and local government.

text_original: They recognize that law enforcement is first the duty of local police and local government.
text_preceding: We, at every level of the government, State, local, Federal, know that the American people have had enough of rising crime and lawlessness in this country.
text_following: They recognize that the frontline headquarters against crime is in the home, the church, the city hall and the county courthouse and the statehouse-not in the far-removed National Capital of Washington.

text_original: They recognize that the frontline headquarters against crime is in the home, the church, the city hall and the county courthouse and the statehouse-not in the far-removed National Capital of Washington.
text_preceding: They recognize that law enforcement is first the duty of local police and local government.
text_following: But the people also recognize that the National Government can and the National Government should help the cities and the States in their war on crime to the full extent of its resources and its constitutional authority.

text_original: But the people also recognize that the National Government can and the National Government should help the cities and the States in their war on crime to the full extent of its resources and its constitutional authority.
text_preceding: They recognize that the frontline headquarters against crime is in the home, the church, the city hall and the county courthouse and the statehouse-not in the far-removed National Capital of Washington.
text_following: This does not mean a national police force.

text_original: This does not mean a national police force.
text_preceding: But the people also recognize that the National Government can and the National Government should help the cities and the States in their war on crime to the full extent of its resources and its constitutional authority.
text_following: It does mean help and financial support: -to develop State and local master plans to combat crime, -to provide better training and better pay for police, and -to bring the most advanced technology to the war on crime in every city and every county in America.

text_original: It does mean help and financial support: -to develop State and local master plans to combat crime, -to provide better training and better pay for police, and -to bring the most advanced technology to the war on crime in every city and every county in America.
text_preceding: This does not mean a national police force.
text_following: There is no more urgent business before this Congress than to pass the Safe Streets Act this year that I proposed last year.

text_original: There is no more urgent business before this Congress than to pass the Safe Streets Act this year that I proposed last year.
text_preceding: It does mean help and financial support: -to develop State and local master plans to combat crime, -to provide better training and better pay for police, and -to bring the most advanced technology to the war on crime in every city and every county in America.
text_following: That law will provide these required funds.

text_original: That law will provide these required funds.
text_preceding: There is no more urgent business before this Congress than to pass the Safe Streets Act this year that I proposed last year.
text_following: They are so critically needed that I have doubled my request under this act to $100 million in fiscal 1969.

text_original: They are so critically needed that I have doubled my request under this act to $100 million in fiscal 1969.
text_preceding: That law will provide these required funds.
text_following: And I urge the Congress to stop the trade in mail-order murder, to stop it this year by adopting a proper gun control law.

text_original: And I urge the Congress to stop the trade in mail-order murder, to stop it this year by adopting a proper gun control law.
text_preceding: They are so critically needed that I have doubled my request under this act to $100 million in fiscal 1969.
text_following: This year, I will propose a Drug Control Act to provide stricter penalties for those who traffic in LSD and other dangerous drugs with our people.

text_original: This year, I will propose a Drug Control Act to provide stricter penalties for those who traffic in LSD and other dangerous drugs with our people.
text_preceding: And I urge the Congress to stop the trade in mail-order murder, to stop it this year by adopting a proper gun control law.
text_following: I will ask for more vigorous enforcement of all of our drug laws by increasing the number of Federal drug and narcotics control officials by more than 30 percent.

text_original: I will ask for more vigorous enforcement of all of our drug laws by increasing the number of Federal drug and narcotics control officials by more than 30 percent.
text_preceding: This year, I will propose a Drug Control Act to provide stricter penalties for those who traffic in LSD and other dangerous drugs with our people.
text_following: The time has come to stop the sale of slavery to the young.

text_original: The time has come to stop the sale of slavery to the young.
text_preceding: I will ask for more vigorous enforcement of all of our drug laws by increasing the number of Federal drug and narcotics control officials by more than 30 percent.
text_following: I also request you to give us funds to add immediately 100 assistant United States attorneys throughout the land to help prosecute our criminal laws.

text_original: I also request you to give us funds to add immediately 100 assistant United States attorneys throughout the land to help prosecute our criminal laws.
text_preceding: The time has come to stop the sale of slavery to the young.
text_following: We have increased our judiciary by 40 percent and we have increased our prosecutors by 16 percent.

text_original: We have increased our judiciary by 40 percent and we have increased our prosecutors by 16 percent.
text_preceding: I also request you to give us funds to add immediately 100 assistant United States attorneys throughout the land to help prosecute our criminal laws.
text_following: The dockets are full of cases because we don't have assistant district attorneys to go before the Federal judge and handle them.

text_original: The dockets are full of cases because we don't have assistant district attorneys to go before the Federal judge and handle them.
text_preceding: We have increased our judiciary by 40 percent and we have increased our prosecutors by 16 percent.
text_following: We start these young lawyers at $8,200 a year.

text_preceding: I ask the Congress for authority to hire 100 more.
text_following: Finally, I ask you to add 100 FBI agents to strengthen law enforcement in the Nation and to protect the individual rights of every citizen.

text_original: Finally, I ask you to add 100 FBI agents to strengthen law enforcement in the Nation and to protect the individual rights of every citizen.

text_following: A moment ago I spoke of despair and frustrated hopes in the cities where the fires of disorder burned last summer.

text_preceding: Finally, I ask you to add 100 FBI agents to strengthen law enforcement in the Nation and to protect the individual rights of every citizen.
text_following: We can-and in time we will-change that despair into confidence, and change those frustrations into achievements.

text_original: We can-and in time we will-change that despair into confidence, and change those frustrations into achievements.
text_preceding: A moment ago I spoke of despair and frustrated hopes in the cities where the fires of disorder burned last summer.
text_following: But violence will never bring progress.

text_original: But violence will never bring progress.
text_preceding: We can-and in time we will-change that despair into confidence, and change those frustrations into achievements.

text_original: We can make progress only by attacking the causes of violence and only where there is civil order founded on justice.
text_preceding: But violence will never bring progress.

text_preceding: We can make progress only by attacking the causes of violence and only where there is civil order founded on justice.

text_following: The unfinished work of the first session must be completed-the Higher Education Act, the Juvenile Delinquency Act, conservation measures to save the redwoods of California, and to preserve the wonders of our scenic rivers, the Highway Beautification Act-and all the other measures for a cleaner, and for a better, and for a more beautiful America.

text_preceding: I shall also urge the Congress to act on several other vital pending bills-especially the civil rights measures-fair jury trials, protection of Federal rights, enforcement of equal employment opportunity, and fair housing.

text_original: The economic outlook for this year is one of steady growth-if we are vigilant.

text_following: True, there are some clouds on the horizon.

text_following: Interest rates have passed the peak of 1966; and if there is continued inaction on the tax bill, they will climb even higher.

text_original: Interest rates have passed the peak of 1966; and if there is continued inaction on the tax bill, they will climb even higher.
text_preceding: True, there are some clouds on the horizon.
text_following: I warn the Congress and the Nation tonight that this failure to act on the tax bill will sweep us into an accelerating spiral of price increases, a slump in homebuilding, and a continuing erosion of the American dollar.

text_original: I warn the Congress and the Nation tonight that this failure to act on the tax bill will sweep us into an accelerating spiral of price increases, a slump in homebuilding, and a continuing erosion of the American dollar.

text_following: And I predict that if this happens, they will all let us know about it.
