text_following: The protection of the lives and property of Americans from foreign enemies is one of my primary responsibilities as President.

text_original: The protection of the lives and property of Americans from foreign enemies is one of my primary responsibilities as President.
text_preceding: This flexible system will do the job better and do it closer to home.
text_following: In a world of instant communications and intercontinental ballistic missiles, in a world economy that is global and interdependent, our relations with other nations become more, not less, important to the lives of Americans.

text_original: In a world of instant communications and intercontinental ballistic missiles, in a world economy that is global and interdependent, our relations with other nations become more, not less, important to the lives of Americans.
text_preceding: The protection of the lives and property of Americans from foreign enemies is one of my primary responsibilities as President.
text_following: America has had a unique role in the world since the day of our independence 200 years ago.

text_original: America has had a unique role in the world since the day of our independence 200 years ago.
text_preceding: In a world of instant communications and intercontinental ballistic missiles, in a world economy that is global and interdependent, our relations with other nations become more, not less, important to the lives of Americans.
text_following: And ever since the end of World War II, we have borne--successfully--a heavy responsibility for ensuring a stable world order and hope for human progress.

text_original: And ever since the end of World War II, we have borne--successfully--a heavy responsibility for ensuring a stable world order and hope for human progress.
text_preceding: America has had a unique role in the world since the day of our independence 200 years ago.
text_following: Today, the state of our foreign policy is sound and strong.

text_original: Today, the state of our foreign policy is sound and strong.
text_preceding: And ever since the end of World War II, we have borne--successfully--a heavy responsibility for ensuring a stable world order and hope for human progress.
text_following: We are at peace, and I will do all in my power to keep it that way.

text_original: We are at peace, and I will do all in my power to keep it that way.
text_preceding: Today, the state of our foreign policy is sound and strong.
text_following: Our military forces are capable and ready.

text_original: Our military forces are capable and ready.
text_preceding: We are at peace, and I will do all in my power to keep it that way.
text_following: Our military power is without equal, and I intend to keep it that way.

text_original: Our military power is without equal, and I intend to keep it that way.
text_preceding: Our military forces are capable and ready.
text_following: Our principal alliances with the industrial democracies of the Atlantic community and Japan have never been more solid.

text_original: Our principal alliances with the industrial democracies of the Atlantic community and Japan have never been more solid.
text_preceding: Our military power is without equal, and I intend to keep it that way.
text_following: A further agreement to limit the strategic arms race may be achieved.

text_original: A further agreement to limit the strategic arms race may be achieved.
text_preceding: Our principal alliances with the industrial democracies of the Atlantic community and Japan have never been more solid.
text_following: We have an improving relationship with China, the world's most populous nation.

text_original: We have an improving relationship with China, the world's most populous nation.
text_preceding: A further agreement to limit the strategic arms race may be achieved.
text_following: The key elements for peace among the nations of the Middle East now exist.

text_original: The key elements for peace among the nations of the Middle East now exist.
text_preceding: We have an improving relationship with China, the world's most populous nation.
text_following: Our traditional friendships in Latin America, Africa, and Asia continue.

text_original: Our traditional friendships in Latin America, Africa, and Asia continue.
text_preceding: The key elements for peace among the nations of the Middle East now exist.
text_following: We have taken the role of leadership in launching a serious and hopeful dialog between the industrial world and the developing world.

text_original: We have taken the role of leadership in launching a serious and hopeful dialog between the industrial world and the developing world.
text_preceding: Our traditional friendships in Latin America, Africa, and Asia continue.
text_following: We have helped to achieve significant reform of the international monetary system.

text_original: We have helped to achieve significant reform of the international monetary system.
text_preceding: We have taken the role of leadership in launching a serious and hopeful dialog between the industrial world and the developing world.
text_following: We should be proud of what America, what our country, has accomplished in these areas, and I believe the American people are.

text_original: We should be proud of what America, what our country, has accomplished in these areas, and I believe the American people are.
text_preceding: We have helped to achieve significant reform of the international monetary system.
text_following: The American people have heard too much about how terrible our mistakes, how evil our deeds, and how misguided our purposes.

text_original: The American people have heard too much about how terrible our mistakes, how evil our deeds, and how misguided our purposes.
text_preceding: We should be proud of what America, what our country, has accomplished in these areas, and I believe the American people are.
text_following: The American people know better.

text_original: The American people know better.
text_preceding: The American people have heard too much about how terrible our mistakes, how evil our deeds, and how misguided our purposes.
text_following: The truth is we are the world's greatest democracy.

text_original: The truth is we are the world's greatest democracy.
text_preceding: The American people know better.
text_following: We remain the symbol of man's aspiration for liberty and well-being.

text_original: We remain the symbol of man's aspiration for liberty and well-being.
text_preceding: The truth is we are the world's greatest democracy.
text_following: We are the embodiment of hope for progress.

text_original: We are the embodiment of hope for progress.
text_preceding: We remain the symbol of man's aspiration for liberty and well-being.
text_following: I say it is time we quit downgrading ourselves as a nation.

text_original: I say it is time we quit downgrading ourselves as a nation.
text_preceding: We are the embodiment of hope for progress.
text_following: Of course, it is our responsibility to learn the right lesson from past mistakes.

text_original: Of course, it is our responsibility to learn the right lesson from past mistakes.
text_preceding: I say it is time we quit downgrading ourselves as a nation.
text_following: It is our duty to see that they never happen again.

text_original: It is our duty to see that they never happen again.
text_preceding: Of course, it is our responsibility to learn the right lesson from past mistakes.
text_following: But our greater duty is to look to the future.

text_original: But our greater duty is to look to the future.
text_preceding: It is our duty to see that they never happen again.
text_following: The world's troubles will not go away.

text_original: The world's troubles will not go away.
text_preceding: But our greater duty is to look to the future.
text_following: The American people want strong and effective international and defense policies.

text_original: The American people want strong and effective international and defense policies.
text_preceding: The world's troubles will not go away.
text_following: In our constitutional system, these policies should reflect consultation and accommodation between the President and the Congress.

text_original: In our constitutional system, these policies should reflect consultation and accommodation between the President and the Congress.
text_preceding: The American people want strong and effective international and defense policies.
text_following: But in the final analysis, as the framers of our Constitution knew from hard experience, the foreign relations of the United States can be conducted effectively only if there is strong central direction that allows flexibility of action.

text_original: But in the final analysis, as the framers of our Constitution knew from hard experience, the foreign relations of the United States can be conducted effectively only if there is strong central direction that allows flexibility of action.
text_preceding: In our constitutional system, these policies should reflect consultation and accommodation between the President and the Congress.
text_following: That responsibility clearly rests with the President.

text_original: That responsibility clearly rests with the President.
text_preceding: But in the final analysis, as the framers of our Constitution knew from hard experience, the foreign relations of the United States can be conducted effectively only if there is strong central direction that allows flexibility of action.
text_following: I pledge to the American people policies which seek a secure, just, and peaceful world.

text_original: I pledge to the American people policies which seek a secure, just, and peaceful world.
text_preceding: That responsibility clearly rests with the President.
text_following: I pledge to the Congress to work with you to that end.

text_original: I pledge to the Congress to work with you to that end.
text_preceding: I pledge to the American people policies which seek a secure, just, and peaceful world.
text_following: We must not face a future in which we can no longer help our friends, such as Angola, even in limited and carefully controlled ways.

text_original: We must not face a future in which we can no longer help our friends, such as Angola, even in limited and carefully controlled ways.
text_preceding: I pledge to the Congress to work with you to that end.
text_following: We must not lose all capacity to respond short of military intervention.

text_original: We must not lose all capacity to respond short of military intervention.
text_preceding: We must not face a future in which we can no longer help our friends, such as Angola, even in limited and carefully controlled ways.
text_following: Some hasty actions of the Congress during the past year--most recently in respect to Angola--were, in my view, very shortsighted.

text_original: Some hasty actions of the Congress during the past year--most recently in respect to Angola--were, in my view, very shortsighted.
text_preceding: We must not lose all capacity to respond short of military intervention.
text_following: Unfortunately, they are still very much on the minds of our allies and our adversaries.

text_original: Unfortunately, they are still very much on the minds of our allies and our adversaries.
text_preceding: Some hasty actions of the Congress during the past year--most recently in respect to Angola--were, in my view, very shortsighted.
text_following: A strong defense posture gives weight to our values and our views in international negotiations.

text_original: A strong defense posture gives weight to our values and our views in international negotiations.
text_preceding: Unfortunately, they are still very much on the minds of our allies and our adversaries.
text_following: It assures the vigor of our alliances.

text_original: It assures the vigor of our alliances.
text_preceding: A strong defense posture gives weight to our values and our views in international negotiations.
text_following: And it sustains our efforts to promote settlements of international conflicts.

text_original: And it sustains our efforts to promote settlements of international conflicts.
text_preceding: It assures the vigor of our alliances.
text_following: Only from a position of strength can we negotiate a balanced agreement to limit the growth of nuclear arms.

text_original: Only from a position of strength can we negotiate a balanced agreement to limit the growth of nuclear arms.
text_preceding: And it sustains our efforts to promote settlements of international conflicts.
text_following: Only a balanced agreement will serve our interests and minimize the threat of nuclear confrontation.

text_original: Only a balanced agreement will serve our interests and minimize the threat of nuclear confrontation.
text_preceding: Only from a position of strength can we negotiate a balanced agreement to limit the growth of nuclear arms.
text_following: The defense budget I will submit to the Congress for fiscal year 1977 will show an essential increase over the current year.

text_original: The defense budget I will submit to the Congress for fiscal year 1977 will show an essential increase over the current year.
text_preceding: Only a balanced agreement will serve our interests and minimize the threat of nuclear confrontation.
text_following: It provides for real growth in purchasing power over this year's defense budget, which includes the cost of the all-volunteer force.

text_original: It provides for real growth in purchasing power over this year's defense budget, which includes the cost of the all-volunteer force.
text_preceding: The defense budget I will submit to the Congress for fiscal year 1977 will show an essential increase over the current year.
text_following: We are continuing to make economies to enhance the efficiency of our military forces.

text_original: We are continuing to make economies to enhance the efficiency of our military forces.
text_preceding: It provides for real growth in purchasing power over this year's defense budget, which includes the cost of the all-volunteer force.
text_following: But the budget I will submit represents the necessity of American strength for the real world in which we live.

text_original: But the budget I will submit represents the necessity of American strength for the real world in which we live.
text_preceding: We are continuing to make economies to enhance the efficiency of our military forces.
text_following: As conflict and rivalry persist in the world, our United States intelligence capabilities must be the best in the world.

text_original: As conflict and rivalry persist in the world, our United States intelligence capabilities must be the best in the world.
text_preceding: But the budget I will submit represents the necessity of American strength for the real world in which we live.
text_following: The crippling of our foreign intelligence services increases the danger of American involvement in direct armed conflict.

text_original: The crippling of our foreign intelligence services increases the danger of American involvement in direct armed conflict.
text_preceding: As conflict and rivalry persist in the world, our United States intelligence capabilities must be the best in the world.
text_following: Our adversaries are encouraged to attempt new adventures while our own ability to monitor events and to influence events short of military action is undermined.

text_original: Our adversaries are encouraged to attempt new adventures while our own ability to monitor events and to influence events short of military action is undermined.
text_preceding: The crippling of our foreign intelligence services increases the danger of American involvement in direct armed conflict.
text_following: Without effective intelligence capability, the United States stands blindfolded and hobbled.

text_original: Without effective intelligence capability, the United States stands blindfolded and hobbled.
text_preceding: Our adversaries are encouraged to attempt new adventures while our own ability to monitor events and to influence events short of military action is undermined.
text_following: In the near future, I will take actions to reform and strengthen our intelligence community.

text_original: In the near future, I will take actions to reform and strengthen our intelligence community.
text_preceding: Without effective intelligence capability, the United States stands blindfolded and hobbled.
text_following: I ask for your positive cooperation.

text_original: I ask for your positive cooperation.
text_preceding: In the near future, I will take actions to reform and strengthen our intelligence community.
text_following: It is time to go beyond sensationalism and ensure an effective, responsible, and responsive intelligence capability.

text_original: It is time to go beyond sensationalism and ensure an effective, responsible, and responsive intelligence capability.
text_preceding: I ask for your positive cooperation.
text_following: Tonight I have spoken about our problems at home and abroad.

text_original: Tonight I have spoken about our problems at home and abroad.
text_preceding: It is time to go beyond sensationalism and ensure an effective, responsible, and responsive intelligence capability.
text_following: I have recommended policies that will meet the challenge of our third century.

text_original: I have recommended policies that will meet the challenge of our third century.
text_preceding: Tonight I have spoken about our problems at home and abroad.
text_following: I have no doubt that our Union will endure, better, stronger, and with more individual freedom.

text_original: I have no doubt that our Union will endure, better, stronger, and with more individual freedom.
text_preceding: I have recommended policies that will meet the challenge of our third century.
text_following: We can see forward only dimly--1 year, 5 years, a generation perhaps.

text_original: We can see forward only dimly--1 year, 5 years, a generation perhaps.
text_preceding: I have no doubt that our Union will endure, better, stronger, and with more individual freedom.
text_following: Like our forefathers, we know that if we meet the challenges of our own time with a common sense of purpose and conviction, if we remain true to our Constitution and to our ideals, then we can know that the future will be better than the past.

text_original: Like our forefathers, we know that if we meet the challenges of our own time with a common sense of purpose and conviction, if we remain true to our Constitution and to our ideals, then we can know that the future will be better than the past.
text_preceding: We can see forward only dimly--1 year, 5 years, a generation perhaps.
text_following: I see America today crossing a threshold, not just because it is our Bicentennial but because we have been tested in adversity.

text_original: I see America today crossing a threshold, not just because it is our Bicentennial but because we have been tested in adversity.
text_preceding: Like our forefathers, we know that if we meet the challenges of our own time with a common sense of purpose and conviction, if we remain true to our Constitution and to our ideals, then we can know that the future will be better than the past.
text_following: We have taken a new look at what we want to be and what we want our Nation to become.

text_original: We have taken a new look at what we want to be and what we want our Nation to become.
text_preceding: I see America today crossing a threshold, not just because it is our Bicentennial but because we have been tested in adversity.
text_following: I see America resurgent, certain once again that life will be better for our children than it is for us, seeking strength that cannot be counted in megatons and riches that cannot be eroded by inflation.

text_original: I see America resurgent, certain once again that life will be better for our children than it is for us, seeking strength that cannot be counted in megatons and riches that cannot be eroded by inflation.
text_preceding: We have taken a new look at what we want to be and what we want our Nation to become.
text_following: I see these United States of America moving forward as before toward a more perfect Union where the government serves and the people rule.

text_original: I see these United States of America moving forward as before toward a more perfect Union where the government serves and the people rule.
text_preceding: I see America resurgent, certain once again that life will be better for our children than it is for us, seeking strength that cannot be counted in megatons and riches that cannot be eroded by inflation.
text_following: We will not make this happen simply by making speeches, good or bad, yours or mine, but by hard work and hard decisions made with courage and with common sense.

text_original: We will not make this happen simply by making speeches, good or bad, yours or mine, but by hard work and hard decisions made with courage and with common sense.
text_preceding: I see these United States of America moving forward as before toward a more perfect Union where the government serves and the people rule.
text_following: I have heard many inspiring Presidential speeches, but the words I remember best were spoken by Dwight D.Eisenhower.

text_original: I have heard many inspiring Presidential speeches, but the words I remember best were spoken by Dwight D.Eisenhower.
text_preceding: We will not make this happen simply by making speeches, good or bad, yours or mine, but by hard work and hard decisions made with courage and with common sense.
text_following: America is not good because it is great, the President said.

text_original: America is not good because it is great, the President said.
text_preceding: I have heard many inspiring Presidential speeches, but the words I remember best were spoken by Dwight D.Eisenhower.
text_following: America is great because it is good.

text_original: America is great because it is good.
text_preceding: America is not good because it is great, the President said.
text_following: President Eisenhower was raised in a poor but religious home in the heart of America.

text_original: President Eisenhower was raised in a poor but religious home in the heart of America.
text_preceding: America is great because it is good.
text_following: And Lincoln in turn evoked the silent image of George Washington kneeling in prayer at Valley Forge.

text_original: And Lincoln in turn evoked the silent image of George Washington kneeling in prayer at Valley Forge.
text_preceding: President Eisenhower was raised in a poor but religious home in the heart of America.
text_following: So, all these magic memories which link eight generations of Americans are summed up in the inscription just above me.

text_original: So, all these magic memories which link eight generations of Americans are summed up in the inscription just above me.
text_preceding: And Lincoln in turn evoked the silent image of George Washington kneeling in prayer at Valley Forge.
text_following: Let us engrave it now in each of our hearts as we begin our Bicentennial.

text_original: Let us engrave it now in each of our hearts as we begin our Bicentennial.
text_preceding: So, all these magic memories which link eight generations of Americans are summed up in the inscription just above me.

text_original: Mr. Speaker, Mr. President, distinguished Members of Congress, honored guests, and fellow citizens:Only a month ago I was your guest in this historic building, and I pledged to you my cooperation in doing what is right for this Nation that we all love so much.
text_following: I'm here tonight to reaffirm that pledge and to ask that we share in restoring the promise that is offered to every citizen by this, the last, best hope of man on Earth.

text_original: I'm here tonight to reaffirm that pledge and to ask that we share in restoring the promise that is offered to every citizen by this, the last, best hope of man on Earth.
text_preceding: Mr. Speaker, Mr. President, distinguished Members of Congress, honored guests, and fellow citizens:Only a month ago I was your guest in this historic building, and I pledged to you my cooperation in doing what is right for this Nation that we all love so much.
text_following: All of us are aware of the punishing inflation which has for the first time in 60 years held to double-digit figures for 2 years in a row.

text_original: All of us are aware of the punishing inflation which has for the first time in 60 years held to double-digit figures for 2 years in a row.
text_preceding: I'm here tonight to reaffirm that pledge and to ask that we share in restoring the promise that is offered to every citizen by this, the last, best hope of man on Earth.
text_following: Interest rates have reached absurd levels of more that 20 percent and over 15 percent for those who would borrow to buy a home.

text_original: Interest rates have reached absurd levels of more that 20 percent and over 15 percent for those who would borrow to buy a home.
text_preceding: All of us are aware of the punishing inflation which has for the first time in 60 years held to double-digit figures for 2 years in a row.
text_following: All across this land one can see newly built homes standing vacant, unsold because of mortgage interest rates.

text_original: All across this land one can see newly built homes standing vacant, unsold because of mortgage interest rates.
text_preceding: Interest rates have reached absurd levels of more that 20 percent and over 15 percent for those who would borrow to buy a home.
text_following: Almost 8 million Americans are out of work.

text_original: Almost 8 million Americans are out of work.
text_preceding: All across this land one can see newly built homes standing vacant, unsold because of mortgage interest rates.
text_following: These are people who want to be productive.

text_original: These are people who want to be productive.
text_preceding: Almost 8 million Americans are out of work.
text_following: But as the months go by, despair dominates their lives.

text_original: But as the months go by, despair dominates their lives.
text_preceding: These are people who want to be productive.
text_following: The threats of layoff and unemployment hang over other millions, and all who work are frustrated by their inability to keep up with inflation.

text_original: The threats of layoff and unemployment hang over other millions, and all who work are frustrated by their inability to keep up with inflation.
text_preceding: But as the months go by, despair dominates their lives.
text_following: One worker in a Midwest city put it to me this way: He said, ""I'm bringing home more dollars than I ever believed I could possibly earn, but I seem to be getting worse off.

text_original: One worker in a Midwest city put it to me this way: He said, ""I'm bringing home more dollars than I ever believed I could possibly earn, but I seem to be getting worse off.
text_preceding: The threats of layoff and unemployment hang over other millions, and all who work are frustrated by their inability to keep up with inflation.
text_following: Not only have hourly earnings of the American worker, after adjusting for inflation, declined 5 percent over the past 5 years, but in these 5 years, Federal personal taxes for the average family have increased 67 percent.

text_original: Not only have hourly earnings of the American worker, after adjusting for inflation, declined 5 percent over the past 5 years, but in these 5 years, Federal personal taxes for the average family have increased 67 percent.
text_preceding: One worker in a Midwest city put it to me this way: He said, ""I'm bringing home more dollars than I ever believed I could possibly earn, but I seem to be getting worse off.
text_following: We can no longer procrastinate and hope that things will get better.

text_original: We can no longer procrastinate and hope that things will get better.
text_preceding: Not only have hourly earnings of the American worker, after adjusting for inflation, declined 5 percent over the past 5 years, but in these 5 years, Federal personal taxes for the average family have increased 67 percent.
text_following: Unless we act forcefully-and now-the economy will get worse.

text_original: Unless we act forcefully-and now-the economy will get worse.
text_preceding: We can no longer procrastinate and hope that things will get better.
text_following: Can we, who man the ship of state, deny it is somewhat out of control?

text_original: Can we, who man the ship of state, deny it is somewhat out of control?
text_preceding: Unless we act forcefully-and now-the economy will get worse.
text_following: Our national debt is approaching $1 trillion.

text_original: Our national debt is approaching $1 trillion.
text_preceding: Can we, who man the ship of state, deny it is somewhat out of control?
text_following: A few weeks ago I called such a figure, a trillion dollars, incomprehensible, and I've been trying ever since to think of a way to illustrate how big a trillion really is.

text_original: A few weeks ago I called such a figure, a trillion dollars, incomprehensible, and I've been trying ever since to think of a way to illustrate how big a trillion really is.
text_preceding: Our national debt is approaching $1 trillion.
text_following: And the best I could come up with is that if you had a stack of thousand-dollar bills in your hand only 4 inches high, you'd be a millionaire.

text_original: And the best I could come up with is that if you had a stack of thousand-dollar bills in your hand only 4 inches high, you'd be a millionaire.
text_preceding: A few weeks ago I called such a figure, a trillion dollars, incomprehensible, and I've been trying ever since to think of a way to illustrate how big a trillion really is.
text_following: A trillion dollars would be a stack of thousand-dollar bills 67 miles high.

text_original: A trillion dollars would be a stack of thousand-dollar bills 67 miles high.
text_preceding: And the best I could come up with is that if you had a stack of thousand-dollar bills in your hand only 4 inches high, you'd be a millionaire.
text_following: The interest on the public debt this year we know will be over $90 billion, and unless we change the proposed spending for the fiscal year beginning October 1st, we'll add another almost $80 billion to the debt.

text_original: The interest on the public debt this year we know will be over $90 billion, and unless we change the proposed spending for the fiscal year beginning October 1st, we'll add another almost $80 billion to the debt.
text_preceding: A trillion dollars would be a stack of thousand-dollar bills 67 miles high.
text_following: Adding to our troubles is a mass of regulations imposed on the shopkeeper, the farmer, the craftsman, professionals, and major industry that is estimated to add $100 billion to the price of the things we buy, and it reduces our ability to produce.

text_original: Adding to our troubles is a mass of regulations imposed on the shopkeeper, the farmer, the craftsman, professionals, and major industry that is estimated to add $100 billion to the price of the things we buy, and it reduces our ability to produce.
text_preceding: The interest on the public debt this year we know will be over $90 billion, and unless we change the proposed spending for the fiscal year beginning October 1st, we'll add another almost $80 billion to the debt.
text_following: The rate of increase in American productivity, once one of the highest in the world, is among the lowest of all major industrial nations.

text_original: The rate of increase in American productivity, once one of the highest in the world, is among the lowest of all major industrial nations.
text_preceding: Adding to our troubles is a mass of regulations imposed on the shopkeeper, the farmer, the craftsman, professionals, and major industry that is estimated to add $100 billion to the price of the things we buy, and it reduces our ability to produce.
text_following: Indeed, it has actually declined in the last 3 years.

text_original: Indeed, it has actually declined in the last 3 years.
text_preceding: The rate of increase in American productivity, once one of the highest in the world, is among the lowest of all major industrial nations.
text_following: Now, I've painted a pretty grim picture, but I think I've painted it accurately.

text_original: Now, I've painted a pretty grim picture, but I think I've painted it accurately.
text_preceding: Indeed, it has actually declined in the last 3 years.
text_following: It is within our power to change this picture, and we can act with hope.

text_original: It is within our power to change this picture, and we can act with hope.
text_preceding: Now, I've painted a pretty grim picture, but I think I've painted it accurately.
text_following: There's nothing wrong with our internal strengths.

text_original: There's nothing wrong with our internal strengths.
text_preceding: It is within our power to change this picture, and we can act with hope.
text_following: There has been no breakdown of the human, technological, and natural resources upon which the economy is built.

text_original: There has been no breakdown of the human, technological, and natural resources upon which the economy is built.
text_preceding: There's nothing wrong with our internal strengths.
text_following: Based on this confidence in a system which has never failed us, but which we have failed through a lack of confidence and sometimes through a belief that we could fine-tune the economy and get it tuned to our liking, I am proposing a comprehensive four-point program.

text_original: Based on this confidence in a system which has never failed us, but which we have failed through a lack of confidence and sometimes through a belief that we could fine-tune the economy and get it tuned to our liking, I am proposing a comprehensive four-point program.
text_preceding: There has been no breakdown of the human, technological, and natural resources upon which the economy is built.
text_following: Now, let me outline in detail some of the principal parts of this program.

text_original: Now, let me outline in detail some of the principal parts of this program.
text_preceding: Based on this confidence in a system which has never failed us, but which we have failed through a lack of confidence and sometimes through a belief that we could fine-tune the economy and get it tuned to our liking, I am proposing a comprehensive four-point program.
text_following: You'll each be provided with a completely detailed copy of the entire program.

text_original: You'll each be provided with a completely detailed copy of the entire program.
text_preceding: Now, let me outline in detail some of the principal parts of this program.
text_following: This plan is aimed at reducing the growth in government spending and taxing, reforming and eliminating regulations which are unnecessary and unproductive or counterproductive, and encouraging a consistent monetary policy aimed at maintaining the value of the currency.

text_original: This plan is aimed at reducing the growth in government spending and taxing, reforming and eliminating regulations which are unnecessary and unproductive or counterproductive, and encouraging a consistent monetary policy aimed at maintaining the value of the currency.
text_preceding: You'll each be provided with a completely detailed copy of the entire program.
text_following: If enacted in full, this program can help America create 13 million new jobs, nearly 3 million more than we would have without these measures.

text_original: If enacted in full, this program can help America create 13 million new jobs, nearly 3 million more than we would have without these measures.
text_preceding: This plan is aimed at reducing the growth in government spending and taxing, reforming and eliminating regulations which are unnecessary and unproductive or counterproductive, and encouraging a consistent monetary policy aimed at maintaining the value of the currency.
text_following: It will also help us to gain control of inflation.

text_original: It will also help us to gain control of inflation.
text_preceding: If enacted in full, this program can help America create 13 million new jobs, nearly 3 million more than we would have without these measures.
text_following: It's important to note that we're only reducing the rate of increase in taxing and spending.

text_original: It's important to note that we're only reducing the rate of increase in taxing and spending.
text_preceding: It will also help us to gain control of inflation.
text_following: We're not attempting to cut either spending or taxing levels below that which we presently have.

text_original: We're not attempting to cut either spending or taxing levels below that which we presently have.
text_preceding: It's important to note that we're only reducing the rate of increase in taxing and spending.
text_following: This plan will get our economy moving again, [create] productivity growth, and thus create the jobs that our people must have.

text_original: This plan will get our economy moving again, [create] productivity growth, and thus create the jobs that our people must have.
text_preceding: We're not attempting to cut either spending or taxing levels below that which we presently have.
text_following: And I'm asking that you join me in reducing direct Federal spending by $41.4 billion in fiscal year 1982, and this goes along with another $7.7 billion in user fees and off-budget savings for a total of $49.1 billion.

text_original: And I'm asking that you join me in reducing direct Federal spending by $41.4 billion in fiscal year 1982, and this goes along with another $7.7 billion in user fees and off-budget savings for a total of $49.1 billion.
text_preceding: This plan will get our economy moving again, [create] productivity growth, and thus create the jobs that our people must have.
text_following: And this will still allow an increase of $40.8 billion over 1981 spending.

text_original: And this will still allow an increase of $40.8 billion over 1981 spending.
text_preceding: And I'm asking that you join me in reducing direct Federal spending by $41.4 billion in fiscal year 1982, and this goes along with another $7.7 billion in user fees and off-budget savings for a total of $49.1 billion.
text_following: Now, I know that exaggerated and inaccurate stories about these cuts have disturbed many people, particularly those dependent on grant and benefit programs for their basic needs.

text_original: Now, I know that exaggerated and inaccurate stories about these cuts have disturbed many people, particularly those dependent on grant and benefit programs for their basic needs.
text_preceding: And this will still allow an increase of $40.8 billion over 1981 spending.
text_following: Some of you have heard from constituents, I know, afraid that social security checks, for example, were going to be taken away from them.

text_original: Some of you have heard from constituents, I know, afraid that social security checks, for example, were going to be taken away from them.
text_preceding: Now, I know that exaggerated and inaccurate stories about these cuts have disturbed many people, particularly those dependent on grant and benefit programs for their basic needs.
text_following: Well, I regret the fear that these unfounded stories have caused, and I welcome this opportunity to set things straight.

text_original: Well, I regret the fear that these unfounded stories have caused, and I welcome this opportunity to set things straight.
text_preceding: Some of you have heard from constituents, I know, afraid that social security checks, for example, were going to be taken away from them.
text_following: We will continue to fulfill the obligations that spring from our national conscience.

text_original: We will continue to fulfill the obligations that spring from our national conscience.
text_preceding: Well, I regret the fear that these unfounded stories have caused, and I welcome this opportunity to set things straight.
text_following: Those who, through no fault of their own, must depend on the rest of us-the poverty stricken, the disabled, the elderly, all those with true need-can rest assured that the social safety net of programs they depend on are exempt from any cuts.

text_original: Those who, through no fault of their own, must depend on the rest of us-the poverty stricken, the disabled, the elderly, all those with true need-can rest assured that the social safety net of programs they depend on are exempt from any cuts.
text_preceding: We will continue to fulfill the obligations that spring from our national conscience.
text_following: The full retirement benefits of the more than 31 million social security recipients will be continued, along with an annual cost-of-living increase.

text_following: I know that you're all aware-but I think it bears saying again-that since 1970 the Soviet Union has invested $300 billion more in its military forces than we have.

text_following: Notwithstanding our economic straits, making the financial changes beginning now is far less costly than waiting and having to attempt a crash program several years from now.

text_following: I hope we can persuade our adversaries to come to realistic balanced and verifiable agreements.

text_preceding: If the tax dollars that are wasted or mismanaged are added to this fraud total, the staggering dimensions of this problem begin to emerge.

text_following: No administration can promise to immediately stop a trend that has grown in recent years as quickly as government expenditures themselves, but let me say this: Waste and fraud in the Federal Government is exactly what I've called it before-an unrelenting national scandal, a scandal we're bound and determined to do something about.

text_original: No administration can promise to immediately stop a trend that has grown in recent years as quickly as government expenditures themselves, but let me say this: Waste and fraud in the Federal Government is exactly what I've called it before-an unrelenting national scandal, a scandal we're bound and determined to do something about.
text_preceding: We're also planning to appoint as Inspectors General highly trained professionals who will spare no effort to do this job.
text_following: Marching in lockstep with the whole program of reductions in spending is the equally important program of reduced tax rates.

text_original: Marching in lockstep with the whole program of reductions in spending is the equally important program of reduced tax rates.
text_preceding: No administration can promise to immediately stop a trend that has grown in recent years as quickly as government expenditures themselves, but let me say this: Waste and fraud in the Federal Government is exactly what I've called it before-an unrelenting national scandal, a scandal we're bound and determined to do something about.
text_following: Both are essential if we're to have economic recovery.

text_original: Both are essential if we're to have economic recovery.
text_preceding: Marching in lockstep with the whole program of reductions in spending is the equally important program of reduced tax rates.
text_following: It's time to create new jobs, to build and rebuild industry, and to give the American people room to do what they do best.

text_original: It's time to create new jobs, to build and rebuild industry, and to give the American people room to do what they do best.
text_preceding: Both are essential if we're to have economic recovery.
text_following: And that can only be done with a tax program which provides incentive to increase productivity for both workers and industry.

text_original: And that can only be done with a tax program which provides incentive to increase productivity for both workers and industry.
text_preceding: It's time to create new jobs, to build and rebuild industry, and to give the American people room to do what they do best.
text_following: Our proposal is for a 10-percent across the-board cut every year for 3 years in the tax rates for all individual income taxpayers, making a total cut in the tax-cut rates of 30 percent.

text_original: Our proposal is for a 10-percent across the-board cut every year for 3 years in the tax rates for all individual income taxpayers, making a total cut in the tax-cut rates of 30 percent.
text_preceding: And that can only be done with a tax program which provides incentive to increase productivity for both workers and industry.
text_following: This 3-year reduction will also apply to the tax on unearned income, leading toward an eventual elimination of the present differential between the tax on earned and unearned income.

text_original: This 3-year reduction will also apply to the tax on unearned income, leading toward an eventual elimination of the present differential between the tax on earned and unearned income.
text_preceding: Our proposal is for a 10-percent across the-board cut every year for 3 years in the tax rates for all individual income taxpayers, making a total cut in the tax-cut rates of 30 percent.
text_following: Now, I would have hoped that we could be retroactive with this.

text_original: Now, I would have hoped that we could be retroactive with this.
text_preceding: This 3-year reduction will also apply to the tax on unearned income, leading toward an eventual elimination of the present differential between the tax on earned and unearned income.
text_following: But as it stands, the effective starting date for these 10-percent personal income tax rate reductions will call for as of July 1st of this year.

text_original: But as it stands, the effective starting date for these 10-percent personal income tax rate reductions will call for as of July 1st of this year.
text_preceding: Now, I would have hoped that we could be retroactive with this.
text_following: Again, let me remind you that while this 30-percent reduction will leave the taxpayers with $500 billion more in their pockets over the next 5 years, it's actually only a reduction in the tax increase already built into the system.

text_original: Again, let me remind you that while this 30-percent reduction will leave the taxpayers with $500 billion more in their pockets over the next 5 years, it's actually only a reduction in the tax increase already built into the system.
text_preceding: But as it stands, the effective starting date for these 10-percent personal income tax rate reductions will call for as of July 1st of this year.
text_following: Unlike some past ""tax reforms,"" this is not merely a shift of wealth between different sets of taxpayers.

text_original: Unlike some past ""tax reforms,"" this is not merely a shift of wealth between different sets of taxpayers.
text_preceding: Again, let me remind you that while this 30-percent reduction will leave the taxpayers with $500 billion more in their pockets over the next 5 years, it's actually only a reduction in the tax increase already built into the system.
text_following: This proposal for an equal reduction in everyone's tax rates will expand our national prosperity, enlarge national incomes, and increase opportunities for all Americans.

text_original: This proposal for an equal reduction in everyone's tax rates will expand our national prosperity, enlarge national incomes, and increase opportunities for all Americans.

text_preceding: This proposal for an equal reduction in everyone's tax rates will expand our national prosperity, enlarge national incomes, and increase opportunities for all Americans.
text_following: A solid body of economic experts does not agree.

text_original: A solid body of economic experts does not agree.
text_preceding: Some will argue, I know, that reducing tax rates now will be inflationary.
text_following: And tax cuts adopted over the past three-fourths of a century indicate these economic experts are right.

text_following: They will not be inflationary.

text_original: I've had advice that in 1985 our real production in goods and services will grow by 20 percent and be $300 billion higher than it is today.
text_preceding: They will not be inflationary.
text_following: The average worker's wage will rise in real purchasing power 8 percent, and this is in after-tax dollars.

text_preceding: I've had advice that in 1985 our real production in goods and services will grow by 20 percent and be $300 billion higher than it is today.

text_preceding: And this, of course, is predicated on a complete program of tax cuts and spending reductions being implemented.

text_original: The present depreciation system is obsolete, needlessly complex, and economically counterproductive.

text_preceding: But our program for economic recovery is so urgently needed to begin to bring down inflation that I'm asking you to act on this plan first and with great urgency.
text_following: American society experienced a virtual explosion in government regulation during the past decade.

text_original: American society experienced a virtual explosion in government regulation during the past decade.
text_preceding: And then, I pledge I will join with you in seeking these additional tax changes at the earliest date possible.
text_following: Between 1970 and 1979, expenditures for the major regulatory agencies quadrupled.

text_original: Between 1970 and 1979, expenditures for the major regulatory agencies quadrupled.
text_preceding: American society experienced a virtual explosion in government regulation during the past decade.
text_following: The number of pages published annually in the Federal Register nearly tripled, and the number of pages in the Code of Federal Regulations increased by nearly two-thirds.

text_original: The number of pages published annually in the Federal Register nearly tripled, and the number of pages in the Code of Federal Regulations increased by nearly two-thirds.
text_preceding: Between 1970 and 1979, expenditures for the major regulatory agencies quadrupled.
text_following: The result has been higher prices, higher unemployment, and lower productivity growth.

text_original: The result has been higher prices, higher unemployment, and lower productivity growth.
text_preceding: The number of pages published annually in the Federal Register nearly tripled, and the number of pages in the Code of Federal Regulations increased by nearly two-thirds.

text_original: Overregulation causes small and independent business men and women, as well as large businesses to defer or terminate plans for expansion.
text_preceding: The result has been higher prices, higher unemployment, and lower productivity growth.

text_following: Now, we have no intention of dismantling the regulatory agencies, especially those necessary to protect environment and assure the public health and safety.

text_original: Now, we have no intention of dismantling the regulatory agencies, especially those necessary to protect environment and assure the public health and safety.
text_preceding: And since they're responsible for most of the new jobs, those new jobs just aren't created.

text_preceding: However, we must come to grips with inefficient and burdensome regulations, eliminate those we can and reform the others.

text_preceding: And finally, just yesterday I signed an Executive order that for the first time provides for effective and coordinated management of the regulatory process.
text_following: We will eliminate those regulations that are unproductive and unnecessary by Executive order where possible and cooperate fully with you on those that require legislation.

text_original: We will eliminate those regulations that are unproductive and unnecessary by Executive order where possible and cooperate fully with you on those that require legislation.
text_preceding: Much has been accomplished, but it's only a beginning.
text_following: The final aspect of our plan requires a national monetary policy which does not allow money growth to increase consistently faster than the growth of goods and services.

text_original: The final aspect of our plan requires a national monetary policy which does not allow money growth to increase consistently faster than the growth of goods and services.
text_preceding: We will eliminate those regulations that are unproductive and unnecessary by Executive order where possible and cooperate fully with you on those that require legislation.
text_following: In order to curb inflation we need to slow the growth in our money supply.

text_original: In order to curb inflation we need to slow the growth in our money supply.
text_preceding: The final aspect of our plan requires a national monetary policy which does not allow money growth to increase consistently faster than the growth of goods and services.
text_following: Now, we fully recognize the independence of the Federal Reserve System and will do nothing to interfere with or undermine that independence.

text_original: Now, we fully recognize the independence of the Federal Reserve System and will do nothing to interfere with or undermine that independence.
text_preceding: In order to curb inflation we need to slow the growth in our money supply.
text_following: We will consult regularly with the Federal Reserve Board on all aspects of our economic program and will vigorously pursue budget policies that'll make their job easier in reducing monetary growth.

text_original: We will consult regularly with the Federal Reserve Board on all aspects of our economic program and will vigorously pursue budget policies that'll make their job easier in reducing monetary growth.
text_preceding: Now, we fully recognize the independence of the Federal Reserve System and will do nothing to interfere with or undermine that independence.
text_following: A successful program to achieve stable and and moderate growth patterns in the money supply will keep both inflation and interest rates down and restore vigor to our financial institutions and markets.

text_original: A successful program to achieve stable and and moderate growth patterns in the money supply will keep both inflation and interest rates down and restore vigor to our financial institutions and markets.
text_preceding: We will consult regularly with the Federal Reserve Board on all aspects of our economic program and will vigorously pursue budget policies that'll make their job easier in reducing monetary growth.
text_following: This, then, is our proposal-America's new beginning: a program for economic recovery.

text_original: This, then, is our proposal-America's new beginning: a program for economic recovery.
text_preceding: A successful program to achieve stable and and moderate growth patterns in the money supply will keep both inflation and interest rates down and restore vigor to our financial institutions and markets.
text_following: I don't want it to be simply the plan of my administration.

text_original: I don't want it to be simply the plan of my administration.
text_preceding: This, then, is our proposal-America's new beginning: a program for economic recovery.
text_following: I'm here tonight to ask you to join me in making it our plan.

text_following: Well, together we can embark on this road, not to make things easy, but to make things better.
