text_following: And I hope you in Congress will pass it quickly.

text_original: And I hope you in Congress will pass it quickly.
text_preceding: That's why the bipartisan leadership has supported it.
text_following: It is in our interest, and we can explain it to the American people, because we're going to do it in the right way.

text_original: It is in our interest, and we can explain it to the American people, because we're going to do it in the right way.
text_preceding: And I hope you in Congress will pass it quickly.
text_following: You know, tonight, this is the first State of the Union address ever delivered since the beginning of the Cold War when not a single Russian missile is pointed at the children of America.

text_original: You know, tonight, this is the first State of the Union address ever delivered since the beginning of the Cold War when not a single Russian missile is pointed at the children of America.
text_preceding: It is in our interest, and we can explain it to the American people, because we're going to do it in the right way.
text_following: And along with the Russians, we're on the way to destroying the missiles and the bombers that carry 9,000 nuclear warheads.

text_original: And along with the Russians, we're on the way to destroying the missiles and the bombers that carry 9,000 nuclear warheads.
text_preceding: You know, tonight, this is the first State of the Union address ever delivered since the beginning of the Cold War when not a single Russian missile is pointed at the children of America.
text_following: We've come so far so fast in this post-Cold War world that it's easy to take the decline of the nuclear threat for granted.

text_original: We've come so far so fast in this post-Cold War world that it's easy to take the decline of the nuclear threat for granted.
text_preceding: And along with the Russians, we're on the way to destroying the missiles and the bombers that carry 9,000 nuclear warheads.
text_following: But it's still there, and we aren't finished yet.

text_original: But it's still there, and we aren't finished yet.
text_preceding: We've come so far so fast in this post-Cold War world that it's easy to take the decline of the nuclear threat for granted.
text_following: This year I'll ask the Senate to approve START II, to eliminate weapons that carry 5,000 more warheads.

text_original: This year I'll ask the Senate to approve START II, to eliminate weapons that carry 5,000 more warheads.
text_preceding: But it's still there, and we aren't finished yet.
text_following: The United States will lead the charge to extend indefinitely the nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty -- to enact a comprehensive nuclear test ban -- and to eliminate chemical weapons.

text_original: The United States will lead the charge to extend indefinitely the nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty -- to enact a comprehensive nuclear test ban -- and to eliminate chemical weapons.
text_preceding: This year I'll ask the Senate to approve START II, to eliminate weapons that carry 5,000 more warheads.
text_following: To stop and roll back North Korea's potentially deadly nuclear program, we'll continue to implement the agree we have reached with that nation.

text_original: To stop and roll back North Korea's potentially deadly nuclear program, we'll continue to implement the agree we have reached with that nation.
text_preceding: The United States will lead the charge to extend indefinitely the nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty -- to enact a comprehensive nuclear test ban -- and to eliminate chemical weapons.
text_following: It's a deal based on continuing inspection with safeguards for our allies and ourselves.

text_original: It's a deal based on continuing inspection with safeguards for our allies and ourselves.
text_preceding: To stop and roll back North Korea's potentially deadly nuclear program, we'll continue to implement the agree we have reached with that nation.
text_following: This year I'll submit to Congress comprehensive legislation to strengthen our hand in combatting terrorists --whether they strike at home or abroad.

text_original: This year I'll submit to Congress comprehensive legislation to strengthen our hand in combatting terrorists --whether they strike at home or abroad.
text_preceding: It's a deal based on continuing inspection with safeguards for our allies and ourselves.
text_following: As the coward's who bombed the World Trade Center found out, this country will hunt down terrorists and bring them to justice.

text_original: As the coward's who bombed the World Trade Center found out, this country will hunt down terrorists and bring them to justice.
text_preceding: This year I'll submit to Congress comprehensive legislation to strengthen our hand in combatting terrorists --whether they strike at home or abroad.
text_following: Just this week, another horrendous terrorist act in Israel killed 19 and injured scores more.

text_original: Just this week, another horrendous terrorist act in Israel killed 19 and injured scores more.
text_preceding: As the coward's who bombed the World Trade Center found out, this country will hunt down terrorists and bring them to justice.
text_following: On behalf of the American people and all of you, I send our deepest sympathy to the families of the victims.

text_original: On behalf of the American people and all of you, I send our deepest sympathy to the families of the victims.
text_preceding: Just this week, another horrendous terrorist act in Israel killed 19 and injured scores more.
text_following: I know that in the face of such evil, it is hard for the people in the Middle East to go forward.

text_original: I know that in the face of such evil, it is hard for the people in the Middle East to go forward.
text_preceding: On behalf of the American people and all of you, I send our deepest sympathy to the families of the victims.
text_following: But the terrorists represent the past, not the future.

text_original: But the terrorists represent the past, not the future.
text_preceding: I know that in the face of such evil, it is hard for the people in the Middle East to go forward.
text_following: We must and we will pursue a comprehensive peace between Israel and all her neighbors in the Middle East.

text_original: We must and we will pursue a comprehensive peace between Israel and all her neighbors in the Middle East.
text_preceding: But the terrorists represent the past, not the future.
text_following: Accordingly, last night I signed an executive order that will block the assets in the United States of terrorist organizations that threaten to disrupt the peace process.

text_original: Accordingly, last night I signed an executive order that will block the assets in the United States of terrorist organizations that threaten to disrupt the peace process.
text_preceding: We must and we will pursue a comprehensive peace between Israel and all her neighbors in the Middle East.
text_following: It prohibits financial transactions with these groups.

text_original: It prohibits financial transactions with these groups.
text_preceding: Accordingly, last night I signed an executive order that will block the assets in the United States of terrorist organizations that threaten to disrupt the peace process.
text_following: And tonight I call on our allies and peace-loving nations throughout the world to join us with renewed fervor in a global effort to combat terrorism.

text_original: And tonight I call on our allies and peace-loving nations throughout the world to join us with renewed fervor in a global effort to combat terrorism.
text_preceding: It prohibits financial transactions with these groups.
text_following: We cannot permit the future to be marred by terror and fear and paralysis.

text_original: We cannot permit the future to be marred by terror and fear and paralysis.
text_preceding: And tonight I call on our allies and peace-loving nations throughout the world to join us with renewed fervor in a global effort to combat terrorism.
text_following: MILITARY PREPAREDNESS:  From the day I took the oath of office, I pledged that our nation would maintain the best-equipped, best-trained and best-prepared military on Earth.

text_original: MILITARY PREPAREDNESS:  From the day I took the oath of office, I pledged that our nation would maintain the best-equipped, best-trained and best-prepared military on Earth.
text_preceding: We cannot permit the future to be marred by terror and fear and paralysis.
text_following: They have managed the dramatic downsizing of our forces after the Cold War with remarkable skill and spirit.

text_original: They have managed the dramatic downsizing of our forces after the Cold War with remarkable skill and spirit.
text_preceding: MILITARY PREPAREDNESS:  From the day I took the oath of office, I pledged that our nation would maintain the best-equipped, best-trained and best-prepared military on Earth.
text_following: But to make sure our military is ready for action, and to provide the pay and the quality of life the military and their families deserve, I'm asking the Congress to add $25 billion in defense spending over the next six years.

text_original: But to make sure our military is ready for action, and to provide the pay and the quality of life the military and their families deserve, I'm asking the Congress to add $25 billion in defense spending over the next six years.
text_preceding: They have managed the dramatic downsizing of our forces after the Cold War with remarkable skill and spirit.
text_following: I have visited many bases at home and around the world, since I became president.

text_original: I have visited many bases at home and around the world, since I became president.
text_preceding: But to make sure our military is ready for action, and to provide the pay and the quality of life the military and their families deserve, I'm asking the Congress to add $25 billion in defense spending over the next six years.
text_following: Tonight, I repeat that request with renewed conviction.

text_original: Tonight, I repeat that request with renewed conviction.
text_preceding: I have visited many bases at home and around the world, since I became president.
text_following: We ask a very great deal of our Armed Forces.

text_original: We ask a very great deal of our Armed Forces.
text_preceding: Tonight, I repeat that request with renewed conviction.
text_following: Now that they are smaller in number, we ask more of them.

text_original: Now that they are smaller in number, we ask more of them.
text_preceding: We ask a very great deal of our Armed Forces.
text_following: They go out more often to more different places and stay longer.

text_original: They go out more often to more different places and stay longer.
text_preceding: Now that they are smaller in number, we ask more of them.
text_following: They are called to service in many, many ways.

text_original: They are called to service in many, many ways.
text_preceding: They go out more often to more different places and stay longer.
text_following: And we must give them and their families what the times demand and what they have earned.

text_original: And we must give them and their families what the times demand and what they have earned.
text_preceding: They are called to service in many, many ways.
text_following: Just think about what our troops have done in the last year, showing America at its best -- helping to save hundreds of thousands of people in Rwanda, moving with lightning speech to head off another threat to Kuwait, giving freedom and democracy back to the people of Haiti.

text_original: Just think about what our troops have done in the last year, showing America at its best -- helping to save hundreds of thousands of people in Rwanda, moving with lightning speech to head off another threat to Kuwait, giving freedom and democracy back to the people of Haiti.
text_preceding: And we must give them and their families what the times demand and what they have earned.
text_following: We have proudly supported peace and prosperity and freedom from South Africa to Northern Ireland, from Central and Eastern Europe to Asia, from Latin America to the Middle East.

text_original: We have proudly supported peace and prosperity and freedom from South Africa to Northern Ireland, from Central and Eastern Europe to Asia, from Latin America to the Middle East.
text_preceding: Just think about what our troops have done in the last year, showing America at its best -- helping to save hundreds of thousands of people in Rwanda, moving with lightning speech to head off another threat to Kuwait, giving freedom and democracy back to the people of Haiti.
text_following: All these endeavors are good in those places, but they make our future more confident and more secure.

text_original: All these endeavors are good in those places, but they make our future more confident and more secure.
text_preceding: We have proudly supported peace and prosperity and freedom from South Africa to Northern Ireland, from Central and Eastern Europe to Asia, from Latin America to the Middle East.
text_following: Well, my fellow Americans, that's my agenda for America's future: Expanding opportunity, not bureaucracy.

text_original: Well, my fellow Americans, that's my agenda for America's future: Expanding opportunity, not bureaucracy.
text_preceding: All these endeavors are good in those places, but they make our future more confident and more secure.
text_following: Enhancing security at home and abroad.

text_original: Enhancing security at home and abroad.
text_preceding: Well, my fellow Americans, that's my agenda for America's future: Expanding opportunity, not bureaucracy.
text_following: Empowering our people to make the most of their own lives.

text_original: Empowering our people to make the most of their own lives.
text_preceding: Enhancing security at home and abroad.
text_following: It's ambitious and achievable, but it's not enough.

text_original: It's ambitious and achievable, but it's not enough.
text_preceding: Empowering our people to make the most of their own lives.
text_following: We even need more than new ideas for changing the world or equipping Americans to compete in the new economy.

text_original: We even need more than new ideas for changing the world or equipping Americans to compete in the new economy.
text_preceding: It's ambitious and achievable, but it's not enough.
text_following: More than a government that's smaller, smarter and wiser.

text_original: More than a government that's smaller, smarter and wiser.
text_preceding: We even need more than new ideas for changing the world or equipping Americans to compete in the new economy.
text_following: More than all the changes we can make in government and in the private sector from the outside in.

text_original: More than all the changes we can make in government and in the private sector from the outside in.
text_preceding: More than a government that's smaller, smarter and wiser.
text_following: Our fortunes and our posterity also depend upon our ability to answer some questions from within -- from the values and voices that speak to our hearts as well as our heads.

text_original: Our fortunes and our posterity also depend upon our ability to answer some questions from within -- from the values and voices that speak to our hearts as well as our heads.
text_preceding: More than all the changes we can make in government and in the private sector from the outside in.
text_following: Voices that tell us we have to do more to accept responsibility for ourselves and our families, for our communities, and, yes, for our fellow citizens.

text_original: Voices that tell us we have to do more to accept responsibility for ourselves and our families, for our communities, and, yes, for our fellow citizens.
text_preceding: Our fortunes and our posterity also depend upon our ability to answer some questions from within -- from the values and voices that speak to our hearts as well as our heads.
text_following: We see our families and our communities all over this country coming apart.

text_original: We see our families and our communities all over this country coming apart.
text_preceding: Voices that tell us we have to do more to accept responsibility for ourselves and our families, for our communities, and, yes, for our fellow citizens.
text_following: And we feel the common ground shifting from under us.

text_original: And we feel the common ground shifting from under us.
text_preceding: We see our families and our communities all over this country coming apart.
text_following: The PTA, the town hall meeting, the ball park -- it's hard for a lot of overworked parents to find the time and space for those things that strengthen the bonds of trust and cooperation.

text_original: The PTA, the town hall meeting, the ball park -- it's hard for a lot of overworked parents to find the time and space for those things that strengthen the bonds of trust and cooperation.
text_preceding: And we feel the common ground shifting from under us.
text_following: Too many of our children don't even have parents and grandparents who can give them those experiences that they need to build their own character and their sense of identity.

text_original: Too many of our children don't even have parents and grandparents who can give them those experiences that they need to build their own character and their sense of identity.
text_preceding: The PTA, the town hall meeting, the ball park -- it's hard for a lot of overworked parents to find the time and space for those things that strengthen the bonds of trust and cooperation.
text_following: MAKING A DIFFERENCE:  We all know what while we here in this chamber can make a difference on those things, that the real differences will be made by our fellow citizens -- where they work and where they live.

text_original: MAKING A DIFFERENCE:  We all know what while we here in this chamber can make a difference on those things, that the real differences will be made by our fellow citizens -- where they work and where they live.
text_preceding: Too many of our children don't even have parents and grandparents who can give them those experiences that they need to build their own character and their sense of identity.
text_following: And it will be made almost without regard to party.

text_original: And it will be made almost without regard to party.
text_preceding: MAKING A DIFFERENCE:  We all know what while we here in this chamber can make a difference on those things, that the real differences will be made by our fellow citizens -- where they work and where they live.
text_following: When I used to go to the softball park in Little Rock to watch my daughter's league, and people would come up to me, fathers and mothers, and talk to me, I can honestly say I had no idea whether 90 percent of them were Republicans or Democrats.

text_original: When I used to go to the softball park in Little Rock to watch my daughter's league, and people would come up to me, fathers and mothers, and talk to me, I can honestly say I had no idea whether 90 percent of them were Republicans or Democrats.
text_preceding: And it will be made almost without regard to party.
text_following: We can't wait for disasters to act the way we used to act every day.

text_original: We can't wait for disasters to act the way we used to act every day.
text_preceding: When I used to go to the softball park in Little Rock to watch my daughter's league, and people would come up to me, fathers and mothers, and talk to me, I can honestly say I had no idea whether 90 percent of them were Republicans or Democrats.
text_following: Because as we move into this next century, everybody matters.

text_original: Because as we move into this next century, everybody matters.
text_preceding: We can't wait for disasters to act the way we used to act every day.
text_following: We don't have a person to waste.

text_original: We don't have a person to waste.
text_preceding: Because as we move into this next century, everybody matters.
text_following: And a lot of people are losing a lot of chances to do better.

text_original: And a lot of people are losing a lot of chances to do better.
text_preceding: We don't have a person to waste.
text_following: That means that we need a New Covenant for everybody.

text_original: That means that we need a New Covenant for everybody.
text_preceding: And a lot of people are losing a lot of chances to do better.
text_following: For our corporate and business leaders, we're going to work here to keep bringing the deficit down, to expand markets, to support their success in every possible way.

text_original: For our corporate and business leaders, we're going to work here to keep bringing the deficit down, to expand markets, to support their success in every possible way.
text_preceding: That means that we need a New Covenant for everybody.
text_following: But they have an obligation when they're doing well to keep jobs in our communities and give their workers a fair share of the prosperity they generate.

text_original: But they have an obligation when they're doing well to keep jobs in our communities and give their workers a fair share of the prosperity they generate.
text_preceding: For our corporate and business leaders, we're going to work here to keep bringing the deficit down, to expand markets, to support their success in every possible way.
text_following: For people in the entertainment industry in this country, we applaud your creativity and your world-wide success, and we support your freedom of expression.

text_original: For people in the entertainment industry in this country, we applaud your creativity and your world-wide success, and we support your freedom of expression.
text_preceding: But they have an obligation when they're doing well to keep jobs in our communities and give their workers a fair share of the prosperity they generate.
text_following: But you do have a responsibility to assess the impact of your work and to understand the damage that comes from the incessant, repetitive, mindless violence and irresponsible conduct that permeates our media all the time.

text_following: We must go forward as one America -- one nation working together to meet the challenges we face together

text_original: We must go forward as one America -- one nation working together to meet the challenges we face together
text_preceding: But we cannot go back to the time when our citizens were left to fend for themselves
text_following: Self-reliance and teamwork are not opposing virtues

text_original: Self-reliance and teamwork are not opposing virtues
text_preceding: We must go forward as one America -- one nation working together to meet the challenges we face together
text_following: I believe our new, smaller government must work in an old-fashioned American way, together with all of our citizens through state and local governments, in the workplace, in religious, charitable and civic associations

text_original: I believe our new, smaller government must work in an old-fashioned American way, together with all of our citizens through state and local governments, in the workplace, in religious, charitable and civic associations
text_preceding: Self-reliance and teamwork are not opposing virtues
text_following: Our goal must be to enable all our people to make the most of their own lives -- with stronger families, more educational opportunity, economic security, safer streets, a cleaner environment in a safer world

text_original: Our goal must be to enable all our people to make the most of their own lives -- with stronger families, more educational opportunity, economic security, safer streets, a cleaner environment in a safer world
text_preceding: I believe our new, smaller government must work in an old-fashioned American way, together with all of our citizens through state and local governments, in the workplace, in religious, charitable and civic associations
text_following: To improve the state of our Union, we must ask more of ourselves, we must expect more of each other, and we must face our challenges together

text_original: To improve the state of our Union, we must ask more of ourselves, we must expect more of each other, and we must face our challenges together
text_preceding: Our goal must be to enable all our people to make the most of their own lives -- with stronger families, more educational opportunity, economic security, safer streets, a cleaner environment in a safer world
text_following: Here, in this place, our responsibility begins with balancing the budget in a way that is fair to all Americans

text_original: Here, in this place, our responsibility begins with balancing the budget in a way that is fair to all Americans
text_preceding: To improve the state of our Union, we must ask more of ourselves, we must expect more of each other, and we must face our challenges together
text_following: There is now broad bipartisan agreement that permanent deficit spending must come to an end

text_original: There is now broad bipartisan agreement that permanent deficit spending must come to an end
text_preceding: Here, in this place, our responsibility begins with balancing the budget in a way that is fair to all Americans
text_following: I compliment the Republican leadership and the membership for the energy and determination you have brought to this task of balancing the budget

text_original: I compliment the Republican leadership and the membership for the energy and determination you have brought to this task of balancing the budget
text_preceding: There is now broad bipartisan agreement that permanent deficit spending must come to an end
text_following: And I thank the Democrats for passing the largest deficit reduction plan in history in 1993, which has already cut the deficit nearly in half in three years

text_original: And I thank the Democrats for passing the largest deficit reduction plan in history in 1993, which has already cut the deficit nearly in half in three years
text_preceding: I compliment the Republican leadership and the membership for the energy and determination you have brought to this task of balancing the budget
text_following: Since 1993, we have all begun to see the benefits of deficit reduction

text_original: Since 1993, we have all begun to see the benefits of deficit reduction
text_preceding: And I thank the Democrats for passing the largest deficit reduction plan in history in 1993, which has already cut the deficit nearly in half in three years
text_following: Lower interest rates have made it easier for businesses to borrow and to invest and to create new jobs

text_original: Lower interest rates have made it easier for businesses to borrow and to invest and to create new jobs
text_preceding: Since 1993, we have all begun to see the benefits of deficit reduction
text_following: Lower interest rates have brought down the cost of home mortgages, car payments and credit card rates to ordinary citizens

text_original: Lower interest rates have brought down the cost of home mortgages, car payments and credit card rates to ordinary citizens
text_preceding: Lower interest rates have made it easier for businesses to borrow and to invest and to create new jobs
text_following: Now, it is time to finish the job and balance the budget

text_original: Now, it is time to finish the job and balance the budget
text_preceding: Lower interest rates have brought down the cost of home mortgages, car payments and credit card rates to ordinary citizens
text_following: Though differences remain among us which are significant, the combined total of the proposed savings that are common to both plans is more than enough, using the numbers from your Congressional Budget Office to balance the budget in seven years and to provide a modest tax cut

text_original: Though differences remain among us which are significant, the combined total of the proposed savings that are common to both plans is more than enough, using the numbers from your Congressional Budget Office to balance the budget in seven years and to provide a modest tax cut
text_preceding: Now, it is time to finish the job and balance the budget
text_following: They will require sacrifice from everyone

text_original: They will require sacrifice from everyone
text_preceding: Though differences remain among us which are significant, the combined total of the proposed savings that are common to both plans is more than enough, using the numbers from your Congressional Budget Office to balance the budget in seven years and to provide a modest tax cut
text_following: But these cuts do not undermine our fundamental obligations to our parents, our children, and our future, by endangering Medicare, or Medicaid, or education, or the environment, or by raising taxes on working families

text_original: But these cuts do not undermine our fundamental obligations to our parents, our children, and our future, by endangering Medicare, or Medicaid, or education, or the environment, or by raising taxes on working families
text_preceding: They will require sacrifice from everyone
text_following: I have said before, and let me say again, many good ideas have come out of our negotiations

text_original: I have said before, and let me say again, many good ideas have come out of our negotiations
text_preceding: But these cuts do not undermine our fundamental obligations to our parents, our children, and our future, by endangering Medicare, or Medicaid, or education, or the environment, or by raising taxes on working families
text_following: I have learned a lot about the way both Republicans and Democrats view the debate before us

text_original: I have learned a lot about the way both Republicans and Democrats view the debate before us
text_preceding: I have said before, and let me say again, many good ideas have come out of our negotiations
text_following: I have learned a lot about the good ideas that we could all embrace

text_original: I have learned a lot about the good ideas that we could all embrace
text_preceding: I have learned a lot about the way both Republicans and Democrats view the debate before us
text_following: We ought to resolve our remaining differences

text_original: We ought to resolve our remaining differences
text_preceding: I have learned a lot about the good ideas that we could all embrace
text_following: I am willing to work to resolve them

text_original: I am willing to work to resolve them
text_preceding: We ought to resolve our remaining differences
text_following: But I ask you to consider that we should at least enact these savings that both plans have in common and give the American people their balanced budget, a tax cut, lower interest rates, and a brighter future

text_original: But I ask you to consider that we should at least enact these savings that both plans have in common and give the American people their balanced budget, a tax cut, lower interest rates, and a brighter future
text_preceding: I am willing to work to resolve them
text_following: We should do that now, and make permanent deficits yesterday's legacy

text_original: We should do that now, and make permanent deficits yesterday's legacy
text_preceding: But I ask you to consider that we should at least enact these savings that both plans have in common and give the American people their balanced budget, a tax cut, lower interest rates, and a brighter future
text_following: CHILDREN AND FAMILIES: Now it is time for us to look also to the challenges of today and tomorrow, beyond the burdens of yesterday

text_original: CHILDREN AND FAMILIES: Now it is time for us to look also to the challenges of today and tomorrow, beyond the burdens of yesterday
text_preceding: We should do that now, and make permanent deficits yesterday's legacy
text_following: The challenges are significant, bout our nation was built on challenges.

text_original: The challenges are significant, bout our nation was built on challenges.
text_preceding: CHILDREN AND FAMILIES: Now it is time for us to look also to the challenges of today and tomorrow, beyond the burdens of yesterday
text_following: America was built on challenges, not promises

text_original: America was built on challenges, not promises
text_preceding: The challenges are significant, bout our nation was built on challenges.
text_following: And when we work together to meet them, we never fail

text_original: And when we work together to meet them, we never fail
text_preceding: America was built on challenges, not promises
text_following: That is the key to a more perfect Union

text_original: That is the key to a more perfect Union
text_preceding: And when we work together to meet them, we never fail
text_following: Our individual dreams must be realized by our common efforts

text_original: Our individual dreams must be realized by our common efforts
text_preceding: That is the key to a more perfect Union
text_following: Tonight I want to speak to you about the challenges we all face as a people

text_original: Tonight I want to speak to you about the challenges we all face as a people
text_preceding: Our individual dreams must be realized by our common efforts
text_following: Our first challenge is to cherish our children and strengthen America's families

text_original: Our first challenge is to cherish our children and strengthen America's families
text_preceding: Tonight I want to speak to you about the challenges we all face as a people
text_following: Family is the foundation of American life

text_original: Family is the foundation of American life
text_preceding: Our first challenge is to cherish our children and strengthen America's families
text_following: If we have stronger families, we will have a stronger America

text_original: If we have stronger families, we will have a stronger America
text_preceding: Family is the foundation of American life
text_following: Before I go on, I would like to take just a moment to thank my own family, and to thank the person who has taught me more than anyone else over 25 years about the importance of families and children -- a wonderful wife, a magnificent mother and a great First Lady

text_original: Before I go on, I would like to take just a moment to thank my own family, and to thank the person who has taught me more than anyone else over 25 years about the importance of families and children -- a wonderful wife, a magnificent mother and a great First Lady
text_preceding: If we have stronger families, we will have a stronger America
text_following: All strong families begin with taking more responsibility for our children

text_original: All strong families begin with taking more responsibility for our children
text_preceding: Before I go on, I would like to take just a moment to thank my own family, and to thank the person who has taught me more than anyone else over 25 years about the importance of families and children -- a wonderful wife, a magnificent mother and a great First Lady
text_following: I have heard Mrs Gore say that it's hard to be a parent today, but it's even harder to be a child

text_original: I have heard Mrs Gore say that it's hard to be a parent today, but it's even harder to be a child
text_preceding: All strong families begin with taking more responsibility for our children
text_following: So all of us, not just as parents, but all of us in our other roles -- our media, our schools, our teachers, our communities, our churches and synagogues, our businesses, our governments -- all of us have a responsibility to help our children to make it and to make the most of their lives and their God-given capacities

text_original: So all of us, not just as parents, but all of us in our other roles -- our media, our schools, our teachers, our communities, our churches and synagogues, our businesses, our governments -- all of us have a responsibility to help our children to make it and to make the most of their lives and their God-given capacities
text_preceding: I have heard Mrs Gore say that it's hard to be a parent today, but it's even harder to be a child
text_following: To the media: I say you should create movies and CDs and television shows you'd want your own children and grandchildren to enjoy

text_original: To the media: I say you should create movies and CDs and television shows you'd want your own children and grandchildren to enjoy
text_preceding: So all of us, not just as parents, but all of us in our other roles -- our media, our schools, our teachers, our communities, our churches and synagogues, our businesses, our governments -- all of us have a responsibility to help our children to make it and to make the most of their lives and their God-given capacities
text_following: I call on Congress to pass the requirement for a V-chip in TV sets so that parents can screen out programs they believe are inappropriate for their children

text_original: I call on Congress to pass the requirement for a V-chip in TV sets so that parents can screen out programs they believe are inappropriate for their children
text_preceding: To the media: I say you should create movies and CDs and television shows you'd want your own children and grandchildren to enjoy
text_following: When parents control what their young children see, that is not censorship

text_original: When parents control what their young children see, that is not censorship
text_preceding: I call on Congress to pass the requirement for a V-chip in TV sets so that parents can screen out programs they believe are inappropriate for their children
text_following: That is enabling parents to assume more personal responsibility for their children's upbringing

text_original: That is enabling parents to assume more personal responsibility for their children's upbringing
text_preceding: When parents control what their young children see, that is not censorship
text_following: The V-chip requirement is part of the important telecommunications bill now pending in this Congress

text_original: The V-chip requirement is part of the important telecommunications bill now pending in this Congress
text_preceding: That is enabling parents to assume more personal responsibility for their children's upbringing
text_following: It has bipartisan support, and I urge you to pass it now

text_original: It has bipartisan support, and I urge you to pass it now
text_preceding: The V-chip requirement is part of the important telecommunications bill now pending in this Congress
text_following: To make the V-chip work, I challenge the broadcast industry to do what movies have done -- to identify your programming in ways that help parents to protect their children

text_original: To make the V-chip work, I challenge the broadcast industry to do what movies have done -- to identify your programming in ways that help parents to protect their children
text_preceding: It has bipartisan support, and I urge you to pass it now
text_following: And I invite the leaders of major media corporations in the entertainment industry to come to the White House next month to work with us in a positive way on concrete ways to improve what our children see on television

text_original: And I invite the leaders of major media corporations in the entertainment industry to come to the White House next month to work with us in a positive way on concrete ways to improve what our children see on television
text_preceding: To make the V-chip work, I challenge the broadcast industry to do what movies have done -- to identify your programming in ways that help parents to protect their children
text_following: I say to those who make and market cigarettes: every year a million children take up smoking, even though it is against the law

text_original: I say to those who make and market cigarettes: every year a million children take up smoking, even though it is against the law
text_preceding: And I invite the leaders of major media corporations in the entertainment industry to come to the White House next month to work with us in a positive way on concrete ways to improve what our children see on television
text_following: Three hundred thousand of them will have their lives shortened as a result

text_original: Three hundred thousand of them will have their lives shortened as a result
text_preceding: I say to those who make and market cigarettes: every year a million children take up smoking, even though it is against the law
text_following: Our administration has taken steps to stop the massive marketing campaigns that appeal to our children

text_original: Our administration has taken steps to stop the massive marketing campaigns that appeal to our children
text_preceding: Three hundred thousand of them will have their lives shortened as a result
text_following: We are simply saying: Market your products to adults, if you wish, but draw the line on children

text_original: We are simply saying: Market your products to adults, if you wish, but draw the line on children
text_preceding: Our administration has taken steps to stop the massive marketing campaigns that appeal to our children
text_following: I say to those who are on welfare, and especially to those who have been trapped on welfare for a long time: For too long our welfare system has undermined the values of family and work, instead of supporting them

text_original: I say to those who are on welfare, and especially to those who have been trapped on welfare for a long time: For too long our welfare system has undermined the values of family and work, instead of supporting them
text_preceding: We are simply saying: Market your products to adults, if you wish, but draw the line on children
text_following: The Congress and I are near agreement on sweeping welfare reform

text_original: The Congress and I are near agreement on sweeping welfare reform
text_preceding: I say to those who are on welfare, and especially to those who have been trapped on welfare for a long time: For too long our welfare system has undermined the values of family and work, instead of supporting them
text_following: We agree on time limits, tough work requirements, and the toughest possible child support enforcement

text_original: We agree on time limits, tough work requirements, and the toughest possible child support enforcement
text_preceding: The Congress and I are near agreement on sweeping welfare reform
text_following: But I believe we must also provide child care so that mothers who are required to go to work can do so without worrying about what is happening to their children

text_original: But I believe we must also provide child care so that mothers who are required to go to work can do so without worrying about what is happening to their children
text_preceding: We agree on time limits, tough work requirements, and the toughest possible child support enforcement
text_following: I challenge this Congress to send me a bipartisan welfare reform bill that will really move people from welfare to work and do the right thing by our children

text_original: I challenge this Congress to send me a bipartisan welfare reform bill that will really move people from welfare to work and do the right thing by our children
text_preceding: But I believe we must also provide child care so that mothers who are required to go to work can do so without worrying about what is happening to their children
text_following: But let us be candid about this difficult problem

text_original: But let us be candid about this difficult problem
text_preceding: I challenge this Congress to send me a bipartisan welfare reform bill that will really move people from welfare to work and do the right thing by our children
text_following: Passing a law, even the best possible law, is only a first step

text_original: Passing a law, even the best possible law, is only a first step
text_preceding: But let us be candid about this difficult problem
text_following: The next step is to make it work

text_original: The next step is to make it work
text_preceding: Passing a law, even the best possible law, is only a first step
text_following: I challenge people on welfare to make the most of this opportunity for independence

text_original: I challenge people on welfare to make the most of this opportunity for independence
text_preceding: The next step is to make it work
text_following: I challenge American businesses to give people on welfare the chance to move into the work force

text_original: I challenge American businesses to give people on welfare the chance to move into the work force
text_preceding: I challenge people on welfare to make the most of this opportunity for independence
text_following: I applaud the work of religious groups and others who care for the poor

text_original: I applaud the work of religious groups and others who care for the poor
text_preceding: I challenge American businesses to give people on welfare the chance to move into the work force
text_following: More than anyone else in our society, they know the true difficulty of the task before us, and they are in a position to help

text_original: More than anyone else in our society, they know the true difficulty of the task before us, and they are in a position to help
text_preceding: I applaud the work of religious groups and others who care for the poor
text_following: Every one of us should join them

text_original: Every one of us should join them

text_following: That is the only way we can make real welfare for american people

text_original: That is the only way we can make real welfare for american people
text_preceding: Every one of us should join them
text_following: To strengthen the family we must do everything we can to keep the teen pregnancy rate going down

text_original: To strengthen the family we must do everything we can to keep the teen pregnancy rate going down
text_preceding: That is the only way we can make real welfare for american people
text_following: I am gratified, as I'm sure all Americans are, that it has dropped for two years in a row

text_original: I am gratified, as I'm sure all Americans are, that it has dropped for two years in a row
text_preceding: To strengthen the family we must do everything we can to keep the teen pregnancy rate going down
text_following: But we all know it is still far too high

text_original: But we all know it is still far too high
text_preceding: I am gratified, as I'm sure all Americans are, that it has dropped for two years in a row
text_following: Tonight I am pleased to announce that a group of prominent Americans is responding to that challenge by forming an organization that will support grass-roots community efforts all across our country in a national campaign against teen pregnancy

text_original: Tonight I am pleased to announce that a group of prominent Americans is responding to that challenge by forming an organization that will support grass-roots community efforts all across our country in a national campaign against teen pregnancy
text_preceding: But we all know it is still far too high

text_preceding: Tonight I am pleased to announce that a group of prominent Americans is responding to that challenge by forming an organization that will support grass-roots community efforts all across our country in a national campaign against teen pregnancy
text_following: I call on American men and women in families to give greater respect to one another

text_original: I call on American men and women in families to give greater respect to one another
text_preceding: And I challenge all of us and every American to join their efforts
text_following: We must end the deadly scourge of domestic violence in our country

text_original: We must end the deadly scourge of domestic violence in our country
text_preceding: I call on American men and women in families to give greater respect to one another
text_following: And I challenge America's families to work harder to stay together

text_original: And I challenge America's families to work harder to stay together
text_preceding: We must end the deadly scourge of domestic violence in our country
text_following: For families who stay together not only do better economically, their children do better as well

text_original: For families who stay together not only do better economically, their children do better as well
text_preceding: And I challenge America's families to work harder to stay together
text_following: In particular, I challenge the fathers of this country to love and care for their children

text_original: In particular, I challenge the fathers of this country to love and care for their children
text_preceding: For families who stay together not only do better economically, their children do better as well
text_following: If your family has separated, you must pay your child support

text_original: If your family has separated, you must pay your child support
text_preceding: In particular, I challenge the fathers of this country to love and care for their children
text_following: We are doing more than ever to make sure you do, and we're going to do more, but let's all admit something about that, too: A check will not substitute for a parent's love and guidance

text_original: We are doing more than ever to make sure you do, and we're going to do more, but let's all admit something about that, too: A check will not substitute for a parent's love and guidance
text_preceding: If your family has separated, you must pay your child support
text_following: And only you -- only you can make the decision to help raise your children

text_following: No matter who you are, how low or high your station in life, it is the most basic human duty of every American to do that job to the best of his or her ability

text_original: No matter who you are, how low or high your station in life, it is the most basic human duty of every American to do that job to the best of his or her ability
text_preceding: And only you -- only you can make the decision to help raise your children
text_following: EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES:  Our second challenge is to provide Americans with the educational opportunities we will all need for this new century

text_original: EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES:  Our second challenge is to provide Americans with the educational opportunities we will all need for this new century
text_preceding: No matter who you are, how low or high your station in life, it is the most basic human duty of every American to do that job to the best of his or her ability

text_original: In our schools, every classroom in America must be connected to the information superhighway, with computers and good software, and well-trained teachers

text_preceding: In our schools, every classroom in America must be connected to the information superhighway, with computers and good software, and well-trained teachers

text_preceding: We are working with the telecommunications industry, educators and parents to connect 20 percent of California's classrooms by this spring, and every classroom and every library in the entire United States by the year 2000

text_preceding: Every diploma ought to mean something

text_original: To measure whether schools are meeting those standards
text_preceding: I challenge every community, every school and every state to adopt national standards of excellence

text_following: That's what our Goals 2000 initiative is all about

text_original: That's what our Goals 2000 initiative is all about

text_original: I challenge every state to give all parents the right to choose which public school their children will attend
text_preceding: That's what our Goals 2000 initiative is all about
text_following: And to let teachers form new schools with a charter they can keep only if they do a good job

text_preceding: I challenge every state to give all parents the right to choose which public school their children will attend
text_following: I challenge all our schools to teach character education, to teach good values and good citizenship

text_original: I challenge all our schools to teach character education, to teach good values and good citizenship
text_preceding: And to let teachers form new schools with a charter they can keep only if they do a good job
text_following: And if it means that teenagers will stop killing each other over designer jackets, then our public schools should be able to require their students to wear school uniforms

text_following: I challenge our parents to become their children's first teachers

text_preceding: And if it means that teenagers will stop killing each other over designer jackets, then our public schools should be able to require their students to wear school uniforms

text_original: No program, no teacher, no one else can do that for you
text_preceding: And visit your children's classroom
text_following: My fellow Americans, higher education is more important today than ever before

text_original: My fellow Americans, higher education is more important today than ever before
text_preceding: No program, no teacher, no one else can do that for you
text_following: We've created a new student loan program that's made it easier to borrow and repay those loans, and we have dramatically cut the student loan default rate

text_preceding: We've created a new student loan program that's made it easier to borrow and repay those loans, and we have dramatically cut the student loan default rate

text_preceding: That is something we should all agree on

text_preceding: But I believe it is false economy
text_following: Finally, if our working families are going to succeed in the new economy, they must be able to buy health insurance policies that they do not lose when they change jobs or when someone in their family gets sick

text_original: Finally, if our working families are going to succeed in the new economy, they must be able to buy health insurance policies that they do not lose when they change jobs or when someone in their family gets sick

text_preceding: Finally, if our working families are going to succeed in the new economy, they must be able to buy health insurance policies that they do not lose when they change jobs or when someone in their family gets sick

text_original: We have to do more to make health care available to every American

text_following: The G.I. Bill for workers, tax relief for education and child rearing, pension availability and protection, access to health care, preservation of Medicare and Medicaid -- these things, along with the Family and Medical Leave Act passed in 1993 -- these things will help responsible, hard-working American families to make the most of their own lives

text_original: In New York City murders are down 25percent
text_preceding: Violent crime is coming down all across America

text_preceding: And to our police, I say, our children need you as role models and heroes

text_preceding: I challenge the Congress to keep those laws on the books

text_preceding: From now on, the rule for residents who commit crime and peddle drugs should be one strike and you're out

text_following: We have got to keep more of our young people out of trouble, with prevention strategies not dictated by Washington, but developed in communities

text_preceding: More police and punishment are important, but they're not enough

text_following: We have to believe some basic things

text_original: We have to believe some basic things

text_following: Do you believe we can expand the economy without hurting the environment?

text_original: Do you believe we can expand the economy without hurting the environment?
text_preceding: We have to believe some basic things
text_following: Do you believe we can create more jobs over the long run by cleaning the environment up?

text_original: Do you believe we can create more jobs over the long run by cleaning the environment up?
text_preceding: Do you believe we can expand the economy without hurting the environment?

text_preceding: Do you believe we can create more jobs over the long run by cleaning the environment up?
