text_preceding: We must challenge businesses and communities to take more initiative in protecting the environment, and we have to make it easier for them to do it
text_following: To communities we say: We must strengthen community right-to-know laws requiring polluters to disclose their emissions, but you have to use the information to work with business to cut pollution

text_original: To communities we say: We must strengthen community right-to-know laws requiring polluters to disclose their emissions, but you have to use the information to work with business to cut pollution
text_preceding: To businesses this administration is saying: If you can find a cheaper, more efficient way than government regulations require to meet tough pollution standards, do it -- as long as you do it right
text_following: People do have a right to know that their air and their water are safe

text_original: People do have a right to know that their air and their water are safe
text_preceding: To communities we say: We must strengthen community right-to-know laws requiring polluters to disclose their emissions, but you have to use the information to work with business to cut pollution
text_following: AMERICAN WORLD LEADERSHIP:  Our sixth challenge is to maintain America's leadership in the fight for freedom and peace throughout the world

text_original: AMERICAN WORLD LEADERSHIP:  Our sixth challenge is to maintain America's leadership in the fight for freedom and peace throughout the world
text_preceding: People do have a right to know that their air and their water are safe
text_following: Because of American leadership, more people than ever before live free and at peace

text_original: Because of American leadership, more people than ever before live free and at peace
text_preceding: AMERICAN WORLD LEADERSHIP:  Our sixth challenge is to maintain America's leadership in the fight for freedom and peace throughout the world
text_following: And Americans have known 50 years of prosperity and security

text_original: And Americans have known 50 years of prosperity and security
text_preceding: Because of American leadership, more people than ever before live free and at peace
text_following: We owe thanks especially to our veterans of World War II

text_original: We owe thanks especially to our veterans of World War II
text_preceding: And Americans have known 50 years of prosperity and security
text_following: I would like to say to Senator Bob Dole and to all others in this Chamber who fought in World War II, and to all others on both sides of the aisle who have fought bravely in all our conflicts since: I salute your service, and so do the American people

text_original: I would like to say to Senator Bob Dole and to all others in this Chamber who fought in World War II, and to all others on both sides of the aisle who have fought bravely in all our conflicts since: I salute your service, and so do the American people
text_preceding: We owe thanks especially to our veterans of World War II
text_following: All over the world, even after the Cold War, people still look to us and trust us to help them seek the blessings of peace and freedom

text_original: All over the world, even after the Cold War, people still look to us and trust us to help them seek the blessings of peace and freedom
text_preceding: I would like to say to Senator Bob Dole and to all others in this Chamber who fought in World War II, and to all others on both sides of the aisle who have fought bravely in all our conflicts since: I salute your service, and so do the American people
text_following: But as the Cold War fades into memory, voices of isolation say America should retreat from its responsibilities

text_original: But as the Cold War fades into memory, voices of isolation say America should retreat from its responsibilities
text_preceding: All over the world, even after the Cold War, people still look to us and trust us to help them seek the blessings of peace and freedom
text_following: The threats we face today as Americans respect no nation's borders

text_original: The threats we face today as Americans respect no nation's borders
text_preceding: But as the Cold War fades into memory, voices of isolation say America should retreat from its responsibilities
text_following: Think of them: terrorism, the spread of weapons of mass destruction, organized crime, drug trafficking, ethnic and religious hatred, aggression by rogue states, environmental degradation

text_original: Think of them: terrorism, the spread of weapons of mass destruction, organized crime, drug trafficking, ethnic and religious hatred, aggression by rogue states, environmental degradation
text_preceding: The threats we face today as Americans respect no nation's borders
text_following: If we fail to address these threats today, we will suffer the consequences in all our tomorrows

text_original: If we fail to address these threats today, we will suffer the consequences in all our tomorrows
text_preceding: Think of them: terrorism, the spread of weapons of mass destruction, organized crime, drug trafficking, ethnic and religious hatred, aggression by rogue states, environmental degradation
text_following: Of course, we can't be everywhere

text_original: Of course, we can't be everywhere
text_preceding: If we fail to address these threats today, we will suffer the consequences in all our tomorrows
text_following: Of course, we can't do everything

text_original: Of course, we can't do everything
text_preceding: Of course, we can't be everywhere
text_following: But where our interests and our values are at stake, and where we can make a difference, America must lead

text_original: But where our interests and our values are at stake, and where we can make a difference, America must lead
text_preceding: Of course, we can't do everything
text_following: We must not be the world's policeman

text_original: We must not be the world's policeman
text_preceding: But where our interests and our values are at stake, and where we can make a difference, America must lead
text_following: But we can and should be the world's very best peacemaker

text_original: But we can and should be the world's very best peacemaker
text_preceding: We must not be the world's policeman
text_following: By keeping our military strong, by using diplomacy where we can and force where we must, by working with others to share the risk and the cost of our efforts, America is making a difference for people here and around the world

text_original: By keeping our military strong, by using diplomacy where we can and force where we must, by working with others to share the risk and the cost of our efforts, America is making a difference for people here and around the world
text_preceding: But we can and should be the world's very best peacemaker
text_following: For the first time since the dawn of the nuclear age, there is not a single Russian missile pointed at America's children

text_original: For the first time since the dawn of the nuclear age, there is not a single Russian missile pointed at America's children
text_preceding: By keeping our military strong, by using diplomacy where we can and force where we must, by working with others to share the risk and the cost of our efforts, America is making a difference for people here and around the world
text_following: North Korea has now frozen its dangerous nuclear weapons program

text_original: North Korea has now frozen its dangerous nuclear weapons program
text_preceding: For the first time since the dawn of the nuclear age, there is not a single Russian missile pointed at America's children
text_following: In Haiti, the dictators are gone, democracy has a new day, the flow of desperate refugees to our shores has subsided

text_original: In Haiti, the dictators are gone, democracy has a new day, the flow of desperate refugees to our shores has subsided
text_preceding: North Korea has now frozen its dangerous nuclear weapons program
text_following: Through tougher trade deals for America -- over 80 of them -- we have opened markets abroad, and now exports are at an all-time high, growing faster than imports and creating good American jobs

text_original: Through tougher trade deals for America -- over 80 of them -- we have opened markets abroad, and now exports are at an all-time high, growing faster than imports and creating good American jobs
text_preceding: In Haiti, the dictators are gone, democracy has a new day, the flow of desperate refugees to our shores has subsided
text_following: We stood with those taking risks for peace: In Northern Ireland, where Catholic and Protestant children now tell their parents, violence must never return

text_original: We stood with those taking risks for peace: In Northern Ireland, where Catholic and Protestant children now tell their parents, violence must never return
text_preceding: Through tougher trade deals for America -- over 80 of them -- we have opened markets abroad, and now exports are at an all-time high, growing faster than imports and creating good American jobs
text_following: In the Middle East, where Arabs and Jews who once seemed destined to fight forever now share knowledge and resources, and even dreams

text_original: In the Middle East, where Arabs and Jews who once seemed destined to fight forever now share knowledge and resources, and even dreams
text_preceding: We stood with those taking risks for peace: In Northern Ireland, where Catholic and Protestant children now tell their parents, violence must never return
text_following: And we stood up for peace in Bosnia

text_original: And we stood up for peace in Bosnia
text_preceding: In the Middle East, where Arabs and Jews who once seemed destined to fight forever now share knowledge and resources, and even dreams
text_following: Remember the skeletal prisoners, the mass graves, the campaign to rape and torture, the endless lines of refugees, the threat of a spreading war

text_original: Remember the skeletal prisoners, the mass graves, the campaign to rape and torture, the endless lines of refugees, the threat of a spreading war
text_preceding: And we stood up for peace in Bosnia
text_following: All these threats, all these horrors have now begun to give way to the promise of peace

text_original: All these threats, all these horrors have now begun to give way to the promise of peace
text_preceding: Remember the skeletal prisoners, the mass graves, the campaign to rape and torture, the endless lines of refugees, the threat of a spreading war
text_following: Now, our troops and a strong NATO, together with our new partners from Central Europe and elsewhere, are helping that peace to take hold

text_original: Now, our troops and a strong NATO, together with our new partners from Central Europe and elsewhere, are helping that peace to take hold
text_preceding: All these threats, all these horrors have now begun to give way to the promise of peace
text_following: As all of you know, I was just there with a bipartisan congressional group, and I was so proud not only of what our troops were doing, but of the pride they evidenced in what they were doing

text_original: As all of you know, I was just there with a bipartisan congressional group, and I was so proud not only of what our troops were doing, but of the pride they evidenced in what they were doing
text_preceding: Now, our troops and a strong NATO, together with our new partners from Central Europe and elsewhere, are helping that peace to take hold
text_following: They knew what America's mission in this world is, and they were proud to be carrying it out

text_original: They knew what America's mission in this world is, and they were proud to be carrying it out
text_preceding: As all of you know, I was just there with a bipartisan congressional group, and I was so proud not only of what our troops were doing, but of the pride they evidenced in what they were doing
text_following: Through these efforts, we have enhanced the security of the American people

text_original: Through these efforts, we have enhanced the security of the American people
text_preceding: They knew what America's mission in this world is, and they were proud to be carrying it out
text_following: But make no mistake about it: important challenges remain

text_original: But make no mistake about it: important challenges remain
text_preceding: Through these efforts, we have enhanced the security of the American people
text_following: The START II Treaty with Russia will cut our nuclear stockpiles by another 25 percent

text_original: The START II Treaty with Russia will cut our nuclear stockpiles by another 25 percent
text_preceding: But make no mistake about it: important challenges remain
text_following: I urge the Senate to ratify it -- now

text_original: I urge the Senate to ratify it -- now
text_preceding: The START II Treaty with Russia will cut our nuclear stockpiles by another 25 percent
text_following: We must end the race to create new nuclear weapons by signing a truly comprehensive nuclear test ban treaty -- this year

text_original: We must end the race to create new nuclear weapons by signing a truly comprehensive nuclear test ban treaty -- this year
text_preceding: I urge the Senate to ratify it -- now
text_following: As we remember what happened in the Japanese subway, we can outlaw poison gas forever if the Senate ratifies the Chemical Weapons Convention -- this year

text_original: As we remember what happened in the Japanese subway, we can outlaw poison gas forever if the Senate ratifies the Chemical Weapons Convention -- this year
text_preceding: We must end the race to create new nuclear weapons by signing a truly comprehensive nuclear test ban treaty -- this year
text_following: We can intensify the fight against terrorists and organized criminals at home and abroad if Congress passes the anti-terrorism legislation I proposed after the Oklahoma City bombing -- now

text_original: We can intensify the fight against terrorists and organized criminals at home and abroad if Congress passes the anti-terrorism legislation I proposed after the Oklahoma City bombing -- now
text_preceding: As we remember what happened in the Japanese subway, we can outlaw poison gas forever if the Senate ratifies the Chemical Weapons Convention -- this year
text_following: We can help more people move from hatred to hope all across the world in our own interest if Congress gives us the means to remain the world's leader for peace

text_original: We can help more people move from hatred to hope all across the world in our own interest if Congress gives us the means to remain the world's leader for peace
text_preceding: We can intensify the fight against terrorists and organized criminals at home and abroad if Congress passes the anti-terrorism legislation I proposed after the Oklahoma City bombing -- now
text_following: RE-INVENTING GOVERNMENT:  My fellow Americans, the six challenges I have just discussed are for all of us

text_original: RE-INVENTING GOVERNMENT:  My fellow Americans, the six challenges I have just discussed are for all of us
text_preceding: We can help more people move from hatred to hope all across the world in our own interest if Congress gives us the means to remain the world's leader for peace
text_following: Our seventh challenge is really America's challenge to those of us in this hallowed hall tonight: to reinvent our government and make our democracy work for them

text_original: Our seventh challenge is really America's challenge to those of us in this hallowed hall tonight: to reinvent our government and make our democracy work for them
text_preceding: RE-INVENTING GOVERNMENT:  My fellow Americans, the six challenges I have just discussed are for all of us
text_following: Last year this Congress applied to itself the laws it applies to everyone else

text_original: Last year this Congress applied to itself the laws it applies to everyone else
text_preceding: Our seventh challenge is really America's challenge to those of us in this hallowed hall tonight: to reinvent our government and make our democracy work for them
text_following: This Congress banned gifts and meals from lobbyists

text_original: This Congress banned gifts and meals from lobbyists
text_preceding: Last year this Congress applied to itself the laws it applies to everyone else
text_following: This Congress forced lobbyists to disclose who pays them and what legislation they are trying to pass or kill

text_original: This Congress forced lobbyists to disclose who pays them and what legislation they are trying to pass or kill
text_preceding: This Congress banned gifts and meals from lobbyists
text_following: This Congress did that, and I applaud you for it

text_original: This Congress did that, and I applaud you for it
text_preceding: This Congress forced lobbyists to disclose who pays them and what legislation they are trying to pass or kill
text_following: Now I challenge Congress to go further -- to curb special interest influence in politics by passing the first truly bipartisan campaign reform bill in a generation

text_original: Now I challenge Congress to go further -- to curb special interest influence in politics by passing the first truly bipartisan campaign reform bill in a generation
text_preceding: This Congress did that, and I applaud you for it
text_following: You, Republicans and Democrats alike, can show the American people that we can limit spending and open the airwaves to all candidates

text_original: You, Republicans and Democrats alike, can show the American people that we can limit spending and open the airwaves to all candidates
text_preceding: Now I challenge Congress to go further -- to curb special interest influence in politics by passing the first truly bipartisan campaign reform bill in a generation
text_following: And I also appeal to Congress to pass the line-item veto you promised the American people

text_original: And I also appeal to Congress to pass the line-item veto you promised the American people
text_preceding: You, Republicans and Democrats alike, can show the American people that we can limit spending and open the airwaves to all candidates
text_following: Our administration is working hard to give the American people a government that works better and costs less

text_original: Our administration is working hard to give the American people a government that works better and costs less
text_preceding: And I also appeal to Congress to pass the line-item veto you promised the American people
text_following: Thanks to the work of Vice President Gore, we are eliminating 16,000 pages of unnecessary rules and regulations, shifting more decision-making out of Washington, back to states and local communities

text_original: Thanks to the work of Vice President Gore, we are eliminating 16,000 pages of unnecessary rules and regulations, shifting more decision-making out of Washington, back to states and local communities
text_preceding: Our administration is working hard to give the American people a government that works better and costs less
text_following: As we move into the era of balanced budgets and smaller government, we must work in new ways to enable people to make the most of their own lives

text_original: As we move into the era of balanced budgets and smaller government, we must work in new ways to enable people to make the most of their own lives
text_preceding: Thanks to the work of Vice President Gore, we are eliminating 16,000 pages of unnecessary rules and regulations, shifting more decision-making out of Washington, back to states and local communities
text_following: We are helping America's communities, not with more bureaucracy, but with more opportunities

text_original: We are helping America's communities, not with more bureaucracy, but with more opportunities
text_preceding: As we move into the era of balanced budgets and smaller government, we must work in new ways to enable people to make the most of their own lives
text_following: Through our successful Empowerment Zones and Community Development Banks, we are helping people to find jobs, to start businesses

text_original: Through our successful Empowerment Zones and Community Development Banks, we are helping people to find jobs, to start businesses
text_preceding: We are helping America's communities, not with more bureaucracy, but with more opportunities
text_following: And with tax incentives for companies that clean up abandoned industrial property, we can bring jobs back to places that desperately, desperately need them

text_original: And with tax incentives for companies that clean up abandoned industrial property, we can bring jobs back to places that desperately, desperately need them
text_preceding: Through our successful Empowerment Zones and Community Development Banks, we are helping people to find jobs, to start businesses
text_following: But there are some areas that the federal government should not leave and should address and address strongly

text_original: But there are some areas that the federal government should not leave and should address and address strongly
text_preceding: And with tax incentives for companies that clean up abandoned industrial property, we can bring jobs back to places that desperately, desperately need them
text_following: One of these areas is the problem of illegal immigration

text_original: One of these areas is the problem of illegal immigration
text_preceding: But there are some areas that the federal government should not leave and should address and address strongly
text_following: After years of neglect, this administration has taken a strong stand to stiffen the protection of our borders

text_original: After years of neglect, this administration has taken a strong stand to stiffen the protection of our borders
text_preceding: One of these areas is the problem of illegal immigration
text_following: We are increasing border controls by 50 percent

text_original: We are increasing border controls by 50 percent
text_preceding: After years of neglect, this administration has taken a strong stand to stiffen the protection of our borders
text_following: We are increasing inspections to prevent the hiring of illegal immigrants

text_original: We are increasing inspections to prevent the hiring of illegal immigrants
text_preceding: We are increasing border controls by 50 percent
text_following: And tonight, I announce I will sign an executive order to deny federal contracts to businesses that hire illegal immigrants

text_original: And tonight, I announce I will sign an executive order to deny federal contracts to businesses that hire illegal immigrants
text_preceding: We are increasing inspections to prevent the hiring of illegal immigrants
text_following: Let me be very clear about this: We are still a nation of immigrants

text_original: Let me be very clear about this: We are still a nation of immigrants
text_preceding: And tonight, I announce I will sign an executive order to deny federal contracts to businesses that hire illegal immigrants
text_following: We should honor every legal immigrant here, working hard to become a new citizen

text_original: We should honor every legal immigrant here, working hard to become a new citizen
text_preceding: Let me be very clear about this: We are still a nation of immigrants
text_following: But we are also a nation of laws

text_original: But we are also a nation of laws
text_preceding: We should honor every legal immigrant here, working hard to become a new citizen
text_following: I want to say a special word now to those who work for our federal government

text_original: I want to say a special word now to those who work for our federal government
text_preceding: But we are also a nation of laws
text_following: Today our federal government is 200,000 employees smaller than it was the day I took office as President

text_original: Today our federal government is 200,000 employees smaller than it was the day I took office as President
text_preceding: I want to say a special word now to those who work for our federal government
text_following: Our federal government today is the smallest it has been in 30 years, and it's getting smaller every day

text_original: Our federal government today is the smallest it has been in 30 years, and it's getting smaller every day
text_preceding: Today our federal government is 200,000 employees smaller than it was the day I took office as President
text_following: Most of our fellow Americans probably don't know that

text_original: Most of our fellow Americans probably don't know that
text_preceding: Our federal government today is the smallest it has been in 30 years, and it's getting smaller every day
text_following: And there is a good reason: The remaining federal work force is composed of Americans who are now working harder and working smarter than ever before, to make sure the quality of our services does not decline

text_original: And there is a good reason: The remaining federal work force is composed of Americans who are now working harder and working smarter than ever before, to make sure the quality of our services does not decline
text_preceding: Most of our fellow Americans probably don't know that
text_following: I'd like to give you one example

text_original: I'd like to give you one example
text_preceding: And there is a good reason: The remaining federal work force is composed of Americans who are now working harder and working smarter than ever before, to make sure the quality of our services does not decline
text_following: He is a 49 year-old Vietnam veteran who's worked for the Social Security Administration for 22 years now

text_original: He is a 49 year-old Vietnam veteran who's worked for the Social Security Administration for 22 years now
text_preceding: I'd like to give you one example
text_following: Last year he was hard at work in the Federal Building in Oklahoma City when the blast killed 169 people and brought the rubble down all around him

text_original: Last year he was hard at work in the Federal Building in Oklahoma City when the blast killed 169 people and brought the rubble down all around him
text_preceding: He is a 49 year-old Vietnam veteran who's worked for the Social Security Administration for 22 years now
text_following: He reentered that building four times

text_original: He reentered that building four times
text_preceding: Last year he was hard at work in the Federal Building in Oklahoma City when the blast killed 169 people and brought the rubble down all around him
text_following: He saved the lives of three women

text_original: He saved the lives of three women
text_preceding: He reentered that building four times
text_following: He's here with us this evening, and I want to recognize Richard and applaud both his public service and his extraordinary personal heroism

text_original: He's here with us this evening, and I want to recognize Richard and applaud both his public service and his extraordinary personal heroism
text_preceding: He saved the lives of three women
text_following: But Richard Dean's story doesn't end there

text_original: But Richard Dean's story doesn't end there
text_preceding: He's here with us this evening, and I want to recognize Richard and applaud both his public service and his extraordinary personal heroism
text_following: This last November, he was forced out of his office when the government shut down

text_original: This last November, he was forced out of his office when the government shut down
text_preceding: But Richard Dean's story doesn't end there
text_following: And the second time the government shut down he continued helping Social Security recipients, but he was working without pay

text_original: And the second time the government shut down he continued helping Social Security recipients, but he was working without pay
text_preceding: This last November, he was forced out of his office when the government shut down
text_following: On behalf of Richard Dean and his family, and all the other people who are out there working every day doing a good job for the American people, I challenge all of you in this Chamber: Never, ever shut the federal government down again

text_original: On behalf of Richard Dean and his family, and all the other people who are out there working every day doing a good job for the American people, I challenge all of you in this Chamber: Never, ever shut the federal government down again
text_preceding: And the second time the government shut down he continued helping Social Security recipients, but he was working without pay
text_following: On behalf of all Americans, especially those who need their Social Security payments at the beginning of March, I also challenge the Congress to preserve the full faith and credit of the United States -- to honor the obligations of this great nation as we have for 220 years

text_original: On behalf of all Americans, especially those who need their Social Security payments at the beginning of March, I also challenge the Congress to preserve the full faith and credit of the United States -- to honor the obligations of this great nation as we have for 220 years
text_preceding: On behalf of Richard Dean and his family, and all the other people who are out there working every day doing a good job for the American people, I challenge all of you in this Chamber: Never, ever shut the federal government down again
text_following: To rise above partisanship and pass a straightforward extension of the debt limit and show people America keeps its word

text_original: To rise above partisanship and pass a straightforward extension of the debt limit and show people America keeps its word
text_preceding: On behalf of all Americans, especially those who need their Social Security payments at the beginning of March, I also challenge the Congress to preserve the full faith and credit of the United States -- to honor the obligations of this great nation as we have for 220 years
text_following: I know that this evening I have asked a lot of Congress, and even more from America

text_original: I know that this evening I have asked a lot of Congress, and even more from America
text_preceding: To rise above partisanship and pass a straightforward extension of the debt limit and show people America keeps its word
text_following: But I am confident: When Americans work together in their homes, their schools, their churches, their synagogues, their civic groups, their workplace, they can meet any challenge

text_original: But I am confident: When Americans work together in their homes, their schools, their churches, their synagogues, their civic groups, their workplace, they can meet any challenge
text_preceding: I know that this evening I have asked a lot of Congress, and even more from America
text_following: TORCH OF CITIZENSHIP:  I say again: the era of big government is over

text_original: TORCH OF CITIZENSHIP:  I say again: the era of big government is over
text_preceding: But I am confident: When Americans work together in their homes, their schools, their churches, their synagogues, their civic groups, their workplace, they can meet any challenge
text_following: But we can't go back to the era of fending for yourself

text_original: But we can't go back to the era of fending for yourself
text_preceding: TORCH OF CITIZENSHIP:  I say again: the era of big government is over
text_following: We have to go forward to the era of working together as a community, as a team, as one America, with all of us reaching across these lines that divide us -- the division, the discrimination, the rancor -- we have to reach across it to find common ground

text_original: We have to go forward to the era of working together as a community, as a team, as one America, with all of us reaching across these lines that divide us -- the division, the discrimination, the rancor -- we have to reach across it to find common ground
text_preceding: But we can't go back to the era of fending for yourself
text_following: We have got to work together if we want America to work

text_original: We have got to work together if we want America to work
text_preceding: We have to go forward to the era of working together as a community, as a team, as one America, with all of us reaching across these lines that divide us -- the division, the discrimination, the rancor -- we have to reach across it to find common ground
text_following: I want you to meet two more people tonight who do just that

text_original: I want you to meet two more people tonight who do just that
text_preceding: We have got to work together if we want America to work
text_following: Lucius Wright is a teacher in the Jackson, Mississippi, public school system

text_original: Lucius Wright is a teacher in the Jackson, Mississippi, public school system

text_following: A Vietnam veteran, he has created groups to help inner-city children turn away from gangs and build futures they can believe in

text_preceding: Lucius Wright is a teacher in the Jackson, Mississippi, public school system

text_preceding: A Vietnam veteran, he has created groups to help inner-city children turn away from gangs and build futures they can believe in
text_following: Like Richard Dean, she helped to pull her fellow citizens out of the rubble and deal with that awful tragedy

text_original: Like Richard Dean, she helped to pull her fellow citizens out of the rubble and deal with that awful tragedy
text_preceding: And Sergeant Jennifer Rodgers is a police officer in Oklahoma City
text_following: She reminds us that in their response to that atrocity the people of Oklahoma City lifted all of us with their basic sense of decency and community

text_original: She reminds us that in their response to that atrocity the people of Oklahoma City lifted all of us with their basic sense of decency and community
text_preceding: Like Richard Dean, she helped to pull her fellow citizens out of the rubble and deal with that awful tragedy
text_following: Lucius Wright and Jennifer Rodgers are special Americans

text_preceding: She reminds us that in their response to that atrocity the people of Oklahoma City lifted all of us with their basic sense of decency and community
text_following: And I have the honor to announce tonight that they are the very first of several thousand Americans who will be chosen to carry the Olympic torch on its long journey from Los Angeles to the centennial of the modern Olympics in Atlanta this summer -- not because they are star athletes, but because they are star citizens, community heroes meeting America's challenges

text_preceding: Lucius Wright and Jennifer Rodgers are special Americans
text_following: Now, each of us must hold high the torch of citizenship in our own lives

text_original: Now, each of us must hold high the torch of citizenship in our own lives

text_following: None of us can finish the race alone

text_original: None of us can finish the race alone
text_preceding: Now, each of us must hold high the torch of citizenship in our own lives
text_following: We can only achieve our destiny together -- one hand, one generation, one American connecting to another

text_original: We can only achieve our destiny together -- one hand, one generation, one American connecting to another
text_preceding: None of us can finish the race alone
text_following: There have always been things we could do together -- dreams we could make real -- which we could never have done on our own

text_original: There have always been things we could do together -- dreams we could make real -- which we could never have done on our own
text_preceding: We can only achieve our destiny together -- one hand, one generation, one American connecting to another
text_following: We Americans have forged our identity, our very union, from every point of view and every point on the planet, every different opinion

text_original: We Americans have forged our identity, our very union, from every point of view and every point on the planet, every different opinion
text_preceding: There have always been things we could do together -- dreams we could make real -- which we could never have done on our own
text_following: But we must be bound together by a faith more powerful than any doctrine that divides us -- by our belief in progress, our love of liberty, and our relentless search for common ground

text_original: But we must be bound together by a faith more powerful than any doctrine that divides us -- by our belief in progress, our love of liberty, and our relentless search for common ground
text_preceding: We Americans have forged our identity, our very union, from every point of view and every point on the planet, every different opinion
text_following: America has always sought and always risen to every challenge

text_original: America has always sought and always risen to every challenge
text_preceding: But we must be bound together by a faith more powerful than any doctrine that divides us -- by our belief in progress, our love of liberty, and our relentless search for common ground
text_following: Who would say that, having come so far together, we will not go forward from here?

text_original: Who would say that, having come so far together, we will not go forward from here?
text_preceding: America has always sought and always risen to every challenge
text_following: Who would say that this age of possibility is not for all Americans?

text_original: Who would say that this age of possibility is not for all Americans?
text_preceding: Who would say that, having come so far together, we will not go forward from here?
text_following: Our country is and always has been a great and good nation

text_original: Our country is and always has been a great and good nation
text_preceding: Who would say that this age of possibility is not for all Americans?
text_following: But the best is yet to come, if we all do our part

text_original: But the best is yet to come, if we all do our part
text_preceding: Our country is and always has been a great and good nation
text_following: Thank you, God bless you and God bless the United States of America

text_original: Thank you, God bless you and God bless the United States of America
text_preceding: But the best is yet to come, if we all do our part

text_original: I thank you for your invitation to speak here tonight.
text_following: I know Congress had to formally invite me, and it could have been a close vote.

text_original: I know Congress had to formally invite me, and it could have been a close vote.
text_preceding: I thank you for your invitation to speak here tonight.
text_following: So, Mr. Vice President, I appreciate you being here to break the tie.

text_original: So, Mr. Vice President, I appreciate you being here to break the tie.
text_preceding: I know Congress had to formally invite me, and it could have been a close vote.
text_following: I want to thank so many of you who have accepted my invitation to come to the White House to discuss important issues.

text_original: I want to thank so many of you who have accepted my invitation to come to the White House to discuss important issues.
text_preceding: So, Mr. Vice President, I appreciate you being here to break the tie.
text_following: I will continue to meet with you and ask for your input.

text_original: I will continue to meet with you and ask for your input.
text_preceding: I want to thank so many of you who have accepted my invitation to come to the White House to discuss important issues.
text_following: You have been kind and candid, and I thank you for making a new President feel welcome.

text_original: You have been kind and candid, and I thank you for making a new President feel welcome.
text_preceding: I will continue to meet with you and ask for your input.
text_following: The last time I visited the Capitol, I came to take an oath on the steps of this building.

text_original: The last time I visited the Capitol, I came to take an oath on the steps of this building.
text_preceding: You have been kind and candid, and I thank you for making a new President feel welcome.
text_following: On the steps of this building, I pledged to honor our Constitution and laws.

text_original: On the steps of this building, I pledged to honor our Constitution and laws.
text_preceding: The last time I visited the Capitol, I came to take an oath on the steps of this building.
text_following: And I asked you to join me in setting a tone of civility and respect in Washington.

text_original: And I asked you to join me in setting a tone of civility and respect in Washington.
text_preceding: On the steps of this building, I pledged to honor our Constitution and laws.
text_following: I hope America is noticing the difference, because we're making progress.

text_original: I hope America is noticing the difference, because we're making progress.
text_preceding: And I asked you to join me in setting a tone of civility and respect in Washington.
text_following: Together, we are changing the tone in the Nation's Capital.

text_original: Together, we are changing the tone in the Nation's Capital.
text_preceding: I hope America is noticing the difference, because we're making progress.
text_following: And this spirit of respect and cooperation is vital, because, in the end, we will be judged not only by what we say or how we say it, we will be judged by what we're able to accomplish.

text_original: And this spirit of respect and cooperation is vital, because, in the end, we will be judged not only by what we say or how we say it, we will be judged by what we're able to accomplish.
text_preceding: Together, we are changing the tone in the Nation's Capital.
text_following: America today is a nation with great challenges, but greater resources.

text_original: America today is a nation with great challenges, but greater resources.
text_preceding: And this spirit of respect and cooperation is vital, because, in the end, we will be judged not only by what we say or how we say it, we will be judged by what we're able to accomplish.
text_following: An artist using statistics as a brush could paint two very different pictures of our country.

text_original: An artist using statistics as a brush could paint two very different pictures of our country.
text_preceding: America today is a nation with great challenges, but greater resources.
text_following: One would have warning signs: increasing layoffs, rising energy prices, too many failing schools, persistent poverty, the stubborn vestiges of racism.

text_original: One would have warning signs: increasing layoffs, rising energy prices, too many failing schools, persistent poverty, the stubborn vestiges of racism.
text_preceding: An artist using statistics as a brush could paint two very different pictures of our country.
text_following: Another picture would be full of blessings: a balanced budget, big surpluses, a military that is second to none, a country at peace with its neighbors, technology that is revolutionizing the world, and our greatest strength -- concerned citizens who care for our country and care for each other.

text_original: Another picture would be full of blessings: a balanced budget, big surpluses, a military that is second to none, a country at peace with its neighbors, technology that is revolutionizing the world, and our greatest strength -- concerned citizens who care for our country and care for each other.
text_preceding: One would have warning signs: increasing layoffs, rising energy prices, too many failing schools, persistent poverty, the stubborn vestiges of racism.
text_following: Neither picture is complete in and of itself.

text_original: Neither picture is complete in and of itself.
text_preceding: Another picture would be full of blessings: a balanced budget, big surpluses, a military that is second to none, a country at peace with its neighbors, technology that is revolutionizing the world, and our greatest strength -- concerned citizens who care for our country and care for each other.
text_following: And tonight I challenge and invite Congress to work with me to use the resources of one picture to repaint the other.

text_original: And tonight I challenge and invite Congress to work with me to use the resources of one picture to repaint the other.
text_preceding: Neither picture is complete in and of itself.
text_following: To direct the advantages of our time to solve the problems of our people.

text_original: To direct the advantages of our time to solve the problems of our people.
text_preceding: And tonight I challenge and invite Congress to work with me to use the resources of one picture to repaint the other.
text_following: Some of these resources will come from government.

text_original: Some of these resources will come from government.
text_preceding: To direct the advantages of our time to solve the problems of our people.
text_following: Year after year in Washington, budget debates seem to come down to an old, tired argument: on one side, those who want more government, regardless of the cost.

text_original: Year after year in Washington, budget debates seem to come down to an old, tired argument: on one side, those who want more government, regardless of the cost.
text_preceding: Some of these resources will come from government.
text_following: On the other, those who want less government, regardless of the need.

text_original: On the other, those who want less government, regardless of the need.
text_preceding: Year after year in Washington, budget debates seem to come down to an old, tired argument: on one side, those who want more government, regardless of the cost.
text_following: We should leave those arguments to the last century, and chart a different course.

text_original: We should leave those arguments to the last century, and chart a different course.
text_preceding: On the other, those who want less government, regardless of the need.
text_following: Government has a role, and an important role.

text_original: Government has a role, and an important role.
text_preceding: We should leave those arguments to the last century, and chart a different course.
text_following: Yet, too much government crowds out initiative and hard work, private charity and the private economy.

text_original: Yet, too much government crowds out initiative and hard work, private charity and the private economy.
text_preceding: Government has a role, and an important role.
text_following: Our new governing vision says government should be active, but limited.

text_original: Our new governing vision says government should be active, but limited.
text_preceding: Yet, too much government crowds out initiative and hard work, private charity and the private economy.
text_following: And my budget is based on that philosophy.

text_original: And my budget is based on that philosophy.
text_preceding: Our new governing vision says government should be active, but limited.
text_following: It is reasonable, and it is responsible.

text_original: It is reasonable, and it is responsible.
text_preceding: And my budget is based on that philosophy.
text_following: It meets our obligations, and funds our growing needs.

text_original: It meets our obligations, and funds our growing needs.
text_preceding: It is reasonable, and it is responsible.
text_following: We increase spending next year for Social Security and Medicare, and other entitlement programs, by $81 billion.

text_original: We increase spending next year for Social Security and Medicare, and other entitlement programs, by $81 billion.
text_preceding: It meets our obligations, and funds our growing needs.
text_following: We've increased spending for discretionary programs by a very responsible 4 percent, above the rate of inflation.

text_original: We've increased spending for discretionary programs by a very responsible 4 percent, above the rate of inflation.
text_preceding: We increase spending next year for Social Security and Medicare, and other entitlement programs, by $81 billion.
text_following: My plan pays down an unprecedented amount of our national debt.

text_original: My plan pays down an unprecedented amount of our national debt.
text_preceding: We've increased spending for discretionary programs by a very responsible 4 percent, above the rate of inflation.
text_following: And then, when money is still left over, my plan returns it to the people who earned it in the first place.

text_original: And then, when money is still left over, my plan returns it to the people who earned it in the first place.
text_preceding: My plan pays down an unprecedented amount of our national debt.
text_following: A budget's impact is counted in dollars, but measured in lives.

text_original: A budget's impact is counted in dollars, but measured in lives.
text_preceding: And then, when money is still left over, my plan returns it to the people who earned it in the first place.
text_following: Excellent schools, quality health care, a secure retirement, a cleaner environment, a stronger defense -- these are all important needs, and we fund them.

text_original: Excellent schools, quality health care, a secure retirement, a cleaner environment, a stronger defense -- these are all important needs, and we fund them.
text_preceding: A budget's impact is counted in dollars, but measured in lives.
text_following: The highest percentage increase in our budget should go to our children's education.

text_original: The highest percentage increase in our budget should go to our children's education.
text_preceding: Excellent schools, quality health care, a secure retirement, a cleaner environment, a stronger defense -- these are all important needs, and we fund them.
text_following: Education is not my top priority -- education is my top priority and, by supporting this budget, you'll make it yours, as well.

text_original: Education is not my top priority -- education is my top priority and, by supporting this budget, you'll make it yours, as well.
text_preceding: The highest percentage increase in our budget should go to our children's education.
text_following: Reading is the foundation of all learning.

text_original: Reading is the foundation of all learning.
text_preceding: Education is not my top priority -- education is my top priority and, by supporting this budget, you'll make it yours, as well.
text_following: So during the next five years, we triple spending, adding $5 billion to help every child in America learn to read.

text_original: So during the next five years, we triple spending, adding $5 billion to help every child in America learn to read.
text_preceding: Reading is the foundation of all learning.
text_following: Values are important, so we've tripled funding for character education to teach our children not only reading and writing, but right from wrong.

text_original: Values are important, so we've tripled funding for character education to teach our children not only reading and writing, but right from wrong.
text_preceding: So during the next five years, we triple spending, adding $5 billion to help every child in America learn to read.
text_following: We've increased funding to train and recruit teachers, because we know a good education starts with a good teacher.

text_original: We've increased funding to train and recruit teachers, because we know a good education starts with a good teacher.
text_preceding: Values are important, so we've tripled funding for character education to teach our children not only reading and writing, but right from wrong.
text_following: And I have a wonderful partner in this effort.

text_original: And I have a wonderful partner in this effort.
text_preceding: We've increased funding to train and recruit teachers, because we know a good education starts with a good teacher.
text_following: I like teachers so much, I married one.

text_original: I like teachers so much, I married one.
text_preceding: And I have a wonderful partner in this effort.
text_following: Laura has begun a new effort to recruit Americans to the profession that will shape our future -- teaching.

text_original: Laura has begun a new effort to recruit Americans to the profession that will shape our future -- teaching.
text_preceding: I like teachers so much, I married one.
text_following: She will travel across America to promote sound teaching practices and early reading skills in our schools and in programs such as Head Start.

text_original: She will travel across America to promote sound teaching practices and early reading skills in our schools and in programs such as Head Start.
text_preceding: Laura has begun a new effort to recruit Americans to the profession that will shape our future -- teaching.
text_following: When it comes to our schools, dollars alone do not always make the difference.

text_original: When it comes to our schools, dollars alone do not always make the difference.
text_preceding: She will travel across America to promote sound teaching practices and early reading skills in our schools and in programs such as Head Start.
text_following: Funding is important, and so is reform.

text_original: Funding is important, and so is reform.
text_preceding: When it comes to our schools, dollars alone do not always make the difference.
text_following: So we must tie funding to higher standards and accountability for results.

text_original: So we must tie funding to higher standards and accountability for results.
text_preceding: Funding is important, and so is reform.
text_following: I believe in local control of schools.

text_original: I believe in local control of schools.
text_preceding: So we must tie funding to higher standards and accountability for results.
text_following: We should not, and we will not, run public schools from Washington, D.C.

text_original: We should not, and we will not, run public schools from Washington, D.C.
text_preceding: I believe in local control of schools.
text_following: Yet when the federal government spends tax dollars, we must insist on results.

text_original: Yet when the federal government spends tax dollars, we must insist on results.
text_preceding: We should not, and we will not, run public schools from Washington, D.C.
text_following: Children should be tested on basic reading and math skills every year between grades three and eight.

text_original: Children should be tested on basic reading and math skills every year between grades three and eight.
text_preceding: Yet when the federal government spends tax dollars, we must insist on results.
text_following: Measuring is the only way to know whether all our children are learning.

text_original: Measuring is the only way to know whether all our children are learning.
text_preceding: Children should be tested on basic reading and math skills every year between grades three and eight.
text_following: And I want to know, because I refuse to leave any child behind in America.

text_original: And I want to know, because I refuse to leave any child behind in America.
text_preceding: Measuring is the only way to know whether all our children are learning.
text_following: Critics of testing contend it distracts from learning.

text_original: Critics of testing contend it distracts from learning.
text_preceding: And I want to know, because I refuse to leave any child behind in America.
text_following: They talk about teaching to the test.

text_original: They talk about teaching to the test.
text_preceding: Critics of testing contend it distracts from learning.
text_following: But let's put that logic to the test.

text_original: But let's put that logic to the test.
text_preceding: They talk about teaching to the test.
text_following: If you test a child on basic math and reading skills, and you're teaching to the test, you're teaching math and reading.

text_original: If you test a child on basic math and reading skills, and you're teaching to the test, you're teaching math and reading.
text_preceding: But let's put that logic to the test.
text_following: As standards rise, local schools will need more flexibility to meet them.

text_original: As standards rise, local schools will need more flexibility to meet them.
text_preceding: If you test a child on basic math and reading skills, and you're teaching to the test, you're teaching math and reading.
text_following: So we must streamline the dozens of federal education programs into five, and let states spend money in those categories as they see fit.

text_original: So we must streamline the dozens of federal education programs into five, and let states spend money in those categories as they see fit.
text_preceding: As standards rise, local schools will need more flexibility to meet them.
text_following: Schools will be given a reasonable chance to improve and the support to do so.

text_original: Schools will be given a reasonable chance to improve and the support to do so.
text_preceding: So we must streamline the dozens of federal education programs into five, and let states spend money in those categories as they see fit.
text_following: Yet, if they don't, if they continue to fail, we must give parents and students different options -- a better public school, a private school, tutoring or a charter school.

text_original: Yet, if they don't, if they continue to fail, we must give parents and students different options -- a better public school, a private school, tutoring or a charter school.
text_preceding: Schools will be given a reasonable chance to improve and the support to do so.
text_following: In the end, every child in a bad situation must be given a better choice because, when it comes to our children, failure is simply not an option.

text_original: In the end, every child in a bad situation must be given a better choice because, when it comes to our children, failure is simply not an option.
text_preceding: Yet, if they don't, if they continue to fail, we must give parents and students different options -- a better public school, a private school, tutoring or a charter school.
text_following: Another priority in my budget is to keep the vital promises of Medicare and Social Security, and together we will do so.

text_original: Another priority in my budget is to keep the vital promises of Medicare and Social Security, and together we will do so.
text_preceding: In the end, every child in a bad situation must be given a better choice because, when it comes to our children, failure is simply not an option.
text_following: To meet the health care needs of all America's seniors, we double the Medicare budget over the next 10 years.

text_original: To meet the health care needs of all America's seniors, we double the Medicare budget over the next 10 years.
text_preceding: Another priority in my budget is to keep the vital promises of Medicare and Social Security, and together we will do so.
text_following: My budget dedicates $238 billion to Medicare next year alone, enough to fund all current programs and to begin a new prescription drug benefit for low-income seniors.

text_original: My budget dedicates $238 billion to Medicare next year alone, enough to fund all current programs and to begin a new prescription drug benefit for low-income seniors.
text_preceding: To meet the health care needs of all America's seniors, we double the Medicare budget over the next 10 years.
text_following: No senior in America should have to choose between buying food and buying prescriptions.

text_original: No senior in America should have to choose between buying food and buying prescriptions.
text_preceding: My budget dedicates $238 billion to Medicare next year alone, enough to fund all current programs and to begin a new prescription drug benefit for low-income seniors.
text_following: To make sure the retirement savings of America's seniors are not diverted in any other program, my budget protects all $2.6 trillion of the Social Security surplus for Social Security, and for Social Security alone.

text_original: To make sure the retirement savings of America's seniors are not diverted in any other program, my budget protects all $2.6 trillion of the Social Security surplus for Social Security, and for Social Security alone.
text_preceding: No senior in America should have to choose between buying food and buying prescriptions.
text_following: My budget puts a priority on access to health care, without telling Americans what doctor they have to see or what coverage they must choose.

text_original: My budget puts a priority on access to health care, without telling Americans what doctor they have to see or what coverage they must choose.
text_preceding: To make sure the retirement savings of America's seniors are not diverted in any other program, my budget protects all $2.6 trillion of the Social Security surplus for Social Security, and for Social Security alone.
text_following: Many working Americans do not have health care coverage, so we will help them buy their own insurance with refundable tax credits.

text_original: Many working Americans do not have health care coverage, so we will help them buy their own insurance with refundable tax credits.
text_preceding: My budget puts a priority on access to health care, without telling Americans what doctor they have to see or what coverage they must choose.
text_following: And to provide quality care in low-income neighborhoods, over the next five years we will double the number of people served at community health care centers.

text_original: And to provide quality care in low-income neighborhoods, over the next five years we will double the number of people served at community health care centers.
text_preceding: Many working Americans do not have health care coverage, so we will help them buy their own insurance with refundable tax credits.
text_following: And we will address the concerns of those who have health coverage, yet worry their insurance company doesn't care and won't pay.

text_original: And we will address the concerns of those who have health coverage, yet worry their insurance company doesn't care and won't pay.
text_preceding: And to provide quality care in low-income neighborhoods, over the next five years we will double the number of people served at community health care centers.
text_following: Together this Congress and this President will find common ground to make sure doctors make medical decisions, and patients get the health care they deserve with a patients' bill of rights.

text_original: Together this Congress and this President will find common ground to make sure doctors make medical decisions, and patients get the health care they deserve with a patients' bill of rights.
text_preceding: And we will address the concerns of those who have health coverage, yet worry their insurance company doesn't care and won't pay.
text_following: When it comes to their health, people want to get the medical care they need, not be forced to go to court because they didn't get it.

text_original: When it comes to their health, people want to get the medical care they need, not be forced to go to court because they didn't get it.
text_preceding: Together this Congress and this President will find common ground to make sure doctors make medical decisions, and patients get the health care they deserve with a patients' bill of rights.
text_following: We will ensure access to the courts for those with legitimate claims.

text_original: We will ensure access to the courts for those with legitimate claims.
text_preceding: When it comes to their health, people want to get the medical care they need, not be forced to go to court because they didn't get it.
text_following: But first, let's put in place a strong, independent review  so we promote quality health care, not frivolous lawsuits.

text_original: But first, let's put in place a strong, independent review  so we promote quality health care, not frivolous lawsuits.
text_preceding: We will ensure access to the courts for those with legitimate claims.
text_following: My budget also increases funding for medical research, which gives hope to many who struggle with serious disease.

text_original: My budget also increases funding for medical research, which gives hope to many who struggle with serious disease.
text_preceding: But first, let's put in place a strong, independent review  so we promote quality health care, not frivolous lawsuits.
text_following: Our prayers tonight are with one of your own who is engaged in his own fight against cancer -- a fine representative, and a good man, Congressman Joe Moakley.

text_original: Our prayers tonight are with one of your own who is engaged in his own fight against cancer -- a fine representative, and a good man, Congressman Joe Moakley.
text_preceding: My budget also increases funding for medical research, which gives hope to many who struggle with serious disease.
text_following: And I can think of no more appropriate tribute to Joe than to have the Congress finish the job of doubling the budget for the National Institutes of Health.

text_original: And I can think of no more appropriate tribute to Joe than to have the Congress finish the job of doubling the budget for the National Institutes of Health.
text_preceding: Our prayers tonight are with one of your own who is engaged in his own fight against cancer -- a fine representative, and a good man, Congressman Joe Moakley.
text_following: My new Freedom Initiative for Americans with Disabilities funds new technologies, expands opportunities to work, and makes our society more welcoming.

text_original: My new Freedom Initiative for Americans with Disabilities funds new technologies, expands opportunities to work, and makes our society more welcoming.
text_preceding: And I can think of no more appropriate tribute to Joe than to have the Congress finish the job of doubling the budget for the National Institutes of Health.
text_following: For the more than 50 million Americans with disabilities, we need to break down barriers to equality.

text_original: For the more than 50 million Americans with disabilities, we need to break down barriers to equality.
text_preceding: My new Freedom Initiative for Americans with Disabilities funds new technologies, expands opportunities to work, and makes our society more welcoming.
text_following: The budget I propose to you also supports the people who keep our country strong and free, the men and women who serve in the United States military.

text_original: The budget I propose to you also supports the people who keep our country strong and free, the men and women who serve in the United States military.
text_preceding: For the more than 50 million Americans with disabilities, we need to break down barriers to equality.
text_following: I'm requesting $5.7 billion in increased military pay and benefits, and health care and housing.

text_original: I'm requesting $5.7 billion in increased military pay and benefits, and health care and housing.
text_preceding: The budget I propose to you also supports the people who keep our country strong and free, the men and women who serve in the United States military.
text_following: Our men and women in uniform give America their best and we owe them our support.

text_original: Our men and women in uniform give America their best and we owe them our support.
text_preceding: I'm requesting $5.7 billion in increased military pay and benefits, and health care and housing.
text_following: America's veterans honored their commitment to our country through their military service.

text_original: America's veterans honored their commitment to our country through their military service.
text_preceding: Our men and women in uniform give America their best and we owe them our support.
text_following: I will honor our commitment to them with a million-dollar increase to ensure better access to quality care and faster decisions on benefit claims.

text_original: I will honor our commitment to them with a million-dollar increase to ensure better access to quality care and faster decisions on benefit claims.
text_preceding: America's veterans honored their commitment to our country through their military service.
text_following: My budget will improve our environment by accelerating the cleanup of toxic brownfields.

text_original: My budget will improve our environment by accelerating the cleanup of toxic brownfields.
text_preceding: I will honor our commitment to them with a million-dollar increase to ensure better access to quality care and faster decisions on benefit claims.
text_following: And I propose we make a major investment in conservation by fully funding the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

text_original: And I propose we make a major investment in conservation by fully funding the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
text_preceding: My budget will improve our environment by accelerating the cleanup of toxic brownfields.
text_following: Our national parks have a special place in our country's life.

text_original: Our national parks have a special place in our country's life.
text_preceding: And I propose we make a major investment in conservation by fully funding the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
text_following: Our parks are places of great natural beauty and history.

text_original: Our parks are places of great natural beauty and history.
text_preceding: Our national parks have a special place in our country's life.
text_following: As good stewards, we must leave them better than we found them.

text_original: As good stewards, we must leave them better than we found them.
text_preceding: Our parks are places of great natural beauty and history.
text_following: So I propose providing $4.9 billion over five years for the upkeep of these national treasures.

text_original: So I propose providing $4.9 billion over five years for the upkeep of these national treasures.
text_preceding: As good stewards, we must leave them better than we found them.
text_following: And my budget adopts a hopeful new approach to help the poor and the disadvantaged.

text_original: And my budget adopts a hopeful new approach to help the poor and the disadvantaged.
text_preceding: So I propose providing $4.9 billion over five years for the upkeep of these national treasures.
text_following: We must encourage and support the work of charities and faith-based and community groups that offer help and love one person at a time.

text_original: We must encourage and support the work of charities and faith-based and community groups that offer help and love one person at a time.
text_preceding: And my budget adopts a hopeful new approach to help the poor and the disadvantaged.
text_following: These groups are working in every neighborhood in America to fight homelessness and addiction and domestic violence.

text_original: These groups are working in every neighborhood in America to fight homelessness and addiction and domestic violence.
text_preceding: We must encourage and support the work of charities and faith-based and community groups that offer help and love one person at a time.
text_following: To provide a hot meal or a mentor or a safe haven for our children.

text_preceding: These groups are working in every neighborhood in America to fight homelessness and addiction and domestic violence.
text_following: Government should welcome these groups to apply for funds, not discriminate against them.

text_original: Government should welcome these groups to apply for funds, not discriminate against them.
text_preceding: To provide a hot meal or a mentor or a safe haven for our children.
text_following: Government cannot be replaced by charities or volunteers.

text_following: Government should not fund religious activities.

text_original: Government should not fund religious activities.

text_following: But our nation should support the good works of these good people who are helping their neighbors in need.

text_original: But our nation should support the good works of these good people who are helping their neighbors in need.

text_following: So I propose allowing all taxpayers, whether they itemize or not, to deduct their charitable contributions.

text_preceding: But our nation should support the good works of these good people who are helping their neighbors in need.

text_following: Our budget provides more than $700 million over the next 10 years for a federal compassion capital fund, with a focused and noble mission, to provide a mentor to the more than 100 million children with a parent in prison, and to support other local efforts to fight illiteracy, teen pregnancy, drug addiction and other difficult problems.
