text_following: Please help me welcome Mayor John Street.

text_original: Please help me welcome Mayor John Street.
text_preceding: With us tonight is the Mayor of Philadelphia.
text_following: Mayor Street has encouraged faith-based and community organizations to make a significant difference in Philadelphia.

text_original: Mayor Street has encouraged faith-based and community organizations to make a significant difference in Philadelphia.
text_preceding: Please help me welcome Mayor John Street.
text_following: He's invited me to his city this summer to see compassionate action.

text_original: He's invited me to his city this summer to see compassionate action.
text_preceding: Mayor Street has encouraged faith-based and community organizations to make a significant difference in Philadelphia.
text_following: I'm personally aware of just how effective the Mayor is.

text_original: I'm personally aware of just how effective the Mayor is.
text_preceding: He's invited me to his city this summer to see compassionate action.
text_following: Let the record show, I lost his city, big time.

text_original: Let the record show, I lost his city, big time.
text_preceding: I'm personally aware of just how effective the Mayor is.
text_following: But some things are bigger than politics.

text_original: But some things are bigger than politics.
text_preceding: Let the record show, I lost his city, big time.
text_following: So I look forward to coming to your city, to see your faith-based programs in action.

text_original: So I look forward to coming to your city, to see your faith-based programs in action.
text_preceding: But some things are bigger than politics.
text_following: As government promotes compassion, it also must promote justice.

text_original: As government promotes compassion, it also must promote justice.
text_preceding: So I look forward to coming to your city, to see your faith-based programs in action.
text_following: Too many of our citizens have cause to doubt our nation's justice, when the law points a finger of suspicion at groups, instead of individuals.

text_original: Too many of our citizens have cause to doubt our nation's justice, when the law points a finger of suspicion at groups, instead of individuals.
text_preceding: As government promotes compassion, it also must promote justice.
text_following: All our citizens are created equal, and must be treated equally.

text_original: All our citizens are created equal, and must be treated equally.
text_preceding: Too many of our citizens have cause to doubt our nation's justice, when the law points a finger of suspicion at groups, instead of individuals.
text_following: Earlier today, I asked John Ashcroft, the Attorney General, to develop specific recommendations to end racial profiling.

text_original: Earlier today, I asked John Ashcroft, the Attorney General, to develop specific recommendations to end racial profiling.
text_preceding: All our citizens are created equal, and must be treated equally.
text_following: It's wrong and we will end it in America.

text_original: It's wrong and we will end it in America.
text_preceding: Earlier today, I asked John Ashcroft, the Attorney General, to develop specific recommendations to end racial profiling.
text_following: In so doing, we will not hinder the work of our nation's brave police officers.

text_original: In so doing, we will not hinder the work of our nation's brave police officers.
text_preceding: It's wrong and we will end it in America.
text_following: They protect us every day -- often at great risk.

text_original: They protect us every day -- often at great risk.
text_preceding: In so doing, we will not hinder the work of our nation's brave police officers.
text_following: But by stopping the abuses of a few, we will add to the public confidence our police officers earn and deserve.

text_original: But by stopping the abuses of a few, we will add to the public confidence our police officers earn and deserve.
text_preceding: They protect us every day -- often at great risk.
text_following: My budget has funded a responsible increase in our ongoing operations.

text_original: My budget has funded a responsible increase in our ongoing operations.
text_preceding: But by stopping the abuses of a few, we will add to the public confidence our police officers earn and deserve.
text_following: It has funded our nation's important priorities.

text_original: It has funded our nation's important priorities.
text_preceding: My budget has funded a responsible increase in our ongoing operations.
text_following: It has protected Social Security and Medicare.

text_original: It has protected Social Security and Medicare.
text_preceding: It has funded our nation's important priorities.
text_following: And our surpluses are big enough that there is still money left over.

text_original: And our surpluses are big enough that there is still money left over.
text_preceding: It has protected Social Security and Medicare.
text_following: Many of you have talked about the need to pay down our national debt.

text_original: Many of you have talked about the need to pay down our national debt.
text_preceding: And our surpluses are big enough that there is still money left over.
text_following: We owe it to our children and grandchildren to act now, and I hope you will join me to pay down $2 trillion in debt during the next 10 years.

text_original: We owe it to our children and grandchildren to act now, and I hope you will join me to pay down $2 trillion in debt during the next 10 years.
text_preceding: Many of you have talked about the need to pay down our national debt.
text_following: At the end of those 10 years, we will have paid down all the debt that is available to retire.

text_original: At the end of those 10 years, we will have paid down all the debt that is available to retire.
text_preceding: We owe it to our children and grandchildren to act now, and I hope you will join me to pay down $2 trillion in debt during the next 10 years.
text_following: That is more debt, repaid more quickly than has ever been repaid by any nation at any time in history.

text_original: That is more debt, repaid more quickly than has ever been repaid by any nation at any time in history.
text_preceding: At the end of those 10 years, we will have paid down all the debt that is available to retire.
text_following: We should also prepare for the unexpected, for the uncertainties of the future.

text_original: We should also prepare for the unexpected, for the uncertainties of the future.
text_preceding: That is more debt, repaid more quickly than has ever been repaid by any nation at any time in history.
text_following: We should approach our nation's budget as any prudent family would, with a contingency fund for emergencies or additional spending needs.

text_original: We should approach our nation's budget as any prudent family would, with a contingency fund for emergencies or additional spending needs.
text_preceding: We should also prepare for the unexpected, for the uncertainties of the future.
text_following: For example, after a strategic review, we may need to increase defense spending.

text_original: For example, after a strategic review, we may need to increase defense spending.
text_preceding: We should approach our nation's budget as any prudent family would, with a contingency fund for emergencies or additional spending needs.
text_following: We may need to increase spending for our farmers or additional money to reform Medicare.

text_original: We may need to increase spending for our farmers or additional money to reform Medicare.
text_preceding: For example, after a strategic review, we may need to increase defense spending.
text_following: And so, my budget sets aside almost a trillion dollars over 10 years for additional needs.

text_original: And so, my budget sets aside almost a trillion dollars over 10 years for additional needs.
text_preceding: We may need to increase spending for our farmers or additional money to reform Medicare.
text_following: That is one trillion additional reasons you can feel comfortable supporting this budget.

text_original: That is one trillion additional reasons you can feel comfortable supporting this budget.
text_preceding: And so, my budget sets aside almost a trillion dollars over 10 years for additional needs.
text_following: We have increased our budget at a responsible 4 percent.

text_original: We have increased our budget at a responsible 4 percent.
text_preceding: That is one trillion additional reasons you can feel comfortable supporting this budget.
text_following: We have funded our priorities.

text_original: We have funded our priorities.
text_preceding: We have increased our budget at a responsible 4 percent.
text_following: We paid down all the available debt.

text_original: We paid down all the available debt.
text_preceding: We have funded our priorities.
text_following: We have prepared for contingencies.

text_original: We have prepared for contingencies.
text_preceding: We paid down all the available debt.
text_following: And we still have money left over.

text_original: And we still have money left over.
text_preceding: We have prepared for contingencies.
text_following: Now, we come to a fork in the road.

text_original: Now, we come to a fork in the road.
text_preceding: And we still have money left over.
text_following: Even though we have already met our needs, we could spend the money on more and bigger government.

text_original: Even though we have already met our needs, we could spend the money on more and bigger government.
text_preceding: Now, we come to a fork in the road.
text_following: That's the road our nation has traveled in recent years.

text_original: That's the road our nation has traveled in recent years.
text_preceding: Even though we have already met our needs, we could spend the money on more and bigger government.
text_following: Last year, government spending shot up 8 percent.

text_original: Last year, government spending shot up 8 percent.
text_preceding: That's the road our nation has traveled in recent years.
text_following: That's far more than our economy grew, far more than personal income grew, and far more than the rate of inflation.

text_original: That's far more than our economy grew, far more than personal income grew, and far more than the rate of inflation.
text_preceding: Last year, government spending shot up 8 percent.
text_following: If you continue on that road, you will spend the surplus and have to dip into Social Security to pay other bills.

text_original: If you continue on that road, you will spend the surplus and have to dip into Social Security to pay other bills.
text_preceding: That's far more than our economy grew, far more than personal income grew, and far more than the rate of inflation.
text_following: Unrestrained government spending is a dangerous road to deficits, so we must take a different path.

text_original: Unrestrained government spending is a dangerous road to deficits, so we must take a different path.
text_preceding: If you continue on that road, you will spend the surplus and have to dip into Social Security to pay other bills.
text_following: The other choice is to let the American people spend their own money to meet their own needs.

text_original: The other choice is to let the American people spend their own money to meet their own needs.
text_preceding: Unrestrained government spending is a dangerous road to deficits, so we must take a different path.
text_following: I hope you will join me in standing firmly on the side of the people.

text_original: I hope you will join me in standing firmly on the side of the people.
text_preceding: The other choice is to let the American people spend their own money to meet their own needs.
text_following: You see, the growing surplus exists because taxes are too high and government is charging more than it needs.

text_original: You see, the growing surplus exists because taxes are too high and government is charging more than it needs.
text_preceding: I hope you will join me in standing firmly on the side of the people.
text_following: The people of America have been overcharged and, on their behalf, I am here asking for a refund.

text_original: The people of America have been overcharged and, on their behalf, I am here asking for a refund.
text_preceding: You see, the growing surplus exists because taxes are too high and government is charging more than it needs.
text_following: Some say my tax plan is too big.

text_original: Some say my tax plan is too big.
text_preceding: The people of America have been overcharged and, on their behalf, I am here asking for a refund.
text_following: I didn't throw darts at the board to come up with a number for tax relief.

text_original: I didn't throw darts at the board to come up with a number for tax relief.
text_preceding: Some say my tax plan is too big.
text_following: I didn't take a poll or develop an arbitrary formula that might sound good.

text_original: I didn't take a poll or develop an arbitrary formula that might sound good.
text_preceding: I didn't throw darts at the board to come up with a number for tax relief.
text_following: I looked at problems in the Tax Code and calculated the cost to fix them.

text_original: I looked at problems in the Tax Code and calculated the cost to fix them.
text_preceding: I didn't take a poll or develop an arbitrary formula that might sound good.
text_following: A tax rate of 15 percent is too high for those who earn low wages, so we must lower the rate to 10 percent.

text_original: A tax rate of 15 percent is too high for those who earn low wages, so we must lower the rate to 10 percent.
text_preceding: I looked at problems in the Tax Code and calculated the cost to fix them.
text_following: No one should pay more than a third of the money they earn in federal income taxes, so we lowered the top rate to 33 percent.

text_original: No one should pay more than a third of the money they earn in federal income taxes, so we lowered the top rate to 33 percent.
text_preceding: A tax rate of 15 percent is too high for those who earn low wages, so we must lower the rate to 10 percent.
text_following: This reform will be welcome relief for America's small businesses, which often pay taxes at the highest rate.

text_original: This reform will be welcome relief for America's small businesses, which often pay taxes at the highest rate.
text_preceding: No one should pay more than a third of the money they earn in federal income taxes, so we lowered the top rate to 33 percent.
text_following: And help for small business means jobs for Americans.

text_original: And help for small business means jobs for Americans.
text_preceding: This reform will be welcome relief for America's small businesses, which often pay taxes at the highest rate.
text_following: We simplified the Tax Code by reducing the number of tax rates from the current five rates to four lower ones, 10 percent, 15, 25 and 33 percent.

text_original: We simplified the Tax Code by reducing the number of tax rates from the current five rates to four lower ones, 10 percent, 15, 25 and 33 percent.
text_preceding: And help for small business means jobs for Americans.
text_following: In my plan, no one is targeted in or targeted out.

text_original: In my plan, no one is targeted in or targeted out.
text_preceding: We simplified the Tax Code by reducing the number of tax rates from the current five rates to four lower ones, 10 percent, 15, 25 and 33 percent.
text_following: Everyone who pays income taxes will get relief.

text_original: Everyone who pays income taxes will get relief.
text_preceding: In my plan, no one is targeted in or targeted out.
text_following: Our government should not tax, and thereby discourage marriage, so we reduced the marriage penalty.

text_original: Our government should not tax, and thereby discourage marriage, so we reduced the marriage penalty.
text_preceding: Everyone who pays income taxes will get relief.
text_following: I want to help families rear and support their children, so we doubled the child credit to $1,000 per child.

text_original: I want to help families rear and support their children, so we doubled the child credit to $1,000 per child.
text_preceding: Our government should not tax, and thereby discourage marriage, so we reduced the marriage penalty.
text_following: It's not fair to tax the same earnings twice -- once when you earn them, and again when you die -- so we must repeal the death tax.

text_original: It's not fair to tax the same earnings twice -- once when you earn them, and again when you die -- so we must repeal the death tax.
text_preceding: I want to help families rear and support their children, so we doubled the child credit to $1,000 per child.
text_following: These changes add up to significant help.

text_original: These changes add up to significant help.
text_preceding: It's not fair to tax the same earnings twice -- once when you earn them, and again when you die -- so we must repeal the death tax.
text_following: A typical family with two children will save $1,600 a year on their federal income taxes.

text_original: A typical family with two children will save $1,600 a year on their federal income taxes.
text_preceding: These changes add up to significant help.
text_following: Now, $1,600 may not sound like a lot to some, but it means a lot to many families: $1,600 buys gas for two cars for an entire year.

text_preceding: A typical family with two children will save $1,600 a year on their federal income taxes.
text_following: It pays tuition for a year at a community college.

text_preceding: Now, $1,600 may not sound like a lot to some, but it means a lot to many families: $1,600 buys gas for two cars for an entire year.
text_following: It pays the average family grocery bill for three months.

text_preceding: It pays tuition for a year at a community college.

text_preceding: It pays the average family grocery bill for three months.
text_following: But they could be from any one of your districts.

text_original: Steven is the network administrator for a school district.
text_preceding: But they could be from any one of your districts.

text_following: Two thousand dollars a year means a lot to my family.

text_preceding: Two thousand dollars a year means a lot to my family.
text_following: My attitude is, government should never stand in the way of families achieving their dreams.

text_preceding: After that, Steven and Josefina want to start saving for Lianna's college education.
text_following: And as we debate this issue, always remember, the surplus is not the government's money, the surplus is the people's money.

text_original: And as we debate this issue, always remember, the surplus is not the government's money, the surplus is the people's money.
text_preceding: My attitude is, government should never stand in the way of families achieving their dreams.
text_following: For lower-income families, my tax plan restores basic fairness.

text_original: For lower-income families, my tax plan restores basic fairness.
text_preceding: And as we debate this issue, always remember, the surplus is not the government's money, the surplus is the people's money.
text_following: Right now, complicated tax rules punish hard work.

text_original: Right now, complicated tax rules punish hard work.
text_preceding: For lower-income families, my tax plan restores basic fairness.
text_following: A waitress supporting two children on $25,000 a year can lose nearly half of every additional dollar she earns above the $25,000.

text_original: A waitress supporting two children on $25,000 a year can lose nearly half of every additional dollar she earns above the $25,000.
text_preceding: Right now, complicated tax rules punish hard work.
text_following: Her overtime, her hardest hours, are taxed at nearly 20 percent.

text_original: Her overtime, her hardest hours, are taxed at nearly 20 percent.
text_preceding: A waitress supporting two children on $25,000 a year can lose nearly half of every additional dollar she earns above the $25,000.
text_following: This sends a terrible message: you'll never get ahead.

text_preceding: Her overtime, her hardest hours, are taxed at nearly 20 percent.
text_following: But America's message must be different.

text_original: But America's message must be different.
text_preceding: This sends a terrible message: you'll never get ahead.
text_following: We must honor hard work, never punish it.

text_original: We must honor hard work, never punish it.
text_preceding: But America's message must be different.
text_following: With tax relief, overtime will no longer be over-taxed time for the waitress.

text_original: With tax relief, overtime will no longer be over-taxed time for the waitress.
text_preceding: We must honor hard work, never punish it.
text_following: People with the smallest incomes will get the highest percentage of reductions.

text_original: People with the smallest incomes will get the highest percentage of reductions.
text_preceding: With tax relief, overtime will no longer be over-taxed time for the waitress.
text_following: And millions of additional American families will be removed from the income tax rolls entirely.

text_original: And millions of additional American families will be removed from the income tax rolls entirely.
text_preceding: People with the smallest incomes will get the highest percentage of reductions.
text_following: Tax relief is right and tax relief is urgent.

text_original: Tax relief is right and tax relief is urgent.
text_preceding: And millions of additional American families will be removed from the income tax rolls entirely.
text_following: The long economic expansion that began almost 10 years ago is faltering.

text_original: The long economic expansion that began almost 10 years ago is faltering.
text_preceding: Tax relief is right and tax relief is urgent.
text_following: Lower interest rates will eventually help, but we cannot assume they will do the job all by themselves.

text_original: Lower interest rates will eventually help, but we cannot assume they will do the job all by themselves.
text_preceding: The long economic expansion that began almost 10 years ago is faltering.
text_following: Forty years ago, and then 20 years ago, two Presidents, one Democrat, one Republican, John F.Kennedy and Ronald Reagan, advocated tax cuts to, in President Kennedy's words, get this country moving again.

text_original: Forty years ago, and then 20 years ago, two Presidents, one Democrat, one Republican, John F.Kennedy and Ronald Reagan, advocated tax cuts to, in President Kennedy's words, get this country moving again.
text_preceding: Lower interest rates will eventually help, but we cannot assume they will do the job all by themselves.
text_following: They knew then what we must do now.

text_original: They knew then what we must do now.
text_preceding: Forty years ago, and then 20 years ago, two Presidents, one Democrat, one Republican, John F.Kennedy and Ronald Reagan, advocated tax cuts to, in President Kennedy's words, get this country moving again.
text_following: To create economic growth and opportunity, we must put money back into the hands of the people who buy goods and create jobs.

text_original: To create economic growth and opportunity, we must put money back into the hands of the people who buy goods and create jobs.
text_preceding: They knew then what we must do now.
text_following: The Chairman of the Federal Reserve has testified before Congress that tax cuts often come too late to stimulate economic recovery.

text_original: The Chairman of the Federal Reserve has testified before Congress that tax cuts often come too late to stimulate economic recovery.
text_preceding: To create economic growth and opportunity, we must put money back into the hands of the people who buy goods and create jobs.
text_following: So I want to work with you to give our economy an important jump-start by making tax relief retroactive.

text_original: So I want to work with you to give our economy an important jump-start by making tax relief retroactive.
text_preceding: The Chairman of the Federal Reserve has testified before Congress that tax cuts often come too late to stimulate economic recovery.
text_following: We must act now because it is the right thing to do.

text_original: We must act now because it is the right thing to do.
text_preceding: So I want to work with you to give our economy an important jump-start by making tax relief retroactive.
text_following: We must also act now because we have other things to do.

text_original: We must also act now because we have other things to do.
text_preceding: We must act now because it is the right thing to do.
text_following: We must show courage to confront and resolve tough challenges, to restructure our nation's defenses, to meet our growing need for energy, and to reform Medicare and Social Security.

text_original: We must show courage to confront and resolve tough challenges, to restructure our nation's defenses, to meet our growing need for energy, and to reform Medicare and Social Security.
text_preceding: We must also act now because we have other things to do.
text_following: America has a window of opportunity to extend and secure our present peace by promoting a distinctly American internationalism.

text_original: America has a window of opportunity to extend and secure our present peace by promoting a distinctly American internationalism.
text_preceding: We must show courage to confront and resolve tough challenges, to restructure our nation's defenses, to meet our growing need for energy, and to reform Medicare and Social Security.
text_following: We will work with our allies and friends to be a force for good and a champion of freedom.

text_original: We will work with our allies and friends to be a force for good and a champion of freedom.
text_preceding: America has a window of opportunity to extend and secure our present peace by promoting a distinctly American internationalism.
text_following: We will work for free markets, free trade and freedom from oppression.

text_original: We will work for free markets, free trade and freedom from oppression.
text_preceding: We will work with our allies and friends to be a force for good and a champion of freedom.
text_following: Nations making progress toward freedom will find America is their friend.

text_original: Nations making progress toward freedom will find America is their friend.
text_preceding: We will work for free markets, free trade and freedom from oppression.
text_following: And we need a strong military to keep the peace.

text_original: And we need a strong military to keep the peace.
text_preceding: Nations making progress toward freedom will find America is their friend.
text_following: But our military was shaped to confront the challenges of the past.

text_original: But our military was shaped to confront the challenges of the past.
text_preceding: And we need a strong military to keep the peace.
text_following: So I've asked the Secretary of Defense to review America's Armed Forces and prepare to transform them to meet emerging threats.

text_preceding: But our military was shaped to confront the challenges of the past.
text_following: My budget makes a down payment on the research and development that will be required.

text_original: My budget makes a down payment on the research and development that will be required.
text_preceding: So I've asked the Secretary of Defense to review America's Armed Forces and prepare to transform them to meet emerging threats.
text_following: Yet, in our broader transformation effort, we must put strategy first, then spending.

text_original: Yet, in our broader transformation effort, we must put strategy first, then spending.
text_preceding: My budget makes a down payment on the research and development that will be required.
text_following: Our defense vision will drive our defense budget, not the other way around.
