text_preceding: Yet, in our broader transformation effort, we must put strategy first, then spending.
text_following: Our nation also needs a clear strategy to confront the threats of the 21st century -- threats that are more widespread and less certain.

text_original: Our nation also needs a clear strategy to confront the threats of the 21st century -- threats that are more widespread and less certain.
text_preceding: Our defense vision will drive our defense budget, not the other way around.
text_following: They range from terrorists who threaten with bombs to tyrants in rogue nations intent upon developing weapons of mass destruction.

text_original: They range from terrorists who threaten with bombs to tyrants in rogue nations intent upon developing weapons of mass destruction.
text_preceding: Our nation also needs a clear strategy to confront the threats of the 21st century -- threats that are more widespread and less certain.
text_following: To protect our own people, our allies and friends, we must develop and we must deploy effective missile defenses.

text_original: To protect our own people, our allies and friends, we must develop and we must deploy effective missile defenses.
text_preceding: They range from terrorists who threaten with bombs to tyrants in rogue nations intent upon developing weapons of mass destruction.
text_following: And as we transform our military, we can discard Cold War relics, and reduce our own nuclear forces to reflect today's needs.

text_original: And as we transform our military, we can discard Cold War relics, and reduce our own nuclear forces to reflect today's needs.
text_preceding: To protect our own people, our allies and friends, we must develop and we must deploy effective missile defenses.
text_following: A strong America is the world's best hope for peace and freedom.

text_original: A strong America is the world's best hope for peace and freedom.
text_preceding: And as we transform our military, we can discard Cold War relics, and reduce our own nuclear forces to reflect today's needs.
text_following: Yet the cause of freedom rests on more than our ability to defend ourselves and our allies.

text_original: Yet the cause of freedom rests on more than our ability to defend ourselves and our allies.
text_preceding: A strong America is the world's best hope for peace and freedom.
text_following: Freedom is exported every day, as we ship goods and products that improve the lives of millions of people.

text_original: Freedom is exported every day, as we ship goods and products that improve the lives of millions of people.
text_preceding: Yet the cause of freedom rests on more than our ability to defend ourselves and our allies.
text_following: Free trade brings greater political and personal freedom.

text_original: Free trade brings greater political and personal freedom.
text_preceding: Freedom is exported every day, as we ship goods and products that improve the lives of millions of people.
text_following: Each of the previous five Presidents has had the ability to negotiate far reaching trade agreements.

text_original: Each of the previous five Presidents has had the ability to negotiate far reaching trade agreements.
text_preceding: Free trade brings greater political and personal freedom.
text_following: Tonight I ask you to give me the strong hand of presidential trade promotion authority, and to do so quickly.

text_original: Tonight I ask you to give me the strong hand of presidential trade promotion authority, and to do so quickly.
text_preceding: Each of the previous five Presidents has had the ability to negotiate far reaching trade agreements.
text_following: As we meet tonight, many citizens are struggling with the high cost of energy.

text_original: As we meet tonight, many citizens are struggling with the high cost of energy.
text_preceding: Tonight I ask you to give me the strong hand of presidential trade promotion authority, and to do so quickly.
text_following: We have a serious energy problem that demands a national energy policy.

text_original: We have a serious energy problem that demands a national energy policy.
text_preceding: As we meet tonight, many citizens are struggling with the high cost of energy.
text_following: The West is confronting a major energy shortage that has resulted in high prices and uncertainty.

text_original: The West is confronting a major energy shortage that has resulted in high prices and uncertainty.
text_preceding: We have a serious energy problem that demands a national energy policy.
text_following: I've asked federal agencies to work with California officials to help speed construction of new energy sources, and I have direct Vice President Cheney, Commerce Secretary Evans, Energy Secretary Abraham and other senior members in my administration to develop a national energy policy.

text_original: I've asked federal agencies to work with California officials to help speed construction of new energy sources, and I have direct Vice President Cheney, Commerce Secretary Evans, Energy Secretary Abraham and other senior members in my administration to develop a national energy policy.
text_preceding: The West is confronting a major energy shortage that has resulted in high prices and uncertainty.
text_following: Our energy demand outstrips our supply.

text_original: Our energy demand outstrips our supply.
text_preceding: I've asked federal agencies to work with California officials to help speed construction of new energy sources, and I have direct Vice President Cheney, Commerce Secretary Evans, Energy Secretary Abraham and other senior members in my administration to develop a national energy policy.
text_following: We can produce more energy at home while protecting our environment, and we must.

text_original: We can produce more energy at home while protecting our environment, and we must.
text_preceding: Our energy demand outstrips our supply.
text_following: We can produce more electricity to meet demand, and we must.

text_original: We can produce more electricity to meet demand, and we must.
text_preceding: We can produce more energy at home while protecting our environment, and we must.
text_following: We can promote alternative energy sources and conservation, and we must.

text_original: We can promote alternative energy sources and conservation, and we must.
text_preceding: We can produce more electricity to meet demand, and we must.
text_following: America must become more energy-independent, and we will.

text_original: America must become more energy-independent, and we will.
text_preceding: We can promote alternative energy sources and conservation, and we must.
text_following: Perhaps the biggest test of our foresight and courage will be reforming Medicare and Social Security.

text_original: Perhaps the biggest test of our foresight and courage will be reforming Medicare and Social Security.
text_preceding: America must become more energy-independent, and we will.
text_following: Medicare's finances are strained and its coverage is outdated.

text_original: Medicare's finances are strained and its coverage is outdated.
text_preceding: Perhaps the biggest test of our foresight and courage will be reforming Medicare and Social Security.
text_following: Ninety-nine percent of employer-provided health plans offer some form of prescription drug coverage.

text_original: Ninety-nine percent of employer-provided health plans offer some form of prescription drug coverage.
text_preceding: Medicare's finances are strained and its coverage is outdated.
text_following: The framework for reform has been developed by Senators Frist and Breaux and Congressman Thomas, and now is the time to act.

text_original: The framework for reform has been developed by Senators Frist and Breaux and Congressman Thomas, and now is the time to act.
text_preceding: Ninety-nine percent of employer-provided health plans offer some form of prescription drug coverage.
text_following: Medicare must be modernized, and we must make sure that every senior on Medicare can choose a health care plan that offers prescription drugs.

text_original: Medicare must be modernized, and we must make sure that every senior on Medicare can choose a health care plan that offers prescription drugs.
text_preceding: The framework for reform has been developed by Senators Frist and Breaux and Congressman Thomas, and now is the time to act.
text_following: Seven years from now, the baby boom generation will begin to claim Social Security benefits.

text_original: Seven years from now, the baby boom generation will begin to claim Social Security benefits.
text_preceding: Medicare must be modernized, and we must make sure that every senior on Medicare can choose a health care plan that offers prescription drugs.
text_following: Every one in this chamber knows that Social Security is not prepared to fully fund their retirement.

text_original: Every one in this chamber knows that Social Security is not prepared to fully fund their retirement.
text_preceding: Seven years from now, the baby boom generation will begin to claim Social Security benefits.
text_following: And we only have a couple of years to get prepared.

text_original: And we only have a couple of years to get prepared.
text_preceding: Every one in this chamber knows that Social Security is not prepared to fully fund their retirement.
text_following: Without reform, this country will one day awaken to a stark choice: either a drastic rise in payroll taxes or a radical cut in retirement benefits.

text_original: Without reform, this country will one day awaken to a stark choice: either a drastic rise in payroll taxes or a radical cut in retirement benefits.
text_preceding: And we only have a couple of years to get prepared.
text_following: This spring I will form a presidential commission to reform Social Security.

text_original: This spring I will form a presidential commission to reform Social Security.
text_preceding: Without reform, this country will one day awaken to a stark choice: either a drastic rise in payroll taxes or a radical cut in retirement benefits.
text_following: The commission will make its recommendations by next fall.

text_original: The commission will make its recommendations by next fall.
text_preceding: This spring I will form a presidential commission to reform Social Security.
text_following: Reform should be based on these principles: It must preserve the benefits of all current retirees and those nearing retirement.

text_original: Reform should be based on these principles: It must preserve the benefits of all current retirees and those nearing retirement.
text_preceding: The commission will make its recommendations by next fall.
text_following: It must return Social Security to sound financial footing.

text_original: It must return Social Security to sound financial footing.
text_preceding: Reform should be based on these principles: It must preserve the benefits of all current retirees and those nearing retirement.
text_following: And it must offer personal savings accounts to younger workers who want them.

text_original: And it must offer personal savings accounts to younger workers who want them.
text_preceding: It must return Social Security to sound financial footing.
text_following: Social Security now offers workers a return of less than 2 percent on the money they pay into the system.

text_original: Social Security now offers workers a return of less than 2 percent on the money they pay into the system.
text_preceding: And it must offer personal savings accounts to younger workers who want them.
text_following: To save the system, we must increase that by allowing younger workers to make safe, sound investments that yield a higher rate of return.

text_original: To save the system, we must increase that by allowing younger workers to make safe, sound investments that yield a higher rate of return.
text_preceding: Social Security now offers workers a return of less than 2 percent on the money they pay into the system.
text_following: Ownership, access to wealth and independence should not be the privilege of the few.

text_original: Ownership, access to wealth and independence should not be the privilege of the few.
text_preceding: To save the system, we must increase that by allowing younger workers to make safe, sound investments that yield a higher rate of return.
text_following: They are the hope of every American, and we must make them the foundation of Social Security.

text_original: They are the hope of every American, and we must make them the foundation of Social Security.
text_preceding: Ownership, access to wealth and independence should not be the privilege of the few.
text_following: By confronting the tough challenge of reform, by being responsible with our budget, we can earn the trust of the American people.

text_original: By confronting the tough challenge of reform, by being responsible with our budget, we can earn the trust of the American people.
text_preceding: They are the hope of every American, and we must make them the foundation of Social Security.
text_following: And we can add to that trust by enacting fair and balanced election and campaign reforms.

text_original: And we can add to that trust by enacting fair and balanced election and campaign reforms.
text_preceding: By confronting the tough challenge of reform, by being responsible with our budget, we can earn the trust of the American people.
text_following: The agenda I have set before you tonight is worthy of a great nation.

text_original: The agenda I have set before you tonight is worthy of a great nation.
text_preceding: And we can add to that trust by enacting fair and balanced election and campaign reforms.
text_following: America is a nation at peace, but not a nation at rest.

text_original: America is a nation at peace, but not a nation at rest.
text_preceding: The agenda I have set before you tonight is worthy of a great nation.
text_following: Much has been given to us, and much is expected.

text_original: Much has been given to us, and much is expected.
text_preceding: America is a nation at peace, but not a nation at rest.
text_following: Let us agree to bridge old divides.

text_original: Let us agree to bridge old divides.
text_preceding: Much has been given to us, and much is expected.
text_following: But let us also agree that our goodwill must be dedicated to great goals.

text_original: But let us also agree that our goodwill must be dedicated to great goals.
text_preceding: Let us agree to bridge old divides.
text_following: Bipartisan is more than minding our matters.

text_original: Bipartisan is more than minding our matters.
text_preceding: But let us also agree that our goodwill must be dedicated to great goals.
text_following: No one can speak in this Capitol and not be awed by its history.

text_original: No one can speak in this Capitol and not be awed by its history.
text_preceding: Bipartisan is more than minding our matters.
text_following: As so many turning points, debates in these chambers have reflected the collected or divided conscience of our country.

text_original: As so many turning points, debates in these chambers have reflected the collected or divided conscience of our country.
text_preceding: No one can speak in this Capitol and not be awed by its history.
text_following: And when we walk through Statuary Hall and see those men and women of marble, we're reminded of their courage and achievement.

text_original: And when we walk through Statuary Hall and see those men and women of marble, we're reminded of their courage and achievement.
text_preceding: As so many turning points, debates in these chambers have reflected the collected or divided conscience of our country.
text_following: Yet America's purpose is never found only in statues or history.

text_original: Yet America's purpose is never found only in statues or history.
text_preceding: And when we walk through Statuary Hall and see those men and women of marble, we're reminded of their courage and achievement.
text_following: America's purpose always stands before us.

text_original: America's purpose always stands before us.
text_preceding: Yet America's purpose is never found only in statues or history.
text_following: Our generation must show courage in a time of blessing, as our nation has always shown in times of crisis.

text_original: Our generation must show courage in a time of blessing, as our nation has always shown in times of crisis.
text_preceding: America's purpose always stands before us.
text_following: And our courage, issue by issue, can gather to greatness and serve our country.

text_original: And our courage, issue by issue, can gather to greatness and serve our country.
text_preceding: Our generation must show courage in a time of blessing, as our nation has always shown in times of crisis.
text_following: This is the privilege and responsibility we share.

text_original: This is the privilege and responsibility we share.
text_preceding: And our courage, issue by issue, can gather to greatness and serve our country.
text_following: And if we work together, we can prove that public service is noble.

text_original: And if we work together, we can prove that public service is noble.
text_preceding: This is the privilege and responsibility we share.
text_following: We all came here for a reason.

text_original: We all came here for a reason.
text_preceding: And if we work together, we can prove that public service is noble.
text_following: We all have things we want to accomplish and promises to keep.

text_original: We all have things we want to accomplish and promises to keep.
text_preceding: We all came here for a reason.
text_following: Juntos podemos -- together we can.

text_original: Juntos podemos -- together we can.
text_preceding: We all have things we want to accomplish and promises to keep.
text_following: We can make Americans proud of their government.

text_original: We can make Americans proud of their government.
text_preceding: Juntos podemos -- together we can.
text_following: Together we can share in the credit of making our country more prosperous and generous and just, and earn from our conscience and from our fellow citizens the highest possible praise: Well done, good and faithful servants.

text_original: Together we can share in the credit of making our country more prosperous and generous and just, and earn from our conscience and from our fellow citizens the highest possible praise: Well done, good and faithful servants.
text_preceding: We can make Americans proud of their government.

text_original: Mr. Speaker, Vice President Cheney, Members of Congress, distinguished citizens and fellow citizens: Every year, by law and by custom, we meet here to consider the state of the Union.
text_following: This year, we gather in this Chamber deeply aware of decisive days that lie ahead.

text_original: This year, we gather in this Chamber deeply aware of decisive days that lie ahead.
text_preceding: Mr. Speaker, Vice President Cheney, Members of Congress, distinguished citizens and fellow citizens: Every year, by law and by custom, we meet here to consider the state of the Union.
text_following: You and I serve our country in a time of great consequence.

text_original: You and I serve our country in a time of great consequence.
text_preceding: This year, we gather in this Chamber deeply aware of decisive days that lie ahead.
text_following: During this session of Congress, we have the duty to reform domestic programs vital to our country.

text_original: During this session of Congress, we have the duty to reform domestic programs vital to our country.
text_preceding: You and I serve our country in a time of great consequence.
text_following: We have the opportunity to save millions of lives abroad from a terrible disease.

text_original: We have the opportunity to save millions of lives abroad from a terrible disease.
text_preceding: During this session of Congress, we have the duty to reform domestic programs vital to our country.
text_following: We will work for a prosperity that is broadly shared, and we will answer every danger and every enemy that threatens the American people.

text_original: We will work for a prosperity that is broadly shared, and we will answer every danger and every enemy that threatens the American people.
text_preceding: We have the opportunity to save millions of lives abroad from a terrible disease.
text_following: In all these days of promise and days of reckoning, we can be confident.

text_original: In all these days of promise and days of reckoning, we can be confident.
text_preceding: We will work for a prosperity that is broadly shared, and we will answer every danger and every enemy that threatens the American people.
text_following: In a whirlwind of change and hope and peril, our faith is sure;

text_original: In a whirlwind of change and hope and peril, our faith is sure;
text_preceding: In all these days of promise and days of reckoning, we can be confident.
text_following: This country has many challenges.

text_original: This country has many challenges.
text_preceding: In a whirlwind of change and hope and peril, our faith is sure;
text_following: We will not deny, we will not ignore, we will not pass along our problems to other Congresses, to other Presidents, and other generations.

text_original: We will not deny, we will not ignore, we will not pass along our problems to other Congresses, to other Presidents, and other generations.
text_preceding: This country has many challenges.
text_following: We will confront them with focus and clarity and courage.

text_original: We will confront them with focus and clarity and courage.
text_preceding: We will not deny, we will not ignore, we will not pass along our problems to other Congresses, to other Presidents, and other generations.
text_following: During the last 2 years, we have seen what can be accomplished when we work together.

text_original: During the last 2 years, we have seen what can be accomplished when we work together.
text_preceding: We will confront them with focus and clarity and courage.
text_following: To lift the standards of our public schools, we achieved historic education reform, which must now be carried out in every school and in every classroom so that every child in America can read and learn and succeed in life.

text_original: To lift the standards of our public schools, we achieved historic education reform, which must now be carried out in every school and in every classroom so that every child in America can read and learn and succeed in life.
text_preceding: During the last 2 years, we have seen what can be accomplished when we work together.
text_following: To protect our country, we reorganized our Government and created the Department of Homeland Security, which is mobilizing against the threats of a new era.

text_original: To protect our country, we reorganized our Government and created the Department of Homeland Security, which is mobilizing against the threats of a new era.
text_preceding: To lift the standards of our public schools, we achieved historic education reform, which must now be carried out in every school and in every classroom so that every child in America can read and learn and succeed in life.
text_following: To bring our economy out of recession, we delivered the largest tax relief in a generation.

text_original: To bring our economy out of recession, we delivered the largest tax relief in a generation.
text_preceding: To protect our country, we reorganized our Government and created the Department of Homeland Security, which is mobilizing against the threats of a new era.
text_following: To insist on integrity in American business, we passed tough reforms, and we are holding corporate criminals to account.

text_original: To insist on integrity in American business, we passed tough reforms, and we are holding corporate criminals to account.
text_preceding: To bring our economy out of recession, we delivered the largest tax relief in a generation.
text_following: Some might call this a good record.

text_original: Some might call this a good record.
text_preceding: To insist on integrity in American business, we passed tough reforms, and we are holding corporate criminals to account.
text_following: Tonight I ask the House and the Senate to join me in the next bold steps to serve our fellow citizens.

text_original: Tonight I ask the House and the Senate to join me in the next bold steps to serve our fellow citizens.
text_preceding: Some might call this a good record.
text_following: Our first goal is clear: We must have an economy that grows fast enough to employ every man and woman who seeks a job.

text_original: Our first goal is clear: We must have an economy that grows fast enough to employ every man and woman who seeks a job.
text_preceding: Tonight I ask the House and the Senate to join me in the next bold steps to serve our fellow citizens.
text_following: After recession, terrorist attacks, corporate scandals, and stock market declines, our economy is recovering.

text_original: After recession, terrorist attacks, corporate scandals, and stock market declines, our economy is recovering.
text_preceding: Our first goal is clear: We must have an economy that grows fast enough to employ every man and woman who seeks a job.
text_following: Yet, it's not growing fast enough or strongly enough.

text_original: Yet, it's not growing fast enough or strongly enough.
text_preceding: After recession, terrorist attacks, corporate scandals, and stock market declines, our economy is recovering.
text_following: With unemployment rising, our Nation needs more small businesses to open, more companies to invest and expand, more employers to put up the sign that says, ``Help Wanted.''

text_original: With unemployment rising, our Nation needs more small businesses to open, more companies to invest and expand, more employers to put up the sign that says, ``Help Wanted.''
text_preceding: Yet, it's not growing fast enough or strongly enough.
text_following: Jobs are created when the economy grows.

text_original: Jobs are created when the economy grows.
text_preceding: With unemployment rising, our Nation needs more small businesses to open, more companies to invest and expand, more employers to put up the sign that says, ``Help Wanted.''
text_following: The economy grows when Americans have more money to spend and invest, and the best and fairest way to make sure Americans have that money is not to tax it away in the first place.

text_original: The economy grows when Americans have more money to spend and invest, and the best and fairest way to make sure Americans have that money is not to tax it away in the first place.
text_preceding: Jobs are created when the economy grows.
text_following: I am proposing that all the income-tax reductions set for 2004 and 2006 be made permanent and effective this year.

text_original: I am proposing that all the income-tax reductions set for 2004 and 2006 be made permanent and effective this year.
text_preceding: The economy grows when Americans have more money to spend and invest, and the best and fairest way to make sure Americans have that money is not to tax it away in the first place.
text_following: And under my plan, as soon as I've signed the bill, this extra money will start showing up in workers' paychecks.

text_original: And under my plan, as soon as I've signed the bill, this extra money will start showing up in workers' paychecks.
text_preceding: I am proposing that all the income-tax reductions set for 2004 and 2006 be made permanent and effective this year.
text_following: Instead of gradually reducing the marriage penalty, we should do it now.

text_original: Instead of gradually reducing the marriage penalty, we should do it now.
text_preceding: And under my plan, as soon as I've signed the bill, this extra money will start showing up in workers' paychecks.
text_following: Instead of slowly raising the child credit to $1,000, we should send the checks to American families now.

text_original: Instead of slowly raising the child credit to $1,000, we should send the checks to American families now.
text_preceding: Instead of gradually reducing the marriage penalty, we should do it now.
text_following: The tax relief is for everyone who pays income taxes, and it will help our economy immediately: 92 million Americans will keep, this year, an average of almost $1,100 more of their own money;

text_original: The tax relief is for everyone who pays income taxes, and it will help our economy immediately: 92 million Americans will keep, this year, an average of almost $1,100 more of their own money;
text_preceding: Instead of slowly raising the child credit to $1,000, we should send the checks to American families now.
text_following: a family of 4 with an income of $40,000 would see their Federal income taxes fall from $1,178 to $45 per year;

text_original: a family of 4 with an income of $40,000 would see their Federal income taxes fall from $1,178 to $45 per year;
text_preceding: The tax relief is for everyone who pays income taxes, and it will help our economy immediately: 92 million Americans will keep, this year, an average of almost $1,100 more of their own money;
text_following: our plan will improve the bottom line for more than 23 million small businesses.

text_original: our plan will improve the bottom line for more than 23 million small businesses.
text_preceding: a family of 4 with an income of $40,000 would see their Federal income taxes fall from $1,178 to $45 per year;
text_following: You, the Congress, have already passed all these reductions and promised them for future years.

text_original: You, the Congress, have already passed all these reductions and promised them for future years.
text_preceding: our plan will improve the bottom line for more than 23 million small businesses.
text_following: If this tax relief is good for Americans 3, or 5, or 7 years from now, it is even better for Americans today.

text_original: If this tax relief is good for Americans 3, or 5, or 7 years from now, it is even better for Americans today.
text_preceding: You, the Congress, have already passed all these reductions and promised them for future years.
text_following: We should also strengthen the economy by treating investors equally in our tax laws.

text_original: We should also strengthen the economy by treating investors equally in our tax laws.
text_preceding: If this tax relief is good for Americans 3, or 5, or 7 years from now, it is even better for Americans today.
text_following: It's fair to tax a company's profits.

text_original: It's fair to tax a company's profits.
text_preceding: We should also strengthen the economy by treating investors equally in our tax laws.
text_following: It is not fair to again tax the shareholder on the same profits.

text_original: It is not fair to again tax the shareholder on the same profits.
text_preceding: It's fair to tax a company's profits.
text_following: To boost investor confidence and to help the nearly 10 million seniors who receive dividend income, I ask you to end the unfair double taxation of dividends.

text_original: To boost investor confidence and to help the nearly 10 million seniors who receive dividend income, I ask you to end the unfair double taxation of dividends.
text_preceding: It is not fair to again tax the shareholder on the same profits.
text_following: Lower taxes and greater investment will help this economy expand.

text_original: Lower taxes and greater investment will help this economy expand.
text_preceding: To boost investor confidence and to help the nearly 10 million seniors who receive dividend income, I ask you to end the unfair double taxation of dividends.
text_following: More jobs mean more taxpayers and higher revenues to our Government.

text_original: More jobs mean more taxpayers and higher revenues to our Government.
text_preceding: Lower taxes and greater investment will help this economy expand.
text_following: The best way to address the deficit and move toward a balanced budget is to encourage economic growth and to show some spending discipline in Washington, DC.

text_original: The best way to address the deficit and move toward a balanced budget is to encourage economic growth and to show some spending discipline in Washington, DC.
text_preceding: More jobs mean more taxpayers and higher revenues to our Government.
text_following: We must work together to fund only our most important priorities.

text_original: We must work together to fund only our most important priorities.
text_preceding: The best way to address the deficit and move toward a balanced budget is to encourage economic growth and to show some spending discipline in Washington, DC.
text_following: I will send you a budget that increases discretionary spending by 4 percent next year, about as much as the average family's income is expected to grow.

text_original: I will send you a budget that increases discretionary spending by 4 percent next year, about as much as the average family's income is expected to grow.
text_preceding: We must work together to fund only our most important priorities.
text_following: And that is a good benchmark for us.

text_original: And that is a good benchmark for us.
text_preceding: I will send you a budget that increases discretionary spending by 4 percent next year, about as much as the average family's income is expected to grow.
text_following: Federal spending should not rise any faster than the paychecks of American families.

text_original: Federal spending should not rise any faster than the paychecks of American families.
text_preceding: And that is a good benchmark for us.
text_following: A growing economy and a focus on essential priorities will be crucial to the future of Social Security.

text_original: A growing economy and a focus on essential priorities will be crucial to the future of Social Security.
text_preceding: Federal spending should not rise any faster than the paychecks of American families.
text_following: As we continue to work together to keep Social Security sound and reliable, we must offer younger workers a chance to invest in retirement accounts that they will control and they will own.

text_original: As we continue to work together to keep Social Security sound and reliable, we must offer younger workers a chance to invest in retirement accounts that they will control and they will own.
text_preceding: A growing economy and a focus on essential priorities will be crucial to the future of Social Security.
text_following: Our second goal is high quality, affordable health for all Americans.

text_original: Our second goal is high quality, affordable health for all Americans.
text_preceding: As we continue to work together to keep Social Security sound and reliable, we must offer younger workers a chance to invest in retirement accounts that they will control and they will own.
text_following: The American system of medicine is a model of skill and innovation, with a pace of discovery that is adding good years to our lives.

text_original: The American system of medicine is a model of skill and innovation, with a pace of discovery that is adding good years to our lives.
text_preceding: Our second goal is high quality, affordable health for all Americans.
text_following: Yet for many people, medical care costs too much, and many have no health coverage at all.

text_original: Yet for many people, medical care costs too much, and many have no health coverage at all.
text_preceding: The American system of medicine is a model of skill and innovation, with a pace of discovery that is adding good years to our lives.
text_following: These problems will not be solved with a nationalized health care system that dictates coverage and rations care.

text_original: These problems will not be solved with a nationalized health care system that dictates coverage and rations care.
text_preceding: Yet for many people, medical care costs too much, and many have no health coverage at all.
text_following: Instead, we must work toward a system in which all Americans have a good insurance policy, choose their own doctors, and seniors and low-income Americans receive the help they need.

text_original: Instead, we must work toward a system in which all Americans have a good insurance policy, choose their own doctors, and seniors and low-income Americans receive the help they need.
text_preceding: These problems will not be solved with a nationalized health care system that dictates coverage and rations care.
text_following: Instead of bureaucrats and trial lawyers and HMOs, we must put doctors and nurses and patients back in charge of American medicine.

text_original: Instead of bureaucrats and trial lawyers and HMOs, we must put doctors and nurses and patients back in charge of American medicine.
text_preceding: Instead, we must work toward a system in which all Americans have a good insurance policy, choose their own doctors, and seniors and low-income Americans receive the help they need.
text_following: Health care reform must begin with Medicare.

text_original: Health care reform must begin with Medicare.
text_preceding: Instead of bureaucrats and trial lawyers and HMOs, we must put doctors and nurses and patients back in charge of American medicine.
text_following: Medicare is the binding commitment of a caring society.

text_original: Medicare is the binding commitment of a caring society.
text_preceding: Health care reform must begin with Medicare.
text_following: We must renew that commitment by giving seniors access to preventive medicine and new drugs that are transforming health care in America.

text_original: We must renew that commitment by giving seniors access to preventive medicine and new drugs that are transforming health care in America.
text_preceding: Medicare is the binding commitment of a caring society.
text_following: Seniors happy with the current Medicare system should be able to keep their coverage just the way it is.

text_original: Seniors happy with the current Medicare system should be able to keep their coverage just the way it is.
text_preceding: We must renew that commitment by giving seniors access to preventive medicine and new drugs that are transforming health care in America.
text_following: And just like you, the Members of Congress, and your staffs and other Federal employees, all seniors should have the choice of a health care plan that provides prescription drugs.

text_original: And just like you, the Members of Congress, and your staffs and other Federal employees, all seniors should have the choice of a health care plan that provides prescription drugs.
text_preceding: Seniors happy with the current Medicare system should be able to keep their coverage just the way it is.
text_following: My budget will commit an additional $400 billion over the next decade to reform and strengthen Medicare.

text_original: My budget will commit an additional $400 billion over the next decade to reform and strengthen Medicare.
text_preceding: And just like you, the Members of Congress, and your staffs and other Federal employees, all seniors should have the choice of a health care plan that provides prescription drugs.
text_following: Leaders of both political parties have talked for years about strengthening Medicare.

text_original: Leaders of both political parties have talked for years about strengthening Medicare.
text_preceding: My budget will commit an additional $400 billion over the next decade to reform and strengthen Medicare.
text_following: I urge the Members of this new Congress to act this year.

text_original: I urge the Members of this new Congress to act this year.
text_preceding: Leaders of both political parties have talked for years about strengthening Medicare.
text_following: To improve our health care system, we must address one of the prime causes of higher cost, the constant threat that physicians and hospitals will be unfairly sued.

text_original: To improve our health care system, we must address one of the prime causes of higher cost, the constant threat that physicians and hospitals will be unfairly sued.
text_preceding: I urge the Members of this new Congress to act this year.
text_following: Because of excessive litigation, everybody pays more for health care, and many parts of America are losing fine doctors.

text_original: Because of excessive litigation, everybody pays more for health care, and many parts of America are losing fine doctors.
text_preceding: To improve our health care system, we must address one of the prime causes of higher cost, the constant threat that physicians and hospitals will be unfairly sued.
text_following: No one has ever been healed by a frivolous lawsuit.

text_original: No one has ever been healed by a frivolous lawsuit.
text_preceding: Because of excessive litigation, everybody pays more for health care, and many parts of America are losing fine doctors.
text_following: I urge the Congress to pass medical liability reform.

text_original: I urge the Congress to pass medical liability reform.
text_preceding: No one has ever been healed by a frivolous lawsuit.
text_following: Our third goal is to promote energy independence for our country, while dramatically improving the environment.

text_original: Our third goal is to promote energy independence for our country, while dramatically improving the environment.
text_preceding: I urge the Congress to pass medical liability reform.
text_following: I have sent you a comprehensive energy plan to promote energy efficiency and conservation, to develop cleaner technology, and to produce more energy at home.

text_original: I have sent you a comprehensive energy plan to promote energy efficiency and conservation, to develop cleaner technology, and to produce more energy at home.
text_preceding: Our third goal is to promote energy independence for our country, while dramatically improving the environment.
text_following: I have sent you Clear Skies legislation that mandates a 70-percent cut in air pollution from powerplants over the next 15 years.

text_original: I have sent you Clear Skies legislation that mandates a 70-percent cut in air pollution from powerplants over the next 15 years.
text_preceding: I have sent you a comprehensive energy plan to promote energy efficiency and conservation, to develop cleaner technology, and to produce more energy at home.
text_following: I have sent you a Healthy Forests Initiative, to help prevent the catastrophic fires that devastate communities, kill wildlife, and burn away millions of acres of treasured forests.

text_original: I have sent you a Healthy Forests Initiative, to help prevent the catastrophic fires that devastate communities, kill wildlife, and burn away millions of acres of treasured forests.
text_preceding: I have sent you Clear Skies legislation that mandates a 70-percent cut in air pollution from powerplants over the next 15 years.
text_following: I urge you to pass these measures, for the good of both our environment and our economy.

text_original: I urge you to pass these measures, for the good of both our environment and our economy.
text_preceding: I have sent you a Healthy Forests Initiative, to help prevent the catastrophic fires that devastate communities, kill wildlife, and burn away millions of acres of treasured forests.
text_following: Even more, I ask you to take a crucial step and protect our environment in ways that generations before us could not have imagined.

text_original: Even more, I ask you to take a crucial step and protect our environment in ways that generations before us could not have imagined.
text_preceding: I urge you to pass these measures, for the good of both our environment and our economy.
text_following: In this century, the greatest environmental progress will come about not through endless lawsuits or command-and-control regulations but through technology and innovation.

text_original: In this century, the greatest environmental progress will come about not through endless lawsuits or command-and-control regulations but through technology and innovation.
text_preceding: Even more, I ask you to take a crucial step and protect our environment in ways that generations before us could not have imagined.
text_following: Tonight I'm proposing $1.2 billion in research funding so that America can lead the world in developing clean,hydrogen-powered automobiles.

text_original: Tonight I'm proposing $1.2 billion in research funding so that America can lead the world in developing clean,hydrogen-powered automobiles.
text_preceding: In this century, the greatest environmental progress will come about not through endless lawsuits or command-and-control regulations but through technology and innovation.
text_following: A simple chemical reaction between hydrogen and oxygen generates energy, which can be used to power a car, producing only water, not exhaust fumes.

text_original: A simple chemical reaction between hydrogen and oxygen generates energy, which can be used to power a car, producing only water, not exhaust fumes.
text_preceding: Tonight I'm proposing $1.2 billion in research funding so that America can lead the world in developing clean,hydrogen-powered automobiles.
text_following: With a new national commitment, our scientists and engineers will overcome obstacles to taking these cars from laboratory to showroom, so that the first car driven by a child born today could be powered by hydrogen and pollution-free.

text_original: With a new national commitment, our scientists and engineers will overcome obstacles to taking these cars from laboratory to showroom, so that the first car driven by a child born today could be powered by hydrogen and pollution-free.
text_preceding: A simple chemical reaction between hydrogen and oxygen generates energy, which can be used to power a car, producing only water, not exhaust fumes.
text_following: Join me in this important innovation to make our air significantly cleaner and our country much less dependent on foreign sources of energy.

text_original: Join me in this important innovation to make our air significantly cleaner and our country much less dependent on foreign sources of energy.
text_preceding: With a new national commitment, our scientists and engineers will overcome obstacles to taking these cars from laboratory to showroom, so that the first car driven by a child born today could be powered by hydrogen and pollution-free.
text_following: Our fourth goal is to apply the compassion of America to the deepest problems of America.

text_original: Our fourth goal is to apply the compassion of America to the deepest problems of America.
text_preceding: Join me in this important innovation to make our air significantly cleaner and our country much less dependent on foreign sources of energy.
text_following: For so many in our country, the homeless and the fatherless, the addicted, the need is great.

text_original: For so many in our country, the homeless and the fatherless, the addicted, the need is great.
text_preceding: Our fourth goal is to apply the compassion of America to the deepest problems of America.
text_following: Yet there's power, wonder-working power, in the goodness and idealism and faith of the American people.

text_original: Yet there's power, wonder-working power, in the goodness and idealism and faith of the American people.
text_preceding: For so many in our country, the homeless and the fatherless, the addicted, the need is great.
text_following: Americans are doing the work of compassion every day, visiting prisoners, providing shelter for battered women, bringing companionship to lonely seniors.

text_original: Americans are doing the work of compassion every day, visiting prisoners, providing shelter for battered women, bringing companionship to lonely seniors.
text_preceding: Yet there's power, wonder-working power, in the goodness and idealism and faith of the American people.
text_following: These good works deserve our praise.

text_original: These good works deserve our praise.
text_preceding: Americans are doing the work of compassion every day, visiting prisoners, providing shelter for battered women, bringing companionship to lonely seniors.
text_following: They deserve our personal support, and when appropriate, they deserve the assistance of the Federal Government.

text_original: They deserve our personal support, and when appropriate, they deserve the assistance of the Federal Government.
text_preceding: These good works deserve our praise.
text_following: I urge you to pass both my Faith-Based Initiative and the Citizen Service Act, to encourage acts of compassion that can transform America,one heart and one soul at a time.

text_original: I urge you to pass both my Faith-Based Initiative and the Citizen Service Act, to encourage acts of compassion that can transform America,one heart and one soul at a time.
text_preceding: They deserve our personal support, and when appropriate, they deserve the assistance of the Federal Government.
text_following: Last year, I called on my fellow citizens to participate in the USA Freedom Corps, which is enlisting tens of thousands of new volunteers across America.

text_original: Last year, I called on my fellow citizens to participate in the USA Freedom Corps, which is enlisting tens of thousands of new volunteers across America.
text_preceding: I urge you to pass both my Faith-Based Initiative and the Citizen Service Act, to encourage acts of compassion that can transform America,one heart and one soul at a time.
text_following: Tonight I ask Congress and the American people to focus the spirit of service and the resources of Government on the needs of some of our most vulnerable citizens -- boys and girls trying to grow up without guidance and attention...and children who have to go through a prison gate to be hugged by their mom or their dad.

text_original: Tonight I ask Congress and the American people to focus the spirit of service and the resources of Government on the needs of some of our most vulnerable citizens -- boys and girls trying to grow up without guidance and attention...and children who have to go through a prison gate to be hugged by their mom or their dad.
text_preceding: Last year, I called on my fellow citizens to participate in the USA Freedom Corps, which is enlisting tens of thousands of new volunteers across America.
text_following: I propose a $450 million initiative to bring mentors to more than a million disadvantaged junior high students and children of prisoners.

text_original: I propose a $450 million initiative to bring mentors to more than a million disadvantaged junior high students and children of prisoners.
text_preceding: Tonight I ask Congress and the American people to focus the spirit of service and the resources of Government on the needs of some of our most vulnerable citizens -- boys and girls trying to grow up without guidance and attention...and children who have to go through a prison gate to be hugged by their mom or their dad.
text_following: Government will support the training and recruiting of mentors.

text_original: Government will support the training and recruiting of mentors.
text_preceding: I propose a $450 million initiative to bring mentors to more than a million disadvantaged junior high students and children of prisoners.
text_following: Yet it is the men and women of America who will fill the need.

text_original: Yet it is the men and women of America who will fill the need.
text_preceding: Government will support the training and recruiting of mentors.
text_following: One mentor, one person can change a life forever, and I urge you to be that one person.

text_original: One mentor, one person can change a life forever, and I urge you to be that one person.
text_preceding: Yet it is the men and women of America who will fill the need.
text_following: Another cause of hopelessness is addiction to drugs.

text_original: Another cause of hopelessness is addiction to drugs.
text_preceding: One mentor, one person can change a life forever, and I urge you to be that one person.
text_following: Addiction crowds out friendship, ambition, moral conviction and reduces all the richness of life to a single destructive desire.

text_original: Addiction crowds out friendship, ambition, moral conviction and reduces all the richness of life to a single destructive desire.
text_preceding: Another cause of hopelessness is addiction to drugs.
text_following: As a government, we are fighting illegal drugs by cutting off supplies and reducing demand through antidrug education programs.

text_original: As a government, we are fighting illegal drugs by cutting off supplies and reducing demand through antidrug education programs.
text_preceding: Addiction crowds out friendship, ambition, moral conviction and reduces all the richness of life to a single destructive desire.
text_following: Yet for those already addicted, the fight against drugs is a fight for their own lives.

text_original: Yet for those already addicted, the fight against drugs is a fight for their own lives.
text_preceding: As a government, we are fighting illegal drugs by cutting off supplies and reducing demand through antidrug education programs.
text_following: Too many Americans in search of treatment cannot get it.

text_original: Too many Americans in search of treatment cannot get it.
text_preceding: Yet for those already addicted, the fight against drugs is a fight for their own lives.
text_following: So tonight I propose a new $600 million program to help an additional 300,000 Americans receive treatment over the next 3 years.

text_original: So tonight I propose a new $600 million program to help an additional 300,000 Americans receive treatment over the next 3 years.
text_preceding: Too many Americans in search of treatment cannot get it.
text_following: Our Nation is blessed with recovery programs that do amazing work.

text_original: Our Nation is blessed with recovery programs that do amazing work.
text_preceding: So tonight I propose a new $600 million program to help an additional 300,000 Americans receive treatment over the next 3 years.
text_following: One of them is found at the Healing Place Church in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.

text_original: One of them is found at the Healing Place Church in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
text_preceding: Our Nation is blessed with recovery programs that do amazing work.
text_following: A man in the program said, ``God does miracles in people's lives, and you never think it could be you.''

text_original: A man in the program said, ``God does miracles in people's lives, and you never think it could be you.''
text_preceding: One of them is found at the Healing Place Church in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
text_following: Tonight let us bring to all Americans who struggle with drug addiction this message of hope: The miracle of recovery is possible, and it could be you.

text_preceding: A man in the program said, ``God does miracles in people's lives, and you never think it could be you.''
text_following: By caring for children who need mentors and for addicted men and women who need treatment, we are building a more welcoming society, a culture that values every life.

text_original: By caring for children who need mentors and for addicted men and women who need treatment, we are building a more welcoming society, a culture that values every life.
text_preceding: Tonight let us bring to all Americans who struggle with drug addiction this message of hope: The miracle of recovery is possible, and it could be you.
text_following: And in this work, we must not overlook the weakest among us.

text_original: And in this work, we must not overlook the weakest among us.
text_preceding: By caring for children who need mentors and for addicted men and women who need treatment, we are building a more welcoming society, a culture that values every life.
text_following: I ask you to protect infants at the very hour of their birth and end the practice of partial-birth abortion.

text_original: I ask you to protect infants at the very hour of their birth and end the practice of partial-birth abortion.
text_preceding: And in this work, we must not overlook the weakest among us.
text_following: And because no human life should be started or ended as the object of an experiment, I ask you to set a high standard for humanity and pass a law against all human cloning.

text_original: And because no human life should be started or ended as the object of an experiment, I ask you to set a high standard for humanity and pass a law against all human cloning.
text_preceding: I ask you to protect infants at the very hour of their birth and end the practice of partial-birth abortion.

text_preceding: And because no human life should be started or ended as the object of an experiment, I ask you to set a high standard for humanity and pass a law against all human cloning.
text_following: The American flag stands for more than our power and our interests.

text_original: The American flag stands for more than our power and our interests.
text_preceding: The qualities of courage and compassion that we strive for in America also determine our conduct abroad.
text_following: Our Founders dedicated this country to the cause of human dignity, the rights of every person, and the possibilities of every life.

text_original: Our Founders dedicated this country to the cause of human dignity, the rights of every person, and the possibilities of every life.
text_preceding: The American flag stands for more than our power and our interests.
text_following: This conviction leads us into the world to help the afflicted and defend the peace and confound the designs of evil men.

text_original: This conviction leads us into the world to help the afflicted and defend the peace and confound the designs of evil men.
text_preceding: Our Founders dedicated this country to the cause of human dignity, the rights of every person, and the possibilities of every life.
text_following: In Afghanistan, we helped to liberate an oppressed people.

text_preceding: This conviction leads us into the world to help the afflicted and defend the peace and confound the designs of evil men.
text_following: And we will continue helping them secure their country, rebuild their society, and educate all their children, boys and girls.

text_preceding: In Afghanistan, we helped to liberate an oppressed people.
text_following: In the Middle East, we will continue to seek peace between a secure Israel and a democratic Palestine.

text_preceding: And we will continue helping them secure their country, rebuild their society, and educate all their children, boys and girls.

text_preceding: Across the Earth, America is feeding the hungry.

text_following: More than 4 million require immediate drug treatment.

text_following: Yet across that continent, only 50,000 AIDS victims--only 50,000--are receiving the medicine they need.

text_original: A doctor in rural South Africa describes his frustration.

text_following: He says, ``We have no medicines.

text_following: In an age of miraculous medicines, no person should have to hear those words.

text_preceding: Many hospitals tell people, `You've got AIDS.
text_following: Antiretroviral drugs can extend life for many years.

text_original: Antiretroviral drugs can extend life for many years.
text_preceding: In an age of miraculous medicines, no person should have to hear those words.
text_following: And the cost of those drugs has dropped from $12,000 a year to under $300 a year, which places a tremendous possibility within our grasp.

text_original: And the cost of those drugs has dropped from $12,000 a year to under $300 a year, which places a tremendous possibility within our grasp.
text_preceding: Antiretroviral drugs can extend life for many years.
text_following: Ladies and gentlemen, seldom has history offered a greater opportunity to do so much for so many.

text_original: Ladies and gentlemen, seldom has history offered a greater opportunity to do so much for so many.
text_preceding: And the cost of those drugs has dropped from $12,000 a year to under $300 a year, which places a tremendous possibility within our grasp.
text_following: We have confronted and will continue to confront HIV/AIDS in our own country.

text_original: We have confronted and will continue to confront HIV/AIDS in our own country.
text_preceding: Ladies and gentlemen, seldom has history offered a greater opportunity to do so much for so many.
text_following: And to meet a severe and urgent crisis abroad, tonight I propose the Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, a work of mercy beyond all current international efforts to help the people of Africa.

text_original: And to meet a severe and urgent crisis abroad, tonight I propose the Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, a work of mercy beyond all current international efforts to help the people of Africa.
text_preceding: We have confronted and will continue to confront HIV/AIDS in our own country.
text_following: This comprehensive plan will prevent 7 million new AIDS infections, treat at least 2 million people with life-extending drugs, and provide humane care for millions of people suffering from AIDS and for children orphaned by AIDS.

text_original: This comprehensive plan will prevent 7 million new AIDS infections, treat at least 2 million people with life-extending drugs, and provide humane care for millions of people suffering from AIDS and for children orphaned by AIDS.
text_preceding: And to meet a severe and urgent crisis abroad, tonight I propose the Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, a work of mercy beyond all current international efforts to help the people of Africa.
text_following: I ask the Congress to commit $15 billion over the next 5 years, including nearly $10 billion in new money, to turn the tide against AIDS in the most afflicted nations of Africa and the Caribbean.

text_preceding: This comprehensive plan will prevent 7 million new AIDS infections, treat at least 2 million people with life-extending drugs, and provide humane care for millions of people suffering from AIDS and for children orphaned by AIDS.
text_following: This Nation can lead the world in sparing innocent people from a plague of nature.

text_original: This Nation can lead the world in sparing innocent people from a plague of nature.
text_preceding: I ask the Congress to commit $15 billion over the next 5 years, including nearly $10 billion in new money, to turn the tide against AIDS in the most afflicted nations of Africa and the Caribbean.
text_following: And this Nation is leading the world in confronting and defeating the manmade evil of international terrorism.

text_original: And this Nation is leading the world in confronting and defeating the manmade evil of international terrorism.
text_preceding: This Nation can lead the world in sparing innocent people from a plague of nature.
text_following: There are days when our fellow citizens do not hear news about the war on terror.

text_original: There are days when our fellow citizens do not hear news about the war on terror.
text_preceding: And this Nation is leading the world in confronting and defeating the manmade evil of international terrorism.
text_following: There's never a day when I do not learn of another threat or receive reports of operations in progress or give an order in this global war against a scattered network of killers.

text_original: There's never a day when I do not learn of another threat or receive reports of operations in progress or give an order in this global war against a scattered network of killers.
text_preceding: There are days when our fellow citizens do not hear news about the war on terror.
text_following: The war goes on, and we are winning.

text_original: The war goes on, and we are winning.
text_preceding: There's never a day when I do not learn of another threat or receive reports of operations in progress or give an order in this global war against a scattered network of killers.
text_following: To date, we've arrested or otherwise dealt with many key commanders of Al Qaida.

text_original: To date, we've arrested or otherwise dealt with many key commanders of Al Qaida.
text_preceding: The war goes on, and we are winning.
text_following: They include a man who directed logistics and funding for the September the 11th attacks, the chief of Al Qaida operations in the Persian Gulf who planned the bombings of our embassies in east Africa and the U.S.S.Cole, an Al Qaida operations chief from S

text_following: Many others have met a different fate.

text_original: Many others have met a different fate.
text_preceding: All told, more than 3,000 suspected terrorists have been arrested in many countries.
text_following: Let's put it this way: They are no longer a problem to the United States and our friends and allies.

text_original: Let's put it this way: They are no longer a problem to the United States and our friends and allies.
text_preceding: Many others have met a different fate.
text_following: We are working closely with other nations to prevent further attacks.

text_original: We are working closely with other nations to prevent further attacks.
text_preceding: Let's put it this way: They are no longer a problem to the United States and our friends and allies.
text_following: America and coalition countries have uncovered and stopped terrorist conspiracies targeting the Embassy in Yemen, the American Embassy in Singapore, a Saudi military base, ships in the Straits of Hormuz and the Straits of Gibraltar.

text_preceding: We are working closely with other nations to prevent further attacks.

text_following: When I came to this rostrum on September the 20th, 2001, I brought the police shield of a fallen officer, my reminder of lives that ended, and a task that does not end.

text_original: When I came to this rostrum on September the 20th, 2001, I brought the police shield of a fallen officer, my reminder of lives that ended, and a task that does not end.
text_preceding: America is committed to keeping the world's most dangerous weapons out of the hands of the most dangerous regimes.
text_following: I gave to you and to all Americans my complete commitment to securing our country and defeating our enemies.

text_preceding: When I came to this rostrum on September the 20th, 2001, I brought the police shield of a fallen officer, my reminder of lives that ended, and a task that does not end.
text_following: And this pledge, given by one, has been kept by many.

text_original: And this pledge, given by one, has been kept by many.
text_preceding: I gave to you and to all Americans my complete commitment to securing our country and defeating our enemies.
text_following: You in the Congress have provided the resources for our defense, and cast the difficult votes of war and peace.

text_following: And I want you and your families to know: America is proud of you.

text_original: And I want you and your families to know: America is proud of you.
text_preceding: Many of our troops are listening tonight.
text_following: And my administration, and this Congress, will give you the resources you need to fight and win the war on terror.

text_original: And my administration, and this Congress, will give you the resources you need to fight and win the war on terror.
text_preceding: And I want you and your families to know: America is proud of you.
text_following: I know that some people question if America is really in a war at all.

text_original: I know that some people question if America is really in a war at all.
text_preceding: And my administration, and this Congress, will give you the resources you need to fight and win the war on terror.
text_following: They view terrorism more as a crime, a problem to be solved mainly with law enforcement and indictments.

text_preceding: Testing is the only way to identify and help students who are falling behind.
text_following: I refuse to give up on any child -- and the No Child Left Behind Act is opening the door of opportunity to all of America's children.

text_original: I refuse to give up on any child -- and the No Child Left Behind Act is opening the door of opportunity to all of America's children.
text_preceding: This nation will not go back to the days of simply shuffling children along from grade to grade without them learning the basics.
text_following: At the same time, we must ensure that older students and adults can gain the skills they need to find work now.

text_original: At the same time, we must ensure that older students and adults can gain the skills they need to find work now.
text_preceding: I refuse to give up on any child -- and the No Child Left Behind Act is opening the door of opportunity to all of America's children.
text_following: Many of the fastest growing occupations require strong math and science preparation, and training beyond the high school level.

text_original: Many of the fastest growing occupations require strong math and science preparation, and training beyond the high school level.
text_preceding: At the same time, we must ensure that older students and adults can gain the skills they need to find work now.
text_following: So tonight, I propose a series of measures called Jobs for the 21st Century.

text_original: So tonight, I propose a series of measures called Jobs for the 21st Century.
text_preceding: Many of the fastest growing occupations require strong math and science preparation, and training beyond the high school level.
text_following: This program will provide extra help to middle and high school students who fall behind in reading and math, expand advanced placement programs in low-income schools, invite math and science professionals from the private sector to teach part-time in our high schools.

text_original: This program will provide extra help to middle and high school students who fall behind in reading and math, expand advanced placement programs in low-income schools, invite math and science professionals from the private sector to teach part-time in our high schools.
text_preceding: So tonight, I propose a series of measures called Jobs for the 21st Century.
text_following: I propose larger Pell grants for students who prepare for college with demanding courses in high school.

text_original: I propose larger Pell grants for students who prepare for college with demanding courses in high school.
text_preceding: This program will provide extra help to middle and high school students who fall behind in reading and math, expand advanced placement programs in low-income schools, invite math and science professionals from the private sector to teach part-time in our high schools.
text_following: I propose increasing our support for America's fine community colleges, so they can.

text_original: I propose increasing our support for America's fine community colleges, so they can.
text_preceding: I propose larger Pell grants for students who prepare for college with demanding courses in high school.
text_following: I do so, so they can train workers for industries that are creating the most new jobs.

text_original: I do so, so they can train workers for industries that are creating the most new jobs.
text_preceding: I propose increasing our support for America's fine community colleges, so they can.
text_following: By all these actions, we'll help more and more Americans to join in the growing prosperity of our country.

text_original: By all these actions, we'll help more and more Americans to join in the growing prosperity of our country.
text_preceding: I do so, so they can train workers for industries that are creating the most new jobs.
text_following: Job training is important, and so is job creation.

text_original: Job training is important, and so is job creation.
text_preceding: By all these actions, we'll help more and more Americans to join in the growing prosperity of our country.
text_following: We must continue to pursue an aggressive, pro-growth economic agenda.

text_original: We must continue to pursue an aggressive, pro-growth economic agenda.
text_preceding: Job training is important, and so is job creation.
text_following: Congress has some unfinished business on the issue of taxes.

text_original: Congress has some unfinished business on the issue of taxes.
text_preceding: We must continue to pursue an aggressive, pro-growth economic agenda.
text_following: The tax reductions you passed are set to expire.

text_original: The tax reductions you passed are set to expire.
text_preceding: Congress has some unfinished business on the issue of taxes.
text_following: Unless you act -- unless you act -- unless you act, the unfair tax on marriage will go back up.

text_original: Unless you act -- unless you act -- unless you act, the unfair tax on marriage will go back up.
text_preceding: The tax reductions you passed are set to expire.
text_following: Unless you act, millions of families will be charged $300 more in federal taxes for every child.

text_original: Unless you act, millions of families will be charged $300 more in federal taxes for every child.
text_preceding: Unless you act -- unless you act -- unless you act, the unfair tax on marriage will go back up.
text_following: Unless you act, small businesses will pay higher taxes.

text_original: Unless you act, small businesses will pay higher taxes.
text_preceding: Unless you act, millions of families will be charged $300 more in federal taxes for every child.
text_following: Unless you act, the death tax will eventually come back to life.

text_original: Unless you act, the death tax will eventually come back to life.
text_preceding: Unless you act, small businesses will pay higher taxes.
text_following: Unless you act, Americans face a tax increase.

text_original: Unless you act, Americans face a tax increase.
text_preceding: Unless you act, the death tax will eventually come back to life.
text_following: What Congress has given, the Congress should not take away.

text_original: What Congress has given, the Congress should not take away.
text_preceding: Unless you act, Americans face a tax increase.
text_following: For the sake of job growth, the tax cuts you passed should be permanent.

text_original: For the sake of job growth, the tax cuts you passed should be permanent.
text_preceding: What Congress has given, the Congress should not take away.
text_following: Our agenda for jobs and growth must help small business owners and employees with relief from needless federal regulation, and protect them from junk and frivolous lawsuits.

text_original: Our agenda for jobs and growth must help small business owners and employees with relief from needless federal regulation, and protect them from junk and frivolous lawsuits.
text_preceding: For the sake of job growth, the tax cuts you passed should be permanent.
text_following: Consumers and businesses need reliable supplies of energy to make our economy run -- so I urge you to pass legislation to modernize our electricity system, promote conservation, and make America less dependent on foreign sources of energy.

text_original: Consumers and businesses need reliable supplies of energy to make our economy run -- so I urge you to pass legislation to modernize our electricity system, promote conservation, and make America less dependent on foreign sources of energy.
text_preceding: Our agenda for jobs and growth must help small business owners and employees with relief from needless federal regulation, and protect them from junk and frivolous lawsuits.
text_following: My administration is promoting free and fair trade to open up new markets for America's entrepreneurs and manufacturers and farmers -- to create jobs for American workers.

text_original: My administration is promoting free and fair trade to open up new markets for America's entrepreneurs and manufacturers and farmers -- to create jobs for American workers.
text_preceding: Consumers and businesses need reliable supplies of energy to make our economy run -- so I urge you to pass legislation to modernize our electricity system, promote conservation, and make America less dependent on foreign sources of energy.
text_following: Younger workers should have the opportunity to build a nest egg by saving part of their Social Security taxes in a personal retirement account.

text_original: Younger workers should have the opportunity to build a nest egg by saving part of their Social Security taxes in a personal retirement account.
text_preceding: My administration is promoting free and fair trade to open up new markets for America's entrepreneurs and manufacturers and farmers -- to create jobs for American workers.
text_following: We should make the Social Security system a source of ownership for the American people.

text_original: We should make the Social Security system a source of ownership for the American people.
text_preceding: Younger workers should have the opportunity to build a nest egg by saving part of their Social Security taxes in a personal retirement account.
text_following: And we should limit the burden of government on this economy by acting as good stewards of taxpayers' dollars.

text_original: And we should limit the burden of government on this economy by acting as good stewards of taxpayers' dollars.
text_preceding: We should make the Social Security system a source of ownership for the American people.
text_following: In two weeks, I will send you a budget that funds the war, protects the homeland, and meets important domestic needs, while limiting the growth in discretionary spending to less than 4 percent.

text_original: In two weeks, I will send you a budget that funds the war, protects the homeland, and meets important domestic needs, while limiting the growth in discretionary spending to less than 4 percent.
text_preceding: And we should limit the burden of government on this economy by acting as good stewards of taxpayers' dollars.
text_following: This will require that Congress focus on priorities, cut wasteful spending, and be wise with the people's money.

text_original: This will require that Congress focus on priorities, cut wasteful spending, and be wise with the people's money.
text_preceding: In two weeks, I will send you a budget that funds the war, protects the homeland, and meets important domestic needs, while limiting the growth in discretionary spending to less than 4 percent.
text_following: By doing so, we can cut the deficit in half over the next five years.

text_original: By doing so, we can cut the deficit in half over the next five years.
text_preceding: This will require that Congress focus on priorities, cut wasteful spending, and be wise with the people's money.
text_following: Tonight, I also ask you to reform our immigration laws so they reflect our values and benefit our economy.

text_original: Tonight, I also ask you to reform our immigration laws so they reflect our values and benefit our economy.
text_preceding: By doing so, we can cut the deficit in half over the next five years.
text_following: I propose a new temporary worker program to match willing foreign workers with willing employers when no Americans can be found to fill the job.
