text_original: I propose a new temporary worker program to match willing foreign workers with willing employers when no Americans can be found to fill the job.
text_preceding: Tonight, I also ask you to reform our immigration laws so they reflect our values and benefit our economy.
text_following: This reform will be good for our economy because employers will find needed workers in an honest and orderly system.

text_original: This reform will be good for our economy because employers will find needed workers in an honest and orderly system.
text_preceding: I propose a new temporary worker program to match willing foreign workers with willing employers when no Americans can be found to fill the job.
text_following: A temporary worker program will help protect our homeland, allowing Border Patrol and law enforcement to focus on true threats to our national security.

text_original: A temporary worker program will help protect our homeland, allowing Border Patrol and law enforcement to focus on true threats to our national security.
text_preceding: This reform will be good for our economy because employers will find needed workers in an honest and orderly system.
text_following: I oppose amnesty, because it would encourage further illegal immigration, and unfairly reward those who break our laws.

text_original: I oppose amnesty, because it would encourage further illegal immigration, and unfairly reward those who break our laws.
text_preceding: A temporary worker program will help protect our homeland, allowing Border Patrol and law enforcement to focus on true threats to our national security.
text_following: My temporary worker program will preserve the citizenship path for those who respect the law, while bringing millions of hardworking men and women out from the shadows of American life.

text_original: My temporary worker program will preserve the citizenship path for those who respect the law, while bringing millions of hardworking men and women out from the shadows of American life.
text_preceding: I oppose amnesty, because it would encourage further illegal immigration, and unfairly reward those who break our laws.
text_following: Our nation's health care system, like our economy, is also in a time of change.

text_original: Our nation's health care system, like our economy, is also in a time of change.
text_preceding: My temporary worker program will preserve the citizenship path for those who respect the law, while bringing millions of hardworking men and women out from the shadows of American life.
text_following: Amazing medical technologies are improving and saving lives.

text_original: Amazing medical technologies are improving and saving lives.
text_preceding: Our nation's health care system, like our economy, is also in a time of change.
text_following: This dramatic progress has brought its own challenge, in the rising costs of medical care and health insurance.

text_original: This dramatic progress has brought its own challenge, in the rising costs of medical care and health insurance.
text_preceding: Amazing medical technologies are improving and saving lives.
text_following: Members of Congress, we must work together to help control those costs and extend the benefits of modern medicine throughout our country.

text_original: Members of Congress, we must work together to help control those costs and extend the benefits of modern medicine throughout our country.
text_preceding: This dramatic progress has brought its own challenge, in the rising costs of medical care and health insurance.
text_following: Meeting these goals requires bipartisan effort, and two months ago, you showed the way.

text_original: Meeting these goals requires bipartisan effort, and two months ago, you showed the way.
text_preceding: Members of Congress, we must work together to help control those costs and extend the benefits of modern medicine throughout our country.
text_following: By strengthening Medicare and adding a prescription drug benefit, you kept a basic commitment to our seniors: You are giving them the modern medicine they deserve.

text_original: By strengthening Medicare and adding a prescription drug benefit, you kept a basic commitment to our seniors: You are giving them the modern medicine they deserve.
text_preceding: Meeting these goals requires bipartisan effort, and two months ago, you showed the way.
text_following: Starting this year, under the law you passed, seniors can choose to receive a drug discount card, saving them 10 to 25 percent off the retail price of most prescription drugs -- and millions of low-income seniors can get an additional $600 to buy medicine.

text_original: Starting this year, under the law you passed, seniors can choose to receive a drug discount card, saving them 10 to 25 percent off the retail price of most prescription drugs -- and millions of low-income seniors can get an additional $600 to buy medicine.
text_preceding: By strengthening Medicare and adding a prescription drug benefit, you kept a basic commitment to our seniors: You are giving them the modern medicine they deserve.
text_following: Beginning next year, seniors will have new coverage for preventive screenings against diabetes and heart disease, and seniors just entering Medicare can receive wellness exams.

text_original: Beginning next year, seniors will have new coverage for preventive screenings against diabetes and heart disease, and seniors just entering Medicare can receive wellness exams.
text_preceding: Starting this year, under the law you passed, seniors can choose to receive a drug discount card, saving them 10 to 25 percent off the retail price of most prescription drugs -- and millions of low-income seniors can get an additional $600 to buy medicine.
text_following: In January of 2006, seniors can get prescription drug coverage under Medicare.

text_original: In January of 2006, seniors can get prescription drug coverage under Medicare.
text_preceding: Beginning next year, seniors will have new coverage for preventive screenings against diabetes and heart disease, and seniors just entering Medicare can receive wellness exams.
text_following: For a monthly premium of about $35, most seniors who do not have that coverage today can expect to see their drug bills cut roughly in half.

text_original: For a monthly premium of about $35, most seniors who do not have that coverage today can expect to see their drug bills cut roughly in half.
text_preceding: In January of 2006, seniors can get prescription drug coverage under Medicare.
text_following: Under this reform, senior citizens will be able to keep their Medicare just as it is, or they can choose a Medicare plan that fits them best -- just as you, as members of Congress, can choose an insurance plan that meets your needs.

text_original: Under this reform, senior citizens will be able to keep their Medicare just as it is, or they can choose a Medicare plan that fits them best -- just as you, as members of Congress, can choose an insurance plan that meets your needs.
text_preceding: For a monthly premium of about $35, most seniors who do not have that coverage today can expect to see their drug bills cut roughly in half.
text_following: And starting this year, millions of Americans will be able to save money tax-free for their medical expenses in a health savings account.

text_original: And starting this year, millions of Americans will be able to save money tax-free for their medical expenses in a health savings account.
text_preceding: Under this reform, senior citizens will be able to keep their Medicare just as it is, or they can choose a Medicare plan that fits them best -- just as you, as members of Congress, can choose an insurance plan that meets your needs.
text_following: I signed this measure proudly, and any attempt to limit the choices of our seniors, or to take away their prescription drug coverage under Medicare, will meet my veto.

text_original: I signed this measure proudly, and any attempt to limit the choices of our seniors, or to take away their prescription drug coverage under Medicare, will meet my veto.
text_preceding: And starting this year, millions of Americans will be able to save money tax-free for their medical expenses in a health savings account.
text_following: On the critical issue of health care, our goal is to ensure that Americans can choose and afford private health care coverage that best fits their individual needs.

text_original: On the critical issue of health care, our goal is to ensure that Americans can choose and afford private health care coverage that best fits their individual needs.
text_preceding: I signed this measure proudly, and any attempt to limit the choices of our seniors, or to take away their prescription drug coverage under Medicare, will meet my veto.
text_following: To make insurance more affordable, Congress must act to address rapidly rising health care costs.

text_original: To make insurance more affordable, Congress must act to address rapidly rising health care costs.
text_preceding: On the critical issue of health care, our goal is to ensure that Americans can choose and afford private health care coverage that best fits their individual needs.
text_following: Small businesses should be able to band together and negotiate for lower insurance rates, so they can cover more workers with health insurance.

text_original: Small businesses should be able to band together and negotiate for lower insurance rates, so they can cover more workers with health insurance.
text_preceding: To make insurance more affordable, Congress must act to address rapidly rising health care costs.
text_following: I urge you to pass association health plans.

text_original: I urge you to pass association health plans.
text_preceding: Small businesses should be able to band together and negotiate for lower insurance rates, so they can cover more workers with health insurance.
text_following: I ask you to give lower-income Americans a refundable tax credit that would allow millions to buy their own basic health insurance.

text_original: I ask you to give lower-income Americans a refundable tax credit that would allow millions to buy their own basic health insurance.
text_preceding: I urge you to pass association health plans.
text_following: By computerizing health records, we can avoid dangerous medical mistakes, reduce costs, and improve care.

text_original: By computerizing health records, we can avoid dangerous medical mistakes, reduce costs, and improve care.
text_preceding: I ask you to give lower-income Americans a refundable tax credit that would allow millions to buy their own basic health insurance.
text_following: To protect the doctor-patient relationship, and keep good doctors doing good work, we must eliminate wasteful and frivolous medical lawsuits.

text_original: To protect the doctor-patient relationship, and keep good doctors doing good work, we must eliminate wasteful and frivolous medical lawsuits.
text_preceding: By computerizing health records, we can avoid dangerous medical mistakes, reduce costs, and improve care.
text_following: And tonight I propose that individuals who buy catastrophic health care coverage, as part of our new health savings accounts, be allowed to deduct 100 percent of the premiums from their taxes.

text_original: And tonight I propose that individuals who buy catastrophic health care coverage, as part of our new health savings accounts, be allowed to deduct 100 percent of the premiums from their taxes.
text_preceding: To protect the doctor-patient relationship, and keep good doctors doing good work, we must eliminate wasteful and frivolous medical lawsuits.
text_following: A government-run health care system is the wrong prescription.

text_original: A government-run health care system is the wrong prescription.
text_preceding: And tonight I propose that individuals who buy catastrophic health care coverage, as part of our new health savings accounts, be allowed to deduct 100 percent of the premiums from their taxes.
text_following: By keeping costs under control, expanding access, and helping more Americans afford coverage, we will preserve the system of private medicine that makes America's health care the best in the world.

text_original: By keeping costs under control, expanding access, and helping more Americans afford coverage, we will preserve the system of private medicine that makes America's health care the best in the world.
text_preceding: A government-run health care system is the wrong prescription.
text_following: We are living in a time of great change -- in our world, in our economy, in science and medicine.

text_original: We are living in a time of great change -- in our world, in our economy, in science and medicine.
text_preceding: By keeping costs under control, expanding access, and helping more Americans afford coverage, we will preserve the system of private medicine that makes America's health care the best in the world.
text_following: Yet some things endure -- courage and compassion, reverence and integrity, respect for differences of faith and race.

text_original: Yet some things endure -- courage and compassion, reverence and integrity, respect for differences of faith and race.
text_preceding: We are living in a time of great change -- in our world, in our economy, in science and medicine.
text_following: The values we try to live by never change.

text_original: The values we try to live by never change.
text_preceding: Yet some things endure -- courage and compassion, reverence and integrity, respect for differences of faith and race.
text_following: And they are instilled in us by fundamental institutions, such as families and schools and religious congregations.

text_original: And they are instilled in us by fundamental institutions, such as families and schools and religious congregations.
text_preceding: The values we try to live by never change.
text_following: These institutions, these unseen pillars of civilization, must remain strong in America, and we will defend them.

text_original: These institutions, these unseen pillars of civilization, must remain strong in America, and we will defend them.
text_preceding: And they are instilled in us by fundamental institutions, such as families and schools and religious congregations.
text_following: We must stand with our families to help them raise healthy, responsible children.

text_original: We must stand with our families to help them raise healthy, responsible children.
text_preceding: These institutions, these unseen pillars of civilization, must remain strong in America, and we will defend them.
text_following: When it comes to helping children make right choices, there is work for all of us to do.

text_original: When it comes to helping children make right choices, there is work for all of us to do.
text_preceding: We must stand with our families to help them raise healthy, responsible children.
text_following: One of the worst decisions our children can make is to gamble their lives and futures on drugs.

text_original: One of the worst decisions our children can make is to gamble their lives and futures on drugs.
text_preceding: When it comes to helping children make right choices, there is work for all of us to do.
text_following: Our government is helping parents confront this problem with aggressive education, treatment, and law enforcement.

text_original: Our government is helping parents confront this problem with aggressive education, treatment, and law enforcement.
text_preceding: One of the worst decisions our children can make is to gamble their lives and futures on drugs.
text_following: Drug use in high school has declined by 11 percent over the last two years.

text_original: Drug use in high school has declined by 11 percent over the last two years.
text_preceding: Our government is helping parents confront this problem with aggressive education, treatment, and law enforcement.
text_following: Four hundred thousand fewer young people are using illegal drugs than in the year 2001.

text_original: Four hundred thousand fewer young people are using illegal drugs than in the year 2001.
text_preceding: Drug use in high school has declined by 11 percent over the last two years.
text_following: In my budget, I proposed new funding to continue our aggressive, community-based strategy to reduce demand for illegal drugs.

text_original: In my budget, I proposed new funding to continue our aggressive, community-based strategy to reduce demand for illegal drugs.
text_preceding: Four hundred thousand fewer young people are using illegal drugs than in the year 2001.
text_following: Drug testing in our schools has proven to be an effective part of this effort.

text_original: Drug testing in our schools has proven to be an effective part of this effort.
text_preceding: In my budget, I proposed new funding to continue our aggressive, community-based strategy to reduce demand for illegal drugs.
text_following: So tonight I proposed an additional $23 million for schools that want to use drug testing as a tool to save children's lives.

text_original: So tonight I proposed an additional $23 million for schools that want to use drug testing as a tool to save children's lives.
text_preceding: Drug testing in our schools has proven to be an effective part of this effort.
text_following: The aim here is not to punish children, but to send them this message: We love you, and we don't want to lose you.

text_original: The aim here is not to punish children, but to send them this message: We love you, and we don't want to lose you.
text_preceding: So tonight I proposed an additional $23 million for schools that want to use drug testing as a tool to save children's lives.
text_following: To help children make right choices, they need good examples.

text_original: To help children make right choices, they need good examples.
text_preceding: The aim here is not to punish children, but to send them this message: We love you, and we don't want to lose you.
text_following: Athletics play such an important role in our society, but, unfortunately, some in professional sports are not setting much of an example.

text_original: Athletics play such an important role in our society, but, unfortunately, some in professional sports are not setting much of an example.
text_preceding: To help children make right choices, they need good examples.
text_following: The use of performance-enhancing drugs like steroids in baseball, football, and other sports is dangerous, and it sends the wrong message -- that there are shortcuts to accomplishment, and that performance is more important than character.

text_original: The use of performance-enhancing drugs like steroids in baseball, football, and other sports is dangerous, and it sends the wrong message -- that there are shortcuts to accomplishment, and that performance is more important than character.
text_preceding: Athletics play such an important role in our society, but, unfortunately, some in professional sports are not setting much of an example.
text_following: So tonight I call on team owners, union representatives, coaches, and players to take the lead, to send the right signal, to get tough, and to get rid of steroids now.

text_original: So tonight I call on team owners, union representatives, coaches, and players to take the lead, to send the right signal, to get tough, and to get rid of steroids now.
text_preceding: The use of performance-enhancing drugs like steroids in baseball, football, and other sports is dangerous, and it sends the wrong message -- that there are shortcuts to accomplishment, and that performance is more important than character.
text_following: To encourage right choices, we must be willing to confront the dangers young people face -- even when they're difficult to talk about.

text_original: To encourage right choices, we must be willing to confront the dangers young people face -- even when they're difficult to talk about.
text_preceding: So tonight I call on team owners, union representatives, coaches, and players to take the lead, to send the right signal, to get tough, and to get rid of steroids now.
text_following: Each year, about 3 million teenagers contract sexually-transmitted diseases that can harm them, or kill them, or prevent them from ever becoming parents.

text_original: Each year, about 3 million teenagers contract sexually-transmitted diseases that can harm them, or kill them, or prevent them from ever becoming parents.
text_preceding: To encourage right choices, we must be willing to confront the dangers young people face -- even when they're difficult to talk about.
text_following: In my budget, I propose a grassroots campaign to help inform families about these medical risks.

text_original: In my budget, I propose a grassroots campaign to help inform families about these medical risks.
text_preceding: Each year, about 3 million teenagers contract sexually-transmitted diseases that can harm them, or kill them, or prevent them from ever becoming parents.
text_following: We will double federal funding for abstinence programs, so schools can teach this fact of life: Abstinence for young people is the only certain way to avoid sexually-transmitted diseases.

text_original: We will double federal funding for abstinence programs, so schools can teach this fact of life: Abstinence for young people is the only certain way to avoid sexually-transmitted diseases.
text_preceding: In my budget, I propose a grassroots campaign to help inform families about these medical risks.
text_following: Decisions children now make can affect their health and character for the rest of their lives.

text_original: Decisions children now make can affect their health and character for the rest of their lives.
text_preceding: We will double federal funding for abstinence programs, so schools can teach this fact of life: Abstinence for young people is the only certain way to avoid sexually-transmitted diseases.
text_following: All of us -- parents and schools and government -- must work together to counter the negative influence of the culture, and to send the right messages to our children.

text_original: All of us -- parents and schools and government -- must work together to counter the negative influence of the culture, and to send the right messages to our children.
text_preceding: Decisions children now make can affect their health and character for the rest of their lives.
text_following: A strong America must also value the institution of marriage.

text_original: A strong America must also value the institution of marriage.
text_preceding: All of us -- parents and schools and government -- must work together to counter the negative influence of the culture, and to send the right messages to our children.
text_following: I believe we should respect individuals as we take a principled stand for one of the most fundamental, enduring institutions of our civilization.

text_original: I believe we should respect individuals as we take a principled stand for one of the most fundamental, enduring institutions of our civilization.
text_preceding: A strong America must also value the institution of marriage.
text_following: Congress has already taken a stand on this issue by passing the Defense of Marriage Act, signed in 1996 by President Clinton.

text_original: Congress has already taken a stand on this issue by passing the Defense of Marriage Act, signed in 1996 by President Clinton.
text_preceding: I believe we should respect individuals as we take a principled stand for one of the most fundamental, enduring institutions of our civilization.
text_following: That statute protects marriage under federal law as a union of a man and a woman, and declares that one state may not redefine marriage for other states.

text_original: That statute protects marriage under federal law as a union of a man and a woman, and declares that one state may not redefine marriage for other states.
text_preceding: Congress has already taken a stand on this issue by passing the Defense of Marriage Act, signed in 1996 by President Clinton.
text_following: Activist judges, however, have begun redefining marriage by court order, without regard for the will of the people and their elected representatives.

text_original: Activist judges, however, have begun redefining marriage by court order, without regard for the will of the people and their elected representatives.
text_preceding: That statute protects marriage under federal law as a union of a man and a woman, and declares that one state may not redefine marriage for other states.
text_following: On an issue of such great consequence, the people's voice must be heard.

text_original: On an issue of such great consequence, the people's voice must be heard.
text_preceding: Activist judges, however, have begun redefining marriage by court order, without regard for the will of the people and their elected representatives.
text_following: If judges insist on forcing their arbitrary will upon the people, the only alternative left to the people would be the constitutional process.

text_original: If judges insist on forcing their arbitrary will upon the people, the only alternative left to the people would be the constitutional process.
text_preceding: On an issue of such great consequence, the people's voice must be heard.
text_following: Our nation must defend the sanctity of marriage.

text_original: Our nation must defend the sanctity of marriage.
text_preceding: If judges insist on forcing their arbitrary will upon the people, the only alternative left to the people would be the constitutional process.
text_following: The outcome of this debate is important -- and so is the way we conduct it.

text_original: The outcome of this debate is important -- and so is the way we conduct it.
text_preceding: Our nation must defend the sanctity of marriage.
text_following: The same moral tradition that defines marriage also teaches that each individual has dignity and value in God's sight.

text_original: The same moral tradition that defines marriage also teaches that each individual has dignity and value in God's sight.
text_preceding: The outcome of this debate is important -- and so is the way we conduct it.
text_following: It's also important to strengthen our communities by unleashing the compassion of America's religious institutions.

text_original: It's also important to strengthen our communities by unleashing the compassion of America's religious institutions.
text_preceding: The same moral tradition that defines marriage also teaches that each individual has dignity and value in God's sight.
text_following: Religious charities of every creed are doing some of the most vital work in our country -- mentoring children, feeding the hungry, taking the hand of the lonely.

text_original: Religious charities of every creed are doing some of the most vital work in our country -- mentoring children, feeding the hungry, taking the hand of the lonely.
text_preceding: It's also important to strengthen our communities by unleashing the compassion of America's religious institutions.
text_following: Yet government has often denied social service grants and contracts to these groups, just because they have a cross or a Star of David or a crescent on the wall.

text_original: Yet government has often denied social service grants and contracts to these groups, just because they have a cross or a Star of David or a crescent on the wall.
text_preceding: Religious charities of every creed are doing some of the most vital work in our country -- mentoring children, feeding the hungry, taking the hand of the lonely.
text_following: By executive order, I have opened billions of dollars in grant money to competition that includes faith-based charities.

text_original: By executive order, I have opened billions of dollars in grant money to competition that includes faith-based charities.
text_preceding: Yet government has often denied social service grants and contracts to these groups, just because they have a cross or a Star of David or a crescent on the wall.
text_following: Tonight I ask you to codify this into law, so people of faith can know that the law will never discriminate against them again.

text_original: Tonight I ask you to codify this into law, so people of faith can know that the law will never discriminate against them again.
text_preceding: By executive order, I have opened billions of dollars in grant money to competition that includes faith-based charities.
text_following: In the past, we've worked together to bring mentors to children of prisoners, and provide treatment for the addicted, and help for the homeless.

text_original: In the past, we've worked together to bring mentors to children of prisoners, and provide treatment for the addicted, and help for the homeless.
text_preceding: Tonight I ask you to codify this into law, so people of faith can know that the law will never discriminate against them again.
text_following: Tonight I ask you to consider another group of Americans in need of help.

text_original: Tonight I ask you to consider another group of Americans in need of help.
text_preceding: In the past, we've worked together to bring mentors to children of prisoners, and provide treatment for the addicted, and help for the homeless.
text_following: This year, some 600,000 inmates will be released from prison back into society.

text_original: This year, some 600,000 inmates will be released from prison back into society.
text_preceding: Tonight I ask you to consider another group of Americans in need of help.
text_following: We know from long experience that if they can't find work, or a home, or help, they are much more likely to commit crime and return to prison.

text_original: We know from long experience that if they can't find work, or a home, or help, they are much more likely to commit crime and return to prison.
text_preceding: This year, some 600,000 inmates will be released from prison back into society.
text_following: So tonight, I propose a four-year, $300 million prisoner re-entry initiative to expand job training and placement services, to provide transitional housing, and to help newly released prisoners get mentoring, including from faith-based groups.

text_original: So tonight, I propose a four-year, $300 million prisoner re-entry initiative to expand job training and placement services, to provide transitional housing, and to help newly released prisoners get mentoring, including from faith-based groups.
text_preceding: We know from long experience that if they can't find work, or a home, or help, they are much more likely to commit crime and return to prison.
text_following: America is the land of second chance, and when the gates of the prison open, the path ahead should lead to a better lifeFor all Americans, the last three years have brought tests we did not ask for, and achievements shared by all.

text_original: America is the land of second chance, and when the gates of the prison open, the path ahead should lead to a better lifeFor all Americans, the last three years have brought tests we did not ask for, and achievements shared by all.
text_preceding: So tonight, I propose a four-year, $300 million prisoner re-entry initiative to expand job training and placement services, to provide transitional housing, and to help newly released prisoners get mentoring, including from faith-based groups.
text_following: By our actions, we have shown what kind of nation we are.

text_original: By our actions, we have shown what kind of nation we are.
text_preceding: America is the land of second chance, and when the gates of the prison open, the path ahead should lead to a better lifeFor all Americans, the last three years have brought tests we did not ask for, and achievements shared by all.
text_following: In grief, we have found the grace to go on.

text_original: In grief, we have found the grace to go on.
text_preceding: By our actions, we have shown what kind of nation we are.
text_following: In challenge, we rediscovered the courage and daring of a free people.

text_original: In challenge, we rediscovered the courage and daring of a free people.
text_preceding: In grief, we have found the grace to go on.
text_following: In victory, we have shown the noble aims and good heart of America.

text_original: In victory, we have shown the noble aims and good heart of America.
text_preceding: In challenge, we rediscovered the courage and daring of a free people.
text_following: And having come this far, we sense that we live in a time set apart.

text_original: And having come this far, we sense that we live in a time set apart.
text_preceding: In victory, we have shown the noble aims and good heart of America.
text_following: I've been witness to the character of the people of America, who have shown calm in times of danger, compassion for one another, and toughness for the long haul.

text_original: I've been witness to the character of the people of America, who have shown calm in times of danger, compassion for one another, and toughness for the long haul.
text_preceding: And having come this far, we sense that we live in a time set apart.
text_following: All of us have been partners in a great enterprise.

text_original: All of us have been partners in a great enterprise.
text_preceding: I've been witness to the character of the people of America, who have shown calm in times of danger, compassion for one another, and toughness for the long haul.
text_following: And even some of the youngest understand that we are living in historic times.

text_original: And even some of the youngest understand that we are living in historic times.
text_preceding: All of us have been partners in a great enterprise.
text_following: Last month a girl in Lincoln, Rhode Island, sent me a letter.

text_original: Last month a girl in Lincoln, Rhode Island, sent me a letter.
text_preceding: And even some of the youngest understand that we are living in historic times.
text_following: Tonight, Ashley, your message to our troops has just been conveyed.

text_original: Tonight, Ashley, your message to our troops has just been conveyed.
text_preceding: Last month a girl in Lincoln, Rhode Island, sent me a letter.
text_following: And, yes, you have some duties yourself.

text_original: And, yes, you have some duties yourself.
text_preceding: Tonight, Ashley, your message to our troops has just been conveyed.
text_following: And, Ashley, while you do your part, all of us here in this great chamber will do our best to keep you and the rest of America safe and free.

text_original: And, Ashley, while you do your part, all of us here in this great chamber will do our best to keep you and the rest of America safe and free.
text_preceding: And, yes, you have some duties yourself.
text_following: My fellow citizens, we now move forward, with confidence and faith.

text_original: My fellow citizens, we now move forward, with confidence and faith.
text_preceding: And, Ashley, while you do your part, all of us here in this great chamber will do our best to keep you and the rest of America safe and free.
text_following: Our nation is strong and steadfast.

text_original: Our nation is strong and steadfast.
text_preceding: My fellow citizens, we now move forward, with confidence and faith.
text_following: The cause we serve is right, because it is the cause of all mankind.

text_original: The cause we serve is right, because it is the cause of all mankind.
text_preceding: Our nation is strong and steadfast.
text_following: The momentum of freedom in our world is unmistakable -- and it is not carried forward by our power alone.

text_original: The momentum of freedom in our world is unmistakable -- and it is not carried forward by our power alone.
text_preceding: The cause we serve is right, because it is the cause of all mankind.
text_following: We can trust in that greater power who guides the unfolding of the years.

text_original: We can trust in that greater power who guides the unfolding of the years.
text_preceding: The momentum of freedom in our world is unmistakable -- and it is not carried forward by our power alone.
text_following: And in all that is to come, we can know that His purposes are just and true.

text_original: And in all that is to come, we can know that His purposes are just and true.
text_preceding: We can trust in that greater power who guides the unfolding of the years.
text_following: May God continue to bless America.

text_original: May God continue to bless America.
text_preceding: And in all that is to come, we can know that His purposes are just and true.

text_original: Tonight, I have a high privilege and distinct honor of my own--as the first President to begin the State of the Union message with these words: Madam Speaker.
text_following: In his day, the late Congressman Thomas D'Alesandro, Jr., from Baltimore, Maryland, saw Presidents Roosevelt and Truman at this rostrum.

text_original: In his day, the late Congressman Thomas D'Alesandro, Jr., from Baltimore, Maryland, saw Presidents Roosevelt and Truman at this rostrum.
text_preceding: Tonight, I have a high privilege and distinct honor of my own--as the first President to begin the State of the Union message with these words: Madam Speaker.
text_following: But nothing could compare with the sight of his only daughter, Nancy, presiding tonight as Speaker of the House of Representatives.

text_original: But nothing could compare with the sight of his only daughter, Nancy, presiding tonight as Speaker of the House of Representatives.
text_preceding: In his day, the late Congressman Thomas D'Alesandro, Jr., from Baltimore, Maryland, saw Presidents Roosevelt and Truman at this rostrum.
text_following: Congratulations, Madam Speaker.

text_original: Congratulations, Madam Speaker.
text_preceding: But nothing could compare with the sight of his only daughter, Nancy, presiding tonight as Speaker of the House of Representatives.
text_following: Two Members of the House and Senate are not with us tonight, and we pray for the recovery and speedy return of Senator Tim Johnson and Congressman Charlie Norwood.

text_original: Two Members of the House and Senate are not with us tonight, and we pray for the recovery and speedy return of Senator Tim Johnson and Congressman Charlie Norwood.
text_preceding: Congratulations, Madam Speaker.
text_following: Madam Speaker, Vice President Cheney, Members of Congress, distinguished guests, and fellow citizens: This rite of custom brings us together at a defining hour, when decisions are hard and courage is tested.

text_original: Madam Speaker, Vice President Cheney, Members of Congress, distinguished guests, and fellow citizens: This rite of custom brings us together at a defining hour, when decisions are hard and courage is tested.
text_preceding: Two Members of the House and Senate are not with us tonight, and we pray for the recovery and speedy return of Senator Tim Johnson and Congressman Charlie Norwood.
text_following: We enter the year 2007 with large endeavors under way, and others that are ours to begin.

text_original: We enter the year 2007 with large endeavors under way, and others that are ours to begin.
text_preceding: Madam Speaker, Vice President Cheney, Members of Congress, distinguished guests, and fellow citizens: This rite of custom brings us together at a defining hour, when decisions are hard and courage is tested.
text_following: In all of this, much is asked of us.

text_original: In all of this, much is asked of us.
text_preceding: We enter the year 2007 with large endeavors under way, and others that are ours to begin.
text_following: We must have the will to face difficult challenges and determined enemies, and the wisdom to face them together.

text_original: We must have the will to face difficult challenges and determined enemies, and the wisdom to face them together.
text_preceding: In all of this, much is asked of us.
text_following: Some in this Chamber are new to the House and Senate, and I congratulate the Democratic majority.

text_original: Some in this Chamber are new to the House and Senate, and I congratulate the Democratic majority.
text_preceding: We must have the will to face difficult challenges and determined enemies, and the wisdom to face them together.
text_following: Congress has changed, but our responsibilities have not.

text_original: Congress has changed, but our responsibilities have not.
text_preceding: Some in this Chamber are new to the House and Senate, and I congratulate the Democratic majority.
text_following: Each of us is guided by our own convictions, and to these we must stay faithful.

text_original: Each of us is guided by our own convictions, and to these we must stay faithful.
text_preceding: Congress has changed, but our responsibilities have not.
text_following: Yet we are all held to the same standards and called to serve the same good purposes: to extend the Nation's prosperity, to spend the people's money wisely, to solve problems, not leave them to future generations, to guard America against all evil, and to keep faith with those we have sent forth to defend us.

text_original: Yet we are all held to the same standards and called to serve the same good purposes: to extend the Nation's prosperity, to spend the people's money wisely, to solve problems, not leave them to future generations, to guard America against all evil, and to keep faith with those we have sent forth to defend us.
text_preceding: Each of us is guided by our own convictions, and to these we must stay faithful.
text_following: We are not the first to come here with government divided and uncertainty in the air.

text_original: We are not the first to come here with government divided and uncertainty in the air.
text_preceding: Yet we are all held to the same standards and called to serve the same good purposes: to extend the Nation's prosperity, to spend the people's money wisely, to solve problems, not leave them to future generations, to guard America against all evil, and to keep faith with those we have sent forth to defend us.
text_following: Like many before us, we can work through our differences and achieve big things for the American people.

text_original: Like many before us, we can work through our differences and achieve big things for the American people.
text_preceding: We are not the first to come here with government divided and uncertainty in the air.
text_following: Our citizens don't much care which side of the aisle we sit on, as long as we are willing to cross that aisle when there is work to be done.

text_original: Our citizens don't much care which side of the aisle we sit on, as long as we are willing to cross that aisle when there is work to be done.
text_preceding: Like many before us, we can work through our differences and achieve big things for the American people.
text_following: Our job is to make life better for our fellow Americans and help them to build a future of hope and opportunity, and this is the business before us tonight.

text_original: Our job is to make life better for our fellow Americans and help them to build a future of hope and opportunity, and this is the business before us tonight.
text_preceding: Our citizens don't much care which side of the aisle we sit on, as long as we are willing to cross that aisle when there is work to be done.
text_following: A future of hope and opportunity begins with a growing economy, and that is what we have.

text_original: A future of hope and opportunity begins with a growing economy, and that is what we have.
text_preceding: Our job is to make life better for our fellow Americans and help them to build a future of hope and opportunity, and this is the business before us tonight.
text_following: We are now in the 41st month of uninterrupted job growth, in a recovery that has created 7.2 million new jobs, so far.

text_original: We are now in the 41st month of uninterrupted job growth, in a recovery that has created 7.2 million new jobs, so far.
text_preceding: A future of hope and opportunity begins with a growing economy, and that is what we have.
text_following: Unemployment is low, inflation is low, and wages are rising.

text_original: Unemployment is low, inflation is low, and wages are rising.
text_preceding: We are now in the 41st month of uninterrupted job growth, in a recovery that has created 7.2 million new jobs, so far.
text_following: The economy is on the move, and our job is to keep it that way, not with more government but with more enterprise.

text_original: The economy is on the move, and our job is to keep it that way, not with more government but with more enterprise.
text_preceding: Unemployment is low, inflation is low, and wages are rising.
text_following: Next week, I will deliver a full report on the state of our economy.

text_original: Next week, I will deliver a full report on the state of our economy.
text_preceding: The economy is on the move, and our job is to keep it that way, not with more government but with more enterprise.
text_following: Tonight, I want to discuss three economic reforms that deserve to be priorities for this Congress.

text_original: Tonight, I want to discuss three economic reforms that deserve to be priorities for this Congress.
text_preceding: Next week, I will deliver a full report on the state of our economy.
text_following: First, we must balance the Federal budget.

text_original: First, we must balance the Federal budget.
text_preceding: Tonight, I want to discuss three economic reforms that deserve to be priorities for this Congress.
text_following: We can do so without raising taxes.

text_original: We can do so without raising taxes.
text_preceding: First, we must balance the Federal budget.
text_following: What we need to do is impose spending discipline in Washington, D.C.

text_original: What we need to do is impose spending discipline in Washington, D.C.
text_preceding: We can do so without raising taxes.
text_following: We set a goal of cutting the deficit in half by 2009, and met that goal 3 years ahead of schedule.

text_original: We set a goal of cutting the deficit in half by 2009, and met that goal 3 years ahead of schedule.
text_preceding: What we need to do is impose spending discipline in Washington, D.C.
text_following: Now let us take the next step.

text_original: Now let us take the next step.
text_preceding: We set a goal of cutting the deficit in half by 2009, and met that goal 3 years ahead of schedule.
text_following: In the coming weeks, I will submit a budget that eliminates the Federal deficit within the next 5 years.

text_original: In the coming weeks, I will submit a budget that eliminates the Federal deficit within the next 5 years.
text_preceding: Now let us take the next step.
text_following: I ask you to make the same commitment.

text_original: I ask you to make the same commitment.
text_preceding: In the coming weeks, I will submit a budget that eliminates the Federal deficit within the next 5 years.
text_following: Together, we can restrain the spending appetite of the Federal Government and balance the Federal budget.

text_original: Together, we can restrain the spending appetite of the Federal Government and balance the Federal budget.
text_preceding: I ask you to make the same commitment.
text_following: Next, there is the matter of earmarks.

text_original: Next, there is the matter of earmarks.
text_preceding: Together, we can restrain the spending appetite of the Federal Government and balance the Federal budget.
text_following: These special interest items are often slipped into bills at the last hour, when not even C-SPAN is watching.

text_original: These special interest items are often slipped into bills at the last hour, when not even C-SPAN is watching.
text_preceding: Next, there is the matter of earmarks.
text_following: In 2005 alone, the number of earmarks grew to over 13,000 and totaled nearly $18 billion.

text_original: In 2005 alone, the number of earmarks grew to over 13,000 and totaled nearly $18 billion.
text_preceding: These special interest items are often slipped into bills at the last hour, when not even C-SPAN is watching.
text_following: Even worse, over 90 percent of earmarks never make it to the floor of the House and Senate.

text_original: Even worse, over 90 percent of earmarks never make it to the floor of the House and Senate.
text_preceding: In 2005 alone, the number of earmarks grew to over 13,000 and totaled nearly $18 billion.
text_following: They are dropped into committee reports that are not even part of the bill that arrives on my desk.

text_original: They are dropped into committee reports that are not even part of the bill that arrives on my desk.
text_preceding: Even worse, over 90 percent of earmarks never make it to the floor of the House and Senate.
text_following: You did not vote them into law.

text_original: You did not vote them into law.
text_preceding: They are dropped into committee reports that are not even part of the bill that arrives on my desk.
text_following: Yet they are treated as if they have the force of law.

text_original: Yet they are treated as if they have the force of law.
text_preceding: You did not vote them into law.
text_following: The time has come to end this practice.

text_original: The time has come to end this practice.
text_preceding: Yet they are treated as if they have the force of law.
text_following: So let us work together to reform the budget process, expose every earmark to the light of day and to a vote in Congress, and cut the number and cost of earmarks at least in half by the end of this session.

text_original: So let us work together to reform the budget process, expose every earmark to the light of day and to a vote in Congress, and cut the number and cost of earmarks at least in half by the end of this session.
text_preceding: The time has come to end this practice.
text_following: Finally, to keep this economy strong we must take on the challenge of entitlements.

text_original: Finally, to keep this economy strong we must take on the challenge of entitlements.
text_preceding: So let us work together to reform the budget process, expose every earmark to the light of day and to a vote in Congress, and cut the number and cost of earmarks at least in half by the end of this session.
text_following: Social Security and Medicare and Medicaid are commitments of conscience, and so it is our duty to keep them permanently sound.

text_original: Social Security and Medicare and Medicaid are commitments of conscience, and so it is our duty to keep them permanently sound.
text_preceding: Finally, to keep this economy strong we must take on the challenge of entitlements.
text_following: Yet we are failing in that duty, and this failure will one day leave our children with three bad options: huge tax increases, huge deficits, or huge and immediate cuts in benefits.

text_original: Yet we are failing in that duty, and this failure will one day leave our children with three bad options: huge tax increases, huge deficits, or huge and immediate cuts in benefits.
text_preceding: Social Security and Medicare and Medicaid are commitments of conscience, and so it is our duty to keep them permanently sound.
text_following: Everyone in this Chamber knows this to be true, yet somehow we have not found it in ourselves to act.

text_original: Everyone in this Chamber knows this to be true, yet somehow we have not found it in ourselves to act.
text_preceding: Yet we are failing in that duty, and this failure will one day leave our children with three bad options: huge tax increases, huge deficits, or huge and immediate cuts in benefits.
text_following: So let us work together and do it now.

text_original: So let us work together and do it now.
text_preceding: Everyone in this Chamber knows this to be true, yet somehow we have not found it in ourselves to act.
text_following: With enough good sense and good will, you and I can fix Medicare and Medicaid, and save Social Security.

text_original: With enough good sense and good will, you and I can fix Medicare and Medicaid, and save Social Security.
text_preceding: So let us work together and do it now.
text_following: Spreading opportunity and hope in America also requires public schools that give children the knowledge and character they need in life.

text_original: Spreading opportunity and hope in America also requires public schools that give children the knowledge and character they need in life.
text_preceding: With enough good sense and good will, you and I can fix Medicare and Medicaid, and save Social Security.
text_following: Five years ago, we rose above partisan differences to pass the No Child Left Behind Act, preserving local control, raising standards, and holding those schools accountable for results.

text_original: Five years ago, we rose above partisan differences to pass the No Child Left Behind Act, preserving local control, raising standards, and holding those schools accountable for results.
text_preceding: Spreading opportunity and hope in America also requires public schools that give children the knowledge and character they need in life.
text_following: And because we acted, students are performing better in reading and math, and minority students are closing the achievement gap.

text_original: And because we acted, students are performing better in reading and math, and minority students are closing the achievement gap.
text_preceding: Five years ago, we rose above partisan differences to pass the No Child Left Behind Act, preserving local control, raising standards, and holding those schools accountable for results.
text_following: Now the task is to build on this success, without watering down standards, without taking control from local communities, and without back sliding and calling it reform.

text_original: Now the task is to build on this success, without watering down standards, without taking control from local communities, and without back sliding and calling it reform.
text_preceding: And because we acted, students are performing better in reading and math, and minority students are closing the achievement gap.
text_following: We can lift student achievement even higher by giving local leaders flexibility to turn around failing schools, and by giving families with children stuck in failing schools the right to choose someplace better.

text_original: We can lift student achievement even higher by giving local leaders flexibility to turn around failing schools, and by giving families with children stuck in failing schools the right to choose someplace better.
text_preceding: Now the task is to build on this success, without watering down standards, without taking control from local communities, and without back sliding and calling it reform.
text_following: We must increase funds for students who struggle, and make sure these children get the special help they need.

text_original: We must increase funds for students who struggle, and make sure these children get the special help they need.
text_preceding: We can lift student achievement even higher by giving local leaders flexibility to turn around failing schools, and by giving families with children stuck in failing schools the right to choose someplace better.
text_following: And we can make sure our children are prepared for the jobs of the future, and our country is more competitive, by strengthening math and science skills.

text_original: And we can make sure our children are prepared for the jobs of the future, and our country is more competitive, by strengthening math and science skills.
text_preceding: We must increase funds for students who struggle, and make sure these children get the special help they need.
text_following: The No Child Left Behind Act has worked for America's children, and I ask Congress to reauthorize this good law.

text_original: The No Child Left Behind Act has worked for America's children, and I ask Congress to reauthorize this good law.
text_preceding: And we can make sure our children are prepared for the jobs of the future, and our country is more competitive, by strengthening math and science skills.
text_following: A future of hope and opportunity requires that all our citizens have affordable and available health care.

text_original: A future of hope and opportunity requires that all our citizens have affordable and available health care.
text_preceding: The No Child Left Behind Act has worked for America's children, and I ask Congress to reauthorize this good law.
text_following: When it comes to health care, government has an obligation to care for the elderly, the disabled, and poor children, and we will meet those responsibilities.

text_original: When it comes to health care, government has an obligation to care for the elderly, the disabled, and poor children, and we will meet those responsibilities.
text_preceding: A future of hope and opportunity requires that all our citizens have affordable and available health care.
text_following: For all other Americans, private health care insurance is the best way to meet their needs.

text_original: For all other Americans, private health care insurance is the best way to meet their needs.
text_preceding: When it comes to health care, government has an obligation to care for the elderly, the disabled, and poor children, and we will meet those responsibilities.
text_following: But many Americans cannot afford a health insurance policy.

text_original: But many Americans cannot afford a health insurance policy.
text_preceding: For all other Americans, private health care insurance is the best way to meet their needs.
text_following: So tonight, I propose two new initiatives to help more Americans afford their own insurance.

text_original: So tonight, I propose two new initiatives to help more Americans afford their own insurance.
text_preceding: But many Americans cannot afford a health insurance policy.
text_following: First, I propose a standard tax deduction for health insurance that will be like the standard tax deduction for dependents.

text_original: First, I propose a standard tax deduction for health insurance that will be like the standard tax deduction for dependents.
text_preceding: So tonight, I propose two new initiatives to help more Americans afford their own insurance.
text_following: Families with health insurance will pay no income or payroll taxes on $15,000 of their income.

text_original: Families with health insurance will pay no income or payroll taxes on $15,000 of their income.
text_preceding: First, I propose a standard tax deduction for health insurance that will be like the standard tax deduction for dependents.
text_following: Single Americans with health insurance will pay no income or payroll taxes on $7,500 of their income.

text_original: Single Americans with health insurance will pay no income or payroll taxes on $7,500 of their income.
text_preceding: Families with health insurance will pay no income or payroll taxes on $15,000 of their income.
text_following: With this reform, more than 100 million men, women, and children who are now covered by employer-provided insurance will benefit from lower tax bills.

text_original: With this reform, more than 100 million men, women, and children who are now covered by employer-provided insurance will benefit from lower tax bills.
text_preceding: Single Americans with health insurance will pay no income or payroll taxes on $7,500 of their income.
text_following: At the same time, this reform will level the playing field for those who do not get health insurance through their job.

text_original: At the same time, this reform will level the playing field for those who do not get health insurance through their job.
text_preceding: With this reform, more than 100 million men, women, and children who are now covered by employer-provided insurance will benefit from lower tax bills.
text_following: For Americans who now purchase health insurance on their own, this proposal would mean a substantial tax savings, $4,500 for a family of four making $60,000 a year.

text_original: For Americans who now purchase health insurance on their own, this proposal would mean a substantial tax savings, $4,500 for a family of four making $60,000 a year.
text_preceding: At the same time, this reform will level the playing field for those who do not get health insurance through their job.
text_following: And for the millions of other Americans who have no health insurance at all, this deduction would help put a basic private health insurance plan within their reach.

text_original: And for the millions of other Americans who have no health insurance at all, this deduction would help put a basic private health insurance plan within their reach.
text_preceding: For Americans who now purchase health insurance on their own, this proposal would mean a substantial tax savings, $4,500 for a family of four making $60,000 a year.
text_following: Changing the Tax Code is a vital and necessary step to making health care affordable for more Americans.

text_original: Changing the Tax Code is a vital and necessary step to making health care affordable for more Americans.
text_preceding: And for the millions of other Americans who have no health insurance at all, this deduction would help put a basic private health insurance plan within their reach.
text_following: My second proposal is to help the States that are coming up with innovative ways to cover the uninsured.

text_original: My second proposal is to help the States that are coming up with innovative ways to cover the uninsured.
text_preceding: Changing the Tax Code is a vital and necessary step to making health care affordable for more Americans.
text_following: States that make basic private health insurance available to all their citizens should receive Federal funds to help them provide this coverage to the poor and the sick.

text_original: States that make basic private health insurance available to all their citizens should receive Federal funds to help them provide this coverage to the poor and the sick.
text_preceding: My second proposal is to help the States that are coming up with innovative ways to cover the uninsured.
text_following: I have asked the Secretary of Health and Human Services to work with Congress to take existing Federal funds and use them to create ``Affordable Choices'' grants.

text_original: I have asked the Secretary of Health and Human Services to work with Congress to take existing Federal funds and use them to create ``Affordable Choices'' grants.
text_preceding: States that make basic private health insurance available to all their citizens should receive Federal funds to help them provide this coverage to the poor and the sick.
text_following: These grants would give our Nation's Governors more money and more flexibility to get private health insurance to those most in need.

text_original: These grants would give our Nation's Governors more money and more flexibility to get private health insurance to those most in need.
text_preceding: I have asked the Secretary of Health and Human Services to work with Congress to take existing Federal funds and use them to create ``Affordable Choices'' grants.
text_following: There are many other ways that Congress can help.

text_original: There are many other ways that Congress can help.
text_preceding: These grants would give our Nation's Governors more money and more flexibility to get private health insurance to those most in need.
text_following: We need to expand health savings accounts.

text_original: We need to expand health savings accounts.
text_preceding: There are many other ways that Congress can help.
text_following: *We need to help small businesses through association health plans, we need to reduce costs and medical errors with better information technology.

text_original: *We need to help small businesses through association health plans, we need to reduce costs and medical errors with better information technology.
text_preceding: We need to expand health savings accounts.
text_following: We will encourage price transparency, and to protect good doctors from junk lawsuits we need to pass medical liability reform.

text_original: We will encourage price transparency, and to protect good doctors from junk lawsuits we need to pass medical liability reform.
text_preceding: *We need to help small businesses through association health plans, we need to reduce costs and medical errors with better information technology.
text_following: And in all we do, we must remember that the best health care decisions are made not by government and insurance companies, but by patients and their doctors.

text_original: And in all we do, we must remember that the best health care decisions are made not by government and insurance companies, but by patients and their doctors.
text_preceding: We will encourage price transparency, and to protect good doctors from junk lawsuits we need to pass medical liability reform.
text_following: Extending hope and opportunity in our country requires an immigration system worthy of America, with laws that are fair and borders that are secure.

text_original: Extending hope and opportunity in our country requires an immigration system worthy of America, with laws that are fair and borders that are secure.
text_preceding: And in all we do, we must remember that the best health care decisions are made not by government and insurance companies, but by patients and their doctors.
text_following: When laws and borders are routinely violated, this harms the interests of our country.

text_original: When laws and borders are routinely violated, this harms the interests of our country.
text_preceding: Extending hope and opportunity in our country requires an immigration system worthy of America, with laws that are fair and borders that are secure.
text_following: To secure our border, we are doubling the size of the Border Patrol, and funding new infrastructure and technology.

text_original: To secure our border, we are doubling the size of the Border Patrol, and funding new infrastructure and technology.
text_preceding: When laws and borders are routinely violated, this harms the interests of our country.
text_following: Yet even with all these steps, we cannot fully secure the border unless we take pressure off the border, and that requires a temporary worker program.

text_original: Yet even with all these steps, we cannot fully secure the border unless we take pressure off the border, and that requires a temporary worker program.
text_preceding: To secure our border, we are doubling the size of the Border Patrol, and funding new infrastructure and technology.
text_following: We should establish a legal and orderly path for foreign workers to enter our country to work on a temporary basis.

text_original: We should establish a legal and orderly path for foreign workers to enter our country to work on a temporary basis.
text_preceding: Yet even with all these steps, we cannot fully secure the border unless we take pressure off the border, and that requires a temporary worker program.
text_following: As a result, they won't have to try to sneak in, and that will leave border agents free to chase down drug smugglers and criminals and terrorists.

text_original: As a result, they won't have to try to sneak in, and that will leave border agents free to chase down drug smugglers and criminals and terrorists.
text_preceding: We should establish a legal and orderly path for foreign workers to enter our country to work on a temporary basis.
text_following: We will enforce our immigration laws at the work site, and give employers the tools to verify the legal status of their workers, so there is no excuse left for violating the law.

text_original: We will enforce our immigration laws at the work site, and give employers the tools to verify the legal status of their workers, so there is no excuse left for violating the law.
text_preceding: As a result, they won't have to try to sneak in, and that will leave border agents free to chase down drug smugglers and criminals and terrorists.
text_following: We need to uphold the great tradition of the melting pot that welcomes and assimilates new arrivals.

text_original: We need to uphold the great tradition of the melting pot that welcomes and assimilates new arrivals.
text_preceding: We will enforce our immigration laws at the work site, and give employers the tools to verify the legal status of their workers, so there is no excuse left for violating the law.
text_following: We need to resolve the status of illegal immigrants who are already in our country, without animosity and without amnesty.

text_original: We need to resolve the status of illegal immigrants who are already in our country, without animosity and without amnesty.
text_preceding: We need to uphold the great tradition of the melting pot that welcomes and assimilates new arrivals.
text_following: Convictions run deep in this Capitol when it comes to immigration.

text_original: Convictions run deep in this Capitol when it comes to immigration.
text_preceding: We need to resolve the status of illegal immigrants who are already in our country, without animosity and without amnesty.
text_following: Let us have a serious, civil, and conclusive debate, so that you can pass, and I can sign, comprehensive immigration reform into law.

text_original: Let us have a serious, civil, and conclusive debate, so that you can pass, and I can sign, comprehensive immigration reform into law.
text_preceding: Convictions run deep in this Capitol when it comes to immigration.
text_following: Extending hope and opportunity depends on a stable supply of energy that keeps America's economy running and America's environment clean.

text_original: Extending hope and opportunity depends on a stable supply of energy that keeps America's economy running and America's environment clean.
text_preceding: Let us have a serious, civil, and conclusive debate, so that you can pass, and I can sign, comprehensive immigration reform into law.
text_following: For too long our Nation has been dependent on foreign oil, and this dependence leaves us more vulnerable to hostile regimes, and to terrorists, who could cause huge disruptions of oil shipments, and raise the price of oil, and do great harm to our economy.

text_original: For too long our Nation has been dependent on foreign oil, and this dependence leaves us more vulnerable to hostile regimes, and to terrorists, who could cause huge disruptions of oil shipments, and raise the price of oil, and do great harm to our economy.
text_preceding: Extending hope and opportunity depends on a stable supply of energy that keeps America's economy running and America's environment clean.
text_following: It is in our vital interest to diversify America's energy supply, and the way forward is through technology.

text_original: It is in our vital interest to diversify America's energy supply, and the way forward is through technology.
text_preceding: For too long our Nation has been dependent on foreign oil, and this dependence leaves us more vulnerable to hostile regimes, and to terrorists, who could cause huge disruptions of oil shipments, and raise the price of oil, and do great harm to our economy.
text_following: We must continue changing the way America generates electric power, by even greater use of clean coal technology, solar and wind energy, and clean, safe nuclear power.

text_original: We must continue changing the way America generates electric power, by even greater use of clean coal technology, solar and wind energy, and clean, safe nuclear power.
text_preceding: It is in our vital interest to diversify America's energy supply, and the way forward is through technology.
text_following: We need to press on with battery research for plug-in and hybrid vehicles and expand the use of clean diesel vehicles and biodiesel fuel.

text_original: We need to press on with battery research for plug-in and hybrid vehicles and expand the use of clean diesel vehicles and biodiesel fuel.
text_preceding: We must continue changing the way America generates electric power, by even greater use of clean coal technology, solar and wind energy, and clean, safe nuclear power.
text_following: We must continue investing in new methods of producing ethanol, using everything from wood chips, to grasses, to agricultural wastes.

text_original: We must continue investing in new methods of producing ethanol, using everything from wood chips, to grasses, to agricultural wastes.
text_preceding: We need to press on with battery research for plug-in and hybrid vehicles and expand the use of clean diesel vehicles and biodiesel fuel.
text_following: We have made a lot of progress, thanks to good policies here in Washington and the strong response of the market.

text_original: We have made a lot of progress, thanks to good policies here in Washington and the strong response of the market.
text_preceding: We must continue investing in new methods of producing ethanol, using everything from wood chips, to grasses, to agricultural wastes.
text_following: And now even more dramatic advances are within reach.

text_original: And now even more dramatic advances are within reach.
text_preceding: We have made a lot of progress, thanks to good policies here in Washington and the strong response of the market.
text_following: Tonight, I ask Congress to join me in pursuing a great goal.

text_original: Tonight, I ask Congress to join me in pursuing a great goal.
text_preceding: And now even more dramatic advances are within reach.
text_following: Let us build on the work we have done and reduce gasoline usage in the United States by 20 percent in the next 10 years.

text_original: Let us build on the work we have done and reduce gasoline usage in the United States by 20 percent in the next 10 years.
text_preceding: Tonight, I ask Congress to join me in pursuing a great goal.
text_following: When we do that, we will be cutting our total imports by the equivalent of three-quarters of all the oil we now import from the Middle East.

text_original: When we do that, we will be cutting our total imports by the equivalent of three-quarters of all the oil we now import from the Middle East.
text_preceding: Let us build on the work we have done and reduce gasoline usage in the United States by 20 percent in the next 10 years.
text_following: To reach this goal, we must increase the supply of alternative fuels, by setting a mandatory fuels standard to require 35 billion gallons of renewable and alternative fuels in 2017.

text_original: To reach this goal, we must increase the supply of alternative fuels, by setting a mandatory fuels standard to require 35 billion gallons of renewable and alternative fuels in 2017.
text_preceding: When we do that, we will be cutting our total imports by the equivalent of three-quarters of all the oil we now import from the Middle East.
text_following: And that is nearly five times the current target.

text_original: And that is nearly five times the current target.
text_preceding: To reach this goal, we must increase the supply of alternative fuels, by setting a mandatory fuels standard to require 35 billion gallons of renewable and alternative fuels in 2017.
text_following: At the same time, we need to reform and modernize fuel economy standards for cars the way we did for light trucks, and conserve up to 8 1/2 billion more gallons of gasoline by 2017.

text_original: At the same time, we need to reform and modernize fuel economy standards for cars the way we did for light trucks, and conserve up to 8 1/2 billion more gallons of gasoline by 2017.
text_preceding: And that is nearly five times the current target.
text_following: Achieving these ambitious goals will dramatically reduce our dependence on foreign oil, but it is not going to eliminate it.

text_original: Achieving these ambitious goals will dramatically reduce our dependence on foreign oil, but it is not going to eliminate it.
text_preceding: At the same time, we need to reform and modernize fuel economy standards for cars the way we did for light trucks, and conserve up to 8 1/2 billion more gallons of gasoline by 2017.
text_following: So as we continue to diversify our fuel supply, we must also step up domestic oil production in environmentally sensitive ways.

text_original: So as we continue to diversify our fuel supply, we must also step up domestic oil production in environmentally sensitive ways.
text_preceding: Achieving these ambitious goals will dramatically reduce our dependence on foreign oil, but it is not going to eliminate it.
text_following: And to further protect America against severe disruptions to our oil supply, I ask Congress to double the current capacity of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

text_original: And to further protect America against severe disruptions to our oil supply, I ask Congress to double the current capacity of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
text_preceding: So as we continue to diversify our fuel supply, we must also step up domestic oil production in environmentally sensitive ways.
text_following: America is on the verge of technological breakthroughs that will enable us to live our lives less dependent on oil.

text_original: America is on the verge of technological breakthroughs that will enable us to live our lives less dependent on oil.
text_preceding: And to further protect America against severe disruptions to our oil supply, I ask Congress to double the current capacity of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
text_following: These technologies will help us become better stewards of the environment, and they will help us to confront the serious challenge of global climate change.

text_original: These technologies will help us become better stewards of the environment, and they will help us to confront the serious challenge of global climate change.
text_preceding: America is on the verge of technological breakthroughs that will enable us to live our lives less dependent on oil.
text_following: A future of hope and opportunity requires a fair, impartial system of justice.

text_original: A future of hope and opportunity requires a fair, impartial system of justice.
text_preceding: These technologies will help us become better stewards of the environment, and they will help us to confront the serious challenge of global climate change.
text_following: The lives of our citizens across our Nation are affected by the outcome of cases pending in our Federal courts.

text_original: The lives of our citizens across our Nation are affected by the outcome of cases pending in our Federal courts.
text_preceding: A future of hope and opportunity requires a fair, impartial system of justice.
text_following: We have a shared obligation to ensure that the Federal courts have enough judges to hear those cases and deliver timely rulings.

text_original: We have a shared obligation to ensure that the Federal courts have enough judges to hear those cases and deliver timely rulings.
text_preceding: The lives of our citizens across our Nation are affected by the outcome of cases pending in our Federal courts.
text_following: As president, I have a duty to nominate qualified men and women to vacancies on the Federal bench.
