text_original: As president, I have a duty to nominate qualified men and women to vacancies on the Federal bench.
text_preceding: We have a shared obligation to ensure that the Federal courts have enough judges to hear those cases and deliver timely rulings.
text_following: And the United States Senate has a duty as well, to give those nominees a fair hearing and a prompt up-or-down vote on the Senate floor.

text_original: And the United States Senate has a duty as well, to give those nominees a fair hearing and a prompt up-or-down vote on the Senate floor.
text_preceding: As president, I have a duty to nominate qualified men and women to vacancies on the Federal bench.
text_following: For all of us in this room, there is no higher responsibility than to protect the people of this country from danger.

text_original: For all of us in this room, there is no higher responsibility than to protect the people of this country from danger.
text_preceding: And the United States Senate has a duty as well, to give those nominees a fair hearing and a prompt up-or-down vote on the Senate floor.
text_following: Five years have come and gone since we saw the scenes and felt the sorrow that the terrorists can cause.

text_original: Five years have come and gone since we saw the scenes and felt the sorrow that the terrorists can cause.
text_preceding: For all of us in this room, there is no higher responsibility than to protect the people of this country from danger.
text_following: We have had time to take stock of our situation.

text_original: We have had time to take stock of our situation.
text_preceding: Five years have come and gone since we saw the scenes and felt the sorrow that the terrorists can cause.
text_following: We have added many critical protections to guard the homeland.

text_original: We have added many critical protections to guard the homeland.
text_preceding: We have had time to take stock of our situation.
text_following: We know with certainty that the horrors of that September morning were just a glimpse of what the terrorists intend for us, unless we stop them.

text_original: We know with certainty that the horrors of that September morning were just a glimpse of what the terrorists intend for us, unless we stop them.
text_preceding: We have added many critical protections to guard the homeland.
text_following: With the distance of time, we find ourselves debating the causes of conflict and the course we have followed.

text_original: With the distance of time, we find ourselves debating the causes of conflict and the course we have followed.
text_preceding: We know with certainty that the horrors of that September morning were just a glimpse of what the terrorists intend for us, unless we stop them.
text_following: Such debates are essential when a great democracy faces great questions.

text_original: Such debates are essential when a great democracy faces great questions.
text_preceding: With the distance of time, we find ourselves debating the causes of conflict and the course we have followed.
text_following: Yet one question has surely been settled, that to win the war on terror we must take the fight to the enemy.

text_original: Yet one question has surely been settled, that to win the war on terror we must take the fight to the enemy.
text_preceding: Such debates are essential when a great democracy faces great questions.
text_following: From the start, America and our allies have protected our people by staying on the offense.

text_original: From the start, America and our allies have protected our people by staying on the offense.
text_preceding: Yet one question has surely been settled, that to win the war on terror we must take the fight to the enemy.
text_following: The enemy knows that the days of comfortable sanctuary, easy movement, steady financing, and free-flowing communications are long over.

text_original: The enemy knows that the days of comfortable sanctuary, easy movement, steady financing, and free-flowing communications are long over.
text_preceding: From the start, America and our allies have protected our people by staying on the offense.
text_following: For the terrorists, life since 9/11 has never been the same.

text_original: For the terrorists, life since 9/11 has never been the same.
text_preceding: The enemy knows that the days of comfortable sanctuary, easy movement, steady financing, and free-flowing communications are long over.
text_following: Our success in this war is often measured by the things that did not happen.

text_original: Our success in this war is often measured by the things that did not happen.
text_preceding: For the terrorists, life since 9/11 has never been the same.
text_following: We cannot know the full extent of the attacks that we and our allies have prevents, but here is some of what we do know: we stopped an al Qaeda plot to fly a hijacked airplane into the tallest building on the west coast.

text_original: We cannot know the full extent of the attacks that we and our allies have prevents, but here is some of what we do know: we stopped an al Qaeda plot to fly a hijacked airplane into the tallest building on the west coast.
text_preceding: Our success in this war is often measured by the things that did not happen.
text_following: We broke up a Southeast Asian terrorist cell grooming operatives for attacks inside the United States.

text_original: We broke up a Southeast Asian terrorist cell grooming operatives for attacks inside the United States.
text_preceding: We cannot know the full extent of the attacks that we and our allies have prevents, but here is some of what we do know: we stopped an al Qaeda plot to fly a hijacked airplane into the tallest building on the west coast.
text_following: We uncovered an al Qaeda cell developing anthrax to be used in attacks against America.

text_original: We uncovered an al Qaeda cell developing anthrax to be used in attacks against America.
text_preceding: We broke up a Southeast Asian terrorist cell grooming operatives for attacks inside the United States.
text_following: And just last August, British authorities uncovered a plot to blow up passenger planes bound for America over the Atlantic Ocean.

text_original: And just last August, British authorities uncovered a plot to blow up passenger planes bound for America over the Atlantic Ocean.
text_preceding: We uncovered an al Qaeda cell developing anthrax to be used in attacks against America.
text_following: For each life saved, we owe a debt of gratitude to the brave public servants who devote their lives to finding the terrorists and stopping them.

text_original: For each life saved, we owe a debt of gratitude to the brave public servants who devote their lives to finding the terrorists and stopping them.
text_preceding: And just last August, British authorities uncovered a plot to blow up passenger planes bound for America over the Atlantic Ocean.
text_following: Every success against the terrorists is a reminder of the shoreless ambitions of this enemy.

text_original: Every success against the terrorists is a reminder of the shoreless ambitions of this enemy.
text_preceding: For each life saved, we owe a debt of gratitude to the brave public servants who devote their lives to finding the terrorists and stopping them.
text_following: The evil that inspired and rejoiced in 9/11 is still at work in the world.

text_original: The evil that inspired and rejoiced in 9/11 is still at work in the world.
text_preceding: Every success against the terrorists is a reminder of the shoreless ambitions of this enemy.
text_following: And so long as that is the case, America is still a Nation at war.

text_original: And so long as that is the case, America is still a Nation at war.
text_preceding: The evil that inspired and rejoiced in 9/11 is still at work in the world.
text_following: In the minds of the terrorists, this war began well before September 11 and will not end until their radical vision is fulfilled.

text_original: In the minds of the terrorists, this war began well before September 11 and will not end until their radical vision is fulfilled.
text_preceding: And so long as that is the case, America is still a Nation at war.
text_following: And these past 5 years have given us a much clearer view of the nature of this enemy.

text_original: And these past 5 years have given us a much clearer view of the nature of this enemy.
text_preceding: In the minds of the terrorists, this war began well before September 11 and will not end until their radical vision is fulfilled.
text_following: Al Qaeda and its followers are Sunni extremists, possessed by hatred and commanded by a harsh and narrow ideology.

text_original: Al Qaeda and its followers are Sunni extremists, possessed by hatred and commanded by a harsh and narrow ideology.
text_preceding: And these past 5 years have given us a much clearer view of the nature of this enemy.
text_following: Take almost any principle of civilization, and their goal is the opposite.

text_original: Take almost any principle of civilization, and their goal is the opposite.
text_preceding: Al Qaeda and its followers are Sunni extremists, possessed by hatred and commanded by a harsh and narrow ideology.
text_following: They preach with threats, instruct with bullets and bombs, and promise paradise for the murder of the innocent.

text_original: They preach with threats, instruct with bullets and bombs, and promise paradise for the murder of the innocent.
text_preceding: Take almost any principle of civilization, and their goal is the opposite.
text_following: Our enemies are quite explicit about their intentions.

text_original: Our enemies are quite explicit about their intentions.
text_preceding: They preach with threats, instruct with bullets and bombs, and promise paradise for the murder of the innocent.
text_following: They want to overthrow moderate governments and establish safe havens from which to plan and carry out new attacks on our country.

text_original: They want to overthrow moderate governments and establish safe havens from which to plan and carry out new attacks on our country.
text_preceding: Our enemies are quite explicit about their intentions.
text_following: By killing and terrorizing Americans, they want to force our country to retreat from the world and abandon the cause of liberty.

text_original: By killing and terrorizing Americans, they want to force our country to retreat from the world and abandon the cause of liberty.
text_preceding: They want to overthrow moderate governments and establish safe havens from which to plan and carry out new attacks on our country.
text_following: They would then be free to impose their will and spread their totalitarian ideology.

text_original: They would then be free to impose their will and spread their totalitarian ideology.
text_preceding: By killing and terrorizing Americans, they want to force our country to retreat from the world and abandon the cause of liberty.
text_following: These men are not given to idle words, and they are just one camp in the Islamist radical movement.

text_original: These men are not given to idle words, and they are just one camp in the Islamist radical movement.
text_preceding: They would then be free to impose their will and spread their totalitarian ideology.
text_following: In recent times, it has also become clear that we face an escalating danger from Shia extremists who are just as hostile to America and are also determined to dominate the Middle East.

text_original: In recent times, it has also become clear that we face an escalating danger from Shia extremists who are just as hostile to America and are also determined to dominate the Middle East.
text_preceding: These men are not given to idle words, and they are just one camp in the Islamist radical movement.
text_following: Many are known to take direction from the regime in Iran, which is funding and arming terrorists like Hezbollah, a group second only to al Qaeda in the American lives it has taken.

text_original: Many are known to take direction from the regime in Iran, which is funding and arming terrorists like Hezbollah, a group second only to al Qaeda in the American lives it has taken.
text_preceding: In recent times, it has also become clear that we face an escalating danger from Shia extremists who are just as hostile to America and are also determined to dominate the Middle East.
text_following: The Shia and Sunni extremists are different faces of the same totalitarian threat.

text_original: The Shia and Sunni extremists are different faces of the same totalitarian threat.
text_preceding: Many are known to take direction from the regime in Iran, which is funding and arming terrorists like Hezbollah, a group second only to al Qaeda in the American lives it has taken.
text_following: Whatever slogans they chant, when they slaughter the innocent, they have the same wicked purposes.

text_original: Whatever slogans they chant, when they slaughter the innocent, they have the same wicked purposes.
text_preceding: The Shia and Sunni extremists are different faces of the same totalitarian threat.
text_following: They want to kill Americans, kill democracy in the Middle East, and gain the weapons to kill on an even more horrific scale.

text_original: They want to kill Americans, kill democracy in the Middle East, and gain the weapons to kill on an even more horrific scale.
text_preceding: Whatever slogans they chant, when they slaughter the innocent, they have the same wicked purposes.
text_following: In the sixth year since our Nation was attacked, I wish I could report to you that the dangers had ended.

text_original: In the sixth year since our Nation was attacked, I wish I could report to you that the dangers had ended.
text_preceding: They want to kill Americans, kill democracy in the Middle East, and gain the weapons to kill on an even more horrific scale.
text_following: And so it remains the policy of this government to use every lawful and proper tool of intelligence, diplomacy, law enforcement, and military action to do our duty, to find these enemies, and to protect the American people.

text_original: And so it remains the policy of this government to use every lawful and proper tool of intelligence, diplomacy, law enforcement, and military action to do our duty, to find these enemies, and to protect the American people.
text_preceding: In the sixth year since our Nation was attacked, I wish I could report to you that the dangers had ended.
text_following: This war is more than a clash of arms.

text_original: This war is more than a clash of arms.
text_preceding: And so it remains the policy of this government to use every lawful and proper tool of intelligence, diplomacy, law enforcement, and military action to do our duty, to find these enemies, and to protect the American people.
text_following: It is a decisive ideological struggle, and the security of our Nation is in the balance.

text_original: It is a decisive ideological struggle, and the security of our Nation is in the balance.
text_preceding: This war is more than a clash of arms.
text_following: To prevail, we must remove the conditions that inspire blind hatred, and drove 19 men to get onto airplanes and to come and kill us.

text_original: To prevail, we must remove the conditions that inspire blind hatred, and drove 19 men to get onto airplanes and to come and kill us.
text_preceding: It is a decisive ideological struggle, and the security of our Nation is in the balance.
text_following: What every terrorist fears most is human freedom, societies where men and women make their own choices, answer to their own conscience, and live by their hopes instead of their resentments.

text_original: What every terrorist fears most is human freedom, societies where men and women make their own choices, answer to their own conscience, and live by their hopes instead of their resentments.
text_preceding: To prevail, we must remove the conditions that inspire blind hatred, and drove 19 men to get onto airplanes and to come and kill us.
text_following: Free people are not drawn to violent and malignant ideologies, and most will choose a better way when they are given a chance.

text_original: Free people are not drawn to violent and malignant ideologies, and most will choose a better way when they are given a chance.
text_preceding: What every terrorist fears most is human freedom, societies where men and women make their own choices, answer to their own conscience, and live by their hopes instead of their resentments.
text_following: So we advance our own security interests by helping moderates, reformers, and brave voices for democracy.

text_original: So we advance our own security interests by helping moderates, reformers, and brave voices for democracy.
text_preceding: Free people are not drawn to violent and malignant ideologies, and most will choose a better way when they are given a chance.
text_following: The great question of our day is whether America will help men and women in the Middle East to build free societies and share in the rights of all humanity.

text_original: The great question of our day is whether America will help men and women in the Middle East to build free societies and share in the rights of all humanity.
text_preceding: So we advance our own security interests by helping moderates, reformers, and brave voices for democracy.
text_following: And I say, for the sake of our own security, we must.

text_original: And I say, for the sake of our own security, we must.
text_preceding: The great question of our day is whether America will help men and women in the Middle East to build free societies and share in the rights of all humanity.
text_following: In the last 2 years, we have seen the desire for liberty in the broader Middle East, and we have been sobered by the enemy's fierce reaction.

text_original: In the last 2 years, we have seen the desire for liberty in the broader Middle East, and we have been sobered by the enemy's fierce reaction.
text_preceding: And I say, for the sake of our own security, we must.
text_following: In 2005, the world watched as the citizens of Lebanon raised the banner of the Cedar Revolution.

text_original: In 2005, the world watched as the citizens of Lebanon raised the banner of the Cedar Revolution.
text_preceding: In the last 2 years, we have seen the desire for liberty in the broader Middle East, and we have been sobered by the enemy's fierce reaction.
text_following: They drove out the Syrian occupiers, and chose new leaders in free elections.

text_original: They drove out the Syrian occupiers, and chose new leaders in free elections.
text_preceding: In 2005, the world watched as the citizens of Lebanon raised the banner of the Cedar Revolution.
text_following: In 2005, the people of Afghanistan defied the terrorists and elected a democratic legislature.

text_original: In 2005, the people of Afghanistan defied the terrorists and elected a democratic legislature.
text_preceding: They drove out the Syrian occupiers, and chose new leaders in free elections.
text_following: And in 2005, the Iraqi people held three national elections, choosing a transitional government, adopting the most progressive, democratic constitution in the Arab world, and then electing a government under that constitution.

text_original: And in 2005, the Iraqi people held three national elections, choosing a transitional government, adopting the most progressive, democratic constitution in the Arab world, and then electing a government under that constitution.
text_preceding: In 2005, the people of Afghanistan defied the terrorists and elected a democratic legislature.
text_following: Despite endless threats from the killers in their midst, nearly 12 million Iraqi citizens came out to vote in a show of hope and solidarity we should never forget.

text_original: Despite endless threats from the killers in their midst, nearly 12 million Iraqi citizens came out to vote in a show of hope and solidarity we should never forget.
text_preceding: And in 2005, the Iraqi people held three national elections, choosing a transitional government, adopting the most progressive, democratic constitution in the Arab world, and then electing a government under that constitution.
text_following: A thinking enemy watched all of these scenes, adjusted their tactics, and in 2006 they struck back.

text_original: A thinking enemy watched all of these scenes, adjusted their tactics, and in 2006 they struck back.
text_preceding: Despite endless threats from the killers in their midst, nearly 12 million Iraqi citizens came out to vote in a show of hope and solidarity we should never forget.
text_following: In Lebanon, assassins took the life of Pierre Gemayel, a prominent participant in the Cedar Revolution.

text_original: In Lebanon, assassins took the life of Pierre Gemayel, a prominent participant in the Cedar Revolution.
text_preceding: A thinking enemy watched all of these scenes, adjusted their tactics, and in 2006 they struck back.
text_following: Hezbollah terrorists, with support from Syria and Iran, sowed conflict in the region and are seeking to undermine Lebanon's legitimately elected government.

text_original: Hezbollah terrorists, with support from Syria and Iran, sowed conflict in the region and are seeking to undermine Lebanon's legitimately elected government.
text_preceding: In Lebanon, assassins took the life of Pierre Gemayel, a prominent participant in the Cedar Revolution.
text_following: In Afghanistan, Taliban and al Qaeda fighters tried to regain power by regrouping and engaging Afghan and NATO forces.

text_original: In Afghanistan, Taliban and al Qaeda fighters tried to regain power by regrouping and engaging Afghan and NATO forces.
text_preceding: Hezbollah terrorists, with support from Syria and Iran, sowed conflict in the region and are seeking to undermine Lebanon's legitimately elected government.
text_following: In Iraq, al Qaeda and other Sunni extremists blew up one of the most sacred places in Shia Islam, the Golden Mosque of Samarra.

text_original: In Iraq, al Qaeda and other Sunni extremists blew up one of the most sacred places in Shia Islam, the Golden Mosque of Samarra.
text_preceding: In Afghanistan, Taliban and al Qaeda fighters tried to regain power by regrouping and engaging Afghan and NATO forces.
text_following: This atrocity, directed at a Muslim house of prayer, was designed to provoke retaliation from Iraqi Shia, and it succeeded.

text_original: This atrocity, directed at a Muslim house of prayer, was designed to provoke retaliation from Iraqi Shia, and it succeeded.
text_preceding: In Iraq, al Qaeda and other Sunni extremists blew up one of the most sacred places in Shia Islam, the Golden Mosque of Samarra.
text_following: Radical Shia elements, some of whom receive support from Iran, formed death squads.

text_original: Radical Shia elements, some of whom receive support from Iran, formed death squads.
text_preceding: This atrocity, directed at a Muslim house of prayer, was designed to provoke retaliation from Iraqi Shia, and it succeeded.
text_following: The result was a tragic escalation of sectarian rage and reprisal that continues to this day.

text_original: The result was a tragic escalation of sectarian rage and reprisal that continues to this day.
text_preceding: Radical Shia elements, some of whom receive support from Iran, formed death squads.
text_following: This is not the fight we entered in Iraq, but it is the fight we are in.

text_original: This is not the fight we entered in Iraq, but it is the fight we are in.
text_preceding: The result was a tragic escalation of sectarian rage and reprisal that continues to this day.
text_following: Every one of us wishes that this war were over and won.

text_original: Every one of us wishes that this war were over and won.
text_preceding: This is not the fight we entered in Iraq, but it is the fight we are in.
text_following: Yet it would not be like us to leave our promises unkept, our friends abandoned, and our own security at risk.

text_original: Yet it would not be like us to leave our promises unkept, our friends abandoned, and our own security at risk.
text_preceding: Every one of us wishes that this war were over and won.
text_following: Ladies and gentlemen, on this day, at this hour, it is still within our power to shape the outcome of this battle.

text_original: Ladies and gentlemen, on this day, at this hour, it is still within our power to shape the outcome of this battle.
text_preceding: Yet it would not be like us to leave our promises unkept, our friends abandoned, and our own security at risk.
text_following: Let us find our resolve and turn events toward victory.

text_original: Let us find our resolve and turn events toward victory.
text_preceding: Ladies and gentlemen, on this day, at this hour, it is still within our power to shape the outcome of this battle.
text_following: We are carrying out a new strategy in Iraq, a plan that demands more from Iraq's elected government and gives our forces in Iraq the reinforcements they need to complete their mission.

text_original: We are carrying out a new strategy in Iraq, a plan that demands more from Iraq's elected government and gives our forces in Iraq the reinforcements they need to complete their mission.
text_preceding: Let us find our resolve and turn events toward victory.
text_following: Our goal is a democratic Iraq that upholds the rule of law, respects the rights of its people, provides them security, and is an ally in the war on terror.

text_original: Our goal is a democratic Iraq that upholds the rule of law, respects the rights of its people, provides them security, and is an ally in the war on terror.
text_preceding: We are carrying out a new strategy in Iraq, a plan that demands more from Iraq's elected government and gives our forces in Iraq the reinforcements they need to complete their mission.
text_following: In order to make progress toward this goal, the Iraqi Government must stop the sectarian violence in its capital.

text_original: In order to make progress toward this goal, the Iraqi Government must stop the sectarian violence in its capital.
text_preceding: Our goal is a democratic Iraq that upholds the rule of law, respects the rights of its people, provides them security, and is an ally in the war on terror.
text_following: But the Iraqis are not yet ready to do this on their own.

text_original: But the Iraqis are not yet ready to do this on their own.
text_preceding: In order to make progress toward this goal, the Iraqi Government must stop the sectarian violence in its capital.
text_following: So we are deploying reinforcements of more than 20,000 additional soldiers and marines to Iraq.

text_original: So we are deploying reinforcements of more than 20,000 additional soldiers and marines to Iraq.
text_preceding: But the Iraqis are not yet ready to do this on their own.
text_following: The vast majority will go to Baghdad, where they will help Iraqi forces to clear and secure neighborhoods, and serve as advisers embedded in Iraqi Army units.

text_original: The vast majority will go to Baghdad, where they will help Iraqi forces to clear and secure neighborhoods, and serve as advisers embedded in Iraqi Army units.
text_preceding: So we are deploying reinforcements of more than 20,000 additional soldiers and marines to Iraq.
text_following: With Iraqis in the lead, our forces will help secure the city by chasing down the terrorists, insurgents, and the roaming death squads.

text_original: With Iraqis in the lead, our forces will help secure the city by chasing down the terrorists, insurgents, and the roaming death squads.
text_preceding: The vast majority will go to Baghdad, where they will help Iraqi forces to clear and secure neighborhoods, and serve as advisers embedded in Iraqi Army units.
text_following: And in Anbar province, where al Qaeda terrorists have gathered and local forces have begun showing a willingness to fight them, we are sending an additional 4,000 United States marines, with orders to find the terrorists and clear them out.

text_original: And in Anbar province, where al Qaeda terrorists have gathered and local forces have begun showing a willingness to fight them, we are sending an additional 4,000 United States marines, with orders to find the terrorists and clear them out.
text_preceding: With Iraqis in the lead, our forces will help secure the city by chasing down the terrorists, insurgents, and the roaming death squads.
text_following: We did not drive al Qaeda out of their safe haven in Afghanistan only to let them set up a new safe haven in a free Iraq.

text_original: We did not drive al Qaeda out of their safe haven in Afghanistan only to let them set up a new safe haven in a free Iraq.
text_preceding: And in Anbar province, where al Qaeda terrorists have gathered and local forces have begun showing a willingness to fight them, we are sending an additional 4,000 United States marines, with orders to find the terrorists and clear them out.
text_following: The people of Iraq want to live in peace, and now is the time for their government to act.

text_original: The people of Iraq want to live in peace, and now is the time for their government to act.
text_preceding: We did not drive al Qaeda out of their safe haven in Afghanistan only to let them set up a new safe haven in a free Iraq.
text_following: Iraq's leaders know that our commitment is not open ended.

text_original: Iraq's leaders know that our commitment is not open ended.
text_preceding: The people of Iraq want to live in peace, and now is the time for their government to act.
text_following: They have promised to deploy more of their own troops to secure Baghdad, and they must do so.

text_original: They have promised to deploy more of their own troops to secure Baghdad, and they must do so.
text_preceding: Iraq's leaders know that our commitment is not open ended.
text_following: They have pledged that they will confront violent radicals of any faction or political party.

text_original: They have pledged that they will confront violent radicals of any faction or political party.
text_preceding: They have promised to deploy more of their own troops to secure Baghdad, and they must do so.
text_following: And they need to follow through and lift needless restrictions on Iraqi and Coalition forces so these troops can achieve their mission of bringing security to all of the people of Baghdad.

text_original: And they need to follow through and lift needless restrictions on Iraqi and Coalition forces so these troops can achieve their mission of bringing security to all of the people of Baghdad.
text_preceding: They have pledged that they will confront violent radicals of any faction or political party.
text_following: Iraq's leaders have committed themselves to a series of benchmarks to achieve reconciliation, to share oil revenues among all of Iraq's citizens, to put the wealth of Iraq into the rebuilding of Iraq, to allow more Iraqis to reenter their nation's civic life, to hold local elections, and to take responsibility for security in every Iraqi province.

text_original: Iraq's leaders have committed themselves to a series of benchmarks to achieve reconciliation, to share oil revenues among all of Iraq's citizens, to put the wealth of Iraq into the rebuilding of Iraq, to allow more Iraqis to reenter their nation's civic life, to hold local elections, and to take responsibility for security in every Iraqi province.
text_preceding: And they need to follow through and lift needless restrictions on Iraqi and Coalition forces so these troops can achieve their mission of bringing security to all of the people of Baghdad.
text_following: But for all of this to happen, Baghdad must be secured.

text_original: But for all of this to happen, Baghdad must be secured.
text_preceding: Iraq's leaders have committed themselves to a series of benchmarks to achieve reconciliation, to share oil revenues among all of Iraq's citizens, to put the wealth of Iraq into the rebuilding of Iraq, to allow more Iraqis to reenter their nation's civic life, to hold local elections, and to take responsibility for security in every Iraqi province.
text_following: And our plan will help the Iraqi Government take back its capital and make good on its commitments.

text_original: And our plan will help the Iraqi Government take back its capital and make good on its commitments.
text_preceding: But for all of this to happen, Baghdad must be secured.
text_following: My fellow citizens, our military commanders and I have carefully weighed the options.

text_original: My fellow citizens, our military commanders and I have carefully weighed the options.
text_preceding: And our plan will help the Iraqi Government take back its capital and make good on its commitments.
text_following: We discussed every possible approach.

text_original: We discussed every possible approach.
text_preceding: My fellow citizens, our military commanders and I have carefully weighed the options.
text_following: In the end, I chose this course of action because it provides the best chance for success.

text_original: In the end, I chose this course of action because it provides the best chance for success.
text_preceding: We discussed every possible approach.
text_following: Many in this Chamber understand that America must not fail in Iraq, because you understand that the consequences of failure would be grievous and far reaching.

text_original: Many in this Chamber understand that America must not fail in Iraq, because you understand that the consequences of failure would be grievous and far reaching.
text_preceding: In the end, I chose this course of action because it provides the best chance for success.
text_following: If American forces step back before Baghdad is secure, the Iraqi Government would be overrun by extremists on all sides.

text_original: If American forces step back before Baghdad is secure, the Iraqi Government would be overrun by extremists on all sides.
text_preceding: Many in this Chamber understand that America must not fail in Iraq, because you understand that the consequences of failure would be grievous and far reaching.
text_following: We could expect an epic battle between Shia extremists backed by Iran, and Sunni extremists aided by al Qaeda and supporters of the old regime.

text_original: We could expect an epic battle between Shia extremists backed by Iran, and Sunni extremists aided by al Qaeda and supporters of the old regime.
text_preceding: If American forces step back before Baghdad is secure, the Iraqi Government would be overrun by extremists on all sides.
text_following: A contagion of violence could spill out across the country, and in time the entire region could be drawn into the conflict.

text_original: A contagion of violence could spill out across the country, and in time the entire region could be drawn into the conflict.
text_preceding: We could expect an epic battle between Shia extremists backed by Iran, and Sunni extremists aided by al Qaeda and supporters of the old regime.
text_following: For America, this is a nightmare scenario.

text_original: For America, this is a nightmare scenario.
text_preceding: A contagion of violence could spill out across the country, and in time the entire region could be drawn into the conflict.
text_following: For the enemy, this is the objective.

text_original: For the enemy, this is the objective.
text_preceding: For America, this is a nightmare scenario.
text_following: Chaos is their greatest ally in this struggle.

text_original: Chaos is their greatest ally in this struggle.
text_preceding: For the enemy, this is the objective.
text_following: And out of chaos in Iraq would emerge an emboldened enemy with new safe havens, new recruits, new resources, and an even greater determination to harm America.

text_original: And out of chaos in Iraq would emerge an emboldened enemy with new safe havens, new recruits, new resources, and an even greater determination to harm America.
text_preceding: Chaos is their greatest ally in this struggle.
text_following: To allow this to happen would be to ignore the lessons of September 11 and invite tragedy.

text_original: To allow this to happen would be to ignore the lessons of September 11 and invite tragedy.
text_preceding: And out of chaos in Iraq would emerge an emboldened enemy with new safe havens, new recruits, new resources, and an even greater determination to harm America.
text_following: And ladies and gentlemen, nothing is more important at this moment in our history than for America to succeed in the Middle East, to succeed in Iraq, and to spare the American people from this danger.

text_original: And ladies and gentlemen, nothing is more important at this moment in our history than for America to succeed in the Middle East, to succeed in Iraq, and to spare the American people from this danger.
text_preceding: To allow this to happen would be to ignore the lessons of September 11 and invite tragedy.
text_following: This is where matters stand tonight, in the here and now.

text_original: This is where matters stand tonight, in the here and now.
text_preceding: And ladies and gentlemen, nothing is more important at this moment in our history than for America to succeed in the Middle East, to succeed in Iraq, and to spare the American people from this danger.
text_following: I have spoken with many of you in person.

text_original: I have spoken with many of you in person.
text_preceding: This is where matters stand tonight, in the here and now.
text_following: I respect you and the arguments you have made.

text_original: I respect you and the arguments you have made.
text_preceding: I have spoken with many of you in person.
text_following: We went into this largely united, in our assumptions and in our convictions.

text_original: We went into this largely united, in our assumptions and in our convictions.
text_preceding: I respect you and the arguments you have made.
text_following: And whatever you voted for, you did not vote for failure.

text_original: And whatever you voted for, you did not vote for failure.
text_preceding: We went into this largely united, in our assumptions and in our convictions.
text_following: Our country is pursuing a new strategy in Iraq, and I ask you to give it a chance to work.

text_original: Our country is pursuing a new strategy in Iraq, and I ask you to give it a chance to work.
text_preceding: And whatever you voted for, you did not vote for failure.
text_following: And I ask you to support our troops in the field, and those on their way.

text_original: And I ask you to support our troops in the field, and those on their way.
text_preceding: Our country is pursuing a new strategy in Iraq, and I ask you to give it a chance to work.
text_following: The war on terror we fight today is a generational struggle that will continue long after you and I have turned our duties over to others.

text_original: The war on terror we fight today is a generational struggle that will continue long after you and I have turned our duties over to others.
text_preceding: And I ask you to support our troops in the field, and those on their way.
text_following: That is why it is important to work together so our Nation can see this great effort through.

text_original: That is why it is important to work together so our Nation can see this great effort through.
text_preceding: The war on terror we fight today is a generational struggle that will continue long after you and I have turned our duties over to others.
text_following: Both parties and both branches should work in close consultation.

text_original: Both parties and both branches should work in close consultation.
text_preceding: That is why it is important to work together so our Nation can see this great effort through.
text_following: And this is why I propose to establish a special advisory council on the war on terror, made up of leaders in Congress from both political parties.

text_original: And this is why I propose to establish a special advisory council on the war on terror, made up of leaders in Congress from both political parties.
text_preceding: Both parties and both branches should work in close consultation.
text_following: We will share ideas for how to position America to meet every challenge that confronts us.

text_original: We will share ideas for how to position America to meet every challenge that confronts us.
text_preceding: And this is why I propose to establish a special advisory council on the war on terror, made up of leaders in Congress from both political parties.
text_following: And we will show our enemies abroad that we are united in the goal of victory.

text_original: And we will show our enemies abroad that we are united in the goal of victory.
text_preceding: We will share ideas for how to position America to meet every challenge that confronts us.
text_following: One of the first steps we can take together is to add to the ranks of our military, so that the American Armed Forces are ready for all the challenges ahead.

text_original: One of the first steps we can take together is to add to the ranks of our military, so that the American Armed Forces are ready for all the challenges ahead.
text_preceding: And we will show our enemies abroad that we are united in the goal of victory.
text_following: Tonight I ask the Congress to authorize an increase in the size of our active Army and Marine Corps by 92,000 in the next 5 years.

text_original: Tonight I ask the Congress to authorize an increase in the size of our active Army and Marine Corps by 92,000 in the next 5 years.
text_preceding: One of the first steps we can take together is to add to the ranks of our military, so that the American Armed Forces are ready for all the challenges ahead.
text_following: A second task we can take on together is to design and establish a volunteer civilian reserve corps.

text_original: A second task we can take on together is to design and establish a volunteer civilian reserve corps.
text_preceding: Tonight I ask the Congress to authorize an increase in the size of our active Army and Marine Corps by 92,000 in the next 5 years.
text_following: Such a corps would function much like our military reserve.

text_original: Such a corps would function much like our military reserve.
text_preceding: A second task we can take on together is to design and establish a volunteer civilian reserve corps.
text_following: It would ease the burden on the Armed Forces by allowing us to hire civilians with critical skills to serve on missions abroad when America needs them.

text_original: It would ease the burden on the Armed Forces by allowing us to hire civilians with critical skills to serve on missions abroad when America needs them.
text_preceding: Such a corps would function much like our military reserve.
text_following: And it would give people across America who do not wear the uniform a chance to serve in the defining struggle of our time.

text_original: And it would give people across America who do not wear the uniform a chance to serve in the defining struggle of our time.
text_preceding: It would ease the burden on the Armed Forces by allowing us to hire civilians with critical skills to serve on missions abroad when America needs them.
text_following: Americans can have confidence in the outcome of this struggle, because we are not in this struggle alone.

text_original: Americans can have confidence in the outcome of this struggle, because we are not in this struggle alone.
text_preceding: And it would give people across America who do not wear the uniform a chance to serve in the defining struggle of our time.
text_following: We have a diplomatic strategy that is rallying the world to join in the fight against extremism.

text_original: We have a diplomatic strategy that is rallying the world to join in the fight against extremism.
text_preceding: Americans can have confidence in the outcome of this struggle, because we are not in this struggle alone.
text_following: In Iraq, multinational forces are operating under a mandate from the United Nations, and we are working with Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, and the gulf states to increase support for Iraq's government.

text_original: In Iraq, multinational forces are operating under a mandate from the United Nations, and we are working with Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, and the gulf states to increase support for Iraq's government.
text_preceding: We have a diplomatic strategy that is rallying the world to join in the fight against extremism.
text_following: The United Nations has imposed sanctions on Iran and made it clear that the world will not allow the regime in Tehran to acquire nuclear weapons.

text_original: The United Nations has imposed sanctions on Iran and made it clear that the world will not allow the regime in Tehran to acquire nuclear weapons.
text_preceding: In Iraq, multinational forces are operating under a mandate from the United Nations, and we are working with Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, and the gulf states to increase support for Iraq's government.
text_following: With the other members of the Quartet, the U.N., the Eurpoean Union and Russia, we are pursuing diplomacy to help bring peace to the Holy Land, and pursuing the establishment of a democratic Palestinian state living side by side with Israel in peace and security.

text_original: With the other members of the Quartet, the U.N., the Eurpoean Union and Russia, we are pursuing diplomacy to help bring peace to the Holy Land, and pursuing the establishment of a democratic Palestinian state living side by side with Israel in peace and security.
text_preceding: The United Nations has imposed sanctions on Iran and made it clear that the world will not allow the regime in Tehran to acquire nuclear weapons.
text_following: In Afghanistan, NATO has taken the lead in turning back the Taliban and al Qaeda offensive, the first time the alliance has deployed forces outside the North Atlantic area.

text_original: In Afghanistan, NATO has taken the lead in turning back the Taliban and al Qaeda offensive, the first time the alliance has deployed forces outside the North Atlantic area.
text_preceding: With the other members of the Quartet, the U.N., the Eurpoean Union and Russia, we are pursuing diplomacy to help bring peace to the Holy Land, and pursuing the establishment of a democratic Palestinian state living side by side with Israel in peace and security.
text_following: Together with our partners in China, Japan, Russia, and South Korea, we are pursuing intensive diplomacy to achieve a Korean Peninsula free of nuclear weapons.

text_original: Together with our partners in China, Japan, Russia, and South Korea, we are pursuing intensive diplomacy to achieve a Korean Peninsula free of nuclear weapons.
text_preceding: In Afghanistan, NATO has taken the lead in turning back the Taliban and al Qaeda offensive, the first time the alliance has deployed forces outside the North Atlantic area.
text_following: And we will continue to speak out for the cause of freedom in places like Cuba, Belarus, and Burma, and continue to awaken the conscience of the world to save the people of Darfur.

text_original: And we will continue to speak out for the cause of freedom in places like Cuba, Belarus, and Burma, and continue to awaken the conscience of the world to save the people of Darfur.
text_preceding: Together with our partners in China, Japan, Russia, and South Korea, we are pursuing intensive diplomacy to achieve a Korean Peninsula free of nuclear weapons.
text_following: American foreign policy is more than a matter of war and diplomacy.

text_original: American foreign policy is more than a matter of war and diplomacy.
text_preceding: And we will continue to speak out for the cause of freedom in places like Cuba, Belarus, and Burma, and continue to awaken the conscience of the world to save the people of Darfur.
text_following: Our work in the world is also based on a timeless truth: to whom much is given, much is required.

text_original: Our work in the world is also based on a timeless truth: to whom much is given, much is required.
text_preceding: American foreign policy is more than a matter of war and diplomacy.
text_following: We hear the call to take on the challenges of hunger and poverty and disease, and that is precisely what America is doing.

text_original: We hear the call to take on the challenges of hunger and poverty and disease, and that is precisely what America is doing.
text_preceding: Our work in the world is also based on a timeless truth: to whom much is given, much is required.
text_following: We must continue to fight HIV/AIDS, especially on the continent of Africa.

text_original: We must continue to fight HIV/AIDS, especially on the continent of Africa.
text_preceding: We hear the call to take on the challenges of hunger and poverty and disease, and that is precisely what America is doing.
text_following: Because you funded our Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, the number of people receiving life-saving drugs has grown from 50,000 to more than 800,000 in 3 short years.

text_original: Because you funded our Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, the number of people receiving life-saving drugs has grown from 50,000 to more than 800,000 in 3 short years.
text_preceding: We must continue to fight HIV/AIDS, especially on the continent of Africa.
text_following: I ask you to continue funding our efforts to fight HIV/AIDS, and I ask you to provide $1 billion over 5 years so we can combat malaria in 15 African countries.

text_original: I ask you to continue funding our efforts to fight HIV/AIDS, and I ask you to provide $1 billion over 5 years so we can combat malaria in 15 African countries.
text_preceding: Because you funded our Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, the number of people receiving life-saving drugs has grown from 50,000 to more than 800,000 in 3 short years.
text_following: I ask that you fund the Millennium Challenge Account so that American aid reaches the people who need it, in nations where democracy is on the rise and corruption is in retreat.

text_original: I ask that you fund the Millennium Challenge Account so that American aid reaches the people who need it, in nations where democracy is on the rise and corruption is in retreat.
text_preceding: I ask you to continue funding our efforts to fight HIV/AIDS, and I ask you to provide $1 billion over 5 years so we can combat malaria in 15 African countries.
text_following: And let us continue to support the expanded trade and debt relief that are the best hope for lifting lives and eliminating poverty.

text_original: And let us continue to support the expanded trade and debt relief that are the best hope for lifting lives and eliminating poverty.
text_preceding: I ask that you fund the Millennium Challenge Account so that American aid reaches the people who need it, in nations where democracy is on the rise and corruption is in retreat.
text_following: When America serves others in this way, we show the strength and generosity of our country.

text_original: When America serves others in this way, we show the strength and generosity of our country.
text_preceding: And let us continue to support the expanded trade and debt relief that are the best hope for lifting lives and eliminating poverty.
text_following: These deeds reflect the character of our people.

text_original: These deeds reflect the character of our people.
text_preceding: When America serves others in this way, we show the strength and generosity of our country.
text_following: The greatest strength we have is the heroic kindness, courage, and self-sacrifice of the American people.

text_original: The greatest strength we have is the heroic kindness, courage, and self-sacrifice of the American people.
text_preceding: These deeds reflect the character of our people.
text_following: You see this spirit often if you know where to look, and tonight we need only look above to the gallery.

text_original: You see this spirit often if you know where to look, and tonight we need only look above to the gallery.
text_preceding: The greatest strength we have is the heroic kindness, courage, and self-sacrifice of the American people.
text_following: Dikembe Mutombo grew up in Africa amid great poverty and disease.

text_original: Dikembe Mutombo grew up in Africa amid great poverty and disease.
text_preceding: You see this spirit often if you know where to look, and tonight we need only look above to the gallery.
text_following: He came to Georgetown University on a scholarship to study medicine, but Coach John Thompson got a look at Dikembe and had a different idea.
