text_following: Countries in Europe and Russia invest more in their roads and railways than we do.

text_original: Countries in Europe and Russia invest more in their roads and railways than we do.
text_preceding: South Korean homes now have greater Internet access than we do.
text_following: China is building faster trains and newer airports.

text_original: China is building faster trains and newer airports.
text_preceding: Countries in Europe and Russia invest more in their roads and railways than we do.
text_following: Meanwhile, when our own engineers graded our Nation's infrastructure, they gave us a D.

text_original: Meanwhile, when our own engineers graded our Nation's infrastructure, they gave us a D.
text_preceding: China is building faster trains and newer airports.
text_following: America is the nation that built the transcontinental railroad, brought electricity to rural communities, constructed the Interstate Highway System.

text_original: America is the nation that built the transcontinental railroad, brought electricity to rural communities, constructed the Interstate Highway System.
text_preceding: Meanwhile, when our own engineers graded our Nation's infrastructure, they gave us a D.
text_following: The jobs created by these projects didn't just come from laying down track or pavement.

text_original: The jobs created by these projects didn't just come from laying down track or pavement.
text_preceding: America is the nation that built the transcontinental railroad, brought electricity to rural communities, constructed the Interstate Highway System.
text_following: They came from businesses that opened near a town's new train station or the new off-ramp.

text_original: They came from businesses that opened near a town's new train station or the new off-ramp.
text_preceding: The jobs created by these projects didn't just come from laying down track or pavement.
text_following: So over the last 2 years, we've begun rebuilding for the 21st century, a project that has meant thousands of good jobs for the hard-hit construction industry.

text_original: So over the last 2 years, we've begun rebuilding for the 21st century, a project that has meant thousands of good jobs for the hard-hit construction industry.
text_preceding: They came from businesses that opened near a town's new train station or the new off-ramp.
text_following: And tonight I'm proposing that we redouble those efforts.

text_original: And tonight I'm proposing that we redouble those efforts.
text_preceding: So over the last 2 years, we've begun rebuilding for the 21st century, a project that has meant thousands of good jobs for the hard-hit construction industry.
text_following: We'll put more Americans to work repairing crumbling roads and bridges.

text_original: We'll put more Americans to work repairing crumbling roads and bridges.
text_preceding: And tonight I'm proposing that we redouble those efforts.
text_following: We'll make sure this is fully paid for, attract private investment, and pick projects based [on]* what's best for the economy, not politicians.

text_original: We'll make sure this is fully paid for, attract private investment, and pick projects based [on]* what's best for the economy, not politicians.
text_preceding: We'll put more Americans to work repairing crumbling roads and bridges.
text_following: Within 25 years, our goal is to give 80 percent of Americans access to high-speed rail.

text_original: Within 25 years, our goal is to give 80 percent of Americans access to high-speed rail.
text_preceding: We'll make sure this is fully paid for, attract private investment, and pick projects based [on]* what's best for the economy, not politicians.
text_following: This could allow you to go places in half the time it takes to travel by car.

text_original: This could allow you to go places in half the time it takes to travel by car.
text_preceding: Within 25 years, our goal is to give 80 percent of Americans access to high-speed rail.
text_following: For some trips, it will be faster than flying, without the pat-down.

text_original: For some trips, it will be faster than flying, without the pat-down.
text_preceding: This could allow you to go places in half the time it takes to travel by car.
text_following: [Laughter] As we speak, routes in California and the Midwest are already underway.

text_original: [Laughter] As we speak, routes in California and the Midwest are already underway.
text_preceding: For some trips, it will be faster than flying, without the pat-down.
text_following: Within the next 5 years, we'll make it possible for businesses to deploy the next generation of high-speed wireless coverage to 98 percent of all Americans.

text_original: Within the next 5 years, we'll make it possible for businesses to deploy the next generation of high-speed wireless coverage to 98 percent of all Americans.
text_preceding: [Laughter] As we speak, routes in California and the Midwest are already underway.
text_following: This isn't just about-this isn't about faster Internet or fewer dropped calls.

text_original: This isn't just about-this isn't about faster Internet or fewer dropped calls.
text_preceding: Within the next 5 years, we'll make it possible for businesses to deploy the next generation of high-speed wireless coverage to 98 percent of all Americans.
text_following: It's about connecting every part of America to the digital age.

text_original: It's about connecting every part of America to the digital age.
text_preceding: This isn't just about-this isn't about faster Internet or fewer dropped calls.
text_following: It's about a rural community in Iowa or Alabama where farmers and small-business owners will be able to sell their products all over the world.

text_original: It's about a rural community in Iowa or Alabama where farmers and small-business owners will be able to sell their products all over the world.
text_preceding: It's about connecting every part of America to the digital age.
text_following: It's about a firefighter who can download the design of a burning building onto a handheld device, a student who can take classes with a digital textbook, or a patient who can have face-to-face video chats with her doctor.

text_original: It's about a firefighter who can download the design of a burning building onto a handheld device, a student who can take classes with a digital textbook, or a patient who can have face-to-face video chats with her doctor.
text_preceding: It's about a rural community in Iowa or Alabama where farmers and small-business owners will be able to sell their products all over the world.
text_following: All these investments, in innovation, education, and infrastructure, will make America a better place to do business and create jobs.

text_original: All these investments, in innovation, education, and infrastructure, will make America a better place to do business and create jobs.
text_preceding: It's about a firefighter who can download the design of a burning building onto a handheld device, a student who can take classes with a digital textbook, or a patient who can have face-to-face video chats with her doctor.
text_following: But to help our companies compete, we also have to knock down barriers that stand in the way of their success.

text_original: But to help our companies compete, we also have to knock down barriers that stand in the way of their success.
text_preceding: All these investments, in innovation, education, and infrastructure, will make America a better place to do business and create jobs.
text_following: For example, over the years, a parade of lobbyists has rigged the Tax Code to benefit particular companies and industries.

text_original: For example, over the years, a parade of lobbyists has rigged the Tax Code to benefit particular companies and industries.
text_preceding: But to help our companies compete, we also have to knock down barriers that stand in the way of their success.
text_following: Those with accountants or lawyers to work the system can end up paying no taxes at all.

text_original: Those with accountants or lawyers to work the system can end up paying no taxes at all.
text_preceding: For example, over the years, a parade of lobbyists has rigged the Tax Code to benefit particular companies and industries.
text_following: But all the rest are hit with one of the highest corporate tax rates in the world.

text_original: But all the rest are hit with one of the highest corporate tax rates in the world.
text_preceding: Those with accountants or lawyers to work the system can end up paying no taxes at all.
text_following: It makes no sense, and it has to change.

text_original: It makes no sense, and it has to change.
text_preceding: But all the rest are hit with one of the highest corporate tax rates in the world.
text_following: So tonight I'm asking Democrats and Republicans to simplify the system, get rid of the loopholes, level the playing field, and use the savings to lower the corporate tax rate for the first time in 25 years without adding to our deficit.

text_original: So tonight I'm asking Democrats and Republicans to simplify the system, get rid of the loopholes, level the playing field, and use the savings to lower the corporate tax rate for the first time in 25 years without adding to our deficit.
text_preceding: It makes no sense, and it has to change.
text_following: To help businesses sell more products abroad, we set a goal of doubling our exports by 2014.

text_original: To help businesses sell more products abroad, we set a goal of doubling our exports by 2014.
text_preceding: So tonight I'm asking Democrats and Republicans to simplify the system, get rid of the loopholes, level the playing field, and use the savings to lower the corporate tax rate for the first time in 25 years without adding to our deficit.
text_following: Because the more we export, the more jobs we create here at home.

text_original: Because the more we export, the more jobs we create here at home.
text_preceding: To help businesses sell more products abroad, we set a goal of doubling our exports by 2014.
text_following: Recently, we signed agreements with India and China that will support more than 250,000 jobs here in the United States.

text_original: Recently, we signed agreements with India and China that will support more than 250,000 jobs here in the United States.
text_preceding: Because the more we export, the more jobs we create here at home.
text_following: And last month, we finalized a trade agreement with South Korea that will support at least 70,000 American jobs.

text_original: And last month, we finalized a trade agreement with South Korea that will support at least 70,000 American jobs.
text_preceding: Recently, we signed agreements with India and China that will support more than 250,000 jobs here in the United States.
text_following: This agreement has unprecedented support from business and labor, Democrats and Republicans, and I ask this Congress to pass it as soon as possible.

text_original: This agreement has unprecedented support from business and labor, Democrats and Republicans, and I ask this Congress to pass it as soon as possible.
text_preceding: And last month, we finalized a trade agreement with South Korea that will support at least 70,000 American jobs.
text_following: Now, before I took office, I made it clear that we would enforce our trade agreements, and that I would only sign deals that keep faith with American workers and promote American jobs.

text_original: Now, before I took office, I made it clear that we would enforce our trade agreements, and that I would only sign deals that keep faith with American workers and promote American jobs.
text_preceding: This agreement has unprecedented support from business and labor, Democrats and Republicans, and I ask this Congress to pass it as soon as possible.
text_following: That's what we did with Korea, and that's what I intend to do as we pursue agreements with Panama and Colombia and continue our Asia Pacific and global trade talks.

text_original: That's what we did with Korea, and that's what I intend to do as we pursue agreements with Panama and Colombia and continue our Asia Pacific and global trade talks.
text_preceding: Now, before I took office, I made it clear that we would enforce our trade agreements, and that I would only sign deals that keep faith with American workers and promote American jobs.
text_following: To reduce barriers to growth and investment, I've ordered a review of Government regulations.

text_original: To reduce barriers to growth and investment, I've ordered a review of Government regulations.
text_preceding: That's what we did with Korea, and that's what I intend to do as we pursue agreements with Panama and Colombia and continue our Asia Pacific and global trade talks.
text_following: When we find rules that put an unnecessary burden on businesses, we will fix them.

text_original: When we find rules that put an unnecessary burden on businesses, we will fix them.
text_preceding: To reduce barriers to growth and investment, I've ordered a review of Government regulations.
text_following: But I will not hesitate to create or enforce commonsense safeguards to protect the American people.

text_original: But I will not hesitate to create or enforce commonsense safeguards to protect the American people.
text_preceding: When we find rules that put an unnecessary burden on businesses, we will fix them.
text_following: That's what we've done in this country for more than a century.

text_original: That's what we've done in this country for more than a century.
text_preceding: But I will not hesitate to create or enforce commonsense safeguards to protect the American people.
text_following: It's why our food is safe to eat, our water is safe to drink, and our air is safe to breathe.

text_original: It's why our food is safe to eat, our water is safe to drink, and our air is safe to breathe.
text_preceding: That's what we've done in this country for more than a century.
text_following: It's why we have speed limits and child labor laws.

text_original: It's why we have speed limits and child labor laws.
text_preceding: It's why our food is safe to eat, our water is safe to drink, and our air is safe to breathe.
text_following: It's why last year, we put in place consumer protections against hidden fees and penalties by credit card companies and new rules to prevent another financial crisis.

text_original: It's why last year, we put in place consumer protections against hidden fees and penalties by credit card companies and new rules to prevent another financial crisis.
text_preceding: It's why we have speed limits and child labor laws.
text_following: And it's why we passed reform that finally prevents the health insurance industry from exploiting patients.

text_original: And it's why we passed reform that finally prevents the health insurance industry from exploiting patients.
text_preceding: It's why last year, we put in place consumer protections against hidden fees and penalties by credit card companies and new rules to prevent another financial crisis.
text_following: Now, I have heard rumors that a few of you still have concerns about our new health care law.

text_original: Now, I have heard rumors that a few of you still have concerns about our new health care law.
text_preceding: And it's why we passed reform that finally prevents the health insurance industry from exploiting patients.
text_following: [Laughter] So let me be the first to say that anything can be improved.

text_original: [Laughter] So let me be the first to say that anything can be improved.
text_preceding: Now, I have heard rumors that a few of you still have concerns about our new health care law.
text_following: If you have ideas about how to improve this law by making care better or more affordable, I am eager to work with you.

text_original: If you have ideas about how to improve this law by making care better or more affordable, I am eager to work with you.
text_preceding: [Laughter] So let me be the first to say that anything can be improved.
text_following: We can start right now by correcting a flaw in the legislation that has placed an unnecessary bookkeeping burden on small businesses.

text_original: We can start right now by correcting a flaw in the legislation that has placed an unnecessary bookkeeping burden on small businesses.
text_preceding: If you have ideas about how to improve this law by making care better or more affordable, I am eager to work with you.
text_following: What I'm not willing to do-what I'm not willing to do is go back to the days when insurance companies could deny someone coverage because of a preexisting condition.

text_original: What I'm not willing to do-what I'm not willing to do is go back to the days when insurance companies could deny someone coverage because of a preexisting condition.
text_preceding: We can start right now by correcting a flaw in the legislation that has placed an unnecessary bookkeeping burden on small businesses.
text_following: I'm not willing to tell James Howard, a brain cancer patient from Texas, that his treatment might not be covered.

text_original: I'm not willing to tell James Howard, a brain cancer patient from Texas, that his treatment might not be covered.
text_preceding: What I'm not willing to do-what I'm not willing to do is go back to the days when insurance companies could deny someone coverage because of a preexisting condition.
text_following: I'm not willing to tell Jim Houser, a small-business man from Oregon, that he has to go back to paying $5,000 more to cover his employees.

text_original: I'm not willing to tell Jim Houser, a small-business man from Oregon, that he has to go back to paying $5,000 more to cover his employees.
text_preceding: I'm not willing to tell James Howard, a brain cancer patient from Texas, that his treatment might not be covered.
text_following: As we speak, this law is making prescription drugs cheaper for seniors and giving uninsured students a chance to stay on their patients'-parents' coverage.

text_original: As we speak, this law is making prescription drugs cheaper for seniors and giving uninsured students a chance to stay on their patients'-parents' coverage.
text_preceding: I'm not willing to tell Jim Houser, a small-business man from Oregon, that he has to go back to paying $5,000 more to cover his employees.
text_following: So I say to this chamber tonight: Instead of refighting the battles of the last 2 years, let's fix what needs fixing, and let's move forward.

text_original: So I say to this chamber tonight: Instead of refighting the battles of the last 2 years, let's fix what needs fixing, and let's move forward.
text_preceding: As we speak, this law is making prescription drugs cheaper for seniors and giving uninsured students a chance to stay on their patients'-parents' coverage.
text_following: Now, the final critical step in winning the future is to make sure we aren't buried under a mountain of debt.

text_original: Now, the final critical step in winning the future is to make sure we aren't buried under a mountain of debt.
text_preceding: So I say to this chamber tonight: Instead of refighting the battles of the last 2 years, let's fix what needs fixing, and let's move forward.
text_following: We are living with a legacy of deficit spending that began almost a decade ago.

text_original: We are living with a legacy of deficit spending that began almost a decade ago.
text_preceding: Now, the final critical step in winning the future is to make sure we aren't buried under a mountain of debt.
text_following: And in the wake of the financial crisis, some of that was necessary to keep credit flowing, save jobs, and put money in people's pockets.

text_original: And in the wake of the financial crisis, some of that was necessary to keep credit flowing, save jobs, and put money in people's pockets.
text_preceding: We are living with a legacy of deficit spending that began almost a decade ago.
text_following: But now that the worst of the recession is over, we have to confront the fact that our Government spends more than it takes in.

text_original: But now that the worst of the recession is over, we have to confront the fact that our Government spends more than it takes in.
text_preceding: And in the wake of the financial crisis, some of that was necessary to keep credit flowing, save jobs, and put money in people's pockets.
text_following: Every day, families sacrifice to live within their means.

text_original: Every day, families sacrifice to live within their means.
text_preceding: But now that the worst of the recession is over, we have to confront the fact that our Government spends more than it takes in.
text_following: They deserve a Government that does the same.

text_original: They deserve a Government that does the same.
text_preceding: Every day, families sacrifice to live within their means.
text_following: So tonight I am proposing that starting this year, we freeze annual domestic spending for the next 5 years.

text_original: So tonight I am proposing that starting this year, we freeze annual domestic spending for the next 5 years.
text_preceding: They deserve a Government that does the same.
text_following: Now, this would reduce the deficit by more than $400 billion over the next decade and will bring discretionary spending to the lowest share of our economy since Dwight Eisenhower was President.

text_original: Now, this would reduce the deficit by more than $400 billion over the next decade and will bring discretionary spending to the lowest share of our economy since Dwight Eisenhower was President.
text_preceding: So tonight I am proposing that starting this year, we freeze annual domestic spending for the next 5 years.
text_following: This freeze will require painful cuts.

text_original: This freeze will require painful cuts.
text_preceding: Now, this would reduce the deficit by more than $400 billion over the next decade and will bring discretionary spending to the lowest share of our economy since Dwight Eisenhower was President.
text_following: Already, we've frozen the salaries of hard-working Federal employees for the next 2 years.

text_original: Already, we've frozen the salaries of hard-working Federal employees for the next 2 years.
text_preceding: This freeze will require painful cuts.
text_following: I've proposed cuts to things I care deeply about, like community action programs.

text_original: I've proposed cuts to things I care deeply about, like community action programs.
text_preceding: Already, we've frozen the salaries of hard-working Federal employees for the next 2 years.
text_following: The Secretary of Defense has also agreed to cut tens of billions of dollars in spending that he and his generals believe our military can do without.

text_original: The Secretary of Defense has also agreed to cut tens of billions of dollars in spending that he and his generals believe our military can do without.
text_preceding: I've proposed cuts to things I care deeply about, like community action programs.
text_following: Now, I recognize that some in this Chamber have already proposed deeper cuts, and I'm willing to eliminate whatever we can honestly afford to do without.

text_original: Now, I recognize that some in this Chamber have already proposed deeper cuts, and I'm willing to eliminate whatever we can honestly afford to do without.
text_preceding: The Secretary of Defense has also agreed to cut tens of billions of dollars in spending that he and his generals believe our military can do without.
text_following: But let's make sure that we're not doing it on the backs of our most vulnerable citizens.

text_original: But let's make sure that we're not doing it on the backs of our most vulnerable citizens.
text_preceding: Now, I recognize that some in this Chamber have already proposed deeper cuts, and I'm willing to eliminate whatever we can honestly afford to do without.
text_following: And let's make sure that what we're cutting is really excess weight.

text_original: And let's make sure that what we're cutting is really excess weight.
text_preceding: But let's make sure that we're not doing it on the backs of our most vulnerable citizens.
text_following: Cutting the deficit by gutting our investments in innovation and education is like lightening an overloaded airplane by removing its engine.

text_original: Cutting the deficit by gutting our investments in innovation and education is like lightening an overloaded airplane by removing its engine.
text_preceding: And let's make sure that what we're cutting is really excess weight.
text_following: It may make you feel like you're flying high at first, but it won't take long before you feel the impact.

text_original: It may make you feel like you're flying high at first, but it won't take long before you feel the impact.
text_preceding: Cutting the deficit by gutting our investments in innovation and education is like lightening an overloaded airplane by removing its engine.
text_following: [Laughter] Now, most of the cuts and savings I've proposed only address annual domestic spending, which represents a little more than 12 percent of our budget.

text_original: [Laughter] Now, most of the cuts and savings I've proposed only address annual domestic spending, which represents a little more than 12 percent of our budget.
text_preceding: It may make you feel like you're flying high at first, but it won't take long before you feel the impact.
text_following: To make further progress, we have to stop pretending that cutting this kind of spending alone will be enough.

text_original: To make further progress, we have to stop pretending that cutting this kind of spending alone will be enough.
text_preceding: [Laughter] Now, most of the cuts and savings I've proposed only address annual domestic spending, which represents a little more than 12 percent of our budget.
text_following: The bipartisan fiscal commission I created last year made this crystal clear.

text_original: The bipartisan fiscal commission I created last year made this crystal clear.
text_preceding: To make further progress, we have to stop pretending that cutting this kind of spending alone will be enough.
text_following: I don't agree with all their proposals, but they made important progress.

text_original: I don't agree with all their proposals, but they made important progress.
text_preceding: The bipartisan fiscal commission I created last year made this crystal clear.
text_following: And their conclusion is that the only way to tackle our deficit is to cut excessive spending wherever we find it, in domestic spending, defense spending, health care spending, and spending through tax breaks and loopholes.

text_original: And their conclusion is that the only way to tackle our deficit is to cut excessive spending wherever we find it, in domestic spending, defense spending, health care spending, and spending through tax breaks and loopholes.
text_preceding: I don't agree with all their proposals, but they made important progress.
text_following: This means further reducing health care costs, including programs like Medicare and Medicaid, which are the single biggest contributor to our long-term deficit.

text_original: This means further reducing health care costs, including programs like Medicare and Medicaid, which are the single biggest contributor to our long-term deficit.
text_preceding: And their conclusion is that the only way to tackle our deficit is to cut excessive spending wherever we find it, in domestic spending, defense spending, health care spending, and spending through tax breaks and loopholes.
text_following: The health insurance law we passed last year will slow these rising costs, which is part of the reason that nonpartisan economists have said that repealing the health care law would add a quarter of a trillion dollars to our deficit.

text_original: The health insurance law we passed last year will slow these rising costs, which is part of the reason that nonpartisan economists have said that repealing the health care law would add a quarter of a trillion dollars to our deficit.
text_preceding: This means further reducing health care costs, including programs like Medicare and Medicaid, which are the single biggest contributor to our long-term deficit.
text_following: Still, I'm willing to look at other ideas to bring down costs, including one that Republicans suggested last year: medical malpractice reform to rein in frivolous lawsuits.

text_original: Still, I'm willing to look at other ideas to bring down costs, including one that Republicans suggested last year: medical malpractice reform to rein in frivolous lawsuits.
text_preceding: The health insurance law we passed last year will slow these rising costs, which is part of the reason that nonpartisan economists have said that repealing the health care law would add a quarter of a trillion dollars to our deficit.
text_following: To put us on solid ground, we should also find a bipartisan solution to strengthen Social Security for future generations.

text_original: To put us on solid ground, we should also find a bipartisan solution to strengthen Social Security for future generations.
text_preceding: Still, I'm willing to look at other ideas to bring down costs, including one that Republicans suggested last year: medical malpractice reform to rein in frivolous lawsuits.
text_following: We must do it without putting at risk current retirees, the most vulnerable, or people with disabilities, without slashing benefits for future generations, and without subjecting Americans' guaranteed retirement income to the whims of the stock market.

text_original: We must do it without putting at risk current retirees, the most vulnerable, or people with disabilities, without slashing benefits for future generations, and without subjecting Americans' guaranteed retirement income to the whims of the stock market.
text_preceding: To put us on solid ground, we should also find a bipartisan solution to strengthen Social Security for future generations.
text_following: And if we truly care about our deficit, we simply can't afford a permanent extension of the tax cuts for the wealthiest 2 percent of Americans.

text_original: And if we truly care about our deficit, we simply can't afford a permanent extension of the tax cuts for the wealthiest 2 percent of Americans.
text_preceding: We must do it without putting at risk current retirees, the most vulnerable, or people with disabilities, without slashing benefits for future generations, and without subjecting Americans' guaranteed retirement income to the whims of the stock market.
text_following: Before we take money away from our schools or scholarships away from our students, we should ask millionaires to give up their tax break.

text_original: Before we take money away from our schools or scholarships away from our students, we should ask millionaires to give up their tax break.
text_preceding: And if we truly care about our deficit, we simply can't afford a permanent extension of the tax cuts for the wealthiest 2 percent of Americans.
text_following: It's not a matter of punishing their success, it's about promoting America's success.

text_original: It's not a matter of punishing their success, it's about promoting America's success.
text_preceding: Before we take money away from our schools or scholarships away from our students, we should ask millionaires to give up their tax break.
text_following: In fact, the best thing we could do on taxes for all Americans is to simplify the individual Tax Code.

text_original: In fact, the best thing we could do on taxes for all Americans is to simplify the individual Tax Code.
text_preceding: It's not a matter of punishing their success, it's about promoting America's success.
text_following: This will be a tough job, but members of both parties have expressed an interest in doing this, and I am prepared to join them.

text_original: This will be a tough job, but members of both parties have expressed an interest in doing this, and I am prepared to join them.
text_preceding: In fact, the best thing we could do on taxes for all Americans is to simplify the individual Tax Code.
text_following: Now is the time for both sides and both Houses of Congress, Democrats and Republicans, to forge a principled compromise that gets the job done.

text_original: Now is the time for both sides and both Houses of Congress, Democrats and Republicans, to forge a principled compromise that gets the job done.
text_preceding: This will be a tough job, but members of both parties have expressed an interest in doing this, and I am prepared to join them.
text_following: If we make the hard choices now to rein in our deficits, we can make the investments we need to win the future.

text_original: If we make the hard choices now to rein in our deficits, we can make the investments we need to win the future.
text_preceding: Now is the time for both sides and both Houses of Congress, Democrats and Republicans, to forge a principled compromise that gets the job done.
text_following: Let me take this one step further.

text_original: Let me take this one step further.
text_preceding: If we make the hard choices now to rein in our deficits, we can make the investments we need to win the future.
text_following: We shouldn't just give our people a Government that's more affordable, we should give them a Government that's more competent and more efficient.

text_original: We shouldn't just give our people a Government that's more affordable, we should give them a Government that's more competent and more efficient.
text_preceding: Let me take this one step further.
text_following: We can't win the future with a Government of the past.

text_original: We can't win the future with a Government of the past.
text_preceding: We shouldn't just give our people a Government that's more affordable, we should give them a Government that's more competent and more efficient.
text_following: We live and do business in the information age, but the last major reorganization of the Government happened in the age of black-and-white TV.

text_original: We live and do business in the information age, but the last major reorganization of the Government happened in the age of black-and-white TV.
text_preceding: We can't win the future with a Government of the past.
text_following: There are 12 different agencies that deal with exports.

text_original: There are 12 different agencies that deal with exports.
text_preceding: We live and do business in the information age, but the last major reorganization of the Government happened in the age of black-and-white TV.
text_following: There are at least five different agencies that deal with housing policy.

text_original: There are at least five different agencies that deal with housing policy.
text_preceding: There are 12 different agencies that deal with exports.
text_following: Then there's my favorite example: The Interior Department is in charge of salmon while they're in fresh water, but the Commerce Department handles them when they're in saltwater.

text_following: Mr. Speaker, Mr. Vice President, Members of Congress, fellow Americans: Fifty-one years ago, John F. Kennedy declared to this Chamber that ""the Constitution makes us not rivals for power, but partners for progress."

text_original: Mr. Speaker, Mr. Vice President, Members of Congress, fellow Americans: Fifty-one years ago, John F. Kennedy declared to this Chamber that ""the Constitution makes us not rivals for power, but partners for progress."

text_following: "It is my task," he said, "to report the state of the Union;to improve it is the task of us all."

text_original: "It is my task," he said, "to report the state of the Union;to improve it is the task of us all."
text_preceding: Mr. Speaker, Mr. Vice President, Members of Congress, fellow Americans: Fifty-one years ago, John F. Kennedy declared to this Chamber that ""the Constitution makes us not rivals for power, but partners for progress."
text_following: Tonight, thanks to the grit and determination of the American people, there is much progress to report.

text_original: Tonight, thanks to the grit and determination of the American people, there is much progress to report.
text_preceding: "It is my task," he said, "to report the state of the Union;to improve it is the task of us all."
text_following: After a decade of grinding war, our brave men and women in uniform are coming home.

text_original: After a decade of grinding war, our brave men and women in uniform are coming home.
text_preceding: Tonight, thanks to the grit and determination of the American people, there is much progress to report.
text_following: After years of grueling recession, our businesses have created over 6 million new jobs.

text_original: After years of grueling recession, our businesses have created over 6 million new jobs.
text_preceding: After a decade of grinding war, our brave men and women in uniform are coming home.
text_following: We buy more American cars than we have in 5 years and less foreign oil than we have in 20.

text_original: We buy more American cars than we have in 5 years and less foreign oil than we have in 20.
text_preceding: After years of grueling recession, our businesses have created over 6 million new jobs.
text_following: Our housing market is healing, our stock market is rebounding, and consumers, patients, and homeowners enjoy stronger protections than ever before.

text_original: Our housing market is healing, our stock market is rebounding, and consumers, patients, and homeowners enjoy stronger protections than ever before.
text_preceding: We buy more American cars than we have in 5 years and less foreign oil than we have in 20.
text_following: So together, we have cleared away the rubble of crisis, and we can say with renewed confidence that the state of our Union is stronger.

text_original: So together, we have cleared away the rubble of crisis, and we can say with renewed confidence that the state of our Union is stronger.
text_preceding: Our housing market is healing, our stock market is rebounding, and consumers, patients, and homeowners enjoy stronger protections than ever before.

text_original: But we gather here knowing that there are millions of Americans whose hard work and dedication have not yet been rewarded.
text_preceding: So together, we have cleared away the rubble of crisis, and we can say with renewed confidence that the state of our Union is stronger.

text_preceding: But we gather here knowing that there are millions of Americans whose hard work and dedication have not yet been rewarded.

text_preceding: Our economy is adding jobs, but too many people still can't find full-time employment.

text_original: Now is the time to get it done.
text_preceding: And right now leaders from the business, labor, law enforcement, faith communities, they all agree that the time has come to pass comprehensive immigration reform.
text_following: [Applause] Now is the time to get it done.

text_original: [Applause] Now is the time to get it done.
text_preceding: Now is the time to get it done.
text_following: Real reform means stronger border security, and we can build on the progress my administration has already made: putting more boots on the southern border than at any time in our history and reducing illegal crossings to their lowest levels in 40 years.

text_original: Real reform means stronger border security, and we can build on the progress my administration has already made: putting more boots on the southern border than at any time in our history and reducing illegal crossings to their lowest levels in 40 years.
text_preceding: [Applause] Now is the time to get it done.
text_following: Real reform means establishing a responsible pathway to earned citizenship, a path that includes passing a background check, paying taxes and a meaningful penalty, learning English, and going to the back of the line behind the folks trying to come here legally.

text_original: Real reform means establishing a responsible pathway to earned citizenship, a path that includes passing a background check, paying taxes and a meaningful penalty, learning English, and going to the back of the line behind the folks trying to come here legally.
text_preceding: Real reform means stronger border security, and we can build on the progress my administration has already made: putting more boots on the southern border than at any time in our history and reducing illegal crossings to their lowest levels in 40 years.
text_following: And real reform means fixing the legal immigration system to cut waiting periods and attract the highly skilled entrepreneurs and engineers that will help create jobs and grow our economy.

text_original: And real reform means fixing the legal immigration system to cut waiting periods and attract the highly skilled entrepreneurs and engineers that will help create jobs and grow our economy.
text_preceding: Real reform means establishing a responsible pathway to earned citizenship, a path that includes passing a background check, paying taxes and a meaningful penalty, learning English, and going to the back of the line behind the folks trying to come here legally.
text_following: In other words, we know what needs to be done.

text_original: In other words, we know what needs to be done.
text_preceding: And real reform means fixing the legal immigration system to cut waiting periods and attract the highly skilled entrepreneurs and engineers that will help create jobs and grow our economy.
text_following: And as we speak, bipartisan groups in both Chambers are working diligently to draft a bill, and I applaud their efforts.

text_original: And as we speak, bipartisan groups in both Chambers are working diligently to draft a bill, and I applaud their efforts.
text_preceding: In other words, we know what needs to be done.
text_following: Send me a comprehensive immigration reform bill in the next few months, and I will sign it right away.

text_original: Send me a comprehensive immigration reform bill in the next few months, and I will sign it right away.
text_preceding: And as we speak, bipartisan groups in both Chambers are working diligently to draft a bill, and I applaud their efforts.
text_following: And America will be better for it.

text_original: And America will be better for it.
text_preceding: Send me a comprehensive immigration reform bill in the next few months, and I will sign it right away.
text_following: We know our economy is stronger when our wives, our mothers, our daughters can live their lives free from discrimination in the workplace and free from the fear of domestic violence.

text_original: We know our economy is stronger when our wives, our mothers, our daughters can live their lives free from discrimination in the workplace and free from the fear of domestic violence.
text_preceding: And America will be better for it.
text_following: Today the Senate passed the "Violence Against Women's Act" that Joe Biden originally wrote almost 20 years ago.

text_original: Today the Senate passed the "Violence Against Women's Act" that Joe Biden originally wrote almost 20 years ago.
text_preceding: We know our economy is stronger when our wives, our mothers, our daughters can live their lives free from discrimination in the workplace and free from the fear of domestic violence.
text_following: And I now urge the House to do the same.

text_original: And I now urge the House to do the same.
text_preceding: Today the Senate passed the "Violence Against Women's Act" that Joe Biden originally wrote almost 20 years ago.
text_following: And I ask this Congress to declare that women should earn a living equal to their efforts, and finally pass the ""Paycheck Fairness Act"" this year.

text_original: And I ask this Congress to declare that women should earn a living equal to their efforts, and finally pass the ""Paycheck Fairness Act"" this year.
text_preceding: And I now urge the House to do the same.
text_following: We know our economy is stronger when we reward an honest day's work with honest wages.

text_original: We know our economy is stronger when we reward an honest day's work with honest wages.
text_preceding: And I ask this Congress to declare that women should earn a living equal to their efforts, and finally pass the ""Paycheck Fairness Act"" this year.
text_following: But today, a full-time worker making the minimum wage earns $14,500 a year.

text_original: But today, a full-time worker making the minimum wage earns $14,500 a year.
text_preceding: We know our economy is stronger when we reward an honest day's work with honest wages.
text_following: Even with the tax relief we put in place, a family with two kids that earns the minimum wage still lives below the poverty line.

text_original: Even with the tax relief we put in place, a family with two kids that earns the minimum wage still lives below the poverty line.
text_preceding: But today, a full-time worker making the minimum wage earns $14,500 a year.
text_following: That's why, since the last time this Congress raised the minimum wage, 19 States have chosen to bump theirs even higher.

text_preceding: Even with the tax relief we put in place, a family with two kids that earns the minimum wage still lives below the poverty line.
text_following: Tonight let's declare that in the wealthiest nation on Earth, no one who works full-time should have to live in poverty and raise the Federal minimum wage to $9 an hour.

text_original: Tonight let's declare that in the wealthiest nation on Earth, no one who works full-time should have to live in poverty and raise the Federal minimum wage to $9 an hour.
text_preceding: That's why, since the last time this Congress raised the minimum wage, 19 States have chosen to bump theirs even higher.
text_following: We should be able to get that done.

text_original: We should be able to get that done.
text_preceding: Tonight let's declare that in the wealthiest nation on Earth, no one who works full-time should have to live in poverty and raise the Federal minimum wage to $9 an hour.
text_following: This single step would raise the incomes of millions of working families.

text_original: This single step would raise the incomes of millions of working families.
text_preceding: We should be able to get that done.
text_following: It could mean the difference between groceries or the food bank, rent or eviction, scraping by or finally getting ahead.

text_original: It could mean the difference between groceries or the food bank, rent or eviction, scraping by or finally getting ahead.
text_preceding: This single step would raise the incomes of millions of working families.
text_following: For businesses across the country, it would mean customers with more money in their pockets.

text_original: For businesses across the country, it would mean customers with more money in their pockets.
text_preceding: It could mean the difference between groceries or the food bank, rent or eviction, scraping by or finally getting ahead.
text_following: And a whole lot of folks out there would probably need less help from government.

text_original: And a whole lot of folks out there would probably need less help from government.
text_preceding: For businesses across the country, it would mean customers with more money in their pockets.
text_following: In fact, working folks shouldn't have to wait year after year for the minimum wage to go up while CEO pay has never been higher.

text_original: In fact, working folks shouldn't have to wait year after year for the minimum wage to go up while CEO pay has never been higher.
text_preceding: And a whole lot of folks out there would probably need less help from government.
text_following: So here's an idea that Governor Romney and I actually agreed on last year: Let's tie the minimum wage to the cost of living so that it finally becomes a wage you can live on.

text_following: Let's offer incentives to companies that hire Americans who've got what it takes to fill that job opening, but have been out of work so long that no one will give them a chance anymore.

text_original: And this year, my administration will begin to partner with 20 of the hardest hit towns in America to get these communities back on their feet.
text_preceding: Let's put people back to work rebuilding vacant homes in rundown neighborhoods.

text_preceding: Now, we'll work with local leaders to target resources at public safety and education and housing.
text_following: And we'll work to strengthen families by removing the financial deterrents to marriage for low-income couples and do more to encourage fatherhood, because what makes you a man isn't the ability to conceive a child, it's having the courage to raise one.

text_following: It is this kind of prosperity-broad, shared, built on a thriving middle class-that has always been the source of our progress at home.

text_original: It is this kind of prosperity-broad, shared, built on a thriving middle class-that has always been the source of our progress at home.
text_preceding: And we want to encourage that.
text_following: It's also the foundation of our power and influence throughout the world.

text_preceding: It is this kind of prosperity-broad, shared, built on a thriving middle class-that has always been the source of our progress at home.

text_preceding: It's also the foundation of our power and influence throughout the world.

text_following: But to meet this threat, we don't need to send tens of thousands of our sons and daughters abroad or occupy other nations.

text_preceding: And where necessary, through a range of capabilities, we will continue to take direct action against those terrorists who pose the gravest threat to Americans.
text_following: That's why my administration has worked tirelessly to forge a durable legal and policy framework to guide our counterterrorism efforts.

text_original: That's why my administration has worked tirelessly to forge a durable legal and policy framework to guide our counterterrorism efforts.

text_original: We know the process will be messy, and we cannot presume to dictate the course of change in countries like Egypt, but we can and will insist on respect for the fundamental rights of all people.
text_preceding: In the Middle East, we will stand with citizens as they demand their universal rights and support stable transitions to democracy.
text_following: We'll keep the pressure on a Syrian regime that has murdered its own people and support opposition leaders that respect the rights of every Syrian.

text_original: We'll keep the pressure on a Syrian regime that has murdered its own people and support opposition leaders that respect the rights of every Syrian.
text_preceding: We know the process will be messy, and we cannot presume to dictate the course of change in countries like Egypt, but we can and will insist on respect for the fundamental rights of all people.
text_following: And we will stand steadfast with Israel in pursuit of security and a lasting peace.

text_original: And we will stand steadfast with Israel in pursuit of security and a lasting peace.
text_preceding: We'll keep the pressure on a Syrian regime that has murdered its own people and support opposition leaders that respect the rights of every Syrian.
text_following: These are the messages I'll deliver when I travel to the Middle East next month.

text_original: These are the messages I'll deliver when I travel to the Middle East next month.
text_preceding: And we will stand steadfast with Israel in pursuit of security and a lasting peace.
text_following: And all this work depends on the courage and sacrifice of those who serve in dangerous places at great personal risk: our diplomats, our intelligence officers, and the men and women of the United States Armed Forces.

text_original: And all this work depends on the courage and sacrifice of those who serve in dangerous places at great personal risk: our diplomats, our intelligence officers, and the men and women of the United States Armed Forces.
text_preceding: These are the messages I'll deliver when I travel to the Middle East next month.
text_following: As long as I'm Commander in Chief, we will do whatever we must to protect those who serve their country abroad, and we will maintain the best military the world has ever known.

text_original: As long as I'm Commander in Chief, we will do whatever we must to protect those who serve their country abroad, and we will maintain the best military the world has ever known.
text_preceding: And all this work depends on the courage and sacrifice of those who serve in dangerous places at great personal risk: our diplomats, our intelligence officers, and the men and women of the United States Armed Forces.
text_following: We'll invest in new capabilities, even as we reduce waste and wartime spending.

text_original: We'll invest in new capabilities, even as we reduce waste and wartime spending.
text_preceding: As long as I'm Commander in Chief, we will do whatever we must to protect those who serve their country abroad, and we will maintain the best military the world has ever known.
text_following: We will ensure equal treatment for all servicemembers and equal benefits for their families, gay and straight.

text_original: We will ensure equal treatment for all servicemembers and equal benefits for their families, gay and straight.
text_preceding: We'll invest in new capabilities, even as we reduce waste and wartime spending.
text_following: We will draw upon the courage and skills of our sisters and daughters and moms, because women have proven under fire that they are ready for combat.

text_original: We will draw upon the courage and skills of our sisters and daughters and moms, because women have proven under fire that they are ready for combat.
text_preceding: We will ensure equal treatment for all servicemembers and equal benefits for their families, gay and straight.
text_following: We will keep faith with our veterans, investing in world-class care-including mental health care-for our wounded warriors, supporting our military families, giving our veterans the benefits and education and job opportunities that they have earned.

text_original: We will keep faith with our veterans, investing in world-class care-including mental health care-for our wounded warriors, supporting our military families, giving our veterans the benefits and education and job opportunities that they have earned.
text_preceding: We will draw upon the courage and skills of our sisters and daughters and moms, because women have proven under fire that they are ready for combat.
text_following: And I want to thank my wife Michelle and Dr. Jill Biden for their continued dedication to serving our military families as well as they have served us.

text_original: And I want to thank my wife Michelle and Dr. Jill Biden for their continued dedication to serving our military families as well as they have served us.
text_preceding: We will keep faith with our veterans, investing in world-class care-including mental health care-for our wounded warriors, supporting our military families, giving our veterans the benefits and education and job opportunities that they have earned.
text_following: Defending our freedom, though, is not just the job of our military alone.

text_original: Defending our freedom, though, is not just the job of our military alone.
text_preceding: And I want to thank my wife Michelle and Dr. Jill Biden for their continued dedication to serving our military families as well as they have served us.
text_following: We must all do our part to make sure our God-given rights are protected here at home.

text_original: We must all do our part to make sure our God-given rights are protected here at home.
text_preceding: Defending our freedom, though, is not just the job of our military alone.
text_following: That includes one of the most fundamental rights of a democracy: the right to vote.

text_original: That includes one of the most fundamental rights of a democracy: the right to vote.
text_preceding: We must all do our part to make sure our God-given rights are protected here at home.
text_following: Now, when any American, no matter where they live or what their party, are denied that right because they can't afford to wait for 5 or 6 or 7 hours just to cast their ballot, we are betraying our ideals.

text_following: In fact, no laws, no initiatives, no administrative acts will perfectly solve all the challenges I've outlined tonight.

text_following: We were sent here to make what difference we can, to secure this Nation, expand opportunity, uphold our ideals through the hard, often frustrating, but absolutely necessary work of self-government.

text_preceding: THE PRESIDENT:  Mr. Speaker, Mr. Vice President, Members of Congress, my fellow Americans: We are 15 years into this new century.
text_following: that unfolded with a new generation fighting two long and costly wars;

text_following: America, for all that we have endured;

text_preceding: We are humbled and grateful for your service.
text_following: for all the grit and hard work required to come back;

text_original: for all the grit and hard work required to come back;
text_preceding: America, for all that we have endured;
text_following: for all the tasks that lie ahead, know this:  The shadow of crisis has passed, and the State of the Union is strong.

text_original: for all the tasks that lie ahead, know this:  The shadow of crisis has passed, and the State of the Union is strong.

text_following: At this moment -- with a growing economy, shrinking deficits, bustling industry, booming energy production -- we have risen from recession freer to write our own future than any other nation on Earth.

text_original: At this moment -- with a growing economy, shrinking deficits, bustling industry, booming energy production -- we have risen from recession freer to write our own future than any other nation on Earth.

text_following: It's now up to us to choose who we want to be over the next 15 years and for decades to come.

text_original: It's now up to us to choose who we want to be over the next 15 years and for decades to come.

text_following: Will we accept an economy where only a few of us do spectacularly well?

text_original: Will we accept an economy where only a few of us do spectacularly well?
text_preceding: It's now up to us to choose who we want to be over the next 15 years and for decades to come.
text_following: Or will we commit ourselves to an economy that generates rising incomes and chances for everyone who makes the effort?

text_preceding: Will we accept an economy where only a few of us do spectacularly well?
text_following: Will we approach the world fearful and reactive, dragged into costly conflicts that strain our military and set back our standing?

text_following: And in fact, at every moment of economic change throughout our history, this country has taken bold action to adapt to new circumstances and to make sure everyone gets a fair shot.

text_original: And in fact, at every moment of economic change throughout our history, this country has taken bold action to adapt to new circumstances and to make sure everyone gets a fair shot.

text_following: We set up worker protections, Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid to protect ourselves from the harshest adversity.

text_original: We set up worker protections, Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid to protect ourselves from the harshest adversity.
text_preceding: And in fact, at every moment of economic change throughout our history, this country has taken bold action to adapt to new circumstances and to make sure everyone gets a fair shot.

text_original: We gave our citizens schools and colleges, infrastructure and the Internet -- tools they needed to go as far as their effort and their dreams will take them.

text_following: That's what middle-class economics is -- the idea that this country does best when everyone gets their fair shot, everyone does their fair share, everyone plays by the same set of rules.

text_original: That's what middle-class economics is -- the idea that this country does best when everyone gets their fair shot, everyone does their fair share, everyone plays by the same set of rules.

text_original: We don't just want everyone to share in America's success, we want everyone to contribute to our success.
text_preceding: That's what middle-class economics is -- the idea that this country does best when everyone gets their fair shot, everyone does their fair share, everyone plays by the same set of rules.
text_following: So what does middle-class economics require in our time?

text_original: So what does middle-class economics require in our time?
text_preceding: We don't just want everyone to share in America's success, we want everyone to contribute to our success.
text_following: First, middle-class economics means helping working families feel more secure in a world of constant change.

text_preceding: That means helping folks afford childcare, college, health care, a home, retirement.
text_following: During World War II, when men like my grandfather went off to war, having women like my grandmother in the workforce was a national security priority -- so this country provided universal childcare.

text_preceding: And my budget will address each of these issues, lowering the taxes of working families and putting thousands of dollars back into their pockets each year.
text_following: In today's economy, when having both parents in the workforce is an economic necessity for many families, we need affordable, high-quality childcare more than ever.

text_original: In today's economy, when having both parents in the workforce is an economic necessity for many families, we need affordable, high-quality childcare more than ever.
text_preceding: During World War II, when men like my grandfather went off to war, having women like my grandmother in the workforce was a national security priority -- so this country provided universal childcare.

text_preceding: It's not a nice-to-have -- it's a must-have.
text_following: And that's why my plan will make quality childcare more available and more affordable for every middle-class and low-income family with young children in America -- by creating more slots and a new tax cut of up to $3,000 per child, per year.

text_following: Today, we are the only advanced country on Earth that doesn't guarantee paid sick leave or paid maternity leave to our workers.

text_original: Forty-three million workers have no paid sick leave -- 43 million.

text_preceding: America thrived in the 20th century because we made high school free, sent a generation of GIs to college, trained the best workforce in the world.
text_following: And in a 21st century economy that rewards knowledge like never before, we need to up our game.

text_original: And in a 21st century economy that rewards knowledge like never before, we need to up our game.
text_preceding: But other countries caught on.
text_following: By the end of this decade, two in three job openings will require some higher education -- two in three.

text_original: By the end of this decade, two in three job openings will require some higher education -- two in three.
text_preceding: And in a 21st century economy that rewards knowledge like never before, we need to up our game.
text_following: And yet, we still live in a country where too many bright, striving Americans are priced out of the education they need.

text_preceding: And yet, we still live in a country where too many bright, striving Americans are priced out of the education they need.
text_following: That's why I'm sending this Congress a bold new plan to lower the cost of community college -- to zero.

text_following: And I want to work with this Congress to make sure those already burdened with student loans can reduce their monthly payments so that student debt doesn't derail anyone's dreams.

text_original: And I want to work with this Congress to make sure those already burdened with student loans can reduce their monthly payments so that student debt doesn't derail anyone's dreams.
text_preceding: Let's stay ahead of the curve.
text_following: Thanks to Vice President Biden's great work to update our job training system, we're connecting community colleges with local employers to train workers to fill high-paying jobs like coding, and nursing, and robotics.

text_original: Thanks to Vice President Biden's great work to update our job training system, we're connecting community colleges with local employers to train workers to fill high-paying jobs like coding, and nursing, and robotics.

text_following: Tonight, I'm also asking more businesses to follow the lead of companies like CVS and UPS, and offer more educational benefits and paid apprenticeships -- opportunities that give workers the chance to earn higher-paying jobs even if they don't have a higher education.

text_following: So to every CEO in America, let me repeat:  If you want somebody who's going to get the job done and done right, hire a veteran.

text_following: Finally, as we better train our workers, we need the new economy to keep churning out high-wage jobs for our workers to fill.

text_original: Since 2010, America has put more people back to work than Europe, Japan, and all advanced economies combined.

text_original: Our manufacturers have added almost 800,000 new jobs.

text_preceding: And that's why the third part of middle-class economics is all about building the most competitive economy anywhere, the place where businesses want to locate and hire.

text_preceding: We should level the playing field.

text_following: Where we too often run onto the rocks is how to pay for these investments.

text_original: Where we too often run onto the rocks is how to pay for these investments.
text_preceding: Members of both parties have told me so.
text_following: As Americans, we don't mind paying our fair share of taxes as long as everybody else does, too.

text_original: As Americans, we don't mind paying our fair share of taxes as long as everybody else does, too.
text_preceding: Where we too often run onto the rocks is how to pay for these investments.
text_following: But for far too long, lobbyists have rigged the tax code with loopholes that let some corporations pay nothing while others pay full freight.

text_original: But for far too long, lobbyists have rigged the tax code with loopholes that let some corporations pay nothing while others pay full freight.
text_preceding: As Americans, we don't mind paying our fair share of taxes as long as everybody else does, too.
text_following: They've riddled it with giveaways that the super-rich don't need, while denying a break to middle-class families who do.

text_original: They've riddled it with giveaways that the super-rich don't need, while denying a break to middle-class families who do.
text_preceding: But for far too long, lobbyists have rigged the tax code with loopholes that let some corporations pay nothing while others pay full freight.
text_following: This year, we have an opportunity to change that.

text_original: This year, we have an opportunity to change that.
text_preceding: They've riddled it with giveaways that the super-rich don't need, while denying a break to middle-class families who do.
text_following: Let's close loopholes so we stop rewarding companies that keep profits abroad, and reward those that invest here in America.

text_original: Let's close loopholes so we stop rewarding companies that keep profits abroad, and reward those that invest here in America.
text_preceding: This year, we have an opportunity to change that.
text_following: Let's use those savings to rebuild our infrastructure and to make it more attractive for companies to bring jobs home.

text_original: Let's use those savings to rebuild our infrastructure and to make it more attractive for companies to bring jobs home.
text_preceding: Let's close loopholes so we stop rewarding companies that keep profits abroad, and reward those that invest here in America.

text_original: Let's simplify the system and let a small business owner file based on her actual bank statement, instead of the number of accountants she can afford.
text_preceding: Let's use those savings to rebuild our infrastructure and to make it more attractive for companies to bring jobs home.
text_following: And let's close the loopholes that lead to inequality by allowing the top one percent to avoid paying taxes on their accumulated wealth.

text_preceding: Let's simplify the system and let a small business owner file based on her actual bank statement, instead of the number of accountants she can afford.

text_preceding: And let's close the loopholes that lead to inequality by allowing the top one percent to avoid paying taxes on their accumulated wealth.

text_preceding: We need a tax code that truly helps working Americans trying to get a leg up in the new economy, and we can achieve that together.
text_following: Giving them the tools they need for good-paying jobs in this new economy.

text_original: Giving them the tools they need for good-paying jobs in this new economy.
text_preceding: Helping hardworking families make ends meet.
text_following: Maintaining the conditions of growth and competitiveness.

text_original: Maintaining the conditions of growth and competitiveness.
text_preceding: Giving them the tools they need for good-paying jobs in this new economy.
text_following: This is where America needs to go.

text_original: This is where America needs to go.
text_preceding: Maintaining the conditions of growth and competitiveness.
text_following: I believe it's where the American people want to go.

text_original: I believe it's where the American people want to go.
text_preceding: This is where America needs to go.
text_following: It will make our economy stronger a year from now, 15 years from now, and deep into the century ahead.

text_original: It will make our economy stronger a year from now, 15 years from now, and deep into the century ahead.
text_preceding: I believe it's where the American people want to go.
text_following: Of course, if there's one thing this new century has taught us, it's that we cannot separate our work here at home from challenges beyond our shores.

text_original: Of course, if there's one thing this new century has taught us, it's that we cannot separate our work here at home from challenges beyond our shores.
text_preceding: It will make our economy stronger a year from now, 15 years from now, and deep into the century ahead.
text_following: My first duty as Commander-in-Chief is to defend the United States of America.

text_original: My first duty as Commander-in-Chief is to defend the United States of America.
text_preceding: Of course, if there's one thing this new century has taught us, it's that we cannot separate our work here at home from challenges beyond our shores.
text_following: In doing so, the question is not whether America leads in the world, but how.

text_original: In doing so, the question is not whether America leads in the world, but how.
text_preceding: My first duty as Commander-in-Chief is to defend the United States of America.
text_following: When we make rash decisions, reacting to the headlines instead of using our heads;

text_original: When we make rash decisions, reacting to the headlines instead of using our heads;
text_preceding: In doing so, the question is not whether America leads in the world, but how.
text_following: when the first response to a challenge is to send in our military -- then we risk getting drawn into unnecessary conflicts, and neglect the broader strategy we need for a safer, more prosperous world.

text_original: when the first response to a challenge is to send in our military -- then we risk getting drawn into unnecessary conflicts, and neglect the broader strategy we need for a safer, more prosperous world.

text_preceding: when the first response to a challenge is to send in our military -- then we risk getting drawn into unnecessary conflicts, and neglect the broader strategy we need for a safer, more prosperous world.

text_preceding: That's what our enemies want us to do.
text_following: We lead best when we combine military power with strong diplomacy;

text_following: First, we stand united with people around the world who have been targeted by terrorists -- from a school in Pakistan to the streets of Paris.

text_original: First, we stand united with people around the world who have been targeted by terrorists -- from a school in Pakistan to the streets of Paris.

text_following: We will continue to hunt down terrorists and dismantle their networks, and we reserve the right to act unilaterally, as we have done relentlessly since I took office to take out terrorists who pose a direct threat to us and our allies.

text_original: We will continue to hunt down terrorists and dismantle their networks, and we reserve the right to act unilaterally, as we have done relentlessly since I took office to take out terrorists who pose a direct threat to us and our allies.

text_following: At the same time, we've learned some costly lessons over the last 13 years.

text_following: Instead of Americans patrolling the valleys of Afghanistan, we've trained their security forces, who have now taken the lead, and we've honored our troops' sacrifice by supporting that country's first democratic transition.

text_original: Instead of Americans patrolling the valleys of Afghanistan, we've trained their security forces, who have now taken the lead, and we've honored our troops' sacrifice by supporting that country's first democratic transition.
text_preceding: At the same time, we've learned some costly lessons over the last 13 years.
text_following: Instead of sending large ground forces overseas, we're partnering with nations from South Asia to North Africa to deny safe haven to terrorists who threaten America.

text_original: Instead of sending large ground forces overseas, we're partnering with nations from South Asia to North Africa to deny safe haven to terrorists who threaten America.
text_preceding: Instead of Americans patrolling the valleys of Afghanistan, we've trained their security forces, who have now taken the lead, and we've honored our troops' sacrifice by supporting that country's first democratic transition.
text_following: In Iraq and Syria, American leadership -- including our military power -- is stopping ISIL's advance.

text_original: In Iraq and Syria, American leadership -- including our military power -- is stopping ISIL's advance.
